Summary: I stayed at this hotel for 2 nights. The staff was great and the breakfast was very good. Love the bed and pillows. Room was very clean when we arrived. Also loved that the Art shuttle stop is so close.

Summary Heading: Close to Disneyland and Garden Walk
Summary: I recently stayed here for 4 nights on business.  I am a Diamond member and had no issues with check-in or check-out.  I did walk to DL and found it to be about a 12-15 minutes time frame.  Also, walking down Disney Way to the parks the sidewalk is mostly shaded.  No breakfast at this time but you can grab a free coffee in the lobby gift shop and then would find breakfast within the parks.  You can call for anything needed for your room as there is not any room service unless requested. The room was nice and I could not hear anything from other rooms. I did not use the pool but saw that it was nice and clean.  I did order food using Doordash one night and it was delivered to the front desk where I was called to pick up.  If you take Uber or Lyft either way to the parks it is

I recommend taking  Uber to the park and back to the hotel

Manager Response: none

Summary: Great modern and clean rooms. Location is very good. 8 minute brisk walk to Disney. Would stay again. Improvements: they only serve coffee and tea for a fee til 10 am. The hot water takes a minute. Start the shower a few minutes early and wait. They should start serving buffet breakfast again included in the price. It came complimentary when I booked but by the time the trip came around there was no more breakfast included.  Also no daily service to clean rooms. Just an FYI.  It was too cold to use the pool during our visit but it looks nice.

Summary Heading: Usually 4 out of 5 stars but bad booking experience left us sour
Summary: We usually love this property - its nice, close to the parks - except for our last visit. We booked a family of 4 for a king suite as the kids like to pull out the sofa and have their own TV in the living room area. However, they gave us a 1 king bed with no sofa room. No place for kids to sleep. After specifically booking the king suite they told us there were none available day of check in. They offered us a 2 queen room but it had no sofa area or living room. We checked into the queen room and found previous guests take out food left in the fridge. yuck. Our 2 friends checked in later in the evening several hours after us and ended up with the king suite we originally booked. The hotel staff blamed booking.com.
Room tip: Park early and walk to parks. Not close to restaurants, best to order delivery.

Summary: Clean, Comfortable, Excellent Staff Close to everything including Disneyland. at a great price 5 stars from myself, with a good inexpensive breakfast as well 7.00 uber ride to the park. The pictures are accurate in all the booking sites TripAdvisor, booking.com Etc.

Summary: This hotel is GORGEOUS!! Staff is AMAZING especially Joey!! So sweet! This was a last minute booking but I will stay here again!! Thank you Joey for everything!! You went above and beyond!! Definitely a must stay!

Summary Heading: Convenient to the Disney, but that’s pretty much the only good thing about it.

Like the chicken & waffles was $15.95 and it was just 2 waffles (so half of a whole waffle) that you can make with those make it urself waffles at an inclusive breakfast & chicken strips. Summary: Stayed here for two nights.  Very clean, modern hotel with surfing theme.  Staff was really great.  Very reasonably priced.  Nice hot tub and pool.  Short walk to many restaurants, shops, Disney. Breakfast is not included in stay.  I would definitely stay here again if in the area.

Summary Heading: Must stay. Extremely clean and staff is amazing!
Summary: Honestly it all started with David F at the front desk. I showed up @ 1130 way early and check in wasn't till 3. Bummer right. But then everything changed when David gave me access to the pool and was able to move me to a different style room and check me in early. It was exactly what I need after a long drive. My back was killing me and all I wanted was a shower. I'm so thankful for David and his friendly attitude and I will come back soon when I visit Disneyland which seems to be the main reason ppl stay here Nd that totally make sense since it's the perfect location. It's so clean as well and just everything about the place screams 5 star. Thank you Suncoast by Hilton and especially thank you to David F of front desk.

After heading to our room we found that outlets in bathroom did not work , evacuation plans were missing , shower curtain had holes in it and air filter definitely hadn’t been changed . We were moved to another room but  even when going in and out hotel staff never said a word .   This hotel has potential to be amazing , the little things that make a great stay . Smile goes a long way and hello .  Housekeeping : Truly amazing as always , friendly and said good morning .

Summary: I’ve been to Disneyland several times. This stay had what I wanted: close proximity, affordable, clean, safe, and quiet. Kids loved pool and hot tub. Parking was convenient. Restaurant was lack luster.

Thanks Joey! Our rooms were super clean, shout out to the housekeeping team!  The shuttle for Disneyland picks you up practically in front of the hotel and drops you off right at the entrance of Disneyland, so it makes it so easy to come back and forth and not have to worry about the hassle of parking there. I’ll definitely pick this hotel again for our next Disney

Summary: Every time we come to Disneyland, we stay at the Suncoast! We are here every few months and love how the staff treats us! The rooms are fabulous and always clean! Housekeeping is on top of it! The pool area is a nice size with plenty of seating area! It also has amazing view for fireworks. A big bonus is that is only a 10 minute walk to the parks making it super easy to take breaks!   I also want to give a HUGE THANK YOU to Isa! Summary Heading: The best part of the stay was Joey at check in
Summary: The absolute saving grace was Joey, the person that checked us in - he was an absolute delight, friendly and helpful and very goof at his job. The actual room was not so great, in particular the bathroom was AWFUL. To begin with, there us no actual door for the bathroom, it's like a closet door on rollers, impossible to actually close and no way to lock. The bathroom fan doesn't function so it stays steamed up IF you can get the water to stay hot (it fluctuates between cold and hot while using.) The toiletries were minimal, with no shampoo (but face wash, hair conditioner and lotion available.) The only place to hang clothes or towels is INSIDE THE SHOWER, which is ridiculous. All in all, definitely not a 4 star hotel except for the excellent staff, Joey in particular.

Room was clean and comfortable and the bathroom had plenty of hot water and pressure. The bed was comfortable and so was the seating. We were given a room on the 5th floor and had a great view of the fireworks (was not listed as a fireworks room) The walk to Disney is about 15 minutes. We stayed here earlier in the year and the pool was was also large and nicely maintained.  Cons: Breakfast is kinda weak and as Hilton Diamond we are trying to use the food and beverage

Summary: Welcoming and friendly staff. The room was nice and clean! My family and I were very pleased with this hotel stay. This will definitely be a hotel we will choose to stay at when on vacation. The staff was all friendly!

Summary Heading: Wonderful stay and 10 minutes away from Disneyland
Summary: This hotel really was the best option I've had during all my stays near Disneyland. It's only 10-12 minutes walking distance from Disney entrance. Hotel had a nice large lobby and lots of space to relax and play some table games. Outdoor pool seemed large, heated, though we didn't get to use it. I highly recommend this place at your next stay in Anaheim!

Summary: Close walking distance to Disneyland (about 10 mins), comfy beds, clean spacious rooms, nice lounge set up in lobby, courteous customer service. Overall satisfied with our stay here if we visit the area again.

Summary: Our family decided to stay at SunCoast for our first family Disney trip. It was only a 12 minute walk to the park. She was able to recommend drinks, she made sure everyone in our family of 14 was taken care of and even helped all the other people around us. She was working by herself and she always had a smile on her face and was so amazing even though I know it was probably stressful for her.  So thank you so much Issa for all that you do, we really appreciated you and how hard you work.

Summary Heading: Amazing Hotel so close to Disneyland!
Summary: We stayed at this hotel for 4 nights 21-25 and it was absolutely superb! Check in was straight forward and easy. The lobby was beautiful and everywhere looked fresh and clean. Our room was perfect! Massive in size with 2 queen beds, but the most amazing part was the view! We could see Disneys Pixar Wheel and Guardians of the Galaxy ride, plus the view of the fireworks was great. Only a 15 minute walk to the park on a well lit and wide path. We didn’t get chance to use the pool but again this looked clean and inviting. A big benefit to this hotel was the complementary use of the self service laundry room. This was perfect to clean and dry our clothes before we moved to the next part of our trip. I would 100% recommend this hotel and hope to return myself again soon.

The first night we had a room facing the highway and the noise was terrible, we could hear highway noise all night long and no one slept because of it. I messaged the hotel to see if they'd be able to place a crib in our room for our infant son. Summary: SunCoast hotel It’s down the road from Disney 10-15 min walk to the main gate, love love love their pool, it was very kid friendly, the room was nice the beds were comfy, the staff was also super nice, will definitely stay there again. We loved the person that checked us in I believe her name was cherise, she had a positive attitude. The only downfall was the cost of the breakfast, it was a little over priced but I guess that’s what you expect for a higher end hotel.
Manager Response: MKrause926,   thank you for recognizing Cherine and sharing with the Tripadvisor community. We look forward to your return visit.

Summary Heading: Nice hotel within walking distance to Disney.
Summary: This was a nice place to stay for Disney.  It's in walking distance, maybe a bit far after a long day but it's an option. Rooms were nice, and clean, nice pool. A bit off the path of the other hotels but a good choice. Try to stay in room on side away from hwy.
Manager Response: Spdurante,   Thanks for the review!

Summary: I visited Anaheim by way of Phoenix and wanted to stay at a nice hotel near Disney. I found Suncoast  Tapestry online and chose it because of the proximity and good reviews. I expected good but I received great. The Manager, David and crew were exceptional! Thx again for top notch hospitality!
Manager Response: Mikeya1993,   We are thrilled you enjoyed your stay! Come back soon!

Summary Heading: Great Hotel and Location for Disneyland
Summary: We stayed at the SunCoast - Anaheim for 3 nights and were very pleased.  Our room, the lobby & all interior common areas and the outdoor pool & Jacuzzi area were all clean and well maintained.  We found the front desk reception staff, and all other staff encountered to be very friendly & courteous!  In particular, we really enjoyed Issa, who was the evening Bartender/Food server!  She was extremely friendly and courteous!!  She created a special request Bloody Mary for me that I suggested and decided it was one that they would add to their drink menu!  Ask for the "Gary Special" Bloody Mary! There is no complimentary breakfast at this Hilton property.  We knew that when we booked, so was not an issue.  There are plenty of nearby restaurants within a 5 min walk at the Garden Walk
Manager Response: GOLA12,   Thank you very much for sharing your experience! We can't wait to have you back!

Summary: The hotel is 0.6 miles from the entrance of Disneyland Resort. Very walkable. Our suite was modern, clean, and a very generous size. The staff is friendly and professional. Shout out to Issa who provided amazing service at the bar. She also went beyond the call of duty by taking care of me when I stupidly walked into a door and lacerated my eyelid! Thank you!
Manager Response: HanHayward,   We are sorry to hear about about your eyelid... we hope you are doing ok. We are so happy you enjoyed SunCoast Park Hotel and can't wait to have you back.

Summary: It is a very nice place to stay . We enjoyed it and the room we selected gave us the privacy we wanted , since our grandson was an adult.I do wish that they included breakfast and parking wasn’t a separate charge . It was kind of expensive for what was offered . The only downfall for us was the walking distance to the park was a little too far for us.
Manager Response: Debra L,   Thank you for the 5 bubble review. We are happy to learn you enjoyed your stay and the proximity from SunCoast Park Hotel Anaheim. Come back soon!

Summary: Overall a good hotel.  Good location. Front desk staff nice and helpful. Room clean. Nice pool area. Easy parking if you have a car-which you don’t need if staying local. Issa at the bar/restaurant is great. Friendly and good food.
Manager Response: A5138Qljsta,   We are thrilled to learn you stay was a 5 Bubble one! Thank you for recognizing our amazing bartender. We can't wait to have you back.

Summary: Hotel is in great shape and has 2 free washer and dryers on the garage level that are not mentioned on the website so are usually available since no one knows they are there. Used the ART busses to get around, the on demand feature is great for $6 a day a bus will pick you up and take you where you want to go, very nice between 10:30am and 6:30pm when the park routes don’t run.  The on site restaurant/bar serves decent food, and has a well stocked bar. Walking to anything is very feasible from this property, nothing is very far away. But when at a convention or the Disney parks you walk plenty so using the busses is well worth knocking a few of the days steps off.
Manager Response: Wesley S,   Thank you for the 5 bubble review! We appreciate you sharing your experience of SunCoast Park Hotel with the Tripadvisor community and look forward to having you again.

Summary: Easy to find and only 10 mins walk to Disney.  Great Value for money as we paid £470 U.K. sterling for 3 nights. Parking is tad expensive at $28 per night plus tax. It’s clean and modern inside. The rooms are large. The pool is good but quiet. We stayed 3 days and on 2nd day had to ask for towels as nobody at all had been to clean rooms any of the 3 days hence why I gave 4 and not 5 stars.
Manager Response: RennieFamilyHolidays,   Thank you for the feedback and sharing your experience.

Summary: The staff were so excellent and I was so grateful they were able to accommodate me during my stay! Lobby smells great, walking distance to Disney, clean rooms and a warm and big pool! Everything was fantastic the week we were there. It was my 3 and a half year old nephews first time at Disney and he loved the hotel and the pool a lot.
Manager Response: Scarlet S,   We are thrilled you enjoyed your experience and stay at SunCoast Park Hotel Anaheim. We hope yo have you back for your nephews next visit to Disneyland.

Summary: I stayed here for several nights.  The hotel lobby and pool area where very nice.  It’s an easy walk to the convention center and to the parks.  The room is a pretty standard hotel room.  The staff were quite nice and helpful during all interactions. It’s not a cheap place to stay but you know that when you book it.
Manager Response: LostALot22,   Thank you for your feedback!

Summary: Stay here and enjoy the short walk to Disney. Bonuses of this hotel are plenty. Awesome, friendly staff! Especially Tony and Issa in the bar and restaurant. The pool is large with a hot tub and is kept clean as the rooms are as well. Would definitely stay here again!   Lesley
Manager Response: lesleyD4907CG,   Thank you for the 5 bubble review! We are thrilled you enjoyed your experience at Suncoast Park Hotel. We can't wait to have you back.

Summary: First time at the Suncoast hotel, room is nice big and super clean. Decided to head down to the bar for a few beers before heading down to Disneyland.  Issa was bartending, incredibly  friendly and very professional.  Will definitely be coming back to this hotel!!
Manager Response: kodieH93,   Thank you for the 5 bubble review and the shout out to our fantastic bartender! We'll be sure to share! Come back soon!

Summary Heading: Short walk to anything you would need for a Disneyland vacation.
Summary: Great room size. Nice pool. Wait staff was very welcoming and nice. Very short easy walk to both parks and downtown Disney. And equally as short walk to the convention center. I would say my GF and I walk slightly faster than most people. Walking to any of those places took about 15is minutes. Also the ART bus pick up is right out front of the hotel if you’d rather take that
Manager Response: mbc5989,   Thanks for the great review! We look forward to your return visit.

Summary: The hotel location is okay..about a 10 minute walk to Disneyland ..my opinion is a little far if you have young kids.  The rooms are nice and are clean. We booked with Westjet and it included a hot breakfast buffet. When we checked in we were told the buffet was not available but we would be provided a $12 credit for the small coffee shop/breakfast area. I expressed that I was not happy with that..why do we have a limit..just one cup of coffee cost $5..I requested to speak to the manager however the manager was not available. The next day I see a hot breakfast buffet set up only to be told we could not eat there as it was only for the high school graduates that were staying there. Obviously I was not happy about this..even my hotel confirmation said includes hot buffet..once
Manager Response: judygQ2076YW,   Please contact david.gutierrez4@hilton.com to discuss your stay details.

Summary: This hotel is extremely clean and well put together.  The staff is incredibly friendly and the vibe is awesome!! Kudos to the hotel manager for running an awesome hotel. We really enjoyed the bar area.  The pool area is also awesome and you can see the Disneyland fireworks perfectly.  Can’t wait to stay again because the rooms are so comfortable and CLEAN. :)
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: Spacious rooms and a beautiful pool.
Summary: Overall we had a great experience here.  We stayed 3 nights here after leaving a "Disney good neighbour hotel," and this was much more pleasant.  The lobby smells so good, I don't know what that scent is but it was lovely.  The pool was large, shallow and warm, there was next to no one in it during the day and my little one really enjoyed swimming for hours.  Rooms are spacious and equipped with a fridge and microwave, and our room had two queens and a hide a bed.  There's no restaurant but lots in walking distance and on uber eats/door dash.  My only complaint is that the app didn't work to open the doors, and the keys were finicky when trying to come in from the pool, we constantly had to have people let us in, or exit to the parking lot and go in the front door. Overall, I
Manager Response: none

Summary: We’ve been here 3 times now, and it never disappoints! It’s a very convenient location, prime location and walking distance to Disneyland! The staff here is very friendly and very accommodating! If you’re looking for a night cap definitely check out their bar and see Issa, she will definitely take care of you! We recommended this hotel to everyone we know. Don’t sleep on the nearby hotels lowkey 😬
Manager Response: monikkajah,   WOW! We are so flattered your go-to hotel in Anaheim is SunCoast Park Hotel Anaheim!  Thank you for recognizing our awesome Team members and we can't wait to have you back!

Summary: Thank you very much Ben for a great customer service. He was very friendly and patient. My stay was overall very positive and I really like the location of the hotel. Everyone is very helpful.  Thank you!
Manager Response: andrewmS431MJ,   Thank you for the 5 bubble review and recognizing our associates. We look forward to your return visit!

Summary Heading: A quiet hotel so close to Disney
Summary: Ok, first off I am a very fussy traveller, to the extent that when I couldn't chose my room on the app the morning before we arrived, I rang the hotel to ask what was up. I spoke to Michella who was very helpful and explained that we should be able to book the 2 fireworks view rooms the next day. Any how they came up on the app later that day and I grabbed them. The next day ( the day we were arriving) Michella reached out to me to explain that there was a maintenance issue in one of the 2 rooms. She gave me several options, one of which was a free upgrade for both rooms to the 2 queen studio suites. As we were staying 6 nights this was a very generous offer, which we took. On checking she personally helped us select the correct rooms for our needs and was very patient with us.
Manager Response: LaLaWales,   WOW! Thank you for sharing such an amazing experience at SunCoast Park Hotel and thank you for recognizing our awesome team. We all look forward to having you back!

Summary: I never review but had to review this hotel. It was clean,  modern and rooms were spacious. We chose it because of closeness to Disney, the fantastic pool and the fact it had a microwave and fridge in the room. We stayed 6 nights and would definitely stay again.
Manager Response: LizhD557ZG,   Thank you for the wonderful comments about your recent stay. We can't wait to have you back!

Summary: I don’t usually write reviews on our hotel stays, but I felt compelled to say something about our recent experience at the Suncoast Park Hotel.  This was an incredible hotel, made even more special by the outstanding staff and service. Issa in particular provided us with incredible service at the restaurant - always giving us the best advice on what to do at Disneyland and she really went above and beyond to make our trip that much more special.  Our room was very nice and the hotel is only a 10-15 min walk from the Disneyland resort. This saved us the need of having to drive our car and pay for parking and it also provided us with much needed flexibility as we could leave and re-enter the parks as we pleased.  The hotel offers one of the biggest and best pools of all the nearby
Manager Response: Curious589192,   Thank you for the wonderful detail about SunCoast Park Hotel and the team member recognition. We can't wait to have you back!

Summary: Family fun environment. Very clean and smells great. Beach vibe very low key hotel. Great for families! Pool is clean and big. There’s also games setup near pool area. The hotel room itself is huge more than enough space for a family.
Manager Response: zlatapu,   Thank you for the fantastic share of your recent hotel experience. We can't wait to have you back!

Summary: This hotel was nice for business. The pizza I had was great. Issa was so kind and friendly. A very new hotel.   I do hope they build up their gym. It’s very sad and they have room for a cable machine and mirrors and a bike.   I would definitely stay there again. It’s by Disney but wasn’t crazy so great for work
Manager Response: Nichole N,   Thank you for your five bubble review! We hope to have you back soon.

Summary: 1) I booked two rooms but when I checked in the front desk only gave me keys to one room. Had to go back down to front desk. 2) they could not give me room close enough to my 10 & 12 years. Literally 23 rooms away! 3) the keys to one of the rooms didn’t work, had to go back downstairs. 4) I was told I would be comped for parking only to have to have to pay for parking when I had to make a quick run to a pharmacy, again had to talk to the front desk. 5) my room with the king bed, though had a little seating area at the front of the room, lack furniture in the area where the bed was. The empty space could fit a whole other bed so the room just looked very awkward. 6) One day two, staff had no control over very rowdy group of guests. A large group took over the pool, the outdoor
Manager Response: none

Summary: This is just the BEST Hotel! We checked in with Karla Z. She was amazing! Very helpful!! We took Ubers to Disneyland. Very quick and inexpensive. Coming back from the parks, we were always greeted and even offered bottle water. Meet the manager one night and I can see why this is such a nice hotel. He runs a great location! We found this to be a very clean, very nice Hilton! Would 100% stay again.
Manager Response: DebbieR760,   WOW! Thank you for recognizing our amazing Team. We absolutely can't wait to have you back!

Summary Heading: If I could give this place a zero I would
Summary: I am a Hilton Lifetime Diamond member and have stayed at countless hotels over the last 40 years. If I could give this hotel a zero I would.  The following is taken directly from their website: Stayover housekeeping service is available upon request during your stay. Simply contact the front desk at any time to request extra towels and amenities or to schedule a room cleaning. For stays of four (4) nights or more, we will provide full cleaning every fourth night/fifth day for all guests.  On our third day I asked that the room be refreshed at 10am.  When we returned to the room at about 1:30 this had not been done.  So I asked that the room be refreshed at 4pm. I went to hallway and spoke to a housekeeping supervisor about my concerns. This was to no avail.   When we returned to
Manager Response: LiJo4145,   I am sorry your stay was not satisfactory and the detail in the shortfalls you experienced.   The housekeeping portion of your concerns  will be addressed and regrettably upper management as unaware until it was too late.    Most importantly thank you for being a Hilton Honor's Diamond member.

Summary Heading: Average Hotel - not really sure why it's a Hilton
Summary: The SunCoast Park Hotel was close to Disneyland. However, I was disappointed this hotel is listed under the Hilton name. It was an average hotel but not an average price. There is a JW Marriott for close to the same price just down the street. If you're looking for an average hotel in the price range of the SunCoast, there are so many to choose from.  The room was average - not particularly comfortable. The lobby was average. The carpets were worn out.  Just not impressive.  I've stayed in many Hilton Hampton Hotels that would beat this hotel on any given day.  It was "fine"
Manager Response: Lilly D,   We are a tapestry Collection hotel by Hilton.  Hilton guests receive the same benefits that all other branded Hilton receives but with an ambience that is unique to the area.   Our 174 guest rooms are next to brand new including the carpets.  We are nothing like a Hampton Inn and I encourage you to take a look at Hilton.com to review the various new brands and how they are different form each other.

Summary: Had an absolutely fantastic time. The rooms are great. We come with a. Family of 4. The front staff is super friendly. Did attend the bar and Issa is fantastic. Eve actually been visiting this hotel for a few years for Disney and she’s been here the whole time. Super nice and friendly. I’d go to any bar she’s bartending.

Summary Heading: Perfect family stay when visiting Disneyland
Summary: Great family vacation. Easy walk to Disneyland, 5-10 mins. Great options to eat out close by. The pool was open late, till 12am, perfect after a long day out at Disneyland. Room was super comfortable for a family of 4. Early check in was offered. We received great service throughout our stay.
Manager Response: Iana824,   WOW!!! Thank you so much for the amazing guest feedback! We can't wait to have you back!

Summary Heading: Friendly staff - above and beyond service
Summary: Cherine was amazing at the front desk from the minute we walked in the door.  She greeted us the next morning as well.    David, I’m assuming the manager,  took time to talk to us and make sure things were wonderful for our stay.  You could tell he respected his staff and the staff respected him as well. Summary: Our first visit here and the staff was SO friendly, and the venue is well kept and clean. Bartender Issa was Absolutely amazing and a sweetheart. As well as David the GM was supe rpolote and friendly. Definitely coming back!

Summary: Nice clean great stuff friendly great GM great front manger quite rooms nice amazing pool i enjoy my time thank suncoast hotel for everything I recommend this great hotel for all desinyland visitors I'm lucky to been there fir 1p days thank you.

Summary: This was a hotel suggested by another sight that we booked our vacation through and we couldn't have more pleased. The staff was great, the entire hotel was clean. The pool was beautiful and the location was great for everything we wanted to do! We will definitely be returning!!
Manager Response: KEC0512,   Thank you for the 5 bubble review!

Summary: I love that it’s soo close to Disney, fireworks every night is wonderful.. I really had such a  nice stay the hotel it was so beautiful,  And Monica at the front desk was so helpful and kind.  I’d definitely love to come back

Summary: Our start to our trip could not have been better with Ellie checking us in. She was very helpful, courteous, and kind. Very clean room and hotel. Easy to get to off the highway. 5 stars for the stay especially for Ellie!  We will stay here again!  Thank you!

Summary: David G the manager and his team make this hotel so amazing. They’re always so pleasant, professional, courteous, accommodating, and go above and beyond. This trip we had checked in with Monica R and she was devine. She got us an upgraded room and got it early for us because we had unexpectedly arrived earlier than we had anticipated. She was so kind.
Manager Response: ARYsMommy    WOW! We are so happy to have had you back. What a wonderful family and we thank you for your business. We can’t wait to have you back soon!

Summary: Nice, clean, newer hotel. Really enjoyed it. It was a short 10 minute walk to parks. We didn't have any issues parking our car prior to us checking in. We were able to park and go to the parks and check in later that night.
Manager Response: brittanyjohnston27,  Thank you so very much for the 5 bubble review. We appreciate your business and look forward to having you back soon.

Summary: Ive stayed in many hotels and this one was is good. I give it 7-8 out of 10 rating. Sink was clogged and house keeping doesnt vacuum behind anything or move anything. I found this out when i dropped something behind the desk, yuck!  However the girls at the front desk made it feel like a 10/10 and rarely do i ever say this. They were great and went over and beyond for me. Both very pleasant and accommodating. I will also say i loved the theme of this hotel and I especially liked our walk to Disneyland. Ive walked from many hotels and this one seemed like one of the better ones to walk from. Didnt feel like we were walking forever after walking the park all day. Uber was $6 when we got desperate on 3rd night lol. It does have a small parking lot & itsnt a very big hotel just
Manager Response: none

Summary: My Son and I Stayed for 5 days to celebrate our birthdays in the Parks. And we absolutely love this hotel, clean facilities, friendly staff, spacious room, walking distance to the Parks and Restaurants and the most important my son enjoy the pool  We definitely stay again 😉
Manager Response: none

Summary: First time staying here and was pleasantly surprise. Much of the hotels in Anaheim are dirty and dated and expensive. This hotel was nicely priced and very clean and modern.  Lobby is warm and welcoming. Staff was very polite and pleasant. Room was great, clean and plenty of room.  Beds very comfortable and very close to Disneyland. I'm very picky with hotels, this one impressed me. We will be back.
Manager Response: tedruiz,   Thank you for the 5 bubble review! We are thrilled we delivered upon your expectations and look forward to  having you back soon.

Summary: I came here to visit friends for the weekend, the hotel overall was great, the receptionist INAH was very helpful and kind. She made my stay worth it. Despite me living in San Diego i came all the way to Anaheim and it was worth it
Manager Response: none

Summary: When we come to Anaheim, Ca we only stay here at SunCoast Park Hotel.  When you enter the hotel you are welcomed like you are coming home, even if it's your first time they don't care, you are treated like family.  The people that work the front deck go far & beyond to make sure you know where things are located in Anaheim & surrounding areas.
Manager Response: Linda J,   Thank you for the wonderful 5 Bubble Review! We enjoy reading fantastic experience such as yours and can't wait to have you back!

Summary: My family and I stayed for one night (I wished we could have stayed another night) and we had awesome service. David R. at the front desk assisted with whatever my family and I needed. Issa the bartender provided great service when I needed to order drinks and gave me good information I needed for my family's Disneyland trip. When it came time to checkout the next day, Cherine at the front desk made my checkout easy. Great service I recommend staying at this hotel if you're visiting Anaheim California.
Manager Response: WOW! thank you for the 5 Bubble review! We are so happy you enjoyed SunCoast Park Hotel and thank you for recognizing our fantastic associates!

Summary: Beautiful hotel, amazing pool and recreation area. Front desk was awesome, and patient with us. By far however, the best housekeeper EVER, has to be Maria Avila, she's hands down, the sweetest and most conscientious I've ever experienced.  My husband and I, stayed longer than expected here, and Maria first welcomed us up on the 5th floor, and always made sure we had clean sheets and towels and extra trash bags.  Throughout our stay, got to know her, and her hard work daily and admired her forth at. Suncoast has got a great staff altogether and everything moved fluidly. Management was always respectful and professional, and really kept everything moving accordingly and in a organized manner.  Definitely gonna return.
Manager Response: Quinn_jill87,  Thank you so very much for the 5 bubble review and recognizing our wonderful room attendant. We can’t wait to have you back!

Summary Heading: Awesome visit at sun coast park hotel.
Summary: I would like to give Issa a huge round of applause. She provided excellent service. While giving the best recommendations she also made me whole family feel special and welcomed with her presence and warm character!
Manager Response: 620JasonAW,   WOW! Thank you for the 5 bubble review and the shout out to our amazing bartender Issa!   We can't wait to have you back!

Summary: Issa was awesome! She went out of her way to make sure my family and I had a great time. Issa not only served delicious drinks but she also let me know of the local food spot that serve great seafood. Thank you Issa!
Manager Response: adrianhM8127LD,   Thank you for the 5 bubble review and the shout our to our specular bartender, Issa.   We can't wait to have you back!

Summary: First, I’d like to give a Huge THANK YOU shout out to BEN, INAH & MONICA!! For accommodating me with our needs of a bigger space for my Family!! The suite is Perfect! Thank you for putting up with my many questions and answering them a smile and being so welcoming and friendly!! Also MONICA! For helping me find my Neck Pillows!  You guys are pretty amazing and I can’t wait to return !!!    Secondly… I recommend this Place!  It’s 2 blocks from Disney and Garden place. Restaurants are all around you!  This hidden Gem is Amazing!  They have a Bar that is Open till closing time !  Pool is open till midnight !!! Try the tub after a long day of walking. You won’t be disappointed.  This place is also very clean and rooms are spacious.  Again, THANK YOU BEN, INAH AND MONICA!!
Manager Response: rachellm2015,   Thanks for the phenomenal 5 bubble review and the wonderful feedback of SunCoast Park Hotel Anaheim. Come back soon!

Summary: The best hidden Gem for all families traveling to Disney and the Anaheim.  The 2 queen suite is a massive room with a queen fold out sofa and plenty of room for an additional roll away bed if needed. This is the best spot for families and easy walking distance to the park, yet tucked far enough away that there is no commotion outside the Hotel.
Manager Response: jas0nm0rse,   Thank you for the 5 bubble review!!!  We can't wait to have you back!

Summary Heading: Excellent stay: huge rooms, walkable to Disneyland
Summary: We had a fabulous stay at the SunCoast Park Hotel and will definitely be going back. We were in town to visit Disneyland, and the walk was easy and pleasant. My mother-in-law drove a mobility scooter and had no trouble with that at all. The scooter was delivered to the hotel before we arrived, and they kept the key at the front desk. The room was enormous, so there was plenty of room to keep the scooter there and we still had tons of room to move around. We had an accessible room on the first floor that was spotless, with comfortable beds and attractive decor. David R and everyone at the front desk were helpful and friendly every time we interacted with them. We'll be back!
Manager Response: Thank you for the 5 bubble review and the associate recognition. We can't wait to have you back!

Summary: The things that were unsatisfatory-  1. Pubic hair in the bathub 2. Walls are paper thin. I heard a family above me RUNNING back and forth several times during my stay. And the vacuuming upstairs sounded like it was in my room. 3. No complimentary breakfast as advertised 4. No one mentioned to push intercom button when leaving the parking lot, so they can let you out. I ended up paying $68 so the arm would open after I had already paid for parking. 5. Another guest charged my room for their breakfast ($35.00) 6. The front desk, although sweet and friendly, did not instill any confidence in me while looking into the charges made to me in error. I left feeling like, I may or may not see the refunds.
Manager Response: none

Summary: After a very long stressful drive here. Both Inah and Ben greeted my significant other and I with bright smiles, were very quick checking us in, and answered all of our questions  thoroughly. Just from that I knew that I’m going to have a great stay.
Manager Response: Thank you for the 5 bubble review and the associate recognition. We can't wait to have you back!

Summary Heading: A wonderful place to stay & phenomenal staff
Summary: If you are in Anaheim you have to stay @ this hotel! It’s beautiful, spacious, they have family games, smells great, the pool is awesome, friendly and helpful staff, laundry center, beyond clean, the GM David H is so friendly and goes above and beyond to make your stay simply the best, it super close to Disneyland. I can’t say enough amazing things about this hotel! Best trip ever.

Summary: I came in for drinks on a Thursday evening and it was relatively quiet, got a Shirley temple and a Bloody Mary. Toren was very sweet and the drinks were well made! A very quaint little spot tucked away from the busy Disney life.

My room was very clean and loved having the market and front desk open 24 hours. The location was very convenient and close to the Garden Walk and Disney

Summary: The hotel stay was excellent. From the time we arrived our reception was  and warm and welcoming. We got there very late and the young man at the desk was very kind.  Our room was beautiful and immaculate. The beds were comfortable and the bathroom h was spotless!  Thank you to Cherine for being so friendly and  checking us out quickly.   Maria our house keeper was great always making sure we were comfortable!  I recommend SunCoast park Hotel to families traveling with Kids because the two bedroom suites accommodate up to 6! I absolutely love it here!!
Manager Response: C1040PCdebrat,   Thanks for the shout out to Maria! We can't wait to have you back!

Summary: Shout out to David R. who came through with an early check-in and a late check-out which allowed me to rest a bit before and after heading to Disneyland which btw is just a 10 min walk from the hotel.  Excellent service from beginning to end, David showed great attention to detail and was fun to chat with.  I had no idea this was a Hilton collection, the rooms are fantastic, modern and clean and I loved the chill surf theme in the lobby, it wasn't too over the top.  Especially loved the water pressure and hot water almost immediately plus the multi-spray shower head.  I am beyond satisfied with this hotel and will definitely be staying again on my next trip to California. I recommend you check it out, you won't be disappointed.
Manager Response: sowhahahappenedwuz,   Thanks for the David R Shout you and the recommendation! We look forward to having you back!

Summary: This hotel is beautiful, the staff is wonderful, and the pool is great.   The beds are comfortable and the room is cozy. The only thing is the bathroom barn door, it is not very private.  If Disneyland is your destination, it is very close.   They have plenty of parking and the property is very clean.
Manager Response: 951richardad,   Thanks for the 5 bubble review!

Summary: Room is clean and comfortable and clean! It is very close to Disney and the other theme parks.  Staff is great specially the nice accommodating bar/kitchen staff Issa. She was very kind and helpful. All the staff made us feel welcome and comfortable! Highly recommended!
Manager Response: 17872RJannd,   WOW!,   Thank you for the 5 bubble review and the recognition to our amazing bartender Issa. We will share your kind words and we can't wait to have you back!

Summary: Ben was very helpful and friendly. Even loaned me a charger for my phone :) This was very appreciated as it was about to die and I forgot mine :(. The hotel is also clean and well maintained. Way to go

Summary: Ben helped us out at the front desk and was wonderful he handled our check in simple and quick very clean and comfortable rooms amazing pool area & bar definitely recommend if your looking for a hotel

Summary: My boyfriend and I stayed here for my birthday and Disneyland getaway. Upon arrival parking was easy and close, and the front desk staff was very welcoming. Check in took moments and we loved our room. We got the studio suite, we knew room service was down so we stocked our little fridge so we could have snacks, coffee, and beer for our stay. The hotel is right across the street from a great mall for wandering, shopping and movies. The walk to Disneyland took less than 15 minutes, and the beds were very comfortable. Overall 10/10 :)
Manager Response: onsetmakeupartist,  Thank you for sharing your experience with SunCoast Park Hotel and yes, we are 12-15 minute walk or approximately 1,090 steps from our hotel front door to the main entrance of Disneyland. Come back soon!

Summary: Great location!  Had a wonderful stay at this lovely property, with a cool SoCal surfing vibe!  Just a short walk to House of Blues, Disneyland, GardenWalk... We took in a game at Anaheim Stadium! Great pool, and friendly service! GM David, Abi at the front desk, Maria in housekeeping, and Gary in group sales took good care of us! We're looking forward to coming back!
Manager Response: kevinaB4425ST,   Thanks for the shoutout to our fantastic team!  We can't wait to have you back!

Summary Heading: Friendly staff, prime location, stellar hotel
Summary: Sun Coast Park is nothing short of fantastic! Every staff member we interacted with was incredibly kind and accommodating. Everything is updated, clean, and well maintained. Our stay here was wonderful we would come back in a heartbeat!
Manager Response: C7204ZZelainea,  Thanks for the 5 bubble review! We are thrilled you enjoyed your stay and can't wait to have you back!

Summary: Beautiful, comfortable,  classy, clean, quiet hotel! Minutes from Angel Stadium,  Disney and Joe's  Italian Ice! The staff was friendly from check-in (Abi) to being greeted by David the GM and Gary the sales manager. Our housekeeper, Maria kept our messy room spotless! Loved the Infinity pool and that the jacuzzi was open until midnight.  We'll be back!
Manager Response: scotchie10,   Thanks for recognizing our AWESOME and AMAZING Team- we can't wait to have you back!

Summary Heading: Beautiful pool with view of DisneyLand fireworks and stays open until Midnight! Priceless with kids!
Summary: The hotel was amazing! The only pool I know of that stays open until midnight. The fireworks from the pool were amazing!! The hotel looks brand new and immaculate. Under ground parking was so nice and easy to unload baggage and get to the elevator. The staff was so welcoming and friendly. We will definitely come back, as we ran out of time to do everything. They are close to wonderful restaurants and Disneyland. The hotel is on Disney Way so you don’t need a car unless you want one. 5 stars!
Manager Response: ToniaGass,   Thanks for the 5 bubble review! We can't wait to have you and your family back.

Summary: After a long day at Disney with the kids being able to come to the hotel grab some drinks while the kids got in the pool, that was my favorite part. Lol. Rooms were super clean.  There was parking. Always feel welcomed.
Manager Response: gisellegomez2,   Thanks for the 5 bubble review of our 'super clean rooms.''We can't wait to have you back!

Summary Heading: Rooms are nice, they nickle and dime you to death though
Summary: The rooms are great. Add $75 a day on top of whatever rate you see though. They took away the continental breakfast, charge for parking, wifi, and coffee. A drip coffee is more expensive than Starbucks now.
Manager Response: Luke, S,   Thanks for the 5 bubbles on Cleanliness ,Service and Sleep Quality. Come back soon!

Summary: My family and I stayed at Suncoast for one night so that we may go to Disneyland the next day. The rooms were comfortable. Issa at the hotel Bar was incredible, so attentive, welcoming and made delicious drinks. Thank you Suncoast for the great stay
Manager Response: Art00011,   Thank you for your 5 bubble review! We can't wait to have you back soon!

Summary: Second time staying here and I was not disappointed. The rooms are so clean and nice.  The staff is so great. Issa in particular was awesome both times. She makes amazing margaritas and provided great service with the food as well. Pizza and wings are so yummy! Very happy customers!
Manager Response: Y4419JBstephanie,   Thanks for the fantastic 5 bubble review!  We  are so happy you are ''happy."

Summary: 10/10 would recommend. Ben at the front desk was very accommodating to our requests for room needs. Great location- 15 min walk to Disney. 10 min drive to Angels stadium. Entire hotel is updated and very clean.

Summary Heading: What a Gem with Amazingly staff
Summary: This was a last minute hotel change that exceeded all expectations. Clean, quiet, close enough to everything. All the staff  was super helpful from check in, to parking which was finicky at first, but resolved quickly. The POOL is amazing.  Sent my two shy teenagers to breakfast and Jorge was kind and accommodating and continued to check-in with us  and they left beyond content.  We travel here at least once a year with our large family, we will be back and tell our friends about this great hotel option.
Manager Response: WOW! Thanks for sharing about the SunCoast Park Hotel and the 5 bubble review!

Summary Heading: Suncoast is our favorite socal travel spot!
Summary: I work in travel therefore help others pick prime locations and have to stay all over as needed. Having the perk of staying at so many hotels you get to really see what they bring to the table. Suncoast is my favorite Southern California location to relax. There staff is AMAZING! I dont say this lightly like all the other reviews. Working in customer service has made my expectations very high but everytime I stay here they excede them. Gary Garcia, Mischelle even down to Jorge there chef make your stay one to remember.  The other perks like being walking distance to Disney Walk, Downtown Disney and Disneyland are just an added bonus to your stay!  10 out of 10 would recommend if you are looking for a relaxing and fun experience.
Manager Response: 663savannahl,   Thanks for recognizing Gary and Mish! They are they BEST! Come back soon!

Summary: We had the pleasure of staying here for four nights. We were in a fireworks view room and man we loved it! The rooms here are spacious and upon arrival our greeting at the front desk made our stay so inviting. The fireworks view is perfect enough to see but not hear the loud bangs and booms of fireworks. As a mom with young kids this is something I appreciated. The pool area was great, clean and spacious. We loved the convenience of the hot tub and cool Volkswagen mad the area fun. The bar area was nice to wind down in after long days in the theme parks. We did get a pepperoni pizza and my daughter enjoyed it as a pizza lover. The room was clean and the walk to Disneyland park was perfect. It was about 8-9 minutes and a straight shot no confusion. If you are looking for a great
Manager Response: Msbriezyb,  Thank you for the wonderful detail with your experience of SunCoast Park Hotel Anaheim. We cannot wait to have you back!

Summary Heading: Don’t upgrade for the fireworks view and don’t eat there. O

Summary: I appreciated the cleanliness of this hotel. Some hotels feel like a maze and this one is straight forward. I also enjoyed that it's just far enough off the beaten path for Disney that it feels peaceful for either leisure or business travel. It's also close enough to Disneyland that it's extremely easy to hop over to the park. Uber was only a few blocks! Perfect.
Manager Response: SarahDeweyRecommends,   Thank you so much for the wonderful review! We are happy to learn that your stay was comfortable. We can't wait to have you back!

Summary: We booked a King Room and it was very spacious and comfortable. So comfortable we booked another night. We visited Disneyland park and after all that walking we did not want to drive an hour back home so we booked a night at the SunCoast Park Hotel. We were greeted well and the place smelled wonderful, clean room too! We had to book another day/night, my daughters were very excited for the Infinity Pool, beautiful and enough space for one to feel like you are there alone. Humble and Kind employees, Maria Avila was a great employee, she was very kind and helpful. She had the right answers for my questions. Also the graveyard employee was kind and friendly as well unfortunately I didn’t get his name, and lastly David Reyes was friendly and helpful with our concerns too! Two things
Manager Response: mabelynr2022,  We are so sorry we missed you! We'd love to have you back and have a second try. Thank you for the other great feedback!

Summary Heading: Perfect place to stay for Disney
Summary: We loved our stay here. All staff were friendly and helpful. Hotel was beautiful and clean! Parking was safe, secure, and Complimentary. (We booked through Get Away Today)  Walk was less than a mile. (Pic included) Garden walk was 1/2 a block away with good places to eat at regular prices. (No offense Disney- but seriously🤑) Pool was beautiful and kinda warm- but weather was also kinda cool. Hot tub was amazing. Highly recommend this property for a Disney vacation.
Manager Response: Jamaica H,   Thank you for sharing a 5 Bubble review about your recent experience at SunCoast Park Hotel Anaheim and thank you for the recommendation! We can't wait to have you back.

Summary Heading: Clean, Classy Hotel within Walking Distance to Disneyland
Summary: Very clean and updated hotel. Good breakfast with lots of choices. Convenient store in lobby to purchase drinks, snacks, toiletries and souvenirs.  Short walk to Disneyland and House of Blues and many stores in a mall.
Manager Response: accardpfamily,   Thank you for the 5 bubble review! We are so thrilled you enjoyed our breakfast. We are constantly listening to our guests and so appreciate the feedback. We can't wait to have you back!

Summary: We have stayed at Suncoast twice now and the experience is better each time. This hotel is an 8 minute walk to Disneyland, easy walk and convenient location to the Garden Walk, which has an AMC and lots of restaurants to eat at.   - Check-in: easy and painless, they even give complimentary waters - Parking: lots of it! There is an underground parking which is right next to the elevators or outside parking near the entrance - Rooms: We have stayed in a standard and a suite. Both are clean, lots of room for two or a family, bathroom is spacious with great lighting, and beds are incredibly comfy! - Customer Service: 10/10 everyone is so friendly and the GM, David G, is very accommodating. He remembered our names, which shows how much he respects and cares for his guests.  We will
Manager Response: Daniel_A_0617,   We so appreciate the 5 Bubble review, all of your delightful experience and cannot wait to have you back.

Summary: I  stay at this hotel whenever I go to Disneyland. I highly recommend everyone to stay here. The hotel is super clean and staff are friendly. I would like to give props to the housekeeper Maria Avila. She has such a positive and energetic attitude. We asked her for items we needed in our room and she provided them with a smile in her face and right away. Front desk staff is ok but the I would like to see more energetic and smiling face at the front desk.

Summary: Perfect hotel for a quick Disney vacay after a business trip! Rooms are lovely but front desk staff is even lovelier. The hotel is clean and includes a beautiful pool with an area outdoors for family dining/play, a bar, fitness center, mini store and laundry room.  We were very comfortable in our rooms and enjoyed the photos/art they have hung throughout the property. We would definitely come here again on our next Disneyland trip!

Summary Heading: Quick Visit From Õut of Town
Summary: I absolutely loved this hotel! The people were great, the underground parking was wonderful, the rooms were wonderful and felt safe, the pool was fun and the hot tub was relaxing. I would definitely go back and the best part was the ability to see the fireworks from our room that were put on by Disney Land. The room was definitely worth the money!

The hotel has a store, bar, business center, breakfast, kids entertainment room, corn hole, Ping-Pong, fitness center and an amazing pool.  This infinity style pool is larger than neighboring hotels that houses more guests.  We will be staying here again.

Summary: Fast check in. Plenty of parking ($24). Nice warm pool. Jacuzzi was hot AF (brings some veggies w/ you and make soup). The pool area was clean and lots of seating & umbrellas. We brought our own drinks for us and the kids and they were ok w it. Rooms were clean and ours was very spacious. Everything was in perfect condition.  Staff and crew were totally polite and professional.  We ordered pizza (domino’s) and grub hub. They were able to deliver w/out issue. Kids enjoyed it. Room A/c worked very well. Beds & pillows were comfy.  We’d definitely stay again.
Manager Response: EDDIE M.   Thank you for sharing your experience with SunCoast Park Hotel Anaheim. We can't wait to have you back!

Summary Heading: Fabulous Hotel for a Disney break.
Summary: A really great hotel with a very close proximity to Disneyland.  Lovely to be able to take a break in the middle of the day and relax around the pool.  Rooms were huge and the beds very comfy with a long list of cable channels available.  Hotel decor was Californian Beach Chic and suited the area. Perfect for your Disneyland break.
Manager Response: 107julest,   Thank you for the 5 bubble review of SunCoast park Hotel Anaheim; We are flattered you enjoyed your stay and the hotel offers and décor. We look forward to your next stay with us.

Summary: I spend 100 nights per year in just Hilton brands alone. I'm middle aged and not high maintenance. Additionally due to my industry/company I've been required to travel during the entire COVID nightmare. I totally understand the challenges and changes the pandemic brought to hotels and have a great deal of respect for the hospitality industry as a whole.  This was my 2nd experience at a Tapestry property. I had three rooms for a week for 6 people and we all experienced the same disappointing experiences.  We have no issues with the hotel public areas or guest rooms. Everything was new/clean, comfortable, functioning and even pretty.  Most staff I engaged with were friendly and willing to assist as well.  Location of hotel is an easy walk to Disney and many quality restaurants.
Manager Response: none

Summary: Stayed here for a sports competition and family vacation to Disney.  The location was perfect, about a mile walk to the convention center and about 1.5 to Disney. The hotel staff were friendly and the room was perfect (spacious, clean, bed was comfortable).  We walked back and forth from the convention center and to the area restaurant. We took an Uber to Disney to avoid parking.   Customer service was excellent and they adjusted our accommodations to meet our extended trip needs.   There’s even a free EV charger in the parking lot! You’ll just need to bring an adapter.   We’ll be staying here again!!
Manager Response: We are thrilled you enjoyed your hotel experience at SunCoast Park Hotel. We look forward to your return visit.

Summary: Great stay near the park. Much quieter than other places. Convenient parking. Easy walk to  Disney. Lia in the kitchen was awesome! Clean with a nice pool. Great place for kids too. We would definitely stay here again in the future.
Manager Response: Thank you for recognizing Lia;  a return visit is the ultimate compliment, thank you again.

Summary Heading: Great place with an excellent staff!
Summary: We stayed here for a hockey tournament and couldn’t be more pleased.  The staff and accommodations are great.   Jorge ans Lia made an excellent breakfast every morning and made sure the whole hockey team of 14 year olds got enough to eat.   The other impressive thing is the GM, David, was out helping the staff at breakfast and it was just great to see a happy staff after the pandemic.    The location was great, you can get Disney tickets in the lobby and walk to the movie theater.    There is a pool, fun games for the kids to play, a big pool and a great little bar area.   More of a boutique feel hotel then some of the other hotels we have stayed at.   We will definitely be back!!
Manager Response: Thank you for the 5 bubble review! We are so happy you enjoyed your experience and thanks for the shout-out to our phenomenal staff. Come back soon.

Summary: If you are thinking this is a Hilton brand experience, it is not. I am truly puzzled by the high ratings this hotel has received here on TripAdvisor.  I am a Diamond VIP Honors Member who spends 60+ nights every year in Hilton brand hotels. I understand all of the nuances between the Hilton Brands - from Waldorf and Conrad all the way down to Tru, in 14 different countries and in 46 US States.  Hilton Honors members do not get benefits here. Do not stay here if you expect to get the level of amenities offered to the various tiers of membership. You won’t even get bottled water.  The room decor is late 1990’s state university budget dorm room. The rooms are not comfortable, and I had the most expensive, the best room, on offer. The beds and linens are fine - they are to Hilton
Manager Response: Peripatetic_P,   I'd like an opportunity to  learn more about your stay. If you would, please contact me at your convenience.   David  Gutierrez, General Manager SunCoast Park Hotel Anaheim P: (714) 598-0600 | F: (714) 598-0601

Summary: My daughter and I Had a great experience!! Love that it was walking distance to convention center and Disney parks. Also food was decent but we had great service from Lia Rocha who helped us with our breakfast!!!!
Manager Response: bvsalazar,   Thank you for the shout out to our fantastic Cook. Lia is truly a join to have on our Team and we are thrilled she delivered a fantastic experience for you and your family. Come back soon!

Summary: Nice hotel but they need a chef / order taker. The nice bartender is serving in many roles and she was not able to produce a majority of the food items on the menu. That was my only issue. I enjoyed my stay and my room was great!
Manager Response: Thank you for the 5 bubble review! We can't wait to have you back!

Summary: Hotel is clean and nice.  Very comfortable rooms.  A little walk to Disneyland, about 15 minutes, but not bad.  Staff is great. Our room was not right when we got there, but Karla took great care of us and went above and beyond.  She is the best!!! The staff was great and a great place!  Would highly recommend.
Manager Response: Thanks so much for the 5 bubble review and the shout out to the BEST hotel team in Anaheim. Come back soon!

Summary: Our room was clean and the staff were very helpful. Withing walking distance to Disney and the pool area was great. Our son loooveddd the pool. Definitely recommend this hotel. Also on A.R.T line if you don't want to walk to Disney
Manager Response: WOW! We are thrilled you enjoyed SunCoast Park Hotel. We can't wait to have you back.

Summary: I've stayed at the Suncoast Park Hotel several times. Each stay is better than the last. I love the staff- they're so friendly and helpful. My luggage broke as I arrived at the hotel and one nice guest relations associate named David helped me by bringing over a cart to wheel my stuff upstairs to my room. It was so kind and really helpful given the situation.   I love the atmosphere. I stay here a lot as a solo woman traveler for work and leisure. I always feel safe and secure. I also really love the outdoor area of this hotel- the pool stays open late (which is always nice after a long park day). I also love the distance and location to the Disney parks (and in some rooms, you have park views).   I continue to recommend this hotel to friends and family because it is such a nice
Manager Response: Hello_Kathleezzzy,   We are thrilled to read your review and even more thrilled you have stayed with SunCoast Park Hotel before and enjoyed your experiences.   Thanks for the shout-out to our top-notch Guest Service Agent David... we'll be sure to share your comments with him.   Come back soon!

Summary: I have been coming to this property for more than 5 years. I will continue to come back. This is a clean, friendly, and warm hotel just a short walk away from the parks. Also the manager Mishella Scott is amazing and very approachable. She makes sure all the guest walk out with a smile.
Manager Response: MMota10,   WOW! We are thrilled at SunCoast Park Hotel to learn you enjoyed your stay and the service reached from Mishella Scott. We can't wait to have you back!

Summary: A beautiful Hotel my room was very clean staff helpful and friendly close to Disneyland the negative was the cologne scent all through the lobby pretty strong but tolerable. I called ahead to ask about gluten free items on their menu the girl said they have good cauliflour crust pizza but lady at bar said they have never had that kind of pizza even though it's on their menu she also said they had no salad don't know if that was just for that day or not the sink drained very slow so it was filling up when I brushed my teeth the bed was very hard but we all have a preference for what we like.  When I looked out my window there  were several black bags down below by the antenna looked like they were cleaning up the area not sure if it had been a homeless camp or not with that being
Manager Response: lor c,   Thank you for your feedback and will use it to strengthen our offerings and service offer. We appreciate your business.

Summary: Often when you travel to a theme park, the local hotels don’t always have great breakfast options as people are busy getting to the park. That was not the case at SunCoast Park Hotel. Chef Lia Rocha made me a great breakfast customized to my preference. She and the ladies at the coffee counter helped start my morning right!    Our room is also great. Spacious and comfortable

Summary: Our second time at this location, and we will never go anywhere else.  10 minute walk to Disney, impeccably clean, plenty of secure parking, just cannot say enough about the attention to detail at SunCoast.  Special shout out to the GM, David, who went out of his way to speak with us regarding a few questions we had.  Save yourself the time, book here and you’ll thank me later.

Summary Heading: Great Location to Disneyland with an amazing cast
Summary: We stayed here in March 2022 and things could not have gone any smother. It started at checkin with “Elle” at the front desk. We got here around 2:30 pm and the hotel was sold out. She was able to get us a room on the 5th floor that we could see Disneyland. All front of the house staff was Pleasent and accommodating. It’s a 10 min walk to Disneyland park. Rates we the best around and including parking. We will be back.  Breakfast was not included but was good.
Manager Response: mjanyeste,   Thank you from all of us at SunCoast Park Hotel Anaheim for the 5 bubble review! We will surely share your feedback Ellie. We can't wait to have you back.

Summary: Stayed for 3 nights while visiting Disneyland with my 5 year old.  Hotel is new and modern.  Beds were comfortable, AC worked perfectly.  No hall noise at all, although we were at the end of the hall.  Pool was nice and well maintained.  Breakfast was delicious and reasonably priced.  We were through the main gates of Disneyland within 15 minutes including crossing traffic and walking with a 5 year old (alternating between running ahead and maintaining the pace of a slug.)  We felt perfectly safe walking even at night.  Would definitely stay here again!
Manager Response: scograd,   We are so thrilled you enjoyed your stay and so appreciate you sharing with the Tripadvisor community that your experience was enjoyable. We cannot wait to have you and your family back!

Summary: We had a wonderful stay recently for a weekend trip to Disneyland. We picked a beautiful weekend so after our time at the park we decided to spend the evening by the pool. The drinks that Isabel mixed were amazing and we’re perfect for relaxing in the hot tub beside the beautiful pool.
Manager Response: jamievZ3378OS,   Thank you for the 5 bubble review! Thank you again for the shout our to our amazing team member Isabel! We look forward to having you back soon!

Summary: We arrived in late and in the morning after a restful nights sleep, in a clean room, with comfortable beds, I had a few questions for the staff. I was greeted by Mish at the front desk. She was very helpful and welcoming. I was very appreciative of her assistance. Later in the day, I was looking around the lobby area and was greeted by David. During our conversation, I found out he was the GM of the hotel. David was also very kind and welcoming. I just wanted to take the time to write a review to thank them both for making my day a little better. We were in Anaheim for a volleyball tournament. This hotel was also walking distance to the garden walk and Disneyland.
Manager Response: RaffieG,   Thank you for the 5 bubble review! We are thrilled you enjoyed your stay and thanks for the nice conversation. We look forward to having you back soon!

Summary Heading: A Hilton hotel that exceeded our expectation
Summary: From the start of our family Disneyland vacation till checkout this Suncoast Park Hilton hotel exceeded our expectation. This hotel is well run under the leadership of the GM David G and the rest of the staff. His attention to detail was evident as he attended to all areas of the hotel and checked on us a few times during our stay to make sure our stay was 5 star.   Clean, spacious rooms, quiet, walking distance to Disneyland (under 20 mins) and breakfast options (hot/cold) served early enough so you can make Disneyland rope drop.   Anaheim Walk (shopping and dining complex) is a 5 minute walk away as well. Fireworks can be seen from their outdoor (non-heated) pool and hot tub   I would not hesitate to book this hotel. Well done. I look forward to staying with you again on our
Manager Response: Drjimau,   What a flattering review and we are so happy you truly enjoyed your stay. We can't wait to have you and your family back soon!

Summary: The hotel was nice! The rooms were excellent! The bartender Aaron was great, very knowledgeable and nice he made excellent drinks! I can’t wait for my next business trip! Good job sun coast! Thank you
Manager Response: 56ra_b,   Thanks for the shout out to our team! We are thrilled you enjoyed your stay. Come back soon.

Summary: I came in March 8th for drinks and some quick food and I ran into Aaron and leeyah who gave excellent service. Leeyah was so polite and helping. Aaron was also nice went and got my food made small conversation with me I enjoyed my time here all around. I will defiantly be back. the drinks were super good. I did not know what I wanted but Aaron and leeyah made sure I found a drink I liked and enjoyed. Great service all around.

Summary: Leeyah and Aaron took care of me while I waited for my plans later on. They poured the best drinks for me and keep good conversations going. Even went on the extra mile to make sure I got the right drink that satisfied me needs!
Manager Response: jogW3605XI,   We are so happy you enjoyed your stay and the service you experience at Beachcomer Bar. We can't wait to have you back soon!

The JW is across the street but we’ll be staying here next time. Also would like to include the front desk agent on our arrival of the 3/1/22 around noon. Shoot out to the whole team!!!! Can’t wait for next trip to Disneyland.

Summary: My daughter and I traveled from New York to California to go to Disneyland for her winter break. This hotel was great. Friendly and helpful staff. Very clean. I was able to get an upgraded room when I checked in. I would stay here again.

Summary: My stay at the SunCoast Hotel with my Wife was amazing, Parking is very secure and although at a charge, it is beyond understandable for the security. Another amazing thing is this is isolated by about a block from the convention center so no crazy crowds and such but you are a 2-5 min drive from all the restaurants, Disneyland, the Convention Center. I will be selecting this again! Also everything is just so convenient! Grabbed a bite outside of here but returned to the Bar in the hotel and Aaron was awesome! Aaron has such great options and knowledge on the drinks and was able to make us something for exactly what we were looking for. Rooms are clean and very organized! I truly will be returning! My wife loved it so much too!
Manager Response: ThateseChad,   Thank you so much for the flattering review! Thank you for recognizing Aaron. We look forward to having you back.

Summary: I’ve been coming to Disneyland as pass members since 2010. I’ve pretty much stayed at most of the places around the area.  As Hilton honors members it’s my priority to only stay at Hilton properties.  Suncoast has been one of my favorites since it was Country Inn. I’m giving this hotel a perfect rating because of consistency.  First of all the room always look immaculate. The king suite is very spacious and provides adequate room for my family of four. Sitting in the lounge area is extremely relaxing especially in front of the fireplaces. Outside there is a huge perfect sparkly infinity pool which is heated a bit.  Now the bulk of my 5 star rating comes from my interaction with 2 people at this property. One person who has made my stay very pleasant is Isabella, the bartender in
Manager Response: Chris D,   We are so happy to learn you enjoyed your stay; We are very appreciative of you business and most importantly, thank you for making us your return hotel. it's guests like yourself that remind us how appreciative we are for your business. Come back soon.

Summary: Friendly staff that assisted with an early and convenient check-in process. Rooms were spacious and clean. The pillows were a little uncomfortable but, other than that, the hotel was perfect. Just a short 10-15 minute walk to Disneyland.  Will definitely stay again.

Summary: Disneyland with the family for my little girls birthday . Had an awesome time . Loved hotel service. I liked how you can use your phone to enter parking lot. Over all great experience for me and the family .
Manager Response: vflores2022,   Thank you for the 5 bubble review!

Summary: Excellent front desk staff! Everyone was friendly and professional. Hotel was extremely clean and room was nice. I recommend this hotel to anyone wanting a quality stay and friendly staff. For the price, you can't beat this place. Short and safe walk to Disney.

Summary: Great service, very clean and new. Lots of amenities ie: gym, pool, laundry. Outside and underground parking. The atmosphere and theme was cool, New and beachy.  Only down side,You could hear freeway a bit.
Manager Response: krisnotch,   Thank you for the fantastic review!

Summary: If you are looking for spacious clean rooms and helpful staff. This is your hotel!!! At my stay at the suncoast park Hotel in anaheim my sisters and I had a wonderful time. When we entered we were greeted by their friendly staff and were helped right away. We were also able to jump into the pool at night and it was an awesome experience. The pool was clean and the water was the perfect temperature. Overall, my stay at the Suncoast park Hotel was amazing. With Five star rating I 100% recommend!

Summary: The hotel is newly renovated, very clean and nice. There is an old school beach/surf theme throughout the hotel, and the fireplace in the lobby was a nice touch. The staff was friendly and professional. The bed was firm but comfortable, the pillows and linens, toiletries and all the room amenities were great.  The little store had a great selection of snacks and things you could cook in the in room microwave. The hot tub was large, and the VW Bus outside on the patio was really neat and unique. I will definitely come back again, I really enjoyed my stay here.
Manager Response: Erik P,   Thank you for taking the time to share such a complimentary review. We would love to have you back.. Lastly, thank you for recognizing our amazing, professionally team.

Summary Heading: GREAT Stay at a affordable price
Summary: STAY HERE! You found the best kept secret in town. I loved my stay at this hotel. I've stayed here several times over the last couple months. If I'm not staying on property at Disneyland I love to stay at the Suncoast. It's a short walk to the park and you get the high quality stay at an affordable price. I love the lobby layout. There's a lot of space to spread out if you have to wait for your room. The staff is so kind and helpful. My rooms have always been so clean and lovely. I really love the bathroom and the deep tub. I love the suite rooms- they're so spacious and worth the money. I am a repeat customer because I've always had such a great experience here. I hope to check out the pool- it always looks so nice and clean.
Manager Response: Kathleezzzy,   Thank you for the fantastic review. We are so happy you enjoyed your stay and the hotel as well as pool. Come back soon!

Summary Heading: Great place for the business traveler too
Summary: I travel to the Anaheim area regularly.  I primarily stay in Hilton properties.  I've stayed at almost every Hilton property around the park.  Many are getting "tired" and in need of a refresh.  Others too commercialized and overpriced with valet parking only.  This place is clean, quiet and newly remodeled.  A hidden treasure.  Be careful as some places in the hotel have poor cell phone reception.  Staff is very friendly.  I do wish their gym was a little larger with more equipment.  Just a basic hotel gym.  Overall, a solid, reliable choice for the business traveler.
Manager Response: patrickmT509DX,   Thank you for the feedback and the 5 bubble review.

Summary: Overall experience was ok a bit of a walk from Disney , also the 24.00 parking a day is way to high it should be have the cost considering parking at Disney is only 24.00 if I would’ve know this I would’ve used those 24.00 towards another hotel a day that didn’t charge for parking
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: Will be coming back again and again
Summary: I can not say enough about how well we were treated by the staff here. From housekeeping to management this hotel screams class! My family and I will be back again and again. So conveniently located to attractions and you can’t beat the price.
