Summary Heading: Happiest Person on earth deserves the happiest hotel stay in Disneyland!
Summary: First time in Disneyland was absolutely fantastic. My experience was delightful and I am so happy with everything. FERNANDO was amazing in checking in. Early check in from a flight was always helpful.  DIANNE and INAH was very accommodating when we have some food deliveries.  ASHLEY in Breakfast always serves us hot and fresh breakfast. ABIGAIL was fast when we checked out. All in all it was a fantastic stay. Thank you very much for everything.
Manager Response: WOW! We are thrilled you enjoyed your stay at SunCoast Park Hotel! Thank you for recognizing the array of dedicated hospitality professionals. We appreciate  your business and we can't wait to have you back!

Summary: My husband and I are forever doing mini staycation overnights. About once every other month we pick a nearby hotel and stay over.   We found the Suncoast soon after they opened. We fell in love with the fireworks rooms because those have a fantastic view of the park.   Let’s fast forward to the Orange County in the middle of a pandemic.  The hotel has reopened for regular travelers.  There have been some needed changes.   Breakfast has scaled down to a few easily heated breakfast sandwiches.  They still offer several coffee drinks, including brewed coffee. For dinner, the bar offers pizzas that are honestly very decent for around $15.  There is no room service.   Let’s talk rooms…. The rooms at the Suncoast are huge.  You won’t feel cramped or boxed in.  There is a selection of
Manager Response: JessicarbtReviews,   Thank you for the kind words and I can't wait to meet you in person on your next stay with us. It is guests like you that allow our SunCoast team to do what we love doing.. offering the warmth of hospitality. We are very appreciative of the description of our hotel and look forward to your nest stay.

Summary Heading: Nice hotel within walking distance of Disneyland
Summary: This was a great hotel for our recent visit to Disneyland. It was a short walk from the park and the hotel staff was helpful and friendly. Our room was clean and spacious (walls did seem to be a bit thin as we were awakened by the toddler above us running in their room!). Mid-week we asked for the room to be refreshed and it was taken care of before we got back that evening. The breakfast offerings are very limited but they were adequate. You do have to pay for coffee although there is a machine in your room also. We would recommend this hotel.
Manager Response: S G,   Thanks for the 5 bubble review and being our guest. We appreciate your recommendation and can't wait to have you back.

Summary: Very impressed with the size and the cleanliness of the room!!!! My kids really enjoyed and were able to sleep very comfortable. The proximity to Disneyland is pretty close compared to other properties I have stayed at.
Manager Response: karinamedina85,   Thank you for the 5 bubble review! We are thrilled you enjoyed your stay and proximity to Disney Parks! We look forward to having you back.

Summary: We had a great stay here while visiting Disneyland. They went  above a beyond to be sure we a great stay. Specifically Antonio who helped us during our check in. There was a small discrepancy with our reservation, but he went out of his way to make it right. Rooms were clean and up to date. Will definitely stay here again.
Manager Response: Dear,   Thank you for that 5 Bubble Review! We are so excited you enjoyed your stay and cleanliness of your room. We can't wait to have you back!

Summary Heading: Okay but better hotels nearby with friendlier staff and won’t rip you off on parking
Summary: Hotel staff is not very friendly or welcoming. Charged an extra day for parking, car was in the lot for less than 24 hours.  Hotel and room was clean and pool was bigger than expected, however, it was not heated as stated on the webpage. Walk to Disney was about 15 min with kids and a short walk to Anaheim Garden Walk which has good restaurants.
Manager Response: Roving258748,   I am sorry to learn your stay was not 100% satisfactory. We have a hotel policy in place that allows the departing guest who wishes to keep their parked on hotel property, up until 10pm on the day of departure.

Summary: Nice new hotel Close to the Disneyland But nobody was wearing masks at the front desk and the bar. The bartender said nobody wears masks in Orange County! Meanwhile we left the bar and went to our room.
Manager Response: kevgio49ers,   Thank you for your feedback. We comply with all State, Local and Country guidelines. and most recently the extension of the indoor mask update. I am sorry for the miscommunication and require all associates to wear a facial covering until further notice.

Summary: This is my second stay at this hotel since D’land reopened.   This is a great property for families.  Rooms are spacious. It is about a 15 minute walk to the park entrance. Tip: pay a bit extra for the fireworks view room-so worth it. Pros: genuinely friendly staff, rooms are super clean with fresh linens and fluffy pillows.  Great pool that is perfect for the littles because not deep, large areas to sit and chill/meet up on first floor. Cons:  no maid service during stay (covid) no place to drop old towels, no garbage receptacles large enough for empty food container, $24 a day for parking (but they do have in/out privileges), no  breakfast buffet- now food for purchase and must buy coffee - but coffee packets in room.
Manager Response: malmelst,   Thank you for your review and feedback; SunCoast Park Hotel has one of THE best vantage points outside of Disneyland to watch the nightly fireworks.

Summary: Very good experience! We stayed over new year’s and had a good experience. Easy to access the parks. Very clean room (hubby brought a black light). Wish they still had the complementary breakfast. Also, note that parking on the property is an additional fee. Overall great stay!
Manager Response: missc0llins,   Thank you for review. We are thrilled you were satisfied with our cleanliness and have some of THE best room attendants in Southern California. We can't wait to have you back.

Summary: We enjoyed staying here for a family vacation to Disney. Walking distance to Disney and different dining revenues.   The bar area was nice to have some drinks and sit by the pool. Definitely recommend and we will be back!
Manager Response: kbarrett2022,   Thank you for the 5 bubble review! We are pleased you enjoyed your stay. We can't wait for your return trip.

Summary Heading: Great place to stay to walk to Disneyland
Summary: We've stayed at this hotel 4 times now.   On top of being well located (15 min walk from the Harbor gate - enough steps to burn a churro!) the staff has always been pleasant and accommodating and the property is very clean and well maintained.    Even though they (like all other properties nearby) charge for parking, there is covered parking available which is a bonus, too!   Looking forward to our next visit.
Manager Response: gregoz34,   WOW! Thank you so much for the review and sharing your experience!  Thanks for your repeat business, we truly appreciate it.

Summary: Five stars for friendly and accommodating staff. Room was huge! And clean!  Freeway noise was bad! No free breakfast anymore. You can purchase breakfast sandwiches and muffins, coffee, and tea from the bar area. Cereal and milk is available to purchase in their little store. They also are not doing daily room service. The front desk has clean towels and extra shampoo/soaps if needed. It would be nice to have more places to hang towels…extra hooks would help vs. one in the shower. Beds are firmer than I like. Easy walk to Disney. I would stay there again if I could get a room without the freeway noise.
Manager Response: arenas309,   Thank you for your review. We look forward to your return visit.

Summary: Our first time staying at the SunCoast Park Hotel and loved it! The rooms are super clean, comfy and spacious.  The service from the front desk is stellar and Scott at the bar is very cool!!! Really enjoyed the vibe and how close Disneyland and other activities are.  Thank you SunCoast Park Hotel for a great stay.  The General Manager David runs a great hotel.

Summary: Very clean. Nice staff. Great location for Disneyland. Very kid friendly. Wish they had a complimentary breakfast/ coffee bar but with Covid it’s understandable why not. Overall extremely happy with stay.

Summary: Hi!! This was a last minute staycation for me! Fernando took good care of me and was so nice. This hotel is beautiful and so quiet. I love boutique hotels and Fernando educated me that this Hilton property was one !! I had no idea. I will definitely stay here again!!! It’s much better here than the other big hotels in the area. It’s soooo beautiful and being from Huntington Beach, I love all the surf decor and Plastic Fantastic Surf Board. I’m all about customer service and Fernando should get employee of the year!!! He answered all my many questions and gave me the best room. It’s away from the lobby, but still close to amenities that this beautiful boutique has to offer. I definitely will be back!!!!
Manager Response: lorisL1092EJ,   thank you for recognizing Fernando! We are looking forward to your return visit.

Summary: Yearly Christmas family trip. First time staying at the hotel but it definitely won’t be our last! Great rates, friendly staff, clean rooms and walking distance to Disneyland and Disney California. Can’t beat that!
Manager Response: rnavarro1969,   Thanks for your review! We are so happy you enjoyed your stay.

Summary: This hotel was fine.  Not great and not awful.  I was underwhelmed by the property.  It was nice for a one night stay for Disney, but chose to drive to the park instead of walk.  Room was average and was fine for what we needed.  Not sure it felt like a Hilton property.  I will probably pick a different property for my next visit.  Overall 3 out of 5 stars.

Summary: This hotel has recently become part of the Hilton brand and it is worthy of being part of that esteemed family. The hotel is clean, bright and modern with a friendly and helpful staff. There is currently no breakfast buffet but there are decent grab and go breakfast options. The rooms are comfortable and well appointed. The hotel is well located within 10-15 minutes walk of Disneyland.
Manager Response: PrincessPieface,   Thank you for your 5 bubble review! We appreciate your business and look forward to having you back.

Summary Heading: Try the Suncoast. For their staff and their drinks and their pizza!!!
Summary: I absolutely love this hotel!! The staff is amazing. Scott and Isabel are THE best bartenders we’ve ever encountered, and we stay at a lot of hotels. Try their homemade pizza!!  Being a Diamond Member, we’ve stayed at a lot of hotels.  This is now our go to.  Miche and David R are both hospitable and welcoming when we arrive. Love this place. We stay a week at a time. Try it you won’t be disappointed. David the owner is also very nice and took the time to talk to us with his charming little son. Five stars. Thank you Scott and Isabel and Miche and David R and Mr. David. Five stars.
Manager Response: Paradise68337051754,   Thank you for your wonderful review, and recognizing our fantastic Team... although I am not the owner, I am very proud to Manage a hotel,  have guests such as yourself and the heart of the hotel..... our wonderful Team Members who enjoy what they are doing.

Summary: I came  first time, headed to the bar and Scott (bartender) treated very well that his service worth it. thanks Scott for your recommendations and good cocktails 🍸 that you made. if you guys come at Suncoast hotel, ask for Scott. he will make the best cocktails

Summary: Great hotel!  It was about a 15 minute walk to Disney which was great The rooms were clean and seemed new.   The staff was helpful and nice.  We had no issues and will probably stay there again when we visit Disneyland.

Summary: We’ve stayed at this Hotel since before it was a Hilton. I will not stay at any other property when visiting Disneyland. I love the rooms and the staff is very friendly and helpful. I do miss the buffet breakfast. I give this hotel a 10

Summary: I stayed a while back with a friend at this hotel.  This hotel would be a great find if not for the unbelievable customer service displayed by Fernando.  He is absolutely the most horrible example of customer service in any hospitality setting.  He is beligerant, rude, obnoxious, argumentative, condescending, and blameful.  In all my years of travel, I have never been so disrespected nor overcome by such unimaginable treatment by a front desk clerk. If not, an influx of non returning guests and numerous complaints from every outlet imaginable with these types of review will come to this hotel frequently.

Summary: Scott was theeeee best bartender I’ve ever had hands down the best ever super informative all round best top points tonite!!! Hotel is clean service is top notch all around great experience highly recommended to anyone love

Summary: Scott is amazing! Great service always friendly and helpful. Definitely completes our visit to Suncoast! Hotel is great. Central location and the walk isn’t too bad to the land. But again, Go see Scott at the bar it’ll be worth it especially if you have kids!

Summary: The rooms are large amazing the hotel is extremely clean and it’s only about a eight minute walk to the gate this is our new go to place we love this hotel! We’ve stayed at several other properties and keep coming back to this one highly recommend.

Summary: Loved our stay here! Very comfortable and quiet rooms! The staff was friendly and very helpful. Easy 10-15 min walk to Disneyland. Our room had a perfect view of the fireworks every night. The pool and outdoor patio were very nice and relaxing. Loved that it’s a smaller hotel, easy to navigate and feel at home there. We will be back!
Manager Response: Lisa M,   Thanks for the 5 bubble review of SunCoast Park Hotel! We are thrilled you enjoyed your recent experience.

Summary: We had a great stay at this hotel. Scott’s service was fantastic as  he was very attentive, professional, and super friendly. I would highly recommend this hotel to all my family and friends for future stays.
Manager Response: B7848LOcynthiac,   Thank you for the review and thank you for recognizing the amazing team at SunCoast park Hotel. We appreciate your recommendation! Com back soon!

Summary: Hotel was very nice! Room and bathroom were clean. Hotel staff was great! But Scott the bartender was super friendly and nice! He held a nice conversation and made sure our drinks were filled :)  Would recommend again! Super close and convenient to Disney :)
Manager Response: samanthao104,   We are thrilled you enjoyed our guest rooms!.  Scott is a top-notch bartender and we are so happy you enjoyed the conversation. Thank you for the recommendation.

Summary Heading: Close to Disney, big room, GREAT price
Summary: We enjoyed staying here. Was easy walk to Disneyland. Maybe 5-10 mins. Very convenient. Large room, plenty of space. Would definitely recommend and stay here again. Price was very reasonable, especially compared to other hotels in area. Staff was great and very helpful.
Manager Response: bart2581,   We are so happy you enjoyed the stay, the proximity to Disney Parks as most importantly, thank you for the recommendation! We can't wait to have you back soon!

Summary: Great room; clean, quiet, and comfy beds. I’m super picky on hotels so I did a lot of research, was very happy with my decision to stay here. Not a bad walk to Disneyland, a bit over a half mile I believe. We walked a couple of times and then took our car to the Disneyland parking garage a couple of times...after doing both, I think it was actually less of a walk from the hotel, plus then we didn’t pay an extra $30 a day for Disney parking. The only issue I had was coming and going from the hotel, they have a key card entry/exit system that never worked for us. Wasn’t too big of a deal though because I just called the front desk from the screen and they buzzed me out. Friendly staff, nice ambiance. Wouldn’t hesitate to stay here again. :)
Manager Response: Thank you for the 5 bubble review and we are so happy you enjoyed your recent stay. Thank you for recognizing our amazing and friendly staff. They are some of the best in hospitality.

Summary: The hotel was great all around! From the breakfast to the bar! Very centralized and the indoor store was well stocked! Just a short drive to downtown Disneyland and the Disneyland parks! Highly recommend!
Manager Response: terinpartida,   Wow! What an amazing 5 bubble review! Thank you for the recommendation. We can't wait to have you back!

Summary: Our family felt cared for during our stay. We were offered an upgrade upon requesting a king bed. It came with a view of the Disneyland fireworks! Staff were super helpful and accommodating. We will definitely stay again!
Manager Response: amynoho,   Thank you for the wonderful review! We have one of THE BEST view of the fireworks outside of Disney. Thank you for the shout out to our amazing staff; they really are true professionals and we can't wait to have  you back!

Summary: I have traveled to many Hilton properties but this has become one of my favorites! I loved the beach theme this hotel had and the way the rooms are set up it made me feel like I was at home. They have a cool VW in the back by the pool area. The staff is so professional and on top of everything.   Special shout-out to Jordy who helped us check in and was very helpful throughout our stay. She was super professional and on top of her game. A true role model for a front desk agent!  Will stay again
Manager Response: WOW! Thank you for the wonder review and we will be sure to share with our amazing associates. We can't wait to have you back.

Summary: The SunCoast has such friendly staff that are so helpful! The location is perfect (especially if you are wanting to walk to Disneyland) and is not loud by the freeway. It was quiet the two nights we stayed there and the bed was so comfortable, I fell right asleep. It was a seamless process to leave our bags at the hotel while we went to Disneyland on our last day and come pick them up before we went to fly home. Definitely a hotel to recommend to friends and family and to stay at again.
Manager Response: jamiels21,  Thank you and we appreciate the recommendation; we look forward to your next visit.

Summary: Our experience at the Suncoast Park Hotel was sufficient for what we needed. The room was a great size and the bed was comfortable. However it was annoying that breakfast was not included in the rate of the room.
Manager Response: Thank you for the review; we have an a la carte menu for guests that want to pick up a coffee or breakfast sandwich on the way to one of the Disney Parks.

Summary: Loved this hotel!!  Very clean! 8 minute walk to Disneyland! Customer service excellent! We had two queen beds, they were very comfortable! No house keeping, but if we needed towels or any amenities they were quick to bring them up! We will for sure be back again!
Manager Response: 472dyanc,   We love our guests from NV!  We can't wait to have you back soon.

Summary: Pillows flat. Room had an odor. AC not easy to figure out. Microwave outdated.  Entrance to elevator from underground parking, couldn’t get in the elevator due to key not working. Was underground no security, no way to reach the office to assist. It was night time and was scared.
Manager Response: lopezliz333,   Thanks for the feedback. We use only Hilton branded bedding, linen and pillows. We continually inspect for quality and reaplce when needed. The garage is keyed for guest security.

Summary: We love this Hotel so much! We’ve stayed here at least 50 times, I have never had a problem with anything. The Staff that we have interacted with have been amazing! Fernando is always so friendly and accommodating, Ben is always so helpful and nice. Jordy always has a smile and is so very friendly. The hotel always smells amazing and clean. The rooms are spacious and comfortable. The A/C works great! The beds are comfortable. We always feel right at home when we stay. It’s an easy walk to Disneyland. The small store is a welcome convenience and reasonably priced. I do miss the full breakfast buffet but understand why it’s closed. I will never stay anywhere else off Disney Property. So, thank you Hilton for this amazing Hotel!
Manager Response: Dear Safari14888033662,   What a fantastic review! We are thrilled you enjoyed your stay at SunCoast Park Hotel and can't wait to have you back.

Summary: Fantastic stay! It is within  walking distance to Disneyland! We could see the fireworks from our room!   Very nice accommodations! Friendly and professional staff! Highly recommend staying here if you are going to Disneyland.
Manager Response: Garyllutz,   Thank you for the 5 bubble review! We are so happy you enjoyed your stay and look forward to welcoming you back.

Summary: We had a a very nice room very spacious including the bathroom we were very comfortable. The staff was very friendly and accommodating. We couldn't be more happier with the accommodations.  Sincerely Ken C.
Manager Response: kencN7432DX,   Thanks for the 5 bubble review! We are so happy you enjoyed the rooms and thanks for recognizing our stellar staff!

Summary: Excellent hotel. Decent walk to Disneyland, takes about 15 min. Right off of the freeway. I do miss when they had a full breakfast. Love the lobby seating area and that they have a full bar! Definitely will stay again.
Manager Response: lisas1010,   WOW! Thank you for the 5 bubble review!

Summary: Stayed in the 2-room 2-queen suite with 2 other adults for 5 nights in October for disney trip. Overall we had a good experience. There are 5 floors and our room was on the 4th. It was spacious and pretty quiet. The 2 queens were comfortable but the pullout sofa bed - not as much. It helped when we got an extra comforter. As expected, housekeeping is minimal right now. Had difficulty getting coffee and coffee cups … not sure why that kept getting misunderstood, but it was easy to get towels and trash removal.  Fridge and microwave were great.   Parking is approx $25/day and I was able to park in the underground lot, which was very nice. There’s a free laundry room at garage level but we didn’t use it. Elevator was always quick. Hotel was clean and smelled nice.   Pool and hot
Manager Response: Mira331,   Thank you for the detailed review of your experience at SunCoast Park Hotel! We can't wait to have you back.

Summary: Scott the bartender at the location was very great, happy, and entertaining. I really appreciated his company!!!!! The hotel itself was very clean realizing and comforting. The best part is it was walking distance to Disneyland.
Manager Response: chriscR1290XC,   Thanks for the shout out for Scott!  We are so happy you enjoyed the proximity to Disney Parks.  Come back soon!

Summary: Always clean, always comfortable, always perfect for a trip to Disneyland. Scott in the lounge was so kind and went above and beyond. This place is legit comfortable. Walking distance to Disneyland, breakfast offered, kids room and fireplaces. I almost don’t want to tell everyone about it.
Manager Response: megancU7261PD,   Thank you for the wonderful review of SunCoast Park Hotel Anaheim! We are so happy you enjoyed your stay! Come back soon!

Summary: We came for a wedding. The hotel location was close enough to the venue. We felt the walking distance to Disneyland was reasonable for adults. I liked that the hotel sold some convenience store items because the store was quite a ways.
Manager Response: ajz4knights,   What great feedback and thank you for sharing with the Tripadvisor community; we appreciate your business. Come back soon!

Summary Heading: Lovely hotel, great proximity to Disneyland
Summary: This is a beautiful hotel. Rooms were very clean and very spacious. Quiet inside even though you're close to the freeway. Pool is huge and sparkling clean (could have been warmer). Staff is friendly and very helpful. Food choices at breakfast bar are a bit like fast food for my taste. The bar has a nice selection of spirits. I have only one complaint - the smell of their cleaning products is completely overwhelming in the lobby - the rooms are fine. I appreciate the cleanliness of the hotel, but they could make better cleaning product choices. If you have any chemical sensitivities, this is not a good choice.
Manager Response: italiangirlat,   Thank you for your feedback; we use commercial and industry grade cleaning products that disinfect and sanitize; we are apologetic they did not meet your standards. We are still taking every precaution to ensure the overall cleanliness of the hotel is top notch.

Summary: Came the first time with my daughter for a Disney trip. We loved this place! Very clean, rooms were comfy and the pool was  great. Fernando at the front desk helped make our stay enjoyable. We actually rebooked again here because of how he took care of us. Being Disneyland pass holders  we know we will be back again!
Manager Response: carla o.   What a fantastic review! Thank you for recognizing Fernando and thank you for your business. We can't wait to have you back soon!

Summary: The hotel is beautiful great pool great rooms be aware that they charge $25 per day to park and also hold $100 per night on a card until you check out. It’s about a 15 to 18 minute walk to Disneyland parks.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review!

Summary: I love this Hotel.  Very clean rooms . Close to Disneyland, 15 min walk depending on speed. Comfortable beds. Friendly employees. One complaint, free parking should be included , $25 a night is too much.
Manager Response: stephaniesmarts,   Thank you for the fantastic review!

Summary: My family and I stayed here during our trip to Disney. I must say we really enjoyed our stay. The staff was super friendly and helpful, the hotel was very clean and smelled amazing. The walk to Disney was quick and easy, so that was a huge plus. Our room was very clean, and we weren’t able to hear outside noise so we slept wonderfully. Overall, great hotel and a very pleasant stay. Will definitely stay here again on our next trip to Disney.
Manager Response: Dear MGame49,   Thanks for the fantastic 5 bubble review! We are thrilled to know you enjoyed our hotel. Hurry back!

Summary: Just Ok, hotel is a really long walk from Disney, food is cafeteria quality and they pump some perfume into the lobby that is overwhelming. Pool is not heated and to our surprise they don’t clean your room unless you stay more than 3 days and request it.
Manager Response: Pioneer15355538107,   We appreciate your feedback and are working on bringing back our full operation as fast as we can.

Summary: I’d highly recommend staying here. It is close to Disneyland, it’s clean and everyone is friendly! The pool and hot tub was great! I would stay there again and suggest. Using the app to check in and out is perfect!
Manager Response: stenzelk2021,   We are thrilled you enjoyed using the Digital Key feature; we hope to have you back soon.

Summary: Great hotel. Super friendly staff. Everything was clean and smelled fresh. It was a good distance to Disneyland parks that we could walk to and from without paying more for parking. Will definitely stay here again.
Manager Response: Dear tjames5426,   Thank you for recognizing our friendly and top-notch staff! Hurry back!

Summary: This hotel was close to where we wanted to go, it was very clean, and check in & out was very easy. We liked that the pool was open late and that they have a 24 hour shop where we can get snacks and water after a long day. This is my favorite hotel near the Disneyland resort now.
Manager Response: ally61092,   Thanks for the fantastic feedback! We appreciate your business!

Summary: I personally think that it was ran better when it was Country Inn and Suites! They had an amazing breakfast, with good choices! Now you have food in aluminum foil that you can’t see and have to pay extra! Parking rates were free! The kids were disappointed because they no longer serve warm cookies!
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: Lovely Modern Stay- Super Chill atmosphere for Disney Adults and Families
Summary: I am a Disney Adult. I love going to the theme parks. I am also a media reporter working for magazines covering theme park news. I almost always have to stay the night because I take the Amtrak to the parks. I've stayed at several hotels in the Disneyland surrounding areas. This hotel is by far my new favorite.   The hotel has such a cool modern look and feel. The moment I walked into the lobby I loved the chill atmosphere- I can see myself going to the bar for drinks or hanging out by the pool (more things to look forward to on my next trip). I loved the conviencet store and the guest services are right at the entrance. I was helped right away and was able to check in early (because my room was ready). This was huge because I had to work inside the parks this afternoon- so an
Manager Response: 992kathleenl,   WOW! We are thrilled to learn the SunCoast Park Hotel delivered what was expected. We appreciate the detail you shared in your experience  and stay and thank you for sharing with the Tripadvisor community. We can't wait to have you back!.

Summary: We booked a last minute trip to Disneyland and found SunCoast Park Hotel! Words can not describe how this  hotel was the perfect gem for a family vacation! Spacious, clean, and comfortable rooms!! Friendly and kind staff!! Yummy breakfast! A very large pool! And, the hotel was walking distance to Disneyland which was the cherry on top! This hotel is now going to be my go to hotel from now on to visit Disneyland! Thank you for making my family vacation so enjoyable!!
Manager Response: 578margiel,   Thank you for the 5 Bubble review!  We are thrilled you enjoyed the pool! We can't wait to have you back!

Summary: 10+ out of 10!  Excellent hotel! My family travels often and this stay by far exceeded our expectations.  We stayed for two nights as we visited Disneyland.  Beautiful decor and wonderful ambiance!   Location, location, location!! It was very close to the park, we were able take a break and rest between park visits which was great!   Cleanliness was a 10+ Out of 10! Everything including our room was spotless!   Staff was excellent everyone was so service focused!   The grounds are amazing! Beautiful infinity pool, underground parking, bar, business center, laundry services, clean and spacious gym and a great little general market that had everything we needed for our stay.   Rooms were very spacious! Comfortable beds and pillows!   Absolutely loved our stay and we will come
Manager Response: erikarP1167LG,   Thank you for the fantastic review! We can't wait to have you back and hope you and your family enjoyed SunCoast Park Hotel as well as Disneyland!

Summary: So this is a surprise trip for my son to Disneyland for the first time (mine too) and we were fortunate enough to make reservations here.  The prices were so reasonable to their competitors.  It’s very clean and comfortable.  Walking to Disney was so much closer than even walking from Disney’s friends parking structure that we found out after checking out. (Won’t do that again and all of the staff was so nice and provided great customer service,   but I have to mention Most importantly that Jordy started our trip of with a bang.  Where she provided great customer service and explained everything we needed to know, provided excellent recommendations, while make us feel so welcome.  Thanks to Jordy and the rest of the staff there we will recommend this location to everyone we know
Manager Response: DayTrip02259788779,  Thank you for the 5 bubble review! We are ecstatic to learn you enjoyed SunCoast Park Hotel Anaheim. We hope to have you back soon!2

Summary: Miss the Coffee Tea bar in the bar area and the Hot Breakfast. At least have muffins, oatmeal, donuts something. The King Suite is awkward the big empty space next to the bed is weird and the table right inside the door 2 of us kicked it or backed into hold the door open for the luggage cart. But other than those weird things the hotel is a great place friendly staff clean just want the old amenities to come back.
Manager Response: 694victoria,   Thank you for the review; while we work on reopening our Buffet we offered grab and go items in our Beachcomer Coffee bar. Thank you for the feedback.

Summary: Our team stayed at the hotel 9/31 - 10/3, 2021.  The drive into Anaheim was long so when I arrived at the hotel at 9:30pm on Thursday looking for a drink,  was told by the female bartender that the bar had just closed for the evening.  So on Friday while out I purchased a couple bottles wine as a few of us after some long games and getting back to the hotel late we could have drink.  Arriving to the bar at 9pm, I met Scott the new bartender, who offered to to keep the bar open for us as we were all rolling in from different venues over the next hour or so.  He was great!  He also offered to to make sure he would stay open for our group on Saturday night.  We all (15-20 of us) rolled in after 9:20pm and there was Scott ready to serve and accommodate us.  he stayed until we were
Manager Response: hcharamuga,   Thank you for the great shout out on Scott!

Summary: I will definitely stay again! I hope that they will send me additional incentives to stay.. that would make it even better. The rate for what I received is what made it very worth while. The staff was friendly and the lot is secure. Oh and make sure you don’t smoke in the room. 👀
Manager Response: michaels7142021,   Thank you for the great 5 Bubble review! We are thrilled you enjoyed your stay. Come back soon!

Summary: The hotel was nice. Guests were pretty lax about wearing masks in shared spaces, and there was a clerk when we left not wearing one. Not a surprise in OC. The three stars are based on the fact that I was never informed during the reservation process that there was no breakfast available. If I were management, I would comp the parking until breakfast is offered.
Manager Response: UglyDollOX,   Thank you for the feedback; while breakfast is not complimentary, we offer hot grab and go items for purchase at our Beachcomer Breakfast bar.

Summary: Had a great experience at this property.  Maria Avila went above and beyond to help my daughter and I upon check-in. I couldn’t have asked for a better person to walk me through and help me when we needed it.   I appreciate you and the hotel experience.
Manager Response: UglyDollOX,  Thank you for the shout out! We'll be sure to share with Maria. We can't wait to have you back!

Summary: Noise level was satisfactory, views were nice, friendly staff, very good on the cleanliness! The outside and inside of hotel was very well taken care of. Very relaxing environment. Staff was very informative and friendly.
Manager Response: kellyrivas15,  Thank you for the 5 Bubble review! We appreciate the feedback!1

Summary: Friendly staff, clean rooms, comfy bed. What more do you need? No breakfast but that wasn’t a deal breaker for us. There was food service available and you can sit in the lobby area to eat.  The bar was open for business  ART picks  up just outside hotel parking, which made our trips to the park easily accessible. We’ll definitely book again.
Manager Response: Pjsanchez7,   WOW! What a fantastic 5 bubble review! We are thrilled to know you enjoyed SunCoast Park Hotel Anaheim. Come back soon!

Summary: Rooms were great, clean and staff was friendly. Close enough to walk to Disneyland but also enough out of the way. We would stay here again and plan to on our next trip to Disney.  Well worth the money
Manager Response: madiohalloran,   We are thrilled to learn you enjoyed SunCoast Park Hotel! Come back soon!

Summary Heading: Nice, new hotel- walking distance to disneyland
Summary: We had a great stay for our three night vacation.  Staff was friendly, and the room was clean, quiet, and comfortable.  It was also a very doable walk to the park, so no bus shuttle was needed.  Would definitely stay again!
Manager Response: shelbylang1993,   We are thrilled you enjoyed your three night vacation as well as the proximity to Disney Parks. We look forward to having you back soon!

Summary Heading: All you will get during a weekday stay is literally a bed to sleep in. This hotel is either stupid about covid protocols or just
Summary: Don't waste your money here, you get the same amenities at the Travelodge up the road and you will save a ton of money. This hotel is very cute and relatively clean, that's it. Covid protocols have allowed this hotel to continue to charge an arm and a leg without actually providing travelers with anything you would normally expect. The bar isn't open, the restaurant isn't open, they won't come to your room at all during your stay unless your stay is apparently longer than 4 days. This hotel isn't even offering breakfast during the week, the best they could muster up is coffee and tea, which none of the hotel staff actually refill, so good luck actually getting some. You have to ask for clean towels every single day if you want new ones because they claim that "enhanced safety
Manager Response: Cupkate4,   Cupkate4,   While we appreciate all feedback from our guests, we do absolutely disclose our abbreviated hours of our restaurants, our limited daily housekeeping service as well as our deposit and authorization on all our websites. Anaheim, in particular, which is heavily tourist and visitor based is still not operating 100% and the lasting implications of our recent pandemic have given way to temporary service adjustments.   I would like the opportunity to discuss your stay over the phone and welcome a call from you at (714) 598-0600 x 702.  Thank you,

Summary: Rooms were clean and staff were friendly. Hotel was conveniently located to Disneyland parks for an easy walk and close to restaurants. The theme of the hotel was cute and the pool area was nice with lots of room to relax after a day at the parks
Manager Response: alixjarvis,   Thank you for the wonderful 5 Bubble Review! We are thrilled that you enjoyed SunCoast Park Hotel Anaheim and the proximity to dining and shopping. We can't wait to have you back!

Summary: We stayed for disney. Walk was super short and convenient. Rooms were clean. Parking was easy to find. Just wish they provided hand soap in the rooms instead of a facial bar of soap. Also upstairs sounded like little kids were running around. Other than that our stay was great!
Manager Response: jennifervillalvazo,   We are thrilled you enjoyed your stay! Our fantastic, top notch Guest Room Attendants take pride in room preparation. We are so happy you were satisfied with the convenience of Disney Parks Main gates. We can't wait to have you back soon!

Summary Heading: Why Didn't I Know of This Hotel Before?
Summary: Tried the SunCoast Park Hotel Anaheim for the first time as a place to stay after a day at Disneyland. So happy with the discovery! Hotel is in easy walking distance to the main entrance gates, with fewer busy intersections to cross. Very pleasant, clean, friendly hotel. Already have booked my next stay!
Manager Response: patinthehat2017,   We are thrilled to learn you enjoyed your experience, guest room and friendly hospitality at SunCoast Park Hotel. We can't wait to have you back.

Summary: Really loved staying here. We stayed for four nights and it was overall great. We did have an issue finding a parking spot after coming back from Disneyland one night. Staff said they get very busy over the weekend. I still think guests should have guaranteed parking at the hotel. Was told we should park our car in the red zone. We didn’t feel comfortable with that so we drove around again and Luckily we found the last available spot.  The room was large and clean, the beds were comfortable and for us the walk to Disneyland was very short. Room also had a fridge and microwave which was nice! I would definitely stay here again!
Manager Response: Bebesr,   Thank you for the wonderful review. I am sorry to learn about the full parking lot; I'd be happy to accommodate your next stay with us with a special gift. Thank you again.

Summary: The hotel is beautiful and the bartender Scott was very helpful and just wonderful to talk too! The hotel was in a great location and perfect for the cost. The hotel is very close to Disneyland and lots of other attractions! We will definitely be back!
Manager Response: Dear GoPlaces01260382530,   Thank you for the shout out on Scott! We'll be sure to share the positive feedback. We can't wait to have you back.

Summary Heading: Great Hotel Within Walking Distance to Disneyland
Summary: Since I arrived at the hotel I was given great service, there were able to check me in early which was amazing as I was ready to nap after a long drive. Front desk was able to help me with getting WiFi setup and gave lots of good advice and recommendations for our stay.  Room was clean, bathroom had plenty of towels and was well supplied, never had an issue with noise and our bed was comfy .  If you don't mind a 10 minute walk or so then this hotel is perfect for Disneyland trips, me and the wife walked to and from Disney the whole week and had no issues at all! I believe you are able to get the ART shuttle set up but in the time you would wait for a shuttle you would have already walked to the gates in Disney in less time, so no need for a shuttle!  Unfortunately wasn't able to
Manager Response: Dear andy916gt,  WOW! Thank you for the fantastic 5 Bubble review and thank you for sharing with the Tripadvisor community. We are thrilled you enjoyed  your guest room, services and amenities. Come back soon!

Summary: This was the perfect spot to get a hotel. It’s a quick walk to the Main gates at Disney and it’s away from the hustle and bustle. A double whammy. It was great to go back and take a nap mid day. You’ll definitely enjoy it here!
Manager Response: ashleysweet64,   Thank you for the fantastic 5 Bubble review! We are so happy to learn you enjoyed the proximity to the Disney parks. We can't wait to have you back!

Summary Heading: Poor parking security and poor wifi
Summary: My car was broken into, someone smashed my window to get in, while parked in paid garage parking. This was due to the fact that they allow people to come in with a 2 hr grace period of not paying for parking, which also makes me fear for the security on the property. The positive would be that the pool was open until midnight.
Manager Response: Dear Nicole A,   We are sorry to learn of this incident; while we are a safe property, and have keyed entrances and exits throughout the entire hotel, we encourage our guests to never leave belongings in a vehicle so they remain protected at all times. We belong to all Anaheim Police Neighborhood Watch programs and have regular patrols. We hope you have a safe return home.

Summary: The Team at this hotel went above and beyond to make sure we had a great stay. Walking distance from Disney parks. Great hotel, food and pool. My family will be staying here for every Disney parks trip.
Manager Response: twintigerswa,   Thank you for the 5 Bubble Review!  We are thrilled to learn that we delivered all that we intended to. We love that your family enjoyed the hotel and thank you for sharing with the Tripadvisor Community!

Summary: This is my Favorite hotel to stay in. I am a local here in Anaheim and my husband and I like to get away here and there and this is always a perfect stay in every way including the staff. As soon as you walk in it smells great! I love everything about this Hotel.
Manager Response: summer032004,   We are so excited to learn we are your favorite hotel!  We will share your fantastic feedback with the Service Team. We can't wait to have you back!

Summary Heading: Not enough parking and no housekeeping!
Summary: Not enough parking and cars where double partied. No housekeeping and Covid is still the excuse. I’ve stayed in Vegas a month ago and they have housekeeping. When called first towels they never came, when we called they said they won’t put them in the room for us so we had to go fine snd det them. The next day we called for towels and they never came do when we called again the story changed and they left our clean towels in the hallway on the floor. They could have atleast put them in a bag if they worried about Covid!
Manager Response: summer032004,   We are sorry to learn you we not completely satisfied with our hotel; Please call me at your convenience to discuss.

Summary: Great hotel! Considering we are still living in COVID world the amenities were plentiful and the staff was very friendly. I would highly recommend this hotel to anyone planning a trip to Disneyland. Whether a couples getaway or a family trip.
Manager Response: Dear  markdesign79,   Thank you for the 5 bubble review and sharing your experience with the Tripadvisor community! We are thrilled you enjoyed your stay and look forward to have you back soon.

Summary: This is one of the best hotels I have ever stayed in Pool is out of this world friendly stuff  but the best part of my stay would have to be the bartender  SCOTT R he is mr do it all from  Chef to bartener best service ever thank you for everything ...
Manager Response: K7683PQjoseg,   Thank you for the 5 bubble review! We are so excited to hear you enjoyed our zero-edge pool and we will be sure to let Scott know you were pleased with his service at the bar. Come back soon!

Summary: This hotel was so lovely. Nice and bright, clean lines. The room was very spacious. Also a number of outlets and USB ports conveniently located throughout the room. Super close to Disneyland, a 0.6 mi walk. I will definitely be staying here again.
Manager Response: Amber H,   Thank you for the 5 Bubble Review and thank you for sharing with the Tripadvisor Community. We can't wait to have you are your family back!

Summary: My family and I recently stayed in a two queen suite. The room was large, clean, and comfortable. The staff at the hotel were incredibly kind and helpful. I would highly recommend Suncoast to anyone. A few things to keep in mind, during covid breakfast is unavailable and housekeeping doesn't come in everyday. In our experience during this pandemic this seems to be how most places operate and if you know that ahead of time it helps. The location of the hotel is perfect though for finding food. You will be very close to gardens walk and many other restaurants and coffee houses. There is coffee on site in the morning which is nice. As far as housekeeping and the pandemic goes, I was able to put towels and our garbage outside the room and it was picked up efficiently. I could also
Manager Response: 777cassandran,   Thank you for the wonderful feedback. We are thrilled you enjoyed your stay and the proximity to Disney Parks. We look forward to having you back.

Summary: Sun Coast Park Hotel Anaheim is a great hotel.  Everyone there is very helpful, kind & makes you feel like you are coming home.  As you enter the hotel there is someone welcoming you & wanting to know how they may help you.  Once you have checked in & you make it to your room, house keepers are greeting you & wanting to know if you need anything.  We always feel like we are coming home to family.
Manager Response: Linda J,   We so value your feedback and appreciate you being our repeat guest; Our entire team is also so happy to see your reservation come in. Come back soon! Thank you for the 5 Bubble review of SunCoast Park Hotel Anaheim.

Summary: Stay was great!!!! Beautiful hotel, super friendly staff and very close to Disneyland Park. Bartender Scott was fantastic! Super kind and friendly, and very attentive. He doubled downed as a bartender and cook waiting on patrons with ease all while pumping out the libations. Overall it was a fantastic trip with no complaints.
Manager Response: Bob0437,   Thank you so very much for the 5 Bubble Review and sharing your feedback with the Tripadvisor world. We are thrilled you enjoyed your stay and the service from Scott, our newest bartender. Come back soon!

Summary: Staff is great. Every time I walked through the lobby I was greeted by a friendly face and a hello, or enjoy your day. Hotel is very clean, very accessible to Disneyland. Free customer laundry. Loved this hotel. I’ve stayed in a lot of hotels, I would definitely come back. The pool is great too. The hotel lobby had a really cool fireplace.
Manager Response: janastasio,   Thank you for the 5 Bubble Review! We are so happy you enjoyed all our hotel has to office. We look forward to your next stay!

Summary: We stayed here for 4 nights while visiting the Disney parks. Nice and clean hotel. Had a minor issue with a slow draining sink and locked safe but were taken care of promptly.   Walking distance to the parks. Right next to Garden Walk mall. Highly recommended!!!
Manager Response: V303QZrobertoc,   Thank you for the nice review! We  cannot wait to have you back!

Summary: I had stayed at his hotel pre-covid and loved it.  The location is ideal and the rooms are big and our family fit comfortably.  My most recent trip was not as enjoyable.  Our visit was set for Monday-Wednesday.  I used the Hilton app to digital check in on Sunday as I usually do.  Hilton offers a digital key which means you can completely bypass the front desk.  We drove up from San Diego early Monday morning and intended to go straight to the parks.  I stopped in at the front desk only to say that I had already checked in for the stay using the app but needed to verify that I as okay to park in the hotel parking lot prior to our room being ready.  To my surprise I was told that I hadn't checked in through the app and that I needed to present my credit card.  I haven't had to do
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: Poor service and not Hilton quality
Summary: This hotel overall did not provide quality service to us by any means. The staff was not helpful or knowledgeable. We had issues with the climate control in our room and the engineer had no knowledge of fixing it. We weren’t offered solutions but rather had to keep complaining until we finally got a new room.   The pillows were so flat we each had 3 under our head but it still wasn’t enough support. We were not informed of cleaning service policy when we checked in so we had to call to request basic needs like toilet paper because our room wasn’t serviced until our last day after a total of 4 nights. We didn’t feel welcomed here and it was not what we would expect from a Hilton quality hotel.   The pool was beautiful but the water was too warm and the jacuzzi had broken jets.
Manager Response: shaunaelisa,  While we always appreciate our guest feedback, the account and details of your stay are incorrect and do not align with any of our guest concerns. Perhaps you stayed elsewhere another hotel. You may contact me to discuss further.

Summary: We had a great time staying at this hotel. The staff is amazing! My husband loved the easy access to the freeway. The bar is not open all the time. The only disappointment was the breakfast that was offered. I would stay here again for sure... but I'd bring my own food.
Manager Response: yllieram,   thanks for the review. Breakfast is available at $10.00 per adult and youth $2 years-12 years at $6.00. Our Beachcomber Buffett is open & day's a week. Come back soon!

Summary Heading: The stays here are always wonderful, love it.
Summary: First thank you to all the staff at the hotel, everyone of them i met. This is about our 8th stay here since the hotel was built. We love this location, the rooms are large and clean, the hotel is very clean, the pool and hot tub are large and clean. laundry is good and clean and free (so nice, thank you). The store is stocked well and priced decent. Check in was smooth and they were able to help with my room request. I know due to covid the cleaning is not everyday, but we were able to get towels and garbage taken care of whenever we asked. The bar was open most of the nights we stayed, and the pool area stays open late which is so nice.   The walk to the park is about 10 mins but its shady most of the walk so its quite comfortable. There are a couple restaurant's close (down a
Manager Response: Dear 18jfr,   Thank you for the detail in your review; we truly appreciate your feedback. We are thrilled you enjoyed your experience at SunCoast Park Hotel Anaheim. We can't wait to have you back.

Summary: Attentive, great customer service, clean and perfect location! I highly recommend to anyone looking for a hotel near Disneyland or Convention center to consider this hotel that feels like a boutique resort with not too many people around like the larger options on strip.
Manager Response: fifanator007,   Thanks for the awesome 5 Bubble review! We love guests like you! Come back  soon!

Summary: Room is pretty big enough and clean, one thing dissatisfied the drawer handles, my baby is just turned 1year old and walking. Handles are bit sharp for my baby so we had to keep watching him and made distance from handles.  Otherwise was perfect!  Pool is pretty big and temperature was great!  We had a such a happy time!!
Manager Response: Dear artistrachel_JY,   Thank you for the 5 Bubble review of SunCoast Park Hotel Anaheim. We are so happy your stay was pleasant and enjoyable. We look forward to having you back.

Summary Heading: Not true information on the Web and in phone conversation
Summary: Hi,  Hotel doesn’t have morning buffet and doesn’t provide room service for 3 first days of reservation. Representatives don’t tell truth about it during phone conversation. Moreover, discounts given because of complains, don’t happen in reality.
Manager Response: Dear lera2001l,   While all feedback is appreciated,  guests are encouraged to review the hotel website on the latest information about food and beverage operations cleaning protocols  etc.  Our hardworking staff received countless accolades from happy guests about their stay and any ''untruth'' you may have received was likely due to our sensitive times post Covid and a misunderstanding.

Summary: I reserved last minute and the accommodated me very well.  They seemed very busy but gave you great individual service.. the rooms were amazing..  close to Disneyland but far enough from the foot traffice - if you are not a Disney person like me!
Manager Response: Dear dianacB6583ZM,   Thank you for the 5 bubble review of SunCoast Park Hotel Anaheim! We appreciate your time and  we can't wait to have you back.

Summary Heading: No sound proofing, you hear everything, sleepless
Summary: No soundproofing. You can hear your neighbors conversations at 3am and all hours of the night. You hear TVs on. You can hear every step taken upstairs. You hear it all. Noisy street too. Watch out for many hiddden fees. Parking is not a flat rate $24. They add a number of taxes to the parking making it nightly $28.33 ridiculous. Also a resort fee on top of that. Advertised as buffet/breakfast included and that is false. They don’t have any breakfast available right now. Staff is nice and it’s very clean! That’s the only plus.
Manager Response: Dear mrsrl2021,   I am sorry there were noise disturbances during your stay. We have one of the highest grades of soundproofing for new built hotels since we opening in 2016.   Parking is not inclusive of tax, just like many goods and services, tax is not included. Our website discloses ''+tax.''  Additionally, like many hotels just reopening, we are not serving our buffet. We do not have that package option available at the current time.   You may contact the General Manager if you would like to discuss the details of your stay further.  Thank you,

Summary: The staff was nice and approachable..the room is clean and smell was good..the pillow on our last day when we change the room is a little bit smelly even the pillowcase was change.Over all it was good to stay stay there..highly recommend..
Manager Response: m21raquipiso,   Thank you for the 5 Bubble review! We are thrilled you enjoyed your stay and thank you for sharing with the Tripadvisor community.

Summary Heading: Everything is extra and NO breakfast
Summary: Since last time we went: Twenty Four Dollars to park a night, Twenty Dolllars for roll away bed per night, NO Breakfast! I mean, we were already there so what could I do?! This is absolutely robbery from this Chain. I’d rather stay anywhere else but here. Shoot, next time we’ll stay at the Motel6. This was way overpriced too especially for all the damn ad-ons and NO breakfast.
Manager Response: ebarocio22,   I am sorry you did not fully enjoy your stay. All our fees and extras our listed on our websites for guest reference, including rollaway and parking charges.

Summary: The hotel was pretty nice and the location is great! It’s 15 mins to Disneyland. We love that the hotel lobby smelled really nice! And the pool looked great, though we never got to use it.   However, the service was quite lacking. Not to say they were rude, but they lacked of warmth and friendliness. They also didnt seem aware of my request to have a crib and the two rooms next to each other. I still didn’t get the two rooms to be next to each other despite checking-in via the app since a day before my arrival. I couldn’t make a selection as well, the rooms were selected for me. When I asked for shower caps, they asked me to come down and pick those up. I never experienced that in any of other hotels. I wasnt acknowledged as a gold member Hilton honor. And when I politely asked
Manager Response: Yulia2201,   I am sorry you did not get to enjoy Anaheim's only infinity/zero edge pool. I am also apologetic you were not fully satisfied with your stay.   If you would like, you may contact the General Manager to discuss your stay in greater detail.

Summary Heading: Great place to stay near Disney.
Summary: This hotel was excellent. Close to Disney. The room was pristine. We ordered dinner at the bar/ cafe and the food was excellent. They have a wonderful pool. Everyone was very nice and were extremely helpful. As of our visit only the cafe had food and only open for dinner but gift shop had a good array of packaged food items and free coffee in AM. The rooms have a fridge ( small ) and a microwave. It was a great place to stay.
Manager Response: GoPlaces66007088498,   Thank you for the 5 Bubble review! Our Team appreciates the shout out. Our fast fired pizzas are one of the best! We can't wait to have you back soon!

Summary: We went here for a basketball tournament . One of the parent got us a group discount for 148$ per night with free parking . Being a Hilton Honors , I thought I would be able to get a better deal than that . Booking June 17-21 using my Honor rewards , made me confuse and believe that I will only be paying 90+ $ for tax and my rooms covered by the rewards . Received an email confirmation on that , but it basically does not include the price details not unless you will click on it again . Confident that I got a better deal, I never visited my booking again . Then I have to add another day because of our Disneyland and California Disney Adventure. Checking in was easy , I would say the Receptionist were pretty friendly but  not that knowledgeable. The rooms are clean but cleaning of
Manager Response: Thank you for your response and being our guest. After reviewing your reservation, the reservation was made outside the group and direct with Hilton using part points and cash. The group rate us only honored when reservations are booked using the special group code. If you would like to discuss your stay in great detail, you may contact the hotel and ask for me. Safe Travels.

Summary: This was the perfect location for our Disneyland adventure to begin and end. The service and recommendations by the front desk staff and Angela were amazing! The hotel room was immaculate and large. The pool is beautiful and very well maintained.  The hotel is within walking distance of Disneyland and several great restaurants. I will definitely stay at this Hilton location again and again!
Manager Response: Dear 586deborahv,   Wow! Thank you for the 5 Bubble review. We are thrilled you got to share your experience of SunCoast Park Hotel Anaheim with the Tripadvisor community. We can't wait to have you back!

Summary: This was our first time trying out a Hilton hotel during one of our disney trips and it didn’t disappoint. Our room was clean and spacious. The pool stayed open until midnight, so it was great to take a quick dip after being on our feet all day. Mini fridge kept our water extremely cold, and our nightstands had AC plugs and USB plugs to charge all our stuff, like mini fans and portable chargers.   The standout though, was being checked in by Ellie! She was so sweet and kind, which is sometimes hard to find at the front desk. She answered all of our questions and gave us insight on the Hilton Honors perks we could sign up for. After driving in the morning and being at the parking until midday, it was refreshing to talk to her and get to know her a little bit.   One thing that is
Manager Response: sabrinafT7183JL,   Thank you for the 5 bubble review and sharing your hotel experience with the Tripadvisor community. We are thrilled to know you enjoyed the stay and thank you for the shout-out about Ellie... she is a rock star!. We hope to have you back soon!

Summary: Aged and basic but clean and comfortable.  Front desk was understaffed. Long line at times and agent kept answering the phone while guests were in line waiting. Good location. Convenience store was helpful.
Manager Response: Thank you for the feedback but we just reopened after a multi-million dollar renovation and upgraded into the Hilton family of hotels. The hotel is 4.5 years old and all guest and public spaces are only months old.  We are sorry about the wait and appreciated tour patience.

Summary: We stayed here due to its proximity to Disneyland and my Hilton status.  We did a quick 2-day trip shortly after Disneyland reopened in May 2021.  Arriving prior to check-in, the front desk gentleman was able to not only allow us to park for the day, they even had a room available  and were able to check us in.  We didn't need it but it was nice to be able to go right to room when we returned for the day.  They also upgraded us to a suite due to my Diamond status without me having to ask.  A quick 15-min walk to the park and were there shortly after opening.    After a long day, we got back to finally the room.  It was updated and clean.  A perfect place to sleep.  I do have to say, I thought the freeway proximity might mean significant noise (and we were closer to it) but the
Manager Response: Thank you so much for the positive review! Our team is professionally trained to take care of our guests and we are so glad you enjoyed your stay. Your feedback and satisfaction is greatly appreciated. We can’t wait to have you back!

Summary: Our experience at this hotel was outstanding. Very helpful and accommodating staff and workers. Rooms clean and spacious. I definitely recommend staying at this hotel. Very close to Disneyland if visiting the park.
Manager Response: Wow! We are thrilled to learn you enjoyed your stay! We love our guests! Come back soon!

Summary: We loved this hotel! The service was great and so helpful.  The room was huge and clean. The gym and pool were really nice. The hotel is  within walking distance to Disneyland! We will definitely stay here again.
Manager Response: Thank you for the FANTASTIC review! We are thrilled you enjoyed your experience! We can’t wait to have you back!

Summary: We have stayed many times at Disneyland at different properties this one is now at the top of the list! Might be five minute farther walk than the properties across the street but worth every step. The property is extremely clean the rooms are large and amazing... staff is very friendly and every time we returned to the hotel we were warmly greeted and the hotel smells amazing :)
Manager Response: Dear josephandclaudia,   Thank you for the 5 Bubble Review! We are thrilled to learn that you enjoyed your stay and we can't wait to have you back. Come back soon!

Summary: Check-in through the app as well as having a digital key was convenient.  Although the digital key did not work for parking and you still have to get a paper to put on your dash.  Parking is a little bit tough when you get in pretty late.  We lucked out and got the last spot but in the morning, there were plenty of cars parked even in the red zone.  I'm thinking they probably use valet usually but did not see that option during our stay.  Overall a pleasant stay.  Easy walk to Disneyland.  Room was nice and clean and the staff were friendly.
Manager Response: christineb21x,   Thank you for your valuable feedback. With the additional reservations and only California residents driving in to enjoy the park, our parking lot was full.  I am apologetic about the hiccup. We hope you come back soon.

Summary: Check in was easy. Like that you can use the Hilton Honors app. Gym was decent. The convenience store was contained helpful items. Bed and pillows were comfortable. Was able to get early check in. Would return.
Manager Response: Dear juan1pablo0,   Thank you for the wonderful 5 Bubble review! We are thrilled to learn your stay was satisfactory. We can't wait to have you back! Thanks for sharing the the Tripadvisor community!

Summary: Hotel was very clean and modern. Even had a fresh scent. Our room was perfect and very clean too. Beds were comfortable and the pillows were too. No complaints and would definitely recommend this hotel. (We stayed for 3 nights.)
Manager Response: Dear tesahelena,   WOW! Thank you for the wonderful 5 Bubble review; all your feedback is so much appreciated. We can't wait to have you back at SunCoast Park Hotel Anaheim.

Summary: Very clean room, ample parking. Beds were comfy and staff was nice. They brought extra luggage racks upon request. We had four people in our family and found the room was large but we needed somewhere to put our suitcases during our stay as it was a very wide open room but we prefer not to leave them open on the floor. I’d stay here again if needed. Not my first choice for a Disney trip with very young children since it’s a longer walk to the park, but for someone who doesn’t mind walking just under a mile to the park, it’s a very nice clean hotel. The walk to the park felt safe and clean, well lit at night.
Manager Response: Dear entravel2021,   We are so appreciative of the Tripadvisor community and guests like you for sharing their experience with the world. Just in case you were wondering, we are only about 1,090 steps from our front door to the main gates of Disneyland. Come back soon!

Summary: This was the worst stay at a Hilton hotel I EVER had. My family came to Anaheim for a basketball tournament, checked in around 3 pm, and immediately left due to basketball games. Came back to the hotel around 10:30 pm. I checked the sheets on both the bed and pullout bed, and everything was DIRTY. I called the guest service 3 times, and nobody picked up; finally, on the 4th call, someone picked up. I told him we have no clean sheets. He told me there are no more clean sheets, said sorry, and then hanged up the phone. I called back and was told they might have one clean blanket and that I would have to get it. I never had guest service tell me I had to pick up an item. I picked up the blanket, took it upstairs, and found it to be dirty. I called back to guest service and told him
Manager Response: Dear dionjohnsondj,   Thank you for your feedback. If it is convenient, you may contact the General Manager at (714) 598-0600 to discuss your details further.

Summary: Stayed two nights for a quick Disneyland trip in a 2 queen room. The hotel looks brand new as opposed to rebranded. There is a beachy vibe thanks to the decor. It is about an 18 minute walk to the park which is once of the closest brand name hotels. The room had a fridge and a microwave. The bed was very comfortable.  The pool is beautiful and has long hours so you can soak in the spa after a day at Disney. There is sit down food service close, but not many options for quick family food close. The plus is the location is pretty quiet.  The major con for us was the lack of breakfast. It had been advertised as a benefit for Diamond members and the lack of this was the biggest con of the trip. This is the only hotel stay I have had during COVID where not even a sack breakfast was
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: clean, fun, family friendly, walking distance, disney approved
Summary: Amazing hotel! Walking distance to Disneyland, Garden Walk, and restaurants! The staff were absolutely amazing & I was so impressed with how clean everything was! We were so happy with our stay that we extended it another night. We will definitely return to this hotel again!
Manager Response: Thank you so very much for the 5 Bubble Review! What beautiful family photos of your stay with SunCoast Park Hotel Anaheim! We can’t wait to have you back!

Summary: This hotel is pretty new and looks great! The staff was very friendly and accommodating, especially the general manager. I was in town for business, but this is def a great family friendly place because the pool is awesome and it is so close to Disney.
Manager Response: Thank you so much the the feedback. We appreciate your business and look forward to having you back soon!

Summary Heading: Great place for a Disneyland trip with an awesome staff.
Summary: My wife arrived on May 17 for a two day trip to the reopened Disneyland park. We were greeted warmly by the front desk. After checking in, we had a nice chat with the manager, Mr. David Guiterrez. He actually made our Disney trip even better when he informed me of what the procedure was to get on the ride "Rise of the Resistance." Without his information, we would have most likely been shut out on our first day at the park. Getting on that ride was part of the reason we made reservations at the park. The proximity to Disneyland (walking distance), cleanliness, and accommodating staff made our stay exceptional, enough so that we booked an extra night to relax before driving back to northern California the next day. I really enjoyed the hospitality, and the fact that the manager
Manager Response: Thank you for the 5 Bubble Review! We are so happy your room and stay were comfortable! Thank you for the detail in your experience and you are welcome back anytime.

Summary: We have been coming to this hotel since they have been open.  When you enter the hotel everyone makes you feel like you are coming home & part of the family.  The rooms are very clean.  We have tried other hotels in the area & we come back to this hotel each time.  It is also very close to Disneyland.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for the  Bubble Review! We are so happy to have our ''regulars'' back! We can't wait to  see you again.

Summary: Friendly and welcoming staff that accommodated our last minute request for an early check in.  The rooms were very nice & clean and fun pool for the kiddos.  Short 10 minute walk to the front gate of Disney...would highly recommend to anyone looking to stay in Anaheim.
Manager Response: Thank you for the 5 Bubble review! We are happy to have our Hilton Honors Guests.. Come back soon

Summary: Close to the theme parks, but right on a busy street. Sirens (police or firefighters) were heard very clearly multiple times per night. Wouldn’t recommend if quiet sleep is important to you. Would recommend if you like being close to everything.
Manager Response: none

Summary: Amazing service. Great accommodations. Just overall an amazing time. From the moment you arrive at the hotel, you feel that the employees care. The room was great. Our king bed was huge and comfortable.
Manager Response: Thank you for the 5 Bubble Review! We are thrilled you enjoyed your stay. We can't wait to have you back.

Summary: David made our stay absolutely amazing . We were comfortable and welcomed with smiles. He let us know all the amenities and gave us a quick run down of places near the hotel. He was friendly and kind . Thank you for making our stay so easy !
Manager Response: Thank you for the 5 bubble review! We love baseball here at SunCoast Park Hotel and you fans are welcome back anytime!

Summary: We stay here often for our Disneyland trips and it’s always fantastic! Beautiful, clean rooms and exceptionally friendly staff! Enjoyed a swim in the pool this time. Give this one a try, it will be your new favorite. We’ll be back soon!
Manager Response: WOW! Thank you for a wonderful 5 bubble review. The Team at SunCoast Park Hotel Anaheim can't wait to have you back!

Summary Heading: Totally our new place to stay!
Summary: Toom beach theme was stunning, the room was so clean and the staff were so kind to my family. They wrote her a birthday card for her birthday. Our first family trip out fo the house in a year! well done!
Manager Response: Thank you for the 5 bubble review!  We can't wait to have you back.

Summary: My family stayed at the hotel and were so impressed with the cleanliness and friendliness of the staff. Everyone was following the covid guidelines. I appreciate how affordable the rooms were as well.  We will definitely be back
Manager Response: Thank you for your 5 Bubble Review! We are thrilled to know you enjoyed your stay. We can't wait to have you back!

Summary Heading: If you like musty, loud, overpriced stays, this is for you
Summary: This is a loud location, given that it is near the I-5 highway. It may not be as loud as midtown Manhattan, but the noise is intense at times.  I had to request new sheets as the ones provided were smelly and caused some kind of reaction (congestion, itchiness). During these COVID days, you make your own bed, which is fairly time-consuming. This hotel has no one to bring things to your room, such as toilet paper or towels.  There were brown marks on the smaller towels. There were long hairs in various places. I ended up cleaning much of the room myself a few times. Most of the dirt or grime seemed related to food. A couple of very tiny ants were found in the room.  The room was very musty. I hoped that thd smell would clear, but this did not happen. The closet, with hard to use
Manager Response: While we take great pride in next-to-brand-new hotel, you feedback is appreciated. While we did not learn of your issues with you stay while you were a guest of ours, you may reach out to the General Manager so that we may make it right. I hope to hear from you soon.

Summary: Restaurant was not available, but the pool and lobby were fine to hang.   Facility was clean, easy and close to Disneyland.  The room was nice large and perfect for 2 and a baby.   For the price worth it.   Enjoy
Manager Response: Dear T7134YUadam,  Thank you for your feedback. We are happy to know you enjoyed your stay.

Summary: Super clean, quiet, friendly staffed hotel. I know Disney is closed to people outside of CA right now, and maybe that’s why it’s so peaceful. But next time I come to Anaheim I’ll definitely stay here. Super spacious rooms!  No breakfast just yet (Covid) but their convenience store by the front desk is open. I believe they said by mid May they might be able to offer breakfast again. There’s a ton of places to eat within walking distance.
Manager Response: Dear W9442PBelizabeths,   Thank you for the 5 bubble review! We are thrilled you enjoyed your stay. We can't wait to have you back

Summary Heading: Amazing experience! Great service all throughout my 5 days.
Summary: Amazing experience! Great service all throughout my 6 days. My fiancee and I almost spent week at Suncoast Hotel. The service was impeccable! The associates made sure to respond accurately to every single needs we have. The management made sure that our stay was great by providing adequate service all along the journey.
Manager Response: Dear Chrisstyno,   Thank you for the 5 bubble review! We are thrilled to know you enjoyed your stay. Thank you for the fantastic comments about our associates and management team. They truly enjoying delivered the hospitality you experienced.  We can't wait to have you back!.

Summary: Great chill hotel. Pool is nice so are the rooms (very clean). Loved the overall aesthetic. Will definitely recommend to my loved ones and i will definitely be back for future stays. Unique hotel overall.
Manager Response: Dear Calvic04,   Thank you for your 5 Bubble Review! We are thrilled you enjoyed your stay. We can't wait to have you back at SunCoast Park Hotel Anaheim.

Summary: Came to Orange County for the weekend actually stayed in Anaheim Disney way this property was off the path a little bit nothing to be concerned with and actually that was nice very quiet no problems the hotel is very clean the rooms were amazing bathrooms clean impeccably sanitize the linens everything was just great staff was nice, dating answered questions will visit again and stay at the same property
Manager Response: Dear martinchavez22,   Thank you for the fantastic 5 Bubble review! We are thrilled you enjoyed SunCoast Park Hotel Anaheim on your recent trip to Anaheim. We can't wait to have you back.

Summary: First time at the hotel. This is the cleanest and best Hilton brand hotel we have ever stayed in. Staff is very friendly. Very convenient location to go to Anaheim Garden Walk,Disneyland and California Adventure and Downtown Disney District. We will be back again and again. Don’t take my word try it for yourself. Kiddos to Sun Coast!
Manager Response: Dear Mizbunnyboo14,   Thank you for the 5 Bubble review! We are thrilled you enjoyed SunCoast Park Hotel Anaheim. We can't wait to have you back.

Summary: Bonding time with son over the weekend. Hotel is clean, smells really good and clean. I’m picky about where I stay, I will not hesitate to re book with SunCoast. Front desk receptionist CIRO really loves his job and made our stay phenomenal. Great location!
Manager Response: Dear Chi00000,   Thank you for the 5 Bubble review! We are thrilled to know you enjoy your stay at SunCoast Park Hotel Anaheim. We can't wait to have you back.

Summary Heading: Excellent quality and fantastic customer service!
Summary: We came down for the Touch of Disney, Taste of Knott's, and Taste of Universal festivals and stayed for three nights. The staff was awesome! Very friendly and provided a great guest experience. The hotel was very clean. The elevators and hallways smelled fresh and sanitized. The room was the same and even had a seal on the door when we entered for the first time. We felt very safe and comfortable throughout the stay. We will definitely stay here again.
Manager Response: Dear BGeo1313,   Thank you for the phenomenal 5 Bubble review! We are thrilled to read how you enjoyed your experience at SunCoast Park Hotel Anaheim. We can't wait to have you back!

Summary: The staff is so great and accompanying. They gave us a suite upgrade since it was our first time staying and we are Hilton members. The rooms are spacious, clean and have a SoCal design. Very close walk to garden walk shopping and restaurants. Would definitely stay again with the family. Hopefully the restaurant will open soon.
