Manager Response: Dear valeriele2021  Thank you for the 5 Bubble review! We are thrilled to know you enjoy our guest rooms as well as the service you experienced. We can't wait to have you back soon!

Summary Heading: Excellent quality at an affordable price
Summary: Last weekend I stayed at this hotel while I was down in Anaheim for the food festival at Disney. I was greeted right when I walked into the hotel and the staff member that checked me in was very friendly and thanked me for being a Gold member. The room was very clean and the perfect size for me. The hotel is definitely walking distance to Disney (10-15 minutes depending on how fast you walk). You could likely easily access the ART nearby if you didn't want to walk (although with COVID I wasn't sure if it was running and I didn't check where the local stop was). I had a few interactions with the front desk when I went to grab drinks from the little market inside the hotel and each time was a great experience. Checkout was also fantastic and I was super happy they were able to
Manager Response: rockgoddess528  WOW! Thank you for the 5 Bubble review. We are thrilled to know you enjoyed your stay and accommodations. We thank you for choosing SunCoast Park Hotel Anaheim and can't wait to have you back!

Summary: Great to see mgmt and staff driving a great experience during challenged Covid times. Room was great.Suppptive and conscientious... check  in automated and they even helped us with room for our Trailer to Park. Great job Sun Coast
Manager Response: Dear TravelSafeChapman,   WOW! We are so happy that you chose to stay at SunCoast Park Hotel and that we met and exceeded your expectations. We can't wait to have you back. Safe travels.

Summary Heading: Extended stay with a wonderful group!
Summary: I stay in quite a few Hilton associated hotels throughout the year and this is one of my favorites.  From Management down this establishment is on their game!  The rooms are spacious, the internet speeds are such that work goes uninterrupted, the staff is very pleasant, the building is often quiet, the pool and spa are very nice and the beds are comfortable!  The close proximity to Disneyland is also a major plus.  I have to say hank you to David an his wonderful staff for making my stay so pleasant.
Manager Response: Dear The_Ben_Walker80,   Thank you for the 5 Bubble review! It's our pleasure to take care of our guest such as yourself. We, at SunCoast Park Hotel Anaheim hope you come back soon and make us ''your home away from home."  safe Travels.

Summary Heading: Best hospitality anyone could ask for...
Summary: The customer service at the front desk was elite from Fernando.  Along with being very welcoming & friendly...he had great local recommendations for dining & entertainment. He called to ensure everything was good to go once we checked into our room.  We definitely look forward to our next visit soon.
Manager Response: Navarro83,   Thank you for the 5 Bubble review! We appreciate your business and I will ensure Fernando knows about your nice words. It is guests like you that inspire us to do well each day at what we love. We look forward to having you back very soon. Safe Travels,

Summary: I had booked a stay here last minute for a work trip, and I was beyond impressed. I stayed at the Hilton in Culver City the following day and the Hilton in Beverly Hills after, and I must say that this was the hotel that gave me the best service. I had no clue that the rooms needed the hotel key to be inserted into the wall for the power to work, and so the guy in the front desk was very helpful and letting me know what I needed to do. When I was leaving the property, my room key wasn't opening the gate, and the same person in the front desk was very helpful and getting me in and out of the property. The rooms are pretty decent and I would definitely recommend this to a family who is wanting to stay near Disneyland. Whoever wrote the horrible review that they did not acknowledge
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to share your feedback with the traveling community; I'll be sure to share your experience with our service team.

Summary: With all that the world has thrown us, these folks are friendly, keep a clean hotel and follow all the safety guidelines. I asked for a complimentary upgrade and I got it because they had it. It was super clean, up to the wife’s standards and the kids loved the pool. We walked to downtown Disney in 11 minutes. We had no issue ordering food to the room. Highly recommend!
Manager Response: Thank you for the 5 bubble review; we are happy to learn your stay met and exceeded expectations. We can't wait to have you back.

Summary Heading: Best Manager and Customer Service EVER!
Summary: David who is the general manager has been a huge help and we haven’t even checked in yet. We need more customer service etiquette like David’s and this world would be a better place! Patron for life here!
Manager Response: Dear ARYsMommy,   Thank you for the wonderful feedback. We appreciate your business and making SunCoast Park Hotel your lodging choice.   Safe Travels,

Summary: Not traveling for almost a year, the Suncoast Anaheim made our stay overly comfortable. Check in was a breeze and the pool was still open!!! From traveling to Anaheim monthly for almost4 years, to not traveling at all, Suncoast Anaheim made our first stay truly magical!!! Joey and Ellie went above and beyond to make my wife and I's stay PERFECT!!! If you're looking for an amazing hotel, with premium amenities, look no further!!!
Manager Response: Dear jpledger23,   Thank you for being our guest and thank you for recognizing Joey and Ellie. I appreciate the feedback of your most recent stay and hope to have you back soon.

Summary: This is one of the best stays we have ever had. We got to stay in one of the suites and it was better than we imagined. When you walk in, there’s a little living area with a nice desk, chair, a loveseat that is also a pullout, as well as a microwave and mini fridge. The bathroom was a nice size with amazing lighting that’s perfect for doing your makeup, if any ladies are wondering. The bedroom was very spacious and the room was very clean and sanitized. The staff was very friendly and helpful they made checking in and out super easy. Gary with the management staff and Joey at front desk took very good care of us. We want to thank everyone at SunCoast Park Hotel for an amazing experience. If you would like a seek-peek of the whole room, we also did a video review on our YouTube
Manager Response: Dear DisneyAlphas,   Thank you for the 5 Bubble Review! We are thrilled to learn your stay was comfortable and met your expectations. We can't wait to have you back soon!

Summary: I totally love this place it's so clean everything is decorated so nicely. I got the King suite. The bed was so comfy! It's a large room. When you first walk in you are in the living room area. Why a couch, chair, desk and a nice size TV mounted to the wall. The fridge and microwave are there as well. The decor in the walls are great.. The lighting in the bathroom was great. I know for women that's important when doing their make up.  Then as you pass the bathroom you get to the bedroom. Huge beautiful dresser and a King Bed. Huge windows with black out shades or close to it.  You can see the snow capped mountains. We saw fireworks from the room. It was NYE  Due to covid the place was very quiet. The bar and breakfast area was out of commission but that area was so nice. The
Manager Response: Dear Nebz_38,   Thank you for the 5 Bubble Review! We are so happy to learn you enjoyed your stay over the New Year's Holiday.  We are thankful for your business and we can't wait to have you back.   Safe Travels,

Summary: Found myself in between apartments and getting price gouged by less than stellar hotels until I heard about Suncoast from a family member. Even with new health related restrictions the hotel gave me a since of freedom and release from the stress I was going through trying to find an apartment! Ellie Lopez made the check in quick and easy and made sure my stay was more than extraordinary!
Manager Response: Thank you for the 5 Bubble Review! We are thrilled to know you enjoyed your stay at SunCoast Park Hotel Anaheim. We can't wait to have you back.

Summary: My wife and I stay 3 nights here. We had the King bed suite. The hotel room has a living room area with a desk, side chair and a couch. The room was clean and spacious with a small refrigerator and microwave. The hotel staff was friendly and accommodating. SunCoast Park Hotel is close to shopping and restaurants. It is a short stroll to the Garden Walk area for your eating and shopping needs.
Manager Response: Dear Passport812005,   Thank you for the 5 Bubble review!  We are so happy to learn that your stay and experience were comfortable. We can't wait to have you back as our guest. Thank you for recognizing the SunCoast Park Hotel Anaheim Team.

Summary: I stayed at SunCoast for a weekend for my friends’ birthday. The staff was amazingly kind and friendly. Super cleanly and COVID-19 aware. The beds were AMAZING! So comfortable I wish I owned the same model as well as the pillows. A/C the pool were available! About a 15 minute walk to so many restaurants and Downtown Disney! I hope I get to stay here again!
Manager Response: WOW! Thank you for the 5 Bubble review. We are so happy to hear you enjoyed your stay at SunCoast Park Hotel Anaheim. Our location is ideal for anyone visiting Downtown Disney.   We can't wait to see you again!

Summary: This hotel is amazing and huge! The staffs are very welcoming, friendly, and helpful. The rooms are cleaned and have lots of space. The pool is amazing and big! Definitely coming back to this hotel! Definitely would recommend coming here!
Manager Response: Dear 0betsaidag,   WOW! Thank you for your 5 Bubble Review. We are so happy to hear you enjoyed SunCoast Park Hotel Anaheim . We cannot wait to have you back as our guest again.

Summary: This Hotel will blow your mind!!! The rooms are amazing and have gorgeous views!! Nice and friendly staff when you walk in they make you feel at home. The pool is huge and beautiful. Will totally be revisiting again! If your looking for a clean, spacious, and gorgeous hotel room this is it!! Don’t look any further.
Manager Response: Thank you for the 5 Bubble review. We are thrilled to know your stay was enjoyable. We can't wait to have you back as our guest again.

Summary: I was concerned taking my family on vacation during COVID times, however this hotel was so clean and the people were so nice I will definitely be coming back! The general manager went out of his way to make outlet visit memorable
Manager Response: Thank you for the 5 Bubble Review! We are happy to learn you enjoyed your stay and  your travels were safe and sound. Thanks for recognizing SunCoast Park Hotel and the efforts made to keep our guests and associates safe.   We hope to have you back soon!

Summary: Guy at front desk offered a bland greeting and didnt acknowledge Gold membership. When asked to send up items, he said he couldn't leave the desk and when I requested a late check out, I was told I'd be charged!   I asked if they offered any breakfast for gold membership, he said he's not aware of any and also there was no pantry credit!   He also allowed a vagrant to charge her phone by the elevator and made me uncomfortable.  Whoever is running this needs to uphold the Hilton standard... it's more than just a name. You're responsible for creating an experience!
Manager Response: O8265XFjasong,   I am sorry to learn that you did not enjoy your stay with us; with the various guidelines still in place in Orange County, our food and beverage options have been suspended until it is safe to resume.   We are safely operating our hotel per Covid-19 precautions and therefore many of our Hilton properties have abbreviated offerings and amenities to keep both guest and employee safe.   I appreciate your feedback and would love an opportunity to discuss your stay over the phone at your convenience. I can be reached at the below phone number.   Safe Travels,   David J Gutierrez, General Manager SunCoast Park Hotel Anaheim P: (714) 598-0600 | F: (714) 598-0601

Summary: Thus was the second time I stayed here...I love the rooms, they are very personable and comfy...u feel like your on vacation even if it's only for one night.. the bed was so comfortable I didn't want to get out of it!! The shower head could b stronger but otherwise it was an awesome experience!! Thank you I will be staying again sooner rather than later!!
Manager Response: Dear Luvinminivacations,   Thank you for the wonderful review; we strive to make the service impression you shared in the review. We are thankful for your business at SunCoast Park Hotel Anaheim and can't wait to have you back as our guest.   Safe Travels,

Summary: Hotel Lobby was clean and smelled nice. Staff was friendly. Was inpressed how the the room door had a sticker stating room has been sanitized. The room itself was well kept and clean. Bed was comfortable. The room decor was cute.
Manager Response: Dear Vamperilla13,   Thank you for your 5 Bubble review;  we are thrilled to know you enjoyed your stay at SunCoast Park Hotel Anaheim. We hope to have your back in the near future!

Summary: Beautiful hotel that takes you away from the stresses of your day. The pool area is amazing especially during California sunsets. The location is perfect within walking distance to the main attractions and food.  The hotel rooms are spacious, clean, new along with a bed that is comfortable.  The staff was very accommodating and helpful. I also found special gifts to bring home that were affordable. Love the service and stay!  You made me feels as if I was a princess!
Manager Response: Dear bucketdreams,   Thank you for the 5 Bubble Review! We are thrilled your stay was as enjoyable as described. Your feedback will go a long way on improving and fine tuning our service and we can’t wait to welcome you back on your next stay in Anaheim!   Safe Travels.   David Gutierrez General Manager

Summary: So with all the craziness in the world I wandered back to a great memory and stay at the SunCoast Park Hotel for our Hilton Conference.  It was a while ago, but I wanted to post how this hotel was the perfect stay close to the Convention Center.  Comfortable rooms, accommodating and friendly FD agents.  Many hoteliers were staying there as well and we all raved about.... Bryce (our bartender)!  After a full work/conference day he recommended the perfect snack which he ran back to the kitchen after hours and made himself... warm chocolate chip cookies!  This became our nightly fav which he made each night without us even asking.  Thanks Bryce for the special service and going out of your way to make our night(s) feel like home!!!
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to share your delightful experience and recognizing our Team.   We hope to see you on your next trip to Anaheim.

Summary Heading: First time here and would return!
Summary: This was a package deal through a travel agency and I was very pleased! The hotel isn't very old and I loved that breakfast was included, we had great weather while there and was able to take advantage of the pool ( a good size) and hot tub. The walk to Disneyland wasn't very far but it was just my husband and myself so no complaints. The staff were friendly and helpful both Ellie who served us dinner the day we arrived and Nicolas with a friendly hello as we came down for breakfasts. This trip was just at the beginning of the Covid19 coming out in America, we were lucky to get to enjoy a getaway before everything went sideways!!
Manager Response: none

Summary: I booked my stay through one company that stated free parking and breakfast for the hotel (the whole reason I wanted to stay here) but it was through the previously owned company. They waived everything upon check-in with proof from my booking site, but I had problems after that. They tried to make me pay for everything when I checked-out. It was just annoying and I didn't appreciate the attitude of one of the receptionists. I do understand they did a lot for me by doing this, but they didn't follow through either.  P.S. The breakfast is NOT worth nine dollars.
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: Will recommend this place: new, clean, quiet
Summary: Concierge personnels were ever the professional, despite amidst the challenges of coronavirus and the very nearby Disneyland parks closing on short notice, both of which were factors beyond their control. Information of breakfast buffet not being served out of caution was disseminated efficiently. The hotel was newly renovated and spotlessly clean. Elevator was fast. 5th floor was quiet and free of noise. Room was so spacious, with enough extra space for a spare couch or a kids playset area. A great first impression of Tapestry. Also, this maybe minor, but the desk chair with contoured memory foam was fantastic and a surprise find. Walk to Disneyland entrance about 15 minutes.
Manager Response: none

Summary: We stayed at the SunCoast Park Hotel amidst the COVID-19 Pandemic for my cousin’s wedding.  I prefer to stay at bigger hotels but when I booked the the hotel I’m February 2020, all hotels in Anaheim were sold out due to a big Expo.  The week I was due to arrive in California, the pandemic got worst and cause numerous cancellations.  The hotel was fairly quiet and nice. It is clean, safe and the best part is the staff were very welcome and accommodating.  The assistant manager, Alex, was very nice to our group.  He opened the bar and food venue earlier and closed later to service us -  there wasn’t much available around.  He offered assistance to the Bridw and groom when he found out about the mishap at the reception.    The rooms, we had a studio, is very spacious and clean ( we
Manager Response: Dear Paulynn2000,  Thank you for taking the time to write such a wonderful review!! We are so delighted that Alex was  able to make your stay here with us even more memorable for you and your family! We look forward to your next stay with us!

Summary: We thoroughly enjoyed our stay at the SunCoast hotel in a fireworks view room.   I am a Hilton Diamond member and did not pay for parking or breakfast.   The breakfast was not continental- there were eggs, bacon, sausage, potatoes, waffles, yogurt and fresh fruit as well as breads and cereal.   It was about a 12 minute walk to Disneyland and even closer to the Anaheim garden walk shopping area.   We did watch the fireworks one night from our room.  Please note fireworks were only on the weekend unlike in Florida.  You could also see the fireworks from the beautiful pool area or big hallway windows.   Nice friendly staff!  The rooms were spacious and had a small bench and desk chair in addition to the beds.
Manager Response: Dear Alices322,  Thank you so much for taking the time to leave a review for us , we are thrilled you enjoyed your time here with us and we look forward to seeing again soon!

Summary: This being our first Anaheim trip, trying to find a hotel for our week at Disneyland was not an easy task because so many of the hotels near the park seemed over priced for being a bit dated.  While Suncoast is not the absolute closest hotel to the park entrance, it was a 10-15 minute walk to the park security tables.  The times we chose to UBER to and from, the average price each way was $7 not including a tip, and the average time from the app locating a driver and us getting out of the car was 5-7 minutes.    The hotel feels new, has a nice lobby, bar, and buffet area.  There was never an issue finding seating during breakfast, and the food provided was always scrambled eggs, sausage, bacon, toast, on top of the standard buffet items.  We typically only tolerate 1-2 days at
Manager Response: Dear carnbravila,  Thank you for sharing with the world about your recent stay at Sun Coast Park , Anaheim. It’s a pleasure to hear from your guests and to learn of their satisfaction as you experienced. We look forward to your next trip to Anaheim.

Summary: We enjoyed a weekend stay for a trip to Disneyland. It was a 4 min ride to the park and only 6 bucks for uber. Very clean and updated room. Could use better mattresses for added comfort and food but acceptable. Includes breakfast, heated pool, and HBO on TV. Internet and parking is an added cost we did not expect as a heads up.
Manager Response: Dear Mrirelan 23,  Thank you for reviewing and staying at the Sun Coast Park, Anaheim. We appreciate your feedback and look forward to your next visit!

Summary: Visited from 27-29 Feb. Service is outstanding I have special need do to blindness and other conditions. Fernando Castro always has visitors concerns handled if additional requirements need to be address.
Manager Response: Dear 183rahaeir,  Thank you for sharing with the world about your recent stay at Sun Coast Park, Anaheim. It’s a pleasure to hear from your guests and to learn of their satisfaction as you experienced. We look forward to your next trip to Anaheim.

Summary: What a great place to stay.  When you enter the hotel the front desk people make you feel like one of the family.  Mish, Fernando, Joey, Dianne, Matthew, John & I know I'm missing someone however once you spend one time with them they remember who you are & greet you with your name.  I haven't gotten that at any other hotel.  If David or Alex are there they also make sure to say Hello & ask how our stay is going & how we have been since the last time we stayed.   Nicolas was very pleasant to talk to when we checked in for breakfast.  Maria made sure that the food was hot & stations were full.  We got to meet Gary & Debbie from marketing & they were glad that we  have stayed here since Dec of 2017.  We have tried other hotels & they just don't add up to this hotel.
Manager Response: Dear T989OYYZ,  Thank you for taking the time to write such a wonderful review!! We are so delighted that Mish, Fernando, Joey, Dianne, Nicolas, John, and Matthew were able to make your stay here with us even more memorable! We look forward to your next stay with us!

Summary: I was in room 210 and 212 checked-in on 26th checked-out 27th. Both rooms were clean and nice. I can go on and on about the hotel, about how great and centrally located it is. However, what continues to bring me back is the employees. They were outstanding and attentive to our needs. Our check-in person was Joey. Joey made our experience there, that much better. Him and your other employees are the reason why, my family and i will be returning.
Manager Response: Dear aalonso619,  Thank you for sharing with the world about your recent stay at Sun Coast Park Hotel, Anaheim. It’s a pleasure to hear from your guests and to learn of their satisfaction as you experienced. We look forward to your next trip to Anaheim.

Summary: Do not hesitate to book this property. I am a retired corporate executive who spent my life traveling and in my 20 plus years of being on the road I have never stayed at a more clean, well managed and friendly staff facility. Congratulations to the management of this property. Hilton is fortunate to have you on their payroll. You do an excellent job and made a huge impression on me during my recent stay. I’m not one to usually take the time to review a business but felt encouraged to do so after my stay at your property. Very family oriented and close to everything.
Manager Response: Dear 565garlandb,   To make an impression as we did with you is all what we strive for; we are a team of hoteliers who have a passion to want to care for our guests.   Your review came across my desk and sent reverberations through each department as I shared it with the team.  Thank you for the compliments and it's always our pleasure. It's what we do best.   Should you have any more feedback, you can reach the General Manager, David Gutierrez at (714) 588-0600 x 702 or david.gutierrez4@hilton.com.  We can't wait to have you back as a guest of ours.   David Gutierrez General Manager (714) 598-0600 david.gutierrez4@hilton.com

Summary: We just got back from one of the best holidays ever! It was made that much better because of the friendly staff, comfortable beds, sweet pool and hot tub, excellent little free breakfast buffets and super location to the Disney parks.   Fernando was amazing and made our check in very quick and easy. Bree, Matt, and Joey were also very quick to help and offer advice and answer any questions.  After walking through the parks all day it was wonderful to come back to the hotel and enjoy a nice drink and meal at the bar.  Bryce was simply fantastic!  We also need to mention Elizabeth (Ellie) because she really stepped up our last night and saved the day!   This hotel is a short 15 minute walk to the Disney parks. The garden walk is 5 minutes away with bowling, escape rooms, theatre,
Manager Response: Dear paulas577  WOW!   What a wonderful review! Thank you for all the mentions of the Team who loves to do what they do best. I'll be sure to let them know.   It's guests like you that help us keep ''hospitality'' alive; we love what we do.   We can't wait until we get to see you back.   Safe Travels,   David Gutierrez General Manager (714) 598-0600 David.gutierrez4@hilton.com

Summary: My family and I had an enjoyable stay.  The rooms were clean and spacious. Walls are a little thin but the hotel stayed quiet for the most part.  The staff was attentive at check in.  We chose this hotel because of the the other positive reviews and it's proximity to the park.  My only unpleasant experience was with the breakfast buffet.  The food is pretty low quality and I ended up only having coffee and toast.  This is a super cheap buffet so I get the low quality on the food, but honestly I'd rather pay double or triple the price for food I can enjoy without having to leave the hotel It would have made for a nice break from the park food.
Manager Response: Dear angelica1877,  Thank you for taking the time to write such a wonderful review!! We are so delighted to read you and your family enjoyed your stay. We hope to see you and you family next time !

Summary Heading: Crisp and Clean with plenty of caffeine
Summary: We were a short walk from Disneyland. The staff was awesome and took care of us after a long day. The restaurant was served great food and the pool was nice and refreshing. The rooms are updated and the beds had us fast asleep.  I will definitely be back next year.
Manager Response: Dear 505corona,   Thank you for the 5 Bubble Review!  yes, we just redid all of our rooms  and the only Tapestry Collection Hotel by Hilton in SoCal!  We can't wait to have you back as our just.

Summary: We arrived on Wednesday and left on Monday!  What a great experience from the beginning to the end. As soon as we walked in we were greeted by a smiling face and great clean scent.  Our check in process was smooth. We stopped at the bar and had a quick drink the bartender Veronica she was super sweet and gave us good ideas on dinner. The room was perfect size for us, 2 adults 2kids,  they were clean as well.  Breakfast was good with eggs waffles and a good variety of foods-   The pool is heated so even in February we were able to enjoy the amenities of the hotel!   Great rate and great rooms!  we will totally stay again here when we come back!
Manager Response: Dear  Inspire530656,   Thank you for the 5 Bubble review! We are thrilled you and your family enjoyed the hotel and the only 18 hour pool in Anaheim!  We can't wait to have you back as our guest!

Summary: Comfortable and clean hotel within walking distance to Disneyland (about 15 minutes).  Front desk staff are pleasant and helpful.  Morning breakfast was good - the staff was very attentive, especially Nicolas.  Always making sure that we had everything we needed.
Manager Response: Dear JanFCo,   thank you for your review.  We strive to ensure each of guests has all that they need at the SunCoast Park Hotel Anaheim.   We can't wait to have you back, soon.

Summary: We have stayed at this hotel when it was previously country inn and suites and that is what brought us back, the amazing service we experienced and very welcoming staff. With new management and name I guess you can say a lot has changed. First off on our initial check in day the guy that checked us in had a very rude attitude and gave us a very unwelcome feeling. Second we notice our room was missing a do not disturb sign so when we notified front desk they said they will have one sent up which never arrived at all. Third the breakfast was ok but didn’t seem to be as good as when we first stayed there. Fitness areas literally shrank to like a two person fitness room vs before it was a lot larger. Last but not least my family felt some what discriminated of our color just by the
Manager Response: Dear ayzamora808,   I'd like an opportunity to discuss your stay at your convenience  and can be reached at (714) 598-0600 x 702.  Our Team is a s diverse as the guests we serve and I am sorry there was a misunderstanding.   I look forward to speaking with you.   David J Gutierrez, General Manager SunCoast Park Hotel Anaheim david.gutierrez4@hilton.com (714) 598.0600 x 702

Summary: This was a last minute trip to Disneyland with kids.  Hotel is approx a year old.  The rooms are spacious with a living area adjacent the sleeping area.  The staff is very friendly.  It's about a 10 - 15 min walk to Disneyland.  Food could be better, but great for kids.
Manager Response: Thank you for staying at SunCoast Park Hotel Anaheim!  We are truly only that 10-15 minutes walk to the  Disney Parks. We can't wait to have you back as our guest.

Summary: Was disappointed when I got to hotel and they did not have the room we requested but they did everything in there power and had the right rooms for the rest of our vacation.  Very nice rooms, free laundry, breakfast was great it would be nice to have hard boiled eggs but breakfast always fresh and available.   Nice pool a little cool but big, and great hot tub.  Easy walk to disney   Great staff especially Nicolas who spent that extra few minutes to great us talk to the grandkids and get us anything we needed,   He was wonderful.  We will stay here again and I recommend everyone stays here.
Manager Response: Dear peggiCalgary,   Thank you for staying with SunCoast Park Hotel Anaheim! We are thrilled you enjoyed our hot breakfast buffet and thank you for recognizing Nicholas.   We look forward to having you back as our guest!

Summary: Excellent location! We were able to walk to and from Disneyland. Rooms were fresh and clean with the California beach theme throughout the hotel. The staff welcomed us and were very helpful. I highly recommend this hotel.
Manager Response: WOW. Thank you for your 5 Bubble review! We are thrilled you enjoyed your stay. I’ll be sure to share your kind words about our Team. We can’t wait to have you back.

Summary: Had a great time at this Hotel.  The location and convenience are hard to beat.  The room we had was very spacious and clean.  The Staff was very helpful and eager to help us have a memorable stay. We will return on our next trip.
Manager Response: Dear severina517,  Thank you for your 5-bubble review. We appreciate your patronage and can’t wait to welcome you back!

Summary: This is a beautiful hotel with a very welcoming staff.  Best place to stay in the area by a long shot and a very good value.  Love the rooms, the bar and pool area, and the breakfast was excellent.  This will be our hotel of choice next time we visit the area and we will look for another hotel in the collection when we travel to our other destination points.
Manager Response: Dear billD836UW,  Thank you for sharing with the world about your recent stay at Sun Coast Park Hotel of Anaheim. It’s a pleasure to hear from our guests and to learn of their satisfaction as you experienced. We look forward to your next trip to Anaheim!

Summary Heading: Nice, new hotel. But a little disappointed. Very rude bar staff
Summary: I stayed for 3 nights from 6th-9th Feb for the new Rise of the Resistance ride at Disneyland. The ride was ace, but I genuinely left this place pretty angry because of service I received by the man behind the bar. I will tell all...  I do have to mention that the staff on reception were lovely. Especially the new girl.   The room was very nice, however a little dark being at the very back of the hotel on the ground floor facing an electrical tower.   Breakfast was nice enough. Fairly surprised we were served juice in plastic cups. I'm not particularly funny about what I have my drinks from, but paying a non-budget price for a room you would expect a little more respect.   On the Saturday (8th Feb) I decided to have some drinks at the bar. It looked nice and I was happy to go
Manager Response: PaulJourney1983,   Thank you for your review; although we strive to exceed our guests expectations, I am apologetic we did not do so on your recent stay.   Thank you for the kind words about our Service Team and I will be addressing the items you shared into you review.   If time permits, please do not hesitate to give me a call. I'd love the opportunity to apologize over the phone.

Summary Heading: Nice hotel in a nice location
Summary: Stayed at this hotel for a conference but would definitely stay for a trip to Disney. The hotel was within walking distance (about a block or two) of downtown Disney, a little further from the convention center. It is nice and clean and well taken care of.
Manager Response: Dear LoveTravel775878,  Thank you so much for taking the time to leave a review for us , we are thrilled you enjoyed your time here with us and we look forward to seeing again soon!

Summary: We were here for five nights. The room is a good size and the bed was very comfortable. The room was quiet for a great nights rest. Located only 1/2 mile from Disneyland it’s an easy walk. The free breakfast buffet was average, offering pastries and donuts would be an improvement. Highly recommended.
Manager Response: Dear JimRawlings,  Thank you for reviewing and staying at the Sun Coast Park in Anaheim. We appreciate your feedback and look forward to your next visit!

Summary: First time staying at a Tapestry Collection hotel and it was very impressive.  My room was clean and environmental friendly.  The front desk staff was very accommodating especially when I needed kleenex for my cold.  Ate dinner at the Bistro/Bar 2 nights and met up with Veronica (happy birthday) same date as mine and Bryce, her evening relief. Very friendly people and fun to joke around with.  The food was also good, had pizza, wings (yummy) and potato skins.  If you are in Anaheim, please check out this hotel.  You won't be disappointed.
Manager Response: Dear 579jerit,  Thank you for taking the time to write such a wonderful review!! We are so delighted that Veronica was able able to make your stay here with us even more memorable! We look forward to your next stay with us!

Summary: This was our first time staying here for our family’s Disney trip. Clear hotel and rooms, the breakfast was great but the service was even better. You can tell the employees care about their guests, particularly Nicolas. He went above and beyond to make sure my family and I were taken care of during breakfast. Thank you!!!
Manager Response: Dear Zlaam12,  Thank you for taking the time to write such a wonderful review!! We are so thrilled to here that Nicolas was able to make your stay here with us even more memorable! We will definitely let Nicolas know of his great work!  We look forward to your next stay with us!

Summary: This is the best hotel in Anaheim Ca! Extremely clean hotel and rooms, great and professional staff. I would recommend this hotel to everyone! Great location and not far from Disney. My favorite new hotel!
Manager Response: Dear awomanofstandard1,  Thank you for your 5-bubble review. We appreciate your patronage and can’t wait to welcome you back

Summary: This hotel was a good Hilton option for a quick stay near Disneyland. We used points and the kids had a blast. Short walk to the park. Clean decent size  room...we didn't need anything more. The below pictures are the view from the 5th (top floor) so you can see the distance
Manager Response: Dear A7897RLmaggiem,  Thank You for your 5 of 5 rating!

Summary: The staff really make the difference.  Great work and wold definetely stay again. The front desk arrival, observice the engineering team help guests, the F&B team clearing the tables and maintining the restaurant.  Very well done and friendly service.
Manager Response: Dear 1475jaspmh,  Thank You for your 5 of 5 rating!

Summary Heading: Disneyland trip- SunCoast Park Hotel Anaheim
Summary: Very clean hotel with welcoming and very kind staff.  Excellent Continental breakfast. Very clean and beautiful pool area. Nice room for the kids to play in with movies and giant bean bag chairs, games for the kids to play while waiting in the lobby. Great place to stay!
Manager Response: Dear 81shannono,  Thank you for sharing with the world about your recent stay at Sun Coast Park Hotel, Anahiem. It’s a pleasure to hear from your guests and to learn of their satisfaction as you experienced. We look forward to your next trip to Anaheim.

Summary: My wife was in Anaheim for a conference. I brought my son later in the week to take to Disneyland. The employees were friendly and attentive. Nicolas helped serve us for breakfast. Great complimentary breakfast and service. The room that we were in was very spacious. And we will definitely be back.
Manager Response: Dear omakaui,  Thank you for reviewing and staying at Sun Coast Park Hotel , Anaheim . We appreciate your feedback and look forward to your next visit!

Summary: Stayed one night after a long day at the Disneyland Parks. Great quick stay! We loved that the pool/jacuzzi was open till midnight (not to mention well kept and lovely), so we could warm up our tired feet and cold bodies...it was a great way to relax after a fun filled (and busy) DISNEY day. Our room was clean and the beds super comfy. We weren’t there for very long, but would definitely go back for a longer stay! There was a small, but well equipped fitness room (we didn’t use, but it looked nice). It was also walking distance from Downtown DISNEY! Would recommend!
Manager Response: Dear xKayxJayx ,  Thank you for reaching out to write your review. We are very delighted to see you enjoyed yourself and our staff made for a memorable stay. Thank You!

Summary: Great experience! Never even knew this Hilton was here, glad to have found. Good perks for Hilton Honors. Excellent value.  Excellent location, 10 minute walk to the park and lots of restaurant options within walking distance. The hotel offered good pizza in the bar area at at reasonable price with a good beer selection. This hotel is small but has great amenities.  Gift shop with snacks, alcohol and anything you may have forgot. The pool area is nice and although no water slides, it is clean,  decent size and has food & drink service with board games and corn hole boards.  Super cute little kids  TV area with bean bags and a star ceiling.  The rooms are very clean and  new.  We stayed in a king bed studio suite which had a safe,  microwave,  fridge,  hair dryer,  desk,  2 TV's,
Manager Response: Dear 49KS,  Thank you for sharing with the world about your recent stay at Sun Coast Park Hotel , Anaheim. It’s a pleasure to hear from your guests and to learn of their satisfaction as you experienced. We look forward to your next trip to Anaheim.

Summary: Beautiful hotel, friendly staff. Location 15 minutes to Disneyland by foot, Anaheim garden walk 5 minutes. Pool was salt water I believe and lovely, we were upgraded to a beautiful suite, extended our stay and the kept us in same room. The lounge had a kids movie room with bean bags and play so while the kids played we sat at the bar for a drink! Awesome. Will stay here again for sure!!!
Manager Response: Dear Jessica N,  Thank you for reviewing and staying at the Sun Coast Park Hotel , Anaheim. We appreciate your feedback and look forward to your next visit!

Summary: Just stayed one night for my birthday. Everything was nice and clean. Didn't use the gym, but it looked nice. Downside is having to pay for parking and breakfast, but other than that, had a good night sleep.
Manager Response: Dear Jehovana B,  Thank you so much for taking the time to leave a review for us , we are thrilled you enjoyed your time here with us and we look forward to seeing again soon

Summary: Staff were extremely helpful and pleasant.  The room was neat and comfortable. Parking was convenient.  The breakfast selection was varied and well prepared. I highly recommend this hotel. For those planning a visit to the Disney parks, it's a convenient 10-15 minute walk to the main gates.
Manager Response: Dear G Thomas W,  Thank You for your 5 of 5 rating!

Summary Heading: Fine if you've never been before
Summary: First of all, the hotel rooms are spacious and clean.  The recent overhaul changing the theme to mostly a surf vibe is nice.  I’m disappointed in what Hilton has done to the running of the property.  I guess when I’m charged $17.95 a day for parking, I expect secured parking to slow down vandals and burglars from completing their tasks.  When you put out the same breakfast product that was once free, and now charge $8.95 per person; well that’s a bit of a stretch.    I’ve stayed in this location three times when it was Country Inns and Suites and loved it.  Fair price for a good product.  Now . . . not so much.
Manager Response: Dear David A,  Thank you for your review all feedback will be relayed to management, and we hope to have again in the near future.  Thank You!

Summary: We had booked this hotel when it was still a Country Inn & Suites, at a very decent rate for a stay during The NAMM Show 2020. However, we never got notification from the property that it had changed into a Hilton property. We just happened to do a random Google search that showed the Country Inn & Suites as closed. Panic set in and we had to call to find out what happened and then confirm our reservations. Once again, we were concerned as we never got any other emails the day or two before arrival, like most other hotels we book. I called to confirm our reservation. Upon arrival we were greeted by a friendly desk attendant. Our room was spacious, newly remodeled and very clean, as was the rest of the property/grounds. They honored our free breakfast and no parking charge, that
Manager Response: Dear kribbean,  Thank you for sharing with the world about your recent stay at Sun Coast Park Hotel,  Anaheim. It’s a pleasure to hear from your guests and to learn of their satisfaction as you experienced. We look forward to your next trip to Anaheim.

Summary: Had this hotel booked for me as my company was to take part in the NAMM show hosted at the convention center each year and I was beyond impressed. Front desk staff was courteous and helpful at all hours of the day -- and considering I didn't get in till after midnight my first night in town, it was so glorious to have a friendly, smiling face after a long processing out of LAX! The bed was comfortable and all floors were quiet, even with kids and families around. The room was spacious and beautifully kept with so many places to charge electronics and store my things. Location was close to all major attractions and just a brisk walk from Disneyland - saving me a pretty penny on Ridesharing or Parking! I will definitely be back.

Summary: Perfect stay!  From the moment we walked in we were treated with kindness. Joey at the front desk spoiled us. Great spotless room away from any road noise. Yummy breakfast kept us going. Pick this hotel.
Manager Response: Dear Lovesplaying,  Thank you for taking the time to write such a wonderful review!! We are so delighted that Joey was able to make your stay here with us even more memorable! We look forward to your next stay with us!

Summary: From top to bottom my 3 day stay went perfectly! The property is beautiful, from the lobby to the rooms everything was spotless. The staff was genuinely friendly and even called me to let me know when a package for me had arrived. I would recommend this hotel to anyone who is looking for a flawless stay in Anaheim!

Summary: This is a hotel off the beaten path but with many perks.   There is an ART shuttle to the park. There is a buffet breakfast for around $10 per adult.  The only restaurant is the bar, and the selection is slim pickings. However, the pizza was a good deal for around $15. (A 12 inch with eight slices.) free coffee is available in the lobby.   The room was clean and tidy, ample towels. It had been recently refurbished. Either stay in a fireworks view room over the pool or go down to the pool. There are excellent views of the fireworks for a decent price versus some of the other properties.   Parking cost around $17-20 but it is well worth it. The lot is small but had room for everyone.   They have a small store with a selection of snacks and items you might have left behind. Also,
Manager Response: Dear Jessicarbt,  Thank you for reviewing and staying at the Sun Coast Park Hotel, Anaheim. We appreciate your feedback and look forward to your next visit!

Summary: My family stayed here for the four nights of our Disneyland trip.  It was a very comfy, very clean hotel.  Each queen bed had four pillows, with more in the closet.  There was enough parking.  The buffet breakfast had scrambled eggs, potatoes, bacon, sausage, toast and muffins, cereal, and a waffle maker.    A Disneyland shuttle is supposed to stop there but I wouldn't wait for it if you can walk.  It's only a 10-minute walk.  Each morning I saw people who had waited over half an hour for the shuttle.  This hotel is also located next to the Garden Walk, which is a block of shops and very good  restaurants, such as The Cheesecake Factory and McCormick & Schmick's.    The only negatives about our stay is that the breakfast policy is not communicated well. When we booked, we were
Manager Response: Dear Candice S,  Thank you so much for taking the time to leave a review for us, we look forward to seeing again soon!

Summary: Excellent location, Excellent employees, particularly Ciro, Ellie and Mish at the front desk along with breakfast and free parking. Can't do much better than this. Very short walk to Disneyland and an even shorter walk to Anaheim GardenWalk. Depending on which side of the hotel you stay on, you can see Disneyland fireworks at night. There is some traffic noise from the freeway, but I personally found it to be excellent white noise. Great zero edge pool and large jacuzzi.
Manager Response: Dear cdlarsen714,  Thank you for your 5-bubble review. We appreciate your patronage and can’t wait to welcome you back.

Summary: The staff here (Elizabeth at the front desk, other front desk personnel and managers that we had contact with) are friendly, helpful, and very good at what they do. Even the custodial and maintenance staff greeted us warmly. The place is ridiculously clean: spotless rooms, super-clean breakfast area with an attendant making sure things are kept stocked and the tables bussed), and I even saw an employee sweeping and scrubbing the parking stalls in the under-hotel garage! The location is about a 15-minute walk to the front gates of Disneyland along well-lit streets, although a city shuttle is also available for a small fee. The breakfast was ample and fresh and they actually changed it up (offerring different items) the two days were there. The room we had was huge with a large

Summary: Just spent 3 nights there. I came down to Orange County to handle some family matters. Actually my sister chose the hotel for my wife and I because the hotel we usually stay at was booked for some reason.   The room was extremely clean and comfortable with a large TV, refrigerator and nice beds.   The staff we encountered, particularly Ciro, Mish and Ellie at the front desk were outstanding!!!! As I stated, my wife and I usually stay at another hotel in the area and we will be staying here from now on.  Breakfast is served in the morning with eggs, sausage, make it yourself waffles, english muffins, fruit, etc available. Parking (at least so far - you never know when a hotel will start getting greedy. I live in Las Vegas, I know!!!) is free. The zero-edge pool is quite large by

Summary: I reserved the hotel under Country Inn &Suits. When arrived, it had another name (SunCoast). It was confusing. Therefore, a notification would’ve been much better.  Since our arrival front desk staff was polite and helpful. We stayed for 5 days/4 nights. SunCoast honored our free breakfast from Country Inn & Suits reservation. The breakfast was about the same every morning; however, i did notice that they tried to change it by adding cheese, or chorizo to the eggs. Kitchen staff was very nice and clean. My 1-year-old daughter made sure to wake me up very early to eat breakfast. We were able to meet some of the Kitchen staff, such as Max Luis. He made sure we had all we needed and picked up our plates as soon as we were done. Also, i got to know the cleaning lady from 3rd floor.

On the downside the hot tub was more of a warm tub which might be something to improve upon.    Grounds were clean and the garden spaces well cared for.    Would stay here again.

The buffet breakfast had a great selection of delicious options, like eggs, tots, country potatoes, etc. With our room, breakfast was complimentary, and parking was free, which other hotels in the area were not offering. I'm not certain the hotel still offers the free breakfast though, now that it's under new management. There was a small gym, pool, jacuzzi and other amenities. Definitely a great option if visiting the parks. I'm not sure if the beds were super comfortable, or if we were just exhausted from walking a half marathon at
Manager Response: Dear herosquest2008,  Thank you for taking the time to write such a wonderful review!! We are so delighted that our staff  were able to make your stay here with us even more memorable! We look forward to your next stay with us!

Summary: Hotel is very modern and updated.  Check in was quick and easy. I didn't take advantage of their pool because it was freezing. Summary Heading: Do yourself a favor and stay here! Near Disneyland
Summary: This hotel is the nicest we've stayed in. It's new (2016) and has a modern feel. The breakfast is vast and delicious. The two breakfast hosts Andrea and Alex we both polite. The two table busers Alejandro and Max were polite and kept our tables cleared of our used dishes during our meals.The maids do a terrific job, and Patricia held the elevator for us and smiled wishing us happy holidays as we got out. Maintenance is responsive. The front desk is top notch as they are always chiper and eager to help. One front desk attendant, named Diana,asked us if we would like our pic taken in front of their Christmas tree, when she saw my wife and I trading holding the camera and posing with our family. Another front desk agent named Joey was happy to answer questions I had over the phone

Summary: I have stayed at the hotel before, but was able to stay during the transition from country inn and suites to SunCoast Park Hotel! What a great experience. The breakfast was wonderful, my daughter loved the large heated outdoor pool, while my wife and I enjoyed the hot tub.  The rooms are clean and roomy, with upgraded amenities.  The ART bus comes by and can take you to the parks, but literally an easy walk to and from the harbor st entrance. Plus even closer to Garden Walk for extra food, and entertainment options. The only reason I would hesitate giving this hotel a 5 bubble rating would be because I don't want it to be booked up the next time my family makes a Disney trip!

Very comfortable beds.  • close proximity to park - 15 minutes to walk.. we would come back in the afternoons and grab food along the way  - recommend pizza press, Jimbobs tacos, bobatopia we’re all good. The Garden walk has lots of options and very close to hotel. • breakfast was good - waffle makers, cereal, hot cereal, yogurt/granola, eggs, sausage/bacon, toast, oranges and apples, tea/coffee and juice options. Summary: The rooms were ok I guess, but in the rooms facing the highway the car noise is very noticable so you should ask for an odd numbered one. After the first night on the "noisy" side I requested a room on the opposite side and they were really accommodating and fixed it right away, so that was good, but that much noise in a fairly new hotel room is really inexcusable.  At check-in when they reserved a charge on my credit card I noticed the "resort fee" they added to my bill, which I was unaware of. The receptionist didn't say anything about it until I asked either. I really feel like this should have been included in the quote I got when I booked the room directly on their website.  I didn't get recognized as a Radisson Rewards Gold member at check-in, it didn't bother me too much

Summary Heading: Excellent location, great rooms, friendly staff
Summary: Hey y'all! My friend and I decided to book this hotel for our Disneyland vacation because of the free breakfast/free parking/walking distance to Disney perks. Well, not only did all three of those perks pay off big time, but the hotel really blew all of my expectations out of the water!   Let me starts with the free breakfast: it's your standard hot breakfast with little to no variation everyday, BUT, it isn't bad and you can fill up before you hit the theme parks!   We always had parking, however, the lots do tend to fill up fast (which is why the walking distance thing is awesome) and the garage underneath the hotel is tiny.   The walk to Disney took us about 15 minutes accounting for waiting at crosswalks and getting stuck in the Disney crowds. A lot of the walk is shaded
