Summary: We decided to stay here for 5 nights whilst looking for a base to explore Southern California. The hotel is well placed for Disneyland (it’s within walking distance) and local restaurants. In addition, it was just a short drive to Huntington Beach. The hotel I believe is new and we found out room to be spacious and comfortable.   The free breakfast was a bonus as was the free parking.  We had a couple of small hiccups with the bar in that when they didn’t have the wine we ordered, we were given something else without asking and then too charged the higher price.  Generally I would say that the bar is under staffed, we saw only one person on duty who was having to cover both food and drinks orders and having the serve food which when out by the pool led to a lengthy delayed
Manager Response: Dear Kjholme,  Thank you so much for taking the time to leave a review for us , we are thrilled you enjoyed your time here with us and we look forward to seeing again soon!

Summary: Country Inn suites is a beautiful hotel! Super clean and I love how they decorated for Halloween 🎃 it’s close to Disneyland,  the freeway and walking distance to restaurants! Hallie was at the front desk and was amazing! She’s super personable, kind and helpful!! I highly recommend coming to Country inn and suites :) 👍🏻
Manager Response: Dear S B ,  Thank you so much for taking the time to leave a review for us , we are thrilled you enjoyed your time here with us and we look forward to seeing again soon!

Summary: My husband and I stay here when he has business in LA or if we decide to stay outside the Disneyland Resort. There are over 1200 reviews commenting on rates, location, rooms, etc. For us, its the little things that keep us coming back...  Little thing #1: First of all, we are both on keto diets so as nice as the breakfast can be, the only thing we eat are the eggs and bacon (the sausage is particularly intolerable). This morning they did not have any bacon. I asked one of the staff, Maximino,  if they had any bacon and he said he would check. He brought back a heaping plate of piping hot, crispy bacon  to make us HAPPY! This story isn't about bacon but about how Max went above and beyond customer service standards of today to ensure guest satisfaction. Friendly, kind and ready
Manager Response: Dear  Roam710183,   WOW! WOW! WOW!  As General Manager of our Country Inn & Suites by Radisson, Anaheim, I am extremely grateful for the  kind words about your stay, service and our amenities. I'm so happy you enjoyed your experience.   We truly thrive off the feedback of our guests. Your review will be shared with the TripAdvisor community.   Thank you for recognizing the efforts of our team and most importantly, let's book your next trip to Anaheim!  Best travels,   David Gutierrez General Manager

Summary Heading: Great place to stay near Disneyland
Summary: Lobby was supper cute . Rooms were large , clean and well decorated with comfortable beds. Breakfast buffet had a large variety of hot and cold food . Parking is free and room rates are reasonable . Great experience !
Manager Response: Dear  sdberges,   Thank you so much for sharing your 5 Bubble experience with the world! We are thrilled you enjoyed your stay with us in Anaheim.   Thank you again,   David Gutierrez, General Manager

Summary: From the time we arrived the dismissive personality of the clerk made us feel uncomfortable. We arrive 30 min before our check in time and asked if our room was ready. She said, no. I would leave my number I would be called when it is ready. Check in time and no call. I went to the clerks desk and asked if it was ready this other clerk said yes. In the hallway I had asked the housekeeping what time was our room ready out of curiosity. They told me about 1:40pm. The room was nice and clean. In our past hotel stays we always had complementary water bottles in the room. Not here, I called the front desk if they had water bottles. They said I can purchase some in the gift store. That was troubling to here. On our check out day, housekeeping knocked on our door twice before checkout
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: One of our favorite places to stay
Summary: This is a beautiful new hotel in a great location. We had none of the issues expressed by some of the other reviews such as noise. We have stayed here several times and find it to be a quality property and excellent value.
Manager Response: none

Summary: Second year staying at Country Inn. About a 15-20 minute walk to Disneyland, depending on your speed or if you have kids in tow. Good value for what we paid-  Free parking, free breakfast (waffle, eggs, oatmeal, cereal, etc), free washer/dryer (only 2 though). Friendly staff, clean and neat.
Manager Response: none

Summary: This hotel is just great! We have stayed here multiple times and will stay again in the future! The staff is super friendly and they respond to any needs very promptly! The hotel is very very clean! The pool area is very nice. It is about a half mile, or 15 minute, walk to Disneyland, which isn’t too bad. Although I believe there is some shuttle you can use, we found it just as easy to walk.
Manager Response: none

Summary: This is a family friendly hotel.   They were accommodating.  Enjoyed the three nights there Staff friendly.  Always smiling. The breakfast was good. The pool was great.  I would come back here again. The room was clean and it was a quiet facility’s.
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: One of the only hotels by Disneyland we’ll come back to!
Summary: Newer hotel which means clean rooms, great customer service & staff & a great hot breakfast each day. We stay at different hotels each year we go to Disneyland but this one we’d come back to!   We took Uber to & from Disneyland from the hotel, a quick 2-3 minute ride for $7 was well worth saving our feet from more walking. We also had a rental car we parked free in the underground garage.   The pool was a lot bigger than the photos show - our kids enjoyed it the day we checked out & after 3 days at Disneyland. We enjoyed the hot tub.   Our daughter has celiac disease & cannot have gluten. The Country Inn & Suites, especially Maria, was great working with me to figure out what my daughter could eat. Maria brought her a plate of gf bacon because the other hot items weren’t safe
Manager Response: none

Summary: Our family of 6 (4 kiddos - 3  of which are under 10) stayed here on a recent trip to Disneland. I thought since its was soo close it may be cluttered with traffic. But, it was in fact the opposite. We walked over to the park each day! They had a bus option but it was not even necessary! The staff at the hotel was excellent and very accomodating. The manager of the hotel even took time to greet us. All together they made it a perfect experience for us.I Highy Recommend!
Manager Response: none

Summary: We stayed in very recently rennovated rooms (almost too recently as the smell of new carpet and paint fumes were very annoying). The hotel is beautiful and I loved the short walk to Disneyland. The pool was very nice and could see the fireworks from the park from the patio.
Manager Response: none

Summary: The four of us stayed here four nights while visiting Disneyland.  I have to say the front desk staff was probably the friendliest and personable I’ve ever met. Joey worked all four nights and I just loved him!  He was very friendly and really helped us. We had an issue with needing to get a package delivered to the hotel and he helped make sure it went smoothly. Thank you to Bre as well. She was so friendly too!    The breakfast offered at no additional fee was totally respectable. They change it up from day to day which was nice. The coffee  was pretty darn good for hotel coffee too!  The room is spacious and clean.   I really enjoyed our stay and honestly wouldn’t change a thing!  Thank you for making our getaway great!
Manager Response: none

Summary: We really enjoyed our stay here. We go to California every couple of years to go to Disneyland and Universal Studios. This is by far the best hotel we have stayed at. Very clean, staff was friendly and attentive. Walk to Disneyland was about 10 minutes which is perfect with kiddos. Breakfast was really good as well. If the price of the rooms stay affordable, we will definitely stay at this hotel again!
Manager Response: none

Summary: I really enjoy stay in this hotel the staff was really friendly always smiling and very helpful the hot breakfast was delicious pool hours are long the bar was great I love that they have kids play my son really enjoy it we had a pleasure stay at this hotel would differently recommend stay in this hotel .
Manager Response: none

Summary: Friendly staff , walking distance to park ,complimentary breakfast, great pool and long pool hours , we had a very pleasant stay at this hotel would differently recommend that you stay at this hotel for family trip
Manager Response: none

Summary: We stayed 3 nights and it was outstanding in every way. Our young boys actually asked to leave Disneyland mid-day to come back to the hotel and play cornhole by the pool and swim!  Food was great, service was out of this world and the room upgrades are amazing. Not a better deal in Anaheim!
Manager Response: none

Summary: The freeway traffic next to the hotel was so loud it was impossible to sleep all night. The HVAC vents to the outside which allows the road noise to come right in the room as if the window is wide open. The HVAC didn't have a fan only option you could run for white noise.  The hotel was very nice, new and clean but you have to bring a white noise machine and earplugs if you want to get any sleep. Very poor HVAC design. Strongly suggest another hotel for that reason alone.
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing your review. It is delighting to read that you were happy with the cleanliness of the hotel. On the other hand, we are sorry to hear that your stay was less pleasing due to the noise at that time. Know that your voice is valuable to further enhance our services. Hoping for another opportunity to leave a more favorable impression in the future.

Summary Heading: Great Hotel, 15 min walk to Disney
Summary: It was a nice and clean hotel, but the walk to Disneyland was long. They had the city bus that takes you, but comes every 30 mins. And it’s $6 a person.  I think the hotel should invest in their own shuttle to & from Disneyland.
Manager Response: none

Summary: We booked a very last minute trip to Disneyland, just my partner and I. We stayed at Country Inn & Suites for four nights, Monday - Friday. The front desk staff were great, always smiling, and helpful. We didn't know the area at all, so we were thankful that they were so knowledgeable with the area. The pool was my favorite part of what the hotel had to offer! The breakfast buffet was kind of crazy, but to be expected with everyone rushing off trying to get to Disneyland in the morning, the food at the buffet was average, nothing special. The only complaint that I had was at 6AM there was loud banging that woke me up, and continued until around 9AM, when finally I just decided to get up, get ready, and leave our room. Overall this is a great hotel, very clean, and is very family
Manager Response: none

Summary: This was our first time staying at this hotel and we LOVED IT! The hotel was very nice and clean, the staff was super friendly and helpful, and a huge plus is that it’s walking distance to Disneyland so you don’t have to deal with the traffic. Will definitely be staying here again!
Manager Response: Thank you so much for taking the time to leave a review for us , we are thrilled you enjoyed your time here with us and we look forward to seeing again soon!

Summary: Very nice place to stay and I would book again.  About 15 minute walk to Disneyland but felt safe to walk and there is a shuttle if preferred.  Very clean and well maintained.  Beds comfortable but could do better with their pillows, but that's a preference.  Breakfast was great and staff was friendly.  James help make sure our place was clean and let us know where everything was.
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing with the world about your recent stay at Country inn & Suites by Radisson Anaheim. It’s a pleasure to hear from your guests and to learn of their satisfaction as you experienced. We look forward to your next trip to Anaheim.

Summary: The towel racks in the bathrooms, (at least, in our room), was very low and next to the toilet where it could be splashed each time the toilet was flushed. When we ordered the turkey avocado club sandwiches, they came with neither turkey nor avocado.  There was some ham, however, on the sandwich which wasn't in the description.  When I asked the man who had taken our orders about it, his reply was, "Each of the cooks has his own style, and makes things differently."  We stayed for a week and didn't eat in there a second time.  The front desk staff was very friendly and helpful.  The service score would have been much higher had it not been for the restaurant staff.
Manager Response: Dear Curious 171474,   Thank  you for the feedback on the towel rack; each guest room is sanitized with the highest standards in  hospitality and would suspect  your experience is an isolated incident.   I am also in receipt of your Survey; I am wholeheartedly apologetic of the experience you had at our restaurant and I am sorry I did not get an opportunity to apologize to you in person.  Please give me an opportunity to apologize on the phone or you are  welcome to email me at: david.gutierrez@countryinn.com. My phone number is (714) 598-0600.  Sincerely,   David Gutierrez General Manager

Summary: This young lady was SO helpful in helping us get a birthday gift to our daughter, whom was staying at this hotel. Brea went above and beyond helping me connect with a local business that could provide a memento delivered to the hotel. I am amazed at the level of service Brea went to make this happen and will always be aware of the employees that Radisson Corporation employs. Thank you Brea, for your due diligence and focus on making sure this all went together as we wanted.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to write such a wonderful review!! We are so delighted that  Bre, was able to make your stay here with us even more memorable! We look forward to your next stay with us!

Summary: Just came back from 7 night stay there and enjoyed every minute of it. Loved the king suite with separate sitting area. Loved the cleanliness of the hotel, loved the location close to Disney and lots of near by restaurants. Loved the pool area. Loved the free breakfast and free self laundry facility. Loved their attention to details and thoughtfulness. Loved this place and thank you for a great stay! :)
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing with the world about your recent stay at Country inn & Suites by Radisson Anaheim. It’s a pleasure to hear from your guests and to learn of their satisfaction as you experienced. We look forward to your next trip to Anaheim.

Summary: Appreciated the friendly team working there. Especially grateful for MARIA  who was assisting in the breakfast nook area and took her time to help me gather up what I needed for our groups breakfast plates Thank you
Manager Response: Thank you so much for taking the time to leave a review for us , we are thrilled you enjoyed your time here with us and we look forward to seeing again soon!

Summary: My family stayed here while visiting Disneyland and we were surprised by how clean the hotel is. I’m a bit of a hotel snob and let me tell you this place smelled of new paint and new carpet, there weren't any weird mysterious stains or smells in our room, the crib they provided for my son to use was clean, the bathroom and bedding were clean and our room was huge and stylish. We loved that they provided a microwave and fridge in the room too. The hotel was very quiet considering that there were many families there and the free breakfast every morning was a great perk! There’s a convenience store in the lobby which is helpful if you forget anything or need water or snacks, the pool is very nice, the free parking is great and it’s a close 15 min walk to Disneyland or you can ride
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing with the world about your recent stay at Country inn & Suites by Radisson Anaheim. It’s a pleasure to hear from your guests and to learn of their satisfaction as you experienced. We look forward to your next trip to Anaheim.

Summary: My husband, 3 year old son and I stayed at this hotel for 2 nights this past weeked. Let me start off by saying that it is Kid Friendly.  They have a Disney  kids hang out room.  TVs play Disney channel.  We live in California, Drove to the Hotel.  EV charging station available. Check In process was fast, friendly front desk.  Room was clean, that was a plus plus. Walking distance to Disneyland Park. Location, Location!!  We loved it. My husbands favorite part of Hotel was the breakfast, with VARIETY of yummy foods. Yes they have Waffles!!  I enjoyed the the bar and fireplace.   We also enjoyed the outdoor sitting area. Pool very clean and yes they provided towels.   I highly recommend this place to family and friends. We want to come back soon.
Manager Response: Thank you for your 5-bubble review. We appreciate your patronage and can’t wait to welcome you back.

Summary Heading: Right next to the freeway. Can’t sleep!
Summary: You can hear every car that goes on the freeway.  Beds weren’t queen size as I requested when i made reservation.    Will not be staying here again.  You can hear every single car that’s on the freeway!  There’s nothing much more to add.
Manager Response: Hello,   I am sincerely apologetic about the noise from the Southern California traffic at night; we pride ourselves on the ease of access from four major freeways in So Cal, the ability to access our hotel as well as bypass the major thoroughfare to the Disneyland Resort.   We work hard to ensure we meet or exceed every guest request; I'd like to make it right and ask you call me, the General Manager, David Gutierrez at (714) 598-0600.   I look forward to speaking with you,   David Gutierrez General Manager

Summary: I booked the stay here due to how close it is. It’s about a block away. If you do need a ride it’s about $3 ride from Uber. Rooms are clean and comfortable. They have breakfast in the morning. Family and I enjoyed. A bar near the pool is a big plus. They have a relaxing area with fireplace. Lots of lounging around chairs. Hotel looks well kept and up to date. They have few vehicle charging stations. Big plus for me. Cool area To stay at and also downtown Disney is just a few steps away. We will definitely return. Thank you for an amazing stay.
Manager Response: Thank you for reviewing and staying at the Country Inn & Suites, Anaheim. We appreciate your feedback and look forward to your next visit!

Summary: As a "local boy" & an employee myself at a local hotel in the Anaheim area, I love to stay at other hotels on my days off every now and then just to see what other hotels are like compared to the one I work for. I've stayed at some good places, as well as some bad ones. This hotel is is one of the nicer ones that I've stayed at The rooms were clean & well stocked. The housekeeping staff were really nice & got me stuff that I needed. I got checked in rather easily by the lobby people. The restaurant even had some pretty good food. This hotel is even really close to Disneyland. I'd say, possibly, within a block and a half walk. Anyway, this is one of the hotels that I would like to stay at again if I ever get a chance to.
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: Amazing experience! Definitely will be back
Summary: Wonderful service from the moment We walked in. Greeted by the General manager who made us feel right at home. The food in the restaurant was a crowd pleaser with kids and adults alike. The housekeepers were more than accommodating. I can’t say enough about the superb customer experience
Manager Response: Hello Chea L.  Thank you for reviewing and staying at the Country Inn & Suites, Anaheim. We appreciate your feedback and look forward to your next visit!

Summary: When we arrived we were warmly welcomed by the front desk staff. Our room was clean, beautifully decorated, and well lit. The breakfast that is offered every morning has a great selection of food. We went to Disneyland and is within walking distance of the hotel which is a plus. Housekeeping staff were very accommodating. We will definitely be back. Highly recommend.
Manager Response: Hello mmwalberg,  Thank you for reviewing and staying at the Country Inn & Suites, Anaheim. We appreciate your feedback and look forward to your next visit!

Summary: Don’t stay here. The sheets smell so strong of bleach that we had to get a blanket from the car to cover the beds. The sheets also made us itch from the chemical smell. The AC was awful - so loud we couldn’t sleep and was either freezing or stuffy. We all got coughs. Horrible experience. Huge electrical tower outside of window and right on the i5. Perhaps make another pick.
Manager Response: Hello  monicacheryce,   I apologize for the experience you had while a guest of ours. I'd like to explain our sanitation procedures; most hotels, and ours included do not you ''bleach.'' We do use non chlorine laundry solutions, all commercial grade and hypo-allergenic.   I would have liked the opportunity to make it right for you  before you left. Our location has been known to be ideal and although our hotel is positioned ideally at I-5 and Disney Way, I apologize we did not know about the a/c hiccups.   You're more than welcome to call me and I can make it right for you and your family. (714) 598-0600.  Thank you,  David Gutierrez General Manager

Summary Heading: Very nice stay; will definitely stay here again
Summary: We had an excellent 6 day stay at this hotel.  The desk staff was excellent. Bre was there every morning when we left for the day, and still there in the evening with a smile on her face welcoming us back.  Breakfast was delicious; eggs, waffles, cereal, fruit, etc. The staff worked hard to make sure we had everything we needed.  Server James was especially accommodating although everyone was great.  Our room was very clean and very quiet.  It is about a 3/4 mile walk to the gate of Disneyland, so perfect for us.  We just parked our car at the hotel for the week and never drove it the entire time we were there.  They have a great little bar/restaurant where you can get drinks and things like pizza.  Other restaurants are close by and within walking distance.
Manager Response: Hello LeeAnn s,  Thank you for reaching out to write your review. We are very delighted to see you enjoyed yourself and our staff made for a memorable stay. I will be sure to relay your positive comments!

Summary: Disappointing. Upon check in, the sliding barn door for the bathroom was broken. Screws were missing form the top. The door would barely budge. We booked this room because they listed cribs in their description. We asked for a crib, a pack n play showed up. Which our 1 year old can't sleep in. After a very long night of no sleep, I checked with the front desk again, they said they would send crib. After 2 pm I checked again, which they said they can't give me one. On leaving to the park on the second day I took our do not disturb off. Seeing the cleaning lady in the hallway and hearing her ask another guest if she would like service I assumed she was going to clean our room. As she was directly across the hallway. We came back 6 hours later and it wasn't cleaned.  Leaving dirty
Manager Response: none

Summary: When we arrived I think there was a mixup with the rooms. We first went to a room that was already occupied. Then we went to another room that wasn't clean yet. Then we went back to that room. And I know there are cleaning standards but it sometimes feels weird to go to a room that was "just cleaned."  In any case Bri (front desk on staff) worked so hard to get everything cleared and made sure that we were satisfied when we finally were able to get into a room. I really enjoyed how patient and cheerful she was. Her manager David did well to make sure that we were okay with all the changes and told us he would give us a free night. When we went to check out, I explain to the manager during the day Mich, of our issues during check in and how David stated he would compensate us. I
Manager Response: Hello hdizzleduey,  Thank you for reviewing and staying at the Country Inn & Suites, Anaheim. We appreciate your feedback and look forward to your next visit!

Summary: We went in to have a couple pre drinks at the bar and ended up having the best time! Very unexpected staying that long but worth it! Thank you Bryce for your service, super cool guy! We will definitely be back! Thank you!
Manager Response: none

Summary: The staff was very friendly and helpful. A special thanks to Fernando, Mish, and Joey for making our stay a special one. These employees were extremely helpful and showed us a lot of attention especially when it came to our son with autism. We had an issue with our room and called the desk, Fernando had maintenance come up immediately to take care of the issue. Problem was fixed and solved the first time. The staff in the breakfast area was also very polite. The breakfast was also good. Our room was clean as well as the rest of the lobby and halls. Only two large blocks away from Disneyland was a plus. The staff and Country Inn is an awesome place to stay and I will recommend this place to anyone and everyone. GREAT PLACE TO STAY
Manager Response: none

Summary: The Country Inn exceeded our expectations by far! We had the opportunity to stay in their newly renovated rooms which are amazing! The colors, size and feel of the rooms were very comforting and felt like home. The entire staff added to the wonderful stay, specifically Gary, Bre and Debra. Each of them personally greeted us, made sure that everything was going well and helped us with such a pleasant attitude.   We were also amazed by how close it is to Disney, it took us less than 10 minutes to walk to the park and it was an easy walk even after three days at the park. I highly recommend this hotel, the staff and the entire experience here at the country inn and suites. We would love to stay here again and anyone considering staying here will be more than pleased with their stay!
Manager Response: none

Summary: We’ve started here twice and will continue to stay here for our Disneyland trips. It’s extremely close to Disneyland!!  Friendly staff, the room was clean/comfortable, and the continental breakfast was the best.
Manager Response: none

Summary: Lovely hotel with big rooms and comfy beds and furnitures. Very family friendly. We visited to celebrate our daughters 10th birthday. The front desk was very welcoming and my kids immediately felt at home. Bre was extremely helpful and made my daughter's birthday trip extra special. Thanks Bre! The hotel serves complimentary breakfast, and should say I was more than happy with choice of breakfast and beverages. James at the dining hall was very helpful with suggesting choices and very polite answering our questions. Overall very well maintained property 10 minutes of easy walk from Disneyland entrance, great choice of restaurants close by and warm pool which is open till
Manager Response: none

Summary: The hotel is located just off the freeway and within easy walking distance to Disneyland. Breakfast is abundant and a great way to start the day. The internet is fast and reliable and the staff friendly and professional. A clean, family oriented hotel for all of your Anaheim needs.
Manager Response: none

Summary: The front desk staff so nice. Mish was so helpful and fun.  Clean hotel, good AM breakfast... with the stay free. If you are GF the will give you GF bread at breakfast if u ask. Everything is convenient. I’d stay there again. Thanks staff!! Clean rooms!
Manager Response: Dear Linda S,   Thank you for sharing with the world about your recent stay at Country inn & Suites by Radisson Anaheim. It’s a pleasure to hear from your guests and to learn of their satisfaction as you experienced. We look forward to your next trip to Anaheim.

Summary: This hotel seems to been sorta new. Clean room, great customer service. Easy ten minute walk to Disneyland. There’s also a public shuttle that passing by every 30 min. For a fee, adults $6 and kids $3.
Manager Response: Dear Mrsgerrt2012, Thank you so much for taking the time to leave a review for us , we are thrilled you enjoyed your time here with us and we look forward to seeing again soon!

Summary: Stayed a couple nights here with my fiancé and daughter. The hotel was great but I have to give five stars to the bartender Bryce for being awesome! He was attentive, had great knowledge of the menu and bar and was friendly and great with my daughter. We went to the bar area to eat more than once because of him! Thanks Bryce!
Manager Response: Dear, Kw2684  Thank you so much for taking the time to leave a review for us and also Bryce's fantastic service he provided for you during your stay with us  , we are thrilled you enjoyed your time here with us and we look forward to seeing again soon!

Summary Heading: Great place! But check your bill on your way out!
Summary: Everything was great and it exceeded my expectations until my last interaction with them. I was quoted $149/night for 4 nights but when I got my receipt they only applied that rate for the first night. Was charged $189/night for our remaining 3 nights. Didn't have an issue at first because I figured it was just an error that could easily be resolved. But when I called in to get it fixed they said "Sorry our records show that was the rate we offered so there's nothing we can do." Not a huge amount of money but enough to feel taken advantage of.  Definitely won't be doing business with them again.
Manager Response: Hello gregallenfarmers,   I wholeheartedly appreciate the review and would like an opportunity to discus the billing issue and make it right for you. Can I ask you call me at (714) 598-0600?  Thank you again and I look forward to speaking with you.  David Gutierrez General Manager

Summary: I went to the bar with a couple of my friends and the had the most amazing time ever. The bartender there was amazing. His name was Bryce. The guy was hilarious and treated us very well. Highly recommended people to go!!
Manager Response: Thank you so much for taking the time to leave a review for us and also Bryce's fantastic service he provided for you during your stay with us , we are thrilled you enjoyed your time here with us and we look forward to seeing again soon!

Summary: Stayed here about 2 weeks ago. Not too bad. No hotel is perfect ..even the great ones. Especially loved the bar. The bartender Bryce was very nice and provided quality drinks! Hope everyone gets his service when you go there!!
Manager Response: Hello Drew C, Thank you so much for taking the time to leave a review for us and also Bryce's fantastic service he provided for you during your stay with us , we are thrilled you enjoyed your time here with us and we look forward to seeing again soon!

Summary: Great hotel. Very clean and really closely located to Disney land. The staff was great. Especially our bartender Bryce. Ask for him if your there. He made the stay more enjoyable and the drinks were well poured.
Manager Response: Hello jasonwoodin,  Thank you so much for taking the time to leave a review for us and also Bryce's fantastic service he provided for you during your stay with us , we are thrilled you enjoyed your time here with us and we look forward to seeing again soon!

Summary: Our family stayed here for a trip to Disney. The hotel was close to Disneyland and affordable. We walked to and from the park. There was also a continental/deluxe breakfast in the morning. There was a large variety of foods to choose from including coffee, tea, hot chocolate. This hotel was  family friendly and had a kids play room with beam bags and a tv playing kids movies on it. The pool and jacuzzi were great! We got a king suite and it was perfect for our family!
Manager Response: Dear Renesse D,  Thank you for reviewing and staying at the Country Inn & Suites, Anaheim. We appreciate your feedback and look forward to your next visit!

Summary: I debated to write a review; when you finally find a business that is about people and for people/guests it’s hard to want to share with the world. The check In was perfect, a few people but we were told “hello”  by the manager as we ate cookies and got a hot coffee. Small talk felt genuine and real and we were given keys to a 2nd floor room that overlooked a massive pool. Hotter then I though it should be I’m late September but the water was a nice respite. We ate at the bar and sat at the patio first night. 2nd day started off the a breakfast spread like no other. Couldn’t find a reason to complain about the offerings.   Everything looked like it was detailed on the daily- so darn clean! 😊  The walk to park was so quick and safe. No issues with a stroller and a 2 year old.
Manager Response: Dear philvigil2019,  Thank you for sharing with the world about your recent stay at Country inn & Suites by Radisson Anaheim. It’s a pleasure to hear from your guests and to learn of their satisfaction as you experienced. We look forward to your next trip to Anaheim.

Summary: Love this place! Walking distance from garden walk and Disney, breakfast is delicious with so many options! Room is lovely and clean and kids loved the big pool. My hotel of choice for sure, looking forward to our next stay.
Manager Response: Dear dharrah82,  Thank you for your 5-bubble review. We appreciate your patronage and can’t wait to welcome you back. Have a wonderful rest of Summer.

Summary: David and the whole team at country inn and suites are amazing!  Great customer service and very friendly. We’ve stayed here several times and every time has been great The location is very close to Disneyland(we usually walk) and restaurants
Manager Response: Dear Vernon b,  Thank you for your kind words, and 5 bubble review we look forward to your upcoming stay with us!

Summary Heading: Comfortable stay at the Country Inn & Suites
Summary: The staff at the Country Inn & Suites are very pleasant and helpful to make your stay wonderful.   Maria, Bre, Debbie, Ellie and Jerikah were helpful in so many ways.  The pool was clean and the perfect temperature.  I would highly recommend.
Manager Response: Dear Rob and Vanessa Z ,  Thank you for taking the time to write such a wonderful review!! We are so delighted that Maria, Bre, Debbie, Ellie and Jerikah were able to make your stay here with us even more memorable! We look forward to your next stay with us!

Summary: This was an idea location for walking to Disneyland.  The walk was only 10 minutes but a bus route also stopped in their parking lot.  Nice newer hotel with free breakfast.  Had a great pool area and the rooms were clean and spacious.  I would definitely stay here again.
Manager Response: Thank you for your 4-bubble review. We appreciate your patronage and can’t wait to welcome you back!

Summary: The staff at this location is wonderful! Front desk was friendly and knowledgeable to the  surrounding area attractions. At breakfast, James was on top of clearing the tables with a smile and fun conversation! We didn’t meet the cleaning staff but they did a wonderful job making beds with our children’s home brought pillows, blankets, and lovies. My grandson was so happy they tucked his lovie in tightly while he was away.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to write such a wonderful review!! We are so delighted that James was able to make your stay here with us even more memorable! We look forward to your next stay with us!

Summary: Stayed for two nights , and had not one complaint.  My room was always clean the staff was excellent and always polite and friendly. They were eager to help and informative.  The breakfast in the mornings were abundant and very good tasting.  Bre checked us in and Fernando checked us out and both were friendly, helpful and informative.  The small in-house store is well stocked and easily accessible.  The pool and jacuzzi area was clean and welcoming.  The bar and eating area was clean, warm and nicely decorated, and the bar staff was friendly and efficient.  I would recommend and have been recommending this hotel to all my family and friends and I will definitely return.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to write such a wonderful review!! We are so delighted that Bre & Fernando were able to make your stay here with us even more memorable! We look forward to your next stay with us!

Summary: We had a great time at this hotel, it is pretty quiet though near freeway, the walk is not bad to Disneyland. The staff was very friendly and accommodating. Would definitely stay here again. The lobby and downstairs is very nice and has a home-like feeling to it.
Manager Response: Dear 722familytrip,  Thank you for your 5-bubble review. We appreciate your patronage and can’t wait to welcome you back.

Summary: The staff were top notch. Such Kind professionals.  Breanna Evens and Misha the manager were Excellent in helping me resolve and issue that arose. They went above and beyond a typical employee. They were so gentle and supportive. They were attentive listeners. They didn't defend or explain a mistake that an employee made. They just resolved it for me. They made me whole.Truly amazing young women! Thank you both. Shawnna
Manager Response: Dear Saysha111,  Thank you for taking the time to write such a wonderful review!! We are so delighted that Bre and Mish were able to make your stay here with us even more memorable! We look forward to your next stay with us!

Summary: Took my family on vacation, centrally located for Disneyland. Very clean & reasonable on rates. Amazing customer service. My kids love the pool and the free breakfast buffet in the morning. My wife enjoyed the bar & fireplace.......
Manager Response: Dear joeyballesteros78,  Thank you for your 5-bubble review. We appreciate your patronage and can’t wait to welcome you back.

Summary Heading: Wow! Great Hotel and Great Staff!!!
Summary: Its hard to choose an aspect of this hotel to start with. But I'm going to start with the staff. Contrary to experiences we've had calling other hotels ahead of our visit, getting through to the front desk is a breeze and the staff are super friendly and thorough with answering questions. We were flying into Orange County Airport and needed transportation to and from the airport to the hotel and they were able to set us up with a black car service upon our request. Upon check-in and through the course of our stay the staff were uber friendly and just genuinely consistent, having presence of mind and were pleasant the whole way through. We really felt they knew what they were doing always, and always calm even when observing them with other guest interactions.   For the hotel
Manager Response: Dear sfkris401,  Thank you for sharing with the world about your recent stay at Country inn & Suites by Radisson Anaheim. It’s a pleasure to hear from your guests and to learn of their satisfaction as you experienced. We look forward to your next trip to Anaheim.

Summary: Picked this hotel not really knowing anything about it expecting the worst I’m glad to say I was overwhelmed on how great it was, how easy it is to get around. They have a bus stop right outside the front door and by the looks of it out of all the stops, it is the only one that has an umbrella to help with the sun, little things like that make this place amazing
Manager Response: Dear 144brittneyh,  Thank you for reviewing and staying at the Country Inn & Suites, Anaheim. We appreciate your feedback and look forward to your next visit!

Summary: Stayed 3 nights here with my husband on our first vacation without our kids. We had an amazing time. Loved the staff, especially Hallie at the front desk. She made checking in and out fun and she was super helpful whenever we needed it. The rooms were clean, the breakfast was good. No complaints from us.
Manager Response: none

Summary: We have been travelling the California coast for about a month. We have stayed at a few different brands of hotel from Best Western Plus, Wyndham and Radisson. This has been the best hotel by far. The location is convenient to Disney. All the staff we had contact with were friendly and polite. The reception staff were very welcoming. The rooms are spacious and well appointed. The breakfast although much the same day to day consisted of enough variety to change things up. And they had actual plates and cutlery - not paper and plastic. The pool area was clean with plenty of towels supplied. One bonus that I have not seen before - complimentary laundry facilities but you do have to buy your laundry soap and dryer sheets. Still a great feature.
Manager Response: none

Summary: We had a quick stay at this property & couldn’t be happier!! Every team member that we interacted with was so pleasant and eager to assist. The spacious room was so comfortable and the beds were heavenly. The dining room staff were very attentive during the yummy complimentary breakfast offered. My family & I will only be staying at Country Inn the next trip we make to Disney! 💕
Manager Response: none

Summary: Thanks to Bre and Fernando, We had a great Time, advices and kindness. The hôtel is very clean and beautiful. The room is huge. We use also the swimming pool and dysney is not far from the hotel Thanks  Brice and lucas
Manager Response: none

Summary: Great hotel with a short walk to Disneyland. Free breakfast was a big plus. Front desk was very pleasant and helpful. James and his crew in the am were great as well. The only drawback was the hotel is close to I5 so the noise might be a problem for light sleepers.
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: Great location for Disneyland/California Adventures and the Angel Stadium
Summary: My family of 5 went on labor day weekend and it was a great stay.  You can see both Disneyland and California Adventures just before turning into the hotel.  The front staff was very welcoming, check-in was easy, room was very clean and huge.  Our room was on the 4th floor facing the highway, but that wasn't a big deal for us as we weren't staying in our room most of the time.  There's a Disneyland shuttle service that picks up and drops off folks at the hotel (not sure if they charge at all, but convenient for those who don't want to drive or pay for parking).  Parking is free and a delicious breakfast is included.  This was a legit breakfast too.  Not your typical hotel breakfast that includes cereal, fruit, and coffee.  This was probably the best complimentary breakfast my
Manager Response: none

Summary: Very clean and comfortable room. I leave more time in this hotel with my family. Hallie in front desk she was nice friendly helpful. She gots nice with the complementary breakfast. She amazing amazing amazing. Thank you.
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: Great hotel & perfect located for Disney park visit
Summary: Very clean and tidy hotel with friendly staff and good service. Especially Bre puts a smile on everyone's faces. Definitely mentionable is the extensive breakfast that is included as well as the free parking and free WIFI. We would recommed the hotel to our friends and other families!
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: If you’re going to Disneyland this is the place to stay!
Summary: This amazing hotel provided everything needed to have a perfect hotel stay. Free breakfast, fun pool, and amazing customer service. Bre was absolutely amazing and answered any questions we could have before we even asked, she definitely deserves a raise or promotion. All within a 15 minute walk to the parks! Best hotel experience I’ve had in a long time :)
Manager Response: none

Summary: Simply stated...there was nothing our family didn't enjoy about our three night stay at the hotel.  Joey started our vacation off right by putting smiles on everyone's faces.  Diana was very helpful and accommodating during a minor medical situation.  The whole cleaning staff was very friendly and always had smiles.  Bre helped check us out and again, very friendly and helpful.  The rooms are very comfortable and super clean.    Breakfast was hot, fresh and delicious.  Although we forgot our swim suits for the beautiful pool, we will not make that mistake next time.   Short walk to Disneyland or cheap Uber ride.  Please don't change a thing!  We can't wait to come back and enjoy the hotel again next time :)
Manager Response: none

Summary: Friendly staff, clean and comfortable room, nice pool, good breakfast selection. Easy walking distance to Disney and the Garden Walk.  There were a lot of local food options within walking distance and plenty of parking.
Manager Response: Dear JenPet46,  Thank you for the 5 out of 5 rating!

Summary: We stayed at the country inn at Anaheim and we where treated so well that I decided to write a personal review about Hallei. Hallei was so caring about our needs that I felt like a celebrity. Hallei had all the answers and suggestions that made our trip to Disneyland even better. Let me say that our accommodations where amazing. The hotel was super clean and all amenities where top notch. We enjoyed the free breakfast that was beyond what you expect when it’s included in the cost of stay. Anyway we are making this location our permanent location any time we’re in the vicinity. Thanks Hallei and staff

Summary Heading: STAYING HERE FOR THE REST OF MY LIFE
Summary: Amazing hotel, easily one of the best when staying for Disneyland. They accommodate your requests. Staff available 24/7. Breakfast was awesome not too crowded. PARKING IS FREE. Checkout is easy and smooth and can request late checkout.

Summary Heading: Great Hotel Short walk to Disneyland
Summary: Friendly and helpful staff, the breakfast was great.  Great proximity to the park, about 5-10 minutes to the park gates.  The Rooms were clean, the pool was nice and the parking was free.  The hotel let us check in early and check out late made for a nice last morning not being rushed.  I would stay here again for sure.
Manager Response: Dear ericF5995LW,  Thank you for reviewing and staying at the Country Inn & Suites, Anaheim. We appreciate your feedback and look forward to your next visit!

Summary: I really really can't see why this hotel has good reviews. Apart from the reception being well decorated. Here is why Front desk don't recognise raddison members  Gym is an absolute joke No sunbeds by the pool just a few chair and patio heater don't work In the room. Road noise is awful and can sleep  Aircon is so noisy you have to think twice about using it Beds are small to make the small room look bigger clothes storage... Simple there is not enough. Breakfast is like feeding time at the zoo. Would not recommend at all
Manager Response: Dear Tonyd123456789,    Thank you for taking the time to share your feedback.  We apologize for the dissatisfaction of your stay.  We take the time to listen to your constructive comments so we can continually improve our services. Tonyd123456789  We hope for another opportunity to exceed your expectations.  Should you have any concerns during or after your stay, please reach out to any of our managers on property.

Summary: The hotel is in walking distance (about 15-20min) to Disney parks and there is no fee for the parking. However the hotel room looks like it was not finished. The bathroom door didn’t have any lock, there was not even one hook or a towel rack so having no place to dry out the towels was very frustrating. Also there was no fan in the bathroom. The furniture was cheap and ugly and the colors of the room were simply depressing. The pillows were small and the mattress was not very comfortable. After midnight when we came back to the hotel I had to call to ask for the pillows because they didn’t put any on the sleeping sofa. I was told to come down to the reception because all the hotel stuff were gone for the night. Breakfast was included however it was a very simple continental

Should you have any concerns during or after your stay, please reach out to any of our Managers.

Summary: This hotel is in an excellent location within walking distance to Disneyland / CA Adventure.  The staff was always welcoming and accomodating for your questions or needs. Our room was very clean and spacious. The breakfast was amazing as it had many choices.  The coffee was very good too!  This property has a comfortable lobby with seating areas all around.  The pool looked so inviting, but it rained a couple of days so we never made it in. When we return for our next Disney trip, we will definitely stay here again!
Manager Response: Dear 4looking4fun,  Thank you so much for taking the time to leave a review for us , we are thrilled you enjoyed your time here with us and we look forward to seeing again soon!

Summary: Great comfortable updated hotel in ideal location (walk to Disneyland) with a really outstanding staff that made me feel welcomed and valued.  Room very nice with lots of thoughtful amenities.  Quiet and safe area.  Would definitely stay there again on my next visit.
Manager Response: Thank you for the 5 out of 5 rating!

Summary: The staff was amazing! The cleaning ladies did a great job and were very nice to the guests, the front desk was great helping us with whatever we need, and greeting us when we walked through the door. Whenever anything was needing the staff would be extremely kind and get to it right away. Overall this hotel was a 5 star review! Especially Hallie she was extremely nice in helping me with all my needs and struggles!
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to review the Country Inn & Suites, Anaheim. We're delighted to see you enjoyed your time with us and the hospitality that Hallie had given to you on your stay with us.   See you during your next visit to the Anaheim area!

Summary: Stayed in August so we could be close to Disney. Front desk amazing ! (5/5). Facility has everything one needs for a family vacay. It would be nice to have more variety at breakfast and have it til 1100 am ( 930 am with a full house is hectic and one scrambles to have it ). Would also be nice to have more variety if needed to snack later on in day or evening. (4/5) Housekeeping Ok ( 4/5). Don’t hesitate to book here. You’ll be glad you did. Next trip we’ll stay here again. Thank you Country Inn & Suites!
Manager Response: Dear Nahda M,  Thank you for reviewing and staying at the Country Inn & Suites, Anaheim.   We appreciate your feedback and look forward to your next visit!

Summary: Great hotel near Disneyland!  Rooms and public area very clean and staff was very friendly and professional.  Good breakfast to start the day. Walkable to Disney parks and close to many places to eat. Would stay again!
Manager Response: Dear pc1king,  Thank you for the 5 out of 5 rating!

Summary Heading: Excellent location and very nice Staff
Summary: The hotel is very clean, super close to the Disney Parks, the breakfast is complete and the staff is amazing; specially Ellie and the manager who had special details with us with one of our party celebrating a birthday

Summary: Breakfast was amazing, if you fill up before going into the park you don’t need to spend too much money inside the park. Rooms were really clean, bathrooms had nice lighting, and there was ample outlets for our charging needs. We were actually upgraded to a bigger room with an additional bed but we opted out for a smaller room because it wasn’t necessary for our part of 2
Manager Response: none

Summary: Hotel was great, newer than some on Harbor Blvd. Close to parks 10 -15 mins away. Location in quiet area, easy to walk to Walgreens, CSV or Starbucks, Pizza Express has great food, cheaper than parks. Room was clean and quiet. Staff super friendly. Nice to have complimentary breakfast to start the day. Had the pool to ourselves, nice to relax when everyone at parks. Would definitely book again.
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: Special thank to the breakfast staff!
Summary: The hotel is well located and the room was big and comfortable. I must give a special thank to Mrs. Maria at the buffet breakfast for her understanding and comprehension to my son issue, who is allergic to gluten. She tried by all means to prepare alternative food for him, so he could get a good breakfast. Thank you!
Manager Response: none

Summary: My family and I live out of the state of California at are Disneyland passholders. With that said we make multiple trips to the Anaheim area each year. Our last trip, August 22 through the 25th 2019  was our very best yet due to our stay at the country inn and suites. We have stayed at numerous hotels in the area over the last five years and this hotel is hands-down the best one we have found! The rooms are ginormous and clean, the beds comfortable, the bathrooms are huge, free parking and a delicious free breakfast...need I say more?!?!?  The front desk staff went out of their way to make us feel at home.  Do yourself a favor and book this hotel now!
Manager Response: Dear ksteenblik,  Thank you for the 5 out of 5 rating! We look forward to having you and your family stay with us again!

Summary: Not fancy but perfect for family on budget near Disneyland. 7-10 minute walk to front gate. Clean hotel with buffet breakfast.  Has nice pool and staff was very friendly and accommodating. I would stay here again
Manager Response: Dear josephc923,   Thank you for your 4-bubble review. We appreciate your patronage and can’t wait to welcome you back. Have a wonderful rest of Summer.

Summary: Just an overall great experience. The hotel and rooms are clean. Breakfast every morning, decent selection but great for a hotel. Best part was the helpfulness of the staff. For my sons birthday they left a card and a stuffed toy, didn’t have to but it’s nice they went out of the way.
Manager Response: Dear 604ismaelv The team at Country Inn & Suites Anaheim thanks you for your wonderful 5 bubble review. We can all remember our first time to Disneyland and celebrating a special birthday at the Parks. We are extremely thankful for your business and we can’t wait to have you back.

Summary: We had such a great stay here! The hotel is super close to Disney, friendly staff & amazing pool. The bar serves great cocktails & Bryce, has  their bartender was amazing. Delicious drinks, perfect after a long day at Disney!
Manager Response: Dear brehemphill1,  WOW! What a fantastic review. Thank you for recognizing Bryce and we’ll be sure to share with him. The team at Country Inn & Suites by Radisson, Anaheim can’t wait to have you back for another cocktail. Safe travels.

Summary: Every employee we encountered was friendly and welcoming, we were greeted with big smiles even though we arrived close to 1 AM for our check in time. Still bright eyed and bushy tailed, we were quickly checked in and on our way.   The room was bigger than expected, bathroom was awesome with good water pressure and a cool sliding door. Breakfast was nice, very filling with your usual continental style options.   Bacon isn’t served every day, but there was delicious breakfast sausages available both days.   The staff was informative, and let us the parking lot for the day after already checking out of the hotel (ask for extended parking)
Manager Response: Dear chefDOOM Thank you for sharing with the world about your recent stay at Country inn & Suites by Radisson Anaheim. It’s a pleasure to hear from your guests and to learn of their satisfaction as you experienced.  We look forward to your next trip to Anaheim.

Summary: Very convenient location and quiet.  Staff was very pleasant and helpful.  Room was clean, and the suite was perfect for an extended stay.  Breakfast had a decent variety of food, and the staff worked hard to keep the area clean.
Manager Response: Dear Pete L,   Thank you for the 5-bubble review. We appreciate your patronage and look forward to having you back. Have a pleasant rest of Summer.

Summary: Ideally placed for Disneyland parks, only a 15 minute walk and 2 blocks from interstate 5, which did create some traffic noise but dis not interfere with our sleep. Our spacious family  room catered easily for our party of 3 adults and 1 five year old with 2 large double beds. Our booking came with free parking and free breakfast which was a bonus, the hotel also had a fitness room and a nice outdoor pool. The staff were welcoming and helpful and we would choose this hotel again if we visit in the future

Summary: Would return to this hotel in a heartbeat. Walking distance to Disneyland, in a safe and quiet area. Room was large, comfortable and immaculately clean. The whole hotel was clean and in good repair. The difference-maker is the staff, which were friendly, kind, and accommodating. They went out of their way to assist me twice and never blinked an eye about doing so. Good price for all you get. Highly recommended.
Manager Response: Dear U9103RUcharlesh,   Wow! what a compliment from you and for our Team; we truly love our guests and to learn that your stay checked all the boxes is fantastic. We can’t wait to have you back.

Summary: My husband and me celebrated our anniversary this weekend and stayed at Country Inn. Staff was very friendly always greeting everyone making themselves available. The room was comfortable and CLEAN! Breakfast was amazing, it is continental but delicious!! Best of all you get to make your own waffles!! I recommend Country Inn as it is just a few miles from Disneyland, Honda and many small restaurants.
Manager Response: Dear rramir477647,   What an AMAZING review. Thank you for sharing your stay and highlights with the world. As a guest of ours, a Full Complimentary Hot Breakfast is available to each of our guests. We can’t wait to have you back.

Summary: Found this beautiful nice hotel by the honda center with great customer service and nice pool. Room was huge! And priced just right! The hotel was a very short uber ride to the Honda center and Angel's stadium Disney land was right down the Street walking distance
Manager Response: Dear  Javier C,   Thanks for the shout out on how close we are to many SoCal attractions and venues. You review is so important to our Team and we look forward to having you back for the next Angel’s game!

Summary Heading: Nice hotel but watch your credit card statement closely
Summary: I used my personal credit card at check in for incidentals.   The company (State of California) paid for the room/tax/resort fee on the company card.    At check out, I received a copy of the close out bill to that effect.   When I checked my personal credit card account, I noticed not only the $100 deposit Pending but the additional $60.56 Pending for a total of 160.56 pending charge.     This seems like credit card fraud to me by the hotel to double bill.  When I called the hotel, they could not explain the additional $60.56.  But only stated it "should" dissapear in 3-8 days.   For this reason, I do not believe I would stay at this location again.    The staff were very friendly, but I have serious doubts about your accounting practices.
Manager Response: none

Summary: We stayed at this hotel a year and a half ago when visiting Disneyland - loved it then and loved it again this time!   From the moment we walked in the doors we were made to feel welcome and at home.  Our luggage was late arriving on our first day and the staff were very accommodating; notifying us the moment  it arrived.  We appreciated the hot breakfast daily to start our day; that is included and the perfect views of the pool and palm trees.  It’s super clean - close to restaurants; and walking distance to Disneyland.  Laundry facilities were perfect also to wash those few things that we wanted to wear again.   I highly recommend this hotel and will definitely be staying here again!!
Manager Response: Dear  DisneyFreak1972,   Thank you for the wonderful review of our Country inn & Suites Anaheim… your review helps to spread the word to the world about our property and how we love what we do. We can’t wait to have you back!

Summary Heading: Excellent service,location, and 10 stars in general.
Summary: Everything here was perfect.  An employee name Max gave us a great welcoming, make us feel like home.  The buffet is really good, variety cleanliness and they have a lot of employees working to have everything at 100%.  Room clean,  comfortable and quiet.  Not a single complaint, will come back very soon.  Congratulations.
Manager Response: Dear Mikefrancoli,   Thank you for the should out to Max. Max is one of many try hotel professionals at our hotel and we are so glad you enjoy our Country inn & Suites Anaheim. Have a great rest of Summer and see you back soon!

Summary: What a great place, it’s been our favorite in Anaheim! Clean, awesome pool (open late and can see some of Disney fireworks) and hot tub, delicious breakfast with 4 waffle makers. :) Close walk to Disneyland and off the main busy strip. We loved our stay here and enjoyed the large rooms.
Manager Response: GeneralmillsU1355GX,   Thank you for your 5-bubble review of the Country Inn & Suites by Radisson, Anaheim. Your title of review is very flattering and we tare ever so appreciative. Can’t wait to have your family back as a return guest of ours.

Summary: We stayed at this hotel two years ago and I liked it so much I wanted to stay again at Country Inn & Suites Anaheim.  This time we stayed for five nights.  Manager, Alex Santana was very welcoming and found us a room at noon upon our arrival which was awesome! He checked in on us often to make sure we were enjoying our stay. The other family who checked in later than us was able to get the room across the hall. Ines, our room cleaner made our little girl happy every day differently by tucking in her stuffy dolls and folding towels.   We were in room 426 which faced the highway. Traffic was like white noise and wasn’t disturbing.  We were actually quite close to the elevators and didn’t find it noisy surprisingly. The beds were comfortable which are a big concern because of bad
Manager Response: WOW! Thank you for Alex’s shout out. He assists the General Manager in overall service efforts and we hope to lead a team of guest-centric associates to want to deliver the best to our Guests The detail described in your review is truly appreciated and we can’t wait to have you back.

Summary: We had an excellent stay at this hotel over the past week.  My wife, daughter (4 years old) and I had previously stayed at a nearby hotel, but were unimpressed by it's quality and set out to find another in the area.  We visited this hotel and were delighted with what we saw.  They had some availability left and were grateful to be able to move to it.  The rooms were great - large, fridges, microwave, bright, clean and airy - housekeeping clearly pays attention to detail to deliver a good standard.  The facilities were also very good with a Fitness Centre, outdoor pool and hot tub.  Towels were provided for this and we spent time enjoying the pool and having fun.  The breakfasts provide a good range of food from cereal, hot breakfast options, waffles, etc.  We enjoyed this each

Summary: Stayed at this hotel for over night stay and then enjoyed a day at the Disneyland park and California adventure park. Overall it was a great day. I missed being at Disneyland, so it was great to be back for one day.
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: Clean, safe, comfortable hotel close to Disneyland
Summary: This hotel exceeded all of our expectations and more! I was taking my boys to Disneyland for the day and thought it would be nice to just be able to walk to a hotel at the end of the night instead of driving home. I did quite a bit of research of the local hotels in the area and this one seemed to have good reviews. I called before reserving to ask if we would be able to park at the hotel on the morning of going to Disneyland since parking is free for guests. The person I spoke to you on the phone was extremely friendly and told me that I would absolutely be able to park there and I could even bring my bags in and they would hold them until my room was available and that once we came back from Disneyland the room and our bags would be ready for us. On the morning of our visit we
Manager Response: none

Summary: Great value for the money! Large hotel rooms, nice pool area, and easy walk to Disney. Very close to restaurants, shopping and entertainment. Lots of seating in the lobby and bar area, which is a nice alternative to hanging out in your room.
Manager Response: none

Summary: We enjoyed 6 nights at this hotel and loved the proximity to Disney. Bre at the front desk was beyond friendly and accommodating. She made our trip extra special. Positives: Pool was great, though we wish there were more lounge chairs and not just regular chairs, bathrooms are nice. Breakfast had lots of choices. Negatives: Hallway noise is loud and the freeway noise is SO loud. We didn’t get much sleep at all, even after walking around the parks all day.

Summary Heading: Nice stay walking distance to Disneyland
Summary: Enjoyed our stay for 3 nights. Walked to the garden walk and Disneyland. Breakfast was included and nice. Pool was heated. Underground parking along with outdoor parking lot. Staff was very friendly.  Will use this hotel again.
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: Quiet Hotel within Walking Distance of Disneyland
Summary: We stayed for two nights in early August. The location is right off the freeway and walking distance to the big D. Checking in was quick and we were even provided room options. Thanks Bre!   Breakfast was good. I suggest that you time it before 8.15am because it is crowded with everyone trying to get to the park at opening. Overall very clean and quiet place to stay.

Summary: We really enjoyed this hotel! They clearly cater to families going to Disneyland. It’s just a short 10-15 minute walk to the Park, or a $6-9 Uber ride. The kids loved the pool and the breakfast was delicious. The bar offered a limited but tasty menu (e.g., pizza, nachos, wings). We would definitely stay here again.

Summary: Great Hotel Great Trip to Disneyland my 8 year olds first time and she said it was amazing overall very happy with our stay and accommodations will return in the future Staff was great rooms were nice

Summary Heading: Wonderful Hotel in a Great Location, but one small blemish
Summary: We had an absolutely perfect stay except for the air conditioner, which seemed unable to cool the room efficiently. It ran most of the night and sounded exactly like a washing machine. Breakfast was excellent and the location perfect for the Disneyland resort access.

Summary: We had a quick one night stay while we were visiting Disney. First of all, the staff was amazing!!  Shout out to Mish, Alex, Ellie and Bree for being so amazing! They were helpful, fun and knowledgeable. The entire place is clean and I could always find someone willing to help if I needed anything. The breakfast was so so good, all fresh and good quality.  I plan on staying here anytime we stay over one Anaheim! It really has everything you need and is within walking distance to the park.

Summary: It was nice experiences for me during staying. The hotel's facilities are good. The room is very clean.  The only uncomfortable thing is no in-house slipper in the room. So when you want to stay in this hotel, bring the personal sandal or slipper.
Manager Response: none

Summary: We stayed here for almost a week. The hotel was so good in every aspect: The room was spacious - it was a room with a king bad and a sofa and they put an extra very comfortable rollon bed. We are a family of 4. The room was very clean. It has a little refrigerator (no freezer) microwave, safe. The hotel has a nice breakfast and also spacious dinning room. Children friendly hotel. A nice TV room next to the dinning room so kids can watch TV while parents eat. The biggest advantage - 12 minutes walk from Disneyland!!! We could actually watch the fireworks from our room.  Also - 10 minutes away from Orange Outlet. There are many restaurants near by - walking distance. To sum it up - A perfect choice!
Manager Response: none

Summary: Cannot say enough great things about my experience at this hotel. Whether you’re here on business or family vacation, this hotel has all the amenities and hospitality to make your stay comfortable. James Lowe was exceptionally helpful and nice and made me feel welcome during my stay. Thanks to all the staff here for their hard work and hospitality. Would definitely stay here again and recommend to all my friends and family.
Manager Response: none

Summary: Expensive hotel, with poor customer service.  As a frequent traveler I was using Radisson chain for my stays. Until I got this sad hotel. They don’t care if you are paying 250 per night and purchase food on their bar saloon, if you bring your own drink they will put you out with very bad way. Looking around Anaheim there is lot of options better than this hotel, just in front Element Hotel is building a new hotel, they are 300 times better than this sad hotel. Bye bye Radisson, welcome Element!!
Manager Response: Dear Javier P,    We thank you for taking the time to share your experience with us and we regret that you felt disappointed in in your experience. Unfortunately, we do not allow alcohol to be brought into our bar area, but perhaps we could have expressed that in a more positive way.   We sincerely do appreciate your patronage and hope to better serve you in the future.

Summary Heading: Good family / business hotel close to Disney
Summary: Nice family / business hotel close to Disney with a good breakfast for this class of hotel.  Compared to 3 star Holiday Inn, Homewood Suite and other Hilton 3 star properties, this breakfast was quite good and did change a bit every day from different style scrambled eggs to a variety of sausages and/or bacon. For a 3.5 star hotel and for the price and location, you cannot beat this place.  Free parking and breakfast for all guests is a great bonus.  Many other similar star hotels charge for parking or only allow two guests for breakfast, not this place.  So this would be on my recommended list for 3.5 star properties.
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: Best rooms, location and costumer service!
Summary: Came for a few days with the family 2 teens 4 adults. We got two rooms and the kids had the entrance pull out bed that’s basically a room to themselves. Thanks Mish Scott for all your help, she’s front desk supervisor who’s very helpful and knowledgeable. Five stars all the way because of location, cleanliness, breakfast and costumer service.   Jesus R.

Summary: I couldn't be more sincere about the title of this review... my wife and I have been to Disneyland many, many times and stayed at different hotels each time. This last time we stayed at the Country Inn and will never stay anywhere else again! The location is amazing - walking took us 13 easy minutes to get to the security bag check at Dizz and Anaheim Gardenwalk was about half that. The hotel is immaculately clean with an amazing pool that was perfect for a little R&R away from the noise and bustle of the parks. The room we stayed in was large and extremely comfortable - the microwave and fridge are fabulous amenities and very much appreciated. The breakfast buffet is spectacular with a wide range of choices - eggs, waffles, breakfast potatoes, fruit and more! Staff is

Summary: We loved our stay at this Hotel. It is new and nice. The Breakfast was GREAT! Fresh fruit, yummy eggs, everything else would you want! The walk to DL was about 15 minutes. It was an easy walk, but after a long day the kids were tired. Next time I would take a cab home at night. The staff was friendly and the place was clean. It's pretty close to the freeway, but I could tune it out at night. I would stay here again! Already planning on it.
Manager Response: Dear LHWOgden,  Thank you for taking the time to review the Country Inn & Suites, Anaheim.

Summary: The service was very accommodating and gave my mom a pleasant stay. Shes visiting from Thailand and said that they had amazing room service and when we were eating breakfast in the lobby the server was very attentive and took pictures for us and offered additional service if we needed any(Thank you James). Definitely recommend coming to visit this place if you're unsure of where to stay near Disneyland.

Summary: I loved my stay at country inn & suites! The walk to disneyland was very short which was great for my family and I, staff was very friendly, and the pool and free breakfast was lovely. I would recommend this place to everyone or anyone who is planning to go to disneyland.

Summary: Husband & I always stay at Country Inn & Suites when we spend multiple days at Disneyland.  It is with in walking distance of the parks & it's a great value for your money.  The staff is very friendly & makes you feel like they have known you for a long time.

Summary: Staff was great, location was excellent. Room was just okay for the money -- spotty internet, average bedding, but nice decor, spacious enough for a family of four, and fairly quiet. Breakfast had a lot to choose from, but wasn't much to speak of in terms of quality: again, not bad, just not great. Keep in mind that the rate does not include the 'resort fee', so it's not really as cheap as you might think. I know other hotels do the same thing, but calling this a 'resort' is a serious stretch -- this isn't the Bellagio. Very friendly and helpful staff, though.

Summary: While the building including location, cleanliness, accessibility are great, the staff members are friendly, helpful and nice. My first trip intension is going to Angel Stadium. This hotel is perfect for this purpose, and later on, I noticed going to the world-famous park is more perfect; it’s just a couple of blocks away! Then, Bre and Mish were so friendly and helped me buy the Disney resort ticket. Now, they know about Japanese Panda, “Kumamon” I will return.

Summary: Good service and nice rooms along with a perfectly accpetable hot breakfast. While there is a 17 USD per day resort fee, it is well worth it for the breakfast and the pool and amenities. Summary: Our stay has been terrific, and we are excited to announce that absolutely everything is amazing and everyone is kind and wonderful to interact with. We adore the pool. Breakfast is yummy every single morning and it is mind-blowing how the cook, Maria, is able to make such delicious food for hundreds of people!  Housekeeping does a wonderful job and the bussers do their job to the best of their abilities, leaving tables clean, nice, and comfortable to stay around! We thank the staff for such a lovely vacation!

Summary: The location of this hotel is extremely convenient and the value is decent. Parking is pretty good but kinda limited spaces. I only ever wanna stay here when I go to Anaheim, so I guess that means something. Overall, it’s a great place to stay and offers a lot

He took the time to find rooms close together and on the top floor.  The location, pool & spa, free breakfast, and free parking just make it overall the best place to stay.  The bar and food service are an extra plus.

Summary: We are having a great stay. Our room is clean, pool is great and breakfast has been awesome! We are visiting for a softball tournament so early morning breakfasts are a necessity. Everything is clean, fresh and presented beautifully! Thank you Maria! You do an excellent job!

Summary: Great service, friendly staff. The room was very clean and cozy. The pool definitely made our kids very happy. Breakfast options were great: from cereal to hot waffles - anything all family members would enjoy.

Summary: Booked to stay here for 6 nights as it is a close enough walk to Disney and the price for the time of year was excellent.  This is a wonderful hotel with friendly staff and a great breakfast. Swimming pool is good and has a nice view of the fireworks from Disney in the evening.  Free parking is a massive plus point too since so many places in the area charge $20+ per night.  Never had a problem finding a space. Highly recommended and will definitely stay here again on a return trip to Disney.

Summary: Great hotel within walking distance of Disneyland. Hot breakfast in morning. Pool is large and warm. Clean throughout hotel. Quiet at night. Great family atmosphere. Restaurants nearby. Close to interstate but do not hear any noise from it.

Summary: I’ve had the opportunity to stay at lots of hotels and this was easily one of the BEST! Great location and the rooms are huge! The staff was excellent, interacting with the guests and doing whatever they could to create an exceptional experience. I traveled with my 2 young children...the pool is incredible and they enjoyed hanging out in the media room after breakfast! I can’t wait to return and I will definitely be staying here again.

Summary: A very nice hotel. Very close to Disney.  You can see the nightly fireworks from the pool.  The rooms are nice , the beds are decent .  Breakfast gets busy so try to eat early if you can.  We would stay here again .

Summary: This hotel was a great and relaxing environment. The hotel’s front desk clerk Dianne was by far the most helpful lady I have ever encountered at a hotel. She helped me out a lot, and stayed positive through out my entire stay. She was very welcoming and I think she was the main reason why I enjoyed my time in California so much.

Summary: No problems whatsoever with this hotel. We did purchase ART shuttle tickets only because we have two toddlers otherwise we could’ve walked to Disneyland. Free hot breakfast. Nice pool, great bar. The king suite was amazing for our family.

Summary Heading: Great hotel for a Disney adventure

Manager Response: Dear Lesley11,  Thank you for taking the time to review the Country Inn & Suites, Anaheim. We're happy to hear you enjoyed everything from our hot buffet breakfast to our proximity to the Disneyland Resort. Thank you for your feedback!

Summary: Stayed here from July 8-18.  This was a very pleaseant stay.  Room was quiet and clean.  Even though it is very close to the interstate it is surprisingly quiet. Bryce in the bar was very accomadating and was great to chat sports with.  The food in the bistro was convienant and resonably priced and decent.  I wished the bistro open longer hours so that we could of had lunches there as well.  Breakfast was good busy but good.  this was a nice coinvience.  One of the managers even took the time to make sure my stay was a good one.  Front desk staff was also very friendly. Overall it was a great stay.  I would stay here again.
