Summary Heading: Great Disney focused property just off the main street.
Summary: This was a great hotel with great staff.  Excellent breakfast with plenty to offer.  Approximately 15 minutes away from the main entrance walking distance.  If traveling with strollers, adults can wheel their kids with no issues.  Do not recommend smaller kids making the walk themselves.  The ART bus transportation is very convenient and stops in the hotel parking lot.  The bus ride to Disney is maybe 10 minutes.  Pool was very clean and facilities were generally outstanding.  I recommend getting food elsewhere, although in-hotel food is available and decent.  The breakfast is tremendous.

There is a bar and bistro right inside from the pool area which has a nice selection of drinks and food for purchase (also with a few TVs to watch a game). We stayed in one night and ordered food for the kids (pizza, wings, nachos) and ate by the pool and watched the fireworks! Summary: We took a family vacation to Disneyland for July 4th and was surprised to find this hotel available. We come down to Disneyland often and try to stay here. We really like the location & that you can watch fireworks from the hotel. The breakfast also has a good variety of choices to prepare you for the day. The service is always friendly & helpful. The room is clean and big. The one thing I would do is maybe add a small table & chairs in the studio rooms so you have somewhere to eat your food. The pool & hot tub was nice, but would’ve been nice if the pool went deeper than 4’6 for actual swimming. All in all a great value. We will continue to stay here as often as we can! I give this a 4 out of 5 star rating....

We also come back to the hotel mid-day for rest so having a shuttle would be beneficial.

All of these things could have been easily dismissed, if
Manager Response: Dear Missozie,  Thank you for taking the time to review the Country Inn & Suites, Anaheim. Manager Response: Dear Pgzmn,  We're happy to hear you enjoyed your time here at the Country Inn & Suites, Anaheim. Thank you for reviewing our hotel and we look forward to your next visit.

Summary: Terrific lodging for a Disney trip--highly recommended! We arrived really early and decided to check-in expecting we wouldn't be back until after midnight from first day at Disneyland. Alex was wonderful--gracious, professional, efficient and offered lots of super tips. We were surprised and super grateful to unexpectedly have our early check-in accommodated. The location is about a 10 minute walk to Disneyland, but we also learned that there is a bus loop that includes the Country Inn's parking lot as a stop. Excellent convenience, especially when we felt like we couldn't walk another step after full days at the park.  The hotel has a beautiful pool, great free breakfast, free cookies throughout the day, nice little convenience store. Clean room, comfortable bed, adequate
Manager Response: Dear Roam4416960475,  Thank you for reviewing the Country Inn & Suites, Anaheim. We're happy to hear you took advantage of our proximity to the Disneyland Resort! Thank you for your feedback and hope we get to see you during your next visit to the Anaheim area.

Summary Heading: Clean Hotels, Friendly Staff, Close to the park
Summary: We popped in for a 1 day trip to Disneyland and it worked out really well.  You can get to the park with a 10 minute walk or catch a shuttle.  It was good times.  We went pretty hard at the park on a Saturday, so it was great to wake up and make some waffles for breakfast and relax by the pool for a little bit on Sunday morning before we drove home.
Manager Response: Dear Resort22935668088,  Thank you for the 5 out of 5 rating!

Summary Heading: Free parking, spacious rooms and great staff
Summary: We arrived before our check in time which was about 1:45pm. We took a chance and asked if we could check in early the staff accommodated. That was a plus. We reserved a king suite and it was big and spacious. There was a USB port right next to the bed to charge your phones. The television and cable was easy to use. I’ve been to hotels when the cable was either slow or you had to keep going back to guide to change the channel.  The bathroom was a pretty decent size. You could easily share the mirrors if needed. The bed was very comfortable, I slept very well both nights we stayed. The rooms are pretty quiet , I’m a light sleeper and I never heard a door slam or hear my neighbors talk. Another plus.  The hotel had complimentary breakfast. The breakfast are was clean, plenty of
Manager Response: Dear ttaylor813,  Thank you for reviewing the Country Inn & Suites, Anaheim. We're happy to hear you enjoyed all we have to offer, from our hot, free breakfast to our infinity pool. Also, we will give David a pat on the back!

Summary: I highly recommend this hotel to anyone considering Anaheim. We planned our week long family vacation and stayed here, extremely friendly and accommodating staff. Beautiful facility, very nice breakfast, extremely clean. David, the General Manager, does a wonderful job at this hotel. Walking distance to Disneyland. Thank you for a great stay, we will be back.
Manager Response: Dear pamfiske,  Thank you for reviewing the Country Inn & Suites, Anaheim! We're glad to hear you enjoyed your time with us and will relay your kind words to David!

Summary: All staff was very friendly and super helpful. Especially the two bartenders at the bar that served us on two separate occasions. Very close to Disneyland, restaurants and stores. Hotel was well kept. And the continental breakfast every morning was super convenient and yummy. Overall wonderful stay. Would highly recommend it to anyone.
Manager Response: Dear Francesca M,  Thank you for taking the time to review the Country Inn & Suites, Anaheim. We appreciate your feedback and look forward to your next visit!

Summary: It was mine and my significant other first time at this hotel hands down the best service the workers made it enjoyable for the both of us there were two in particular one I believe is Bryan and the other had curly hair and a name that I can’t seem to remember it starts with a J.
Manager Response: Dear Adriannnaaa,  We're happy to hear you enjoyed your time with us. We will definitely give Bryan and Joey a pat on the back.

Summary: We enjoyed our 6 nights in the hotel. It’s very new and fresh. We only had breakfast 2-3 mornings & found it to be average. The nice part is there’s plenty of seating. The pool and hot tub were well kept. You can see DL fireworks from the pool, but not the hot tub. We ordered pizza from the Bistro one night and it was good, just wish it was open before 5:00. Market had good options for munchies. Parking spaces are in short supply, but we always managed to find the last spot. Based on the number of times we shared the elevator with employees, I’d guess there’s no service elevator or employee parking.   Prior to our stay, I remember reading a review calling the rooms “spacious,” but I don’t agree. They were nice, clean, and beds were comfy. It was great having a fridge, microwave,
Manager Response: Dear afirefly70,  Thank you for reviewing the Country Inn & Suites.

Summary: Nicest affordable hotel we visited in Anaheim but close to the highway. Great full breakfast with lots of options.  Eggs, sausage/bacon, fruit...Staff is super nice. Hotel is clean. Bar with food options.  Nice pool area. Small gym with essentials.  Great internet service.  Free parking!!  Room had bad chemical smell.  Can walk to Disney but longer walk. $6 Lyft ride will get you there and save parking fees at Disney.  Nice stay for a short visit.
Manager Response: Dear Kimberley C,  Thank you for reviewing the Country inn & Suites, Anaheim. We will definitely place you in a room of your choosing when you visit next. See you next time!

Summary: I came on a last minute trip with my one daughter. We booked the king suite which was just as affordable as regular rooms around the area. It was clean and spacious and we both loved having our own tvs to unwind after a long day at the park. We checked in early and our room wasn't ready, but we were given cookies and invited to wait by the pool or just explore. The pool is beautiful and we were able to see the fireworks from the pool deck. Breakfast was amazing and had something for everyone. We walked to and from the parks both days we went, and my 5 year old survived. We will definitely be back!
Manager Response: Dear HeatherMickey,  Thank you for taking the time to review the Country Inn & Suites, Anaheim. We appreciate your feedback and are extremely happy to hear you enjoyed all we have to offer. See you next time!

Summary: We loved our stay here. Family friendly, nice and spacious bedroom, clean and big pool and spa, good location, free parking and good breakfast options.  Will stay here again for sure and totally recommend it.  Only problem for us is that we were expecting them to offer shuttle service to nearby attractions but they don't have this service.  Also, it is right next to the highway so if you are sensitive to noise then this might be a problem... although if you are visiting Disneyland you might come back so tired that noise won't even matter, you'll have a comfy bed to rest and you'll fall asleep in no time.
Manager Response: Dear Culture04513036826,  Thank you for reviewing the Country Inn & Suites, Anaheim. We're happy to hear you enjoyed your time with us. We know how important a good nights sleep is when you're on vacation and we're glad we were able to deliver.

Summary: My check in experience was very pleasant even though there was a mix up with our rooms & bags situation. The Night supervisor handled the situation in a professionally.  I found that the employees went over and beyond to accommodate everyones needs. This one employee Maria at the continental breakfast served us with true Aloha. She went out of her way to get us Ice just because someone wanted it in there hot drink. I didn't know how to thank her so I decided to write this to the hotel reviews. I hope she will receive this short note to express our Thanks.. Country Inn & Suites is a very clean hotel.
Manager Response: Dear Flyer34411981096,  Thank you for reviewing the Country Inn & Suites, Anaheim. Thank you for  your kind words. We will definitely relay your feedback to Maria!

Summary: The best thing about this hotel is the location to disneyland. Its a 15 min walk but there is a bus that takes you right to the park for $5 a piece. The breakfast was subpar even for hotel standards. It was a very quiet hotel and would recommend it to all of us light sleepers out there.
Manager Response: Dear alaskanbl,  Thank you for the 5 out of 5 rating!

Summary: We come every year to Disneyland and stay at Residence Inn, but this year for our luck Residence Inn was booked for our dates. We really loved Country Inn! The hotel is family friendly and at the same time is relaxing, inviting, and has everything you need. The pool area was clean and resort like. They had several patio tables to enjoy your time outside. Right in the front desk there is a seating area for you to wait or relax. They have another two seating areas, so you don’t feel crowded or rushed. Our room was very clean and spacious. I did read other reviews about getting a room with empty spaces without furniture next to the bed, but these rooms are just fine. They are meant  to be for ADA approved. Our room and service was perfect. Yes there is a bit of noise due the
Manager Response: Dear Verenice C,  Thank you for the 5 out of 5 rating! We're glad you enjoyed our family friendly environment and all we have to offer our guests. We'll see you during your next visit to the Anaheim area.

Summary: Great hotel.  Very friendly and helpful staff throughout entire hotel.  Clean room.  Free Parking in hotel Garage meant I could park right under hotel and easily get elevator up to my floor.  The free breakfast and eating area is the best arrangement I have ever seen in a hotel - open area and plenty of seating.  Great hotel for kids.  I highly recommend this place.
Manager Response: Dear Guide2032966060,  Thank you for taking the time to review the Country Inn & Suites, Anaheim. We're happy to hear you enjoyed your time with us.

Summary: We came as a family of 10. We picked Country Inn for the location and price and breakfast. Laundry services are awesome As Well! We were all happy with our experience there. Would definitely stay again.
Manager Response: Dear Trek35591729343,  Thank you for reviewing the Country Inn & Suites!

Summary: This place has the biggest pool at a hotel that I have seen in the LA-Long Beach-Anaheim area. One end is fairly shallow, so if you are swimming laps at 6:00am (yes, the pool is open then), you may have to swim on your back at that end. May not be able to swim laps at other times of the day. The rooms and bed are nice and comfortable. Shower was fine. Breakfast has both a 4-small waffle maker and a 1-large waffle maker. They seem to alternate between sausage and bacon. The had hash browns like diced potatoes, and like McD's. Wasn't keen on the canned fruit for yogurt. The desk has cookies. You can watch the Disney fireworks at night from the end of the hallways. The food from the bar area is pretty good, too.
Manager Response: Dear htwh,  We're happy to hear you enjoyed all the Country Inn & Suites has to offer, from our freshly baked cookies to our spacious infinity pool. See you next time!

Summary: We had a great family vacation, the staff was great the hotel overall was very clean, the pool was nice and big. The free breakfast was great the grandchild liked that the best, beside the nightly cookies. You could see the Disney fireworks at night from the huge windows at each end the hallways to view. Thank you country Inn
Manager Response: Dear Frank Dorthy C,  Thank you for the perfect rating! We appreciate your feedback and look forward to your next visit!

Summary Heading: Great Price - Great Location - Great Hotel
Summary: My husband and I wanted to spend a few days at Disneyland to celebrate our 33rd wedding anniversary.  The hotel met all our needs.  Given the location of the hotel, it was priced very reasonable.  We found the walk to and from Disneyland to be no big deal but I can see how going with children might be a hinderance.  The only complaint I had was there was no lock on the bathroom door.  While the style and idea of a sliding barn door cute, a family with children could prove to be a problem when someone wants privacy.  The breakfast buffet was the best we have every seen.  There was plenty to choose from.
Manager Response: Dear Roving26359394955,  Thank you for taking the time to review the Country Inn & Suites, Anaheim. Happy Anniversary! Thank you for your kind words.

Summary: Stayed here with my wife due to their proximity to Disneyland and was very happy with not only the quality of the rooms - they all seemed brand new - but also the proximity to the park entrance. It was a very easy 10-15 minute walk to Disney, which was perfect! They also provide a paid bus service (very cheap) if you can't walk. The rooms were spotless, the shower and bathroom were great, and the service was impeccable. Would definitely stay here again if and when we come back to Disneyland.
Manager Response: Dear Culture36965566961,  Thank you for the 5 out of 5 rating. We appreciate your feedback.

Summary: Few issues. Nothing special. Wouldn’t go again. Many other locations in area you’ll get better value ie better staff, food selection at breakfast. Cleanliness of room and items in the room ie coffee maker.
Manager Response: Dear Dreamer03418457879,  We're sorry to hear you didn't fully enjoy your time with us. Please feel free to reach out to me directly at property level to further discuss your recent stay.

Summary: Stayed June 18-22. I had reservations at another hotel but cancelled those and decided to stay here. Glad I did! Made reservations thru a third party website and didn’t have to pay the resort fees! Stayed in a king suite and it was HUGE! Loved how there’s a second tv in the “living room.” Room was super clean and comfy! Only thing I wish was better was the shower pressure. Like previous reviewers stated, FREE parking, FREE WiFi and FREE breakfast! Not many hotels can give you this! The breakfast was amazing! Waffles, bacon, sausage patties, sausage links, scrambled eggs. Definitely saves $$ right there! Walking distance to Anaheim garden walk. Would I stay here again?! Uhhh HECK YEAH!!! Now the question is, when can we come back??! :-)
Manager Response: Dear LMQ1027,  Thank you for the 5 out of 5 rating! We're delighted to hear you enjoyed everything we have to offer. Thank you for your kind words and we'll see you next time!

Summary: I cancelled my reservation in a different hotel because I read great reviews about this hotel and I don’t regretted at all.  This hotel is very close to Disneyland (about 15 min walking with kids), rooms are huge and everything looks new, free breakfast with a lot of options, the coffee is great!!! And they have free cookies, a variety of teas and hot chocolate also for free after 3pm. You can relax in the swimming and jacuzzi which open until 12am. Or you can just watch the fireworks from there every night at 9.30pm.  We stay 7 days and we really had great experience. I don’t think you can get free parking, free breakfast, free WiFi in any other brand knew hotel for the same price. Price is great for all you can get here.  They have a bar with a kids corner so you can drink and
Manager Response: Dear AlisonOrmeno,  Thank you for reviewing the Country Inn & Suites, Anaheim. It's great to hear you enjoyed all we have to offer. From our fresh pizza at our Bistro, to our evening tea and hot chocolate! Oh, and we will definitely give Maria a pat on the back! Thank you for your kind words and see you next time!

Summary: Resort fee high for Parking.    The location was good.   Coffee non existent until 6:30am for a park so close to Disney and when you want to be fed and on your way into the park.    There were not “to go” cups unless asked for.    Thank
Manager Response: Dear Annabelle V,  Thank you for reviewing the Country Inn & Suites, Anaheim. We appreciate your feedback and will definitely take it into consideration.

Summary: In many years of travelling, we have NEVER had such a warm welcome, nor met such genuinely caring and helpful staff as at this hotel. What amazing staff.  Nothing was too much trouble.  They fixed incorrect travel dates without charge at check in, fixed a very minor issue in the room within 3 minutes of my phone call and allowed us to still use the pool and carpark when we'd (sadly) checked out and our adult kids were still playing at Disney. Management must be doing a great job as their staff are simply amazing. Cannot recommend this place highly enough.  Thank you for opening our eyes to how it can be done!
Manager Response: Dear nnicola,  Thank you for taking the time to review the Country Inn & Suites, Anaheim. We are delighted to hear you enjoyed your time with us, while being checked in and after checking out. We're looking forward to your next visit!

Summary: Clean, large rooms, extremely friendly staff, close to Disneyland (900m walk). Morning breakfast was great too. (James was a friendly waiter that made good conversation and made you feel very welcome)
Manager Response: Dear dees630,  Thank you for the 5 out of 5 rating! We appreciate any and all feedback!

Summary: Not only is the property close to Disney, they also have the most amazing staff - all very friendly and visible whenever you need anything. Breakfast was GREAT and they have a bar and their pool is spectacular! I highly recommend this property!
Manager Response: Dear 822ruthiej,  Thank you for reviewing the Country Inn & Suites, Anaheim! We are happy to hear you enjoyed everything we have to offer, from our hot buffet breakfast to your one of a kind infinity pool! See you next time!

Summary: My family and I visited for a total amount of 5 days, all of which we were received with excellent service. I would also like to mention that Maximo was very great and attentive as well. Anything that we needed he was always more than happy to help us. We appreciate his dedicated service along with the rest of the staff. Definitely recommend on staying at this hotel.
Manager Response: Dear yesseniagarcia19,  Thank you for taking the time to review the Country Inn & Suites, Anaheim. We appreciate your feedback and will relay your kind words to Max.

Summary: Excellent, clean, friendly! Walking distance to American Sports Center for Volleyball Tournament. Breakfast staff, especially a guy named Maximino was extremely genuine and helpful. The entire breakfast staff made sure tables were clean! A great family atmosphere I will come back to again and again!
Manager Response: Dear Andy M,  Thank you for the 5 out of 5 rating! We're happy to hear you enjoyed your time with us. We'll definitely give Max a pat on the back!

Summary: Do not recommend this hotel horrible location, not clean, staff not helpful. And you can hear the traffic all night. The beds are horrible and the air conditioner is loud. The breakfast is horrible. I do not recommend
Manager Response: Dear Guest,    We apologize you were not satisfied with the service of the hotel during your stay. We appreciate you taking the time share your experience. Your comments are valued, and your suggestions will be used to consider improvements in the future. I would love to talk to you to be able to get more details and information so we can focus on those areas.  Please do not hesitate to contact me via phone or email.   Sincerely,  Alex Santana alex.santana@countryinn.com 714-598-0600 Ext 705

Summary Heading: Perfect stay for a visit to Disneyland
Summary: The hotel was fantastic. Our room was spacious, clean and very comfortable. The breakfasts were great although sometimes a little manic especially around the Mickey Waffle machines :-) and the pool was a welcome retreat after the parks. The staff were the best and one manager even personally made us pizzas and served us a beer in the afternoon when the bar was officially closed. Highly recommended.
Manager Response: Dear kennyg1962,  Thank you for taking the time to review the Country Inn & Suites, Anaheim. We're glad you enjoyed your time with us. See you next time!

Summary: Good cleanliness and affordable price but breakfast variety and check in procedures  can improve. Location is about 15 to 20 mins from Disney’s, for those mind to stay next to high voltage pole, some rooms are next to high voltage poles so choose wisely.
Manager Response: Dear Guide48568256421,  Thank you reviewing the Country Inn & Suites, Anaheim. We appreciate your feedback.

Summary Heading: A great place to stay when visiting Disneyland
Summary: This hotel has a great location to allow you to walk to Disneyland's entrance.  You can park here for the day free and walk to the park.  The rooms are very clean and modern. The free breakfast is good, not fantastic, but it does the job.  The pool is awesome if you find time to take a swim.  We just slept here in between two days at the park and it did the trick for a reasonable amount.  We would stay here again for sure!
Manager Response: Dear DianeN627,  We are happy to hear you enjoyed everything from our hot breakfast to our spacious infinity pool! We appreciate your comments and look forward to your next visit!

Summary Heading: Excellent option for trip to Disneyland
Summary: We had a great experience at this hotel.  The hotel is new and modern, and the rooms are very comfortable.  The breakfast was great.  The hotel staff was able to help us with questions and with getting shuttle passes to go to Disneyland.  We did not use the pool during this trip, but it looks like a very nice pool.  The underground parking garage was also very convenient.  We would definitely stay here again. Highly recommended!
Manager Response: Dear EMorgan2579,  Thank you for reviewing the Country Inn & Suites, Anaheim. We're glad to hear our staff helped you so much. We appreciate your feedback and look forward to your next visit!

Summary: Housekeeper named Maria Avila went above and beyond to make the experience very pleasurable. Miss Avila was extremely pleasant with every interaction that I had with her and also ensured that everything in the room was above board and comfortable during my stay. Thank you very much.
Manager Response: Dear Manny R,  Thank you so much for the 5 out of 5 rating! We appreciate your feedback and will relay your kind words to Maria A.

Summary: Our family of 4 thoroughly enjoyed our stay here. We were checked in early after a long flight from Oz and given a lovely buffet breakfast on arrival. The hotel is modern, clean and a 10 minute walk to Disney. Staff were lovely and accommodating. Can not fault our stay here.
Manager Response: Dear wilsygirl,  Thank you for reviewing the Country Inn & Suites, Anaheim. We are delighted to hear you and your family enjoyed your time with us! We appreciate your feedback and look forward to your next stay.

Summary: I’ve stayed at this hotel multiple times and what amazing hotel and there staff is excellent! Very accommodating and the breakfast is wonderful! The rooms are very spacious and beds are comfortable! They have a bar with great drinks and food and a kid room with movies on! Also walking distance to Disneyland and awesome restaurants all near by! My FIRST CHOICE anytime coming to California with my family for a vacation! Also the staff go’s above and beyond to make sure your stay is perfect can’t ask for a better vacation hotel stay! 👍 and you can see the fireworks from the hotel!
Manager Response: Dear Volcomhunn,  Thank you for taking the time to review the Country Inn & Suites, Anaheim. We're happy to hear you enjoyed your time with us! See you next time!

Summary: The proximity to Disney parks (walking distance) and the breakfast were a great value. The overall feel of the hotel was warm  and welcoming. The staff was very helpful and friendly. The beds were very comfy
Manager Response: Dear Tour44956597629,  Thank you for taking the time to review the Country Inn & Suites, Anaheim! Thank you for the 4 out of 5 review.

Summary: Loved our stay here. The staff were super friendly and went above and beyond. Breakfast was sometimes crowded but they did an awesome job keeping tables cleaned and checking on us if we needed anything. Hotel was super clean which is why I’m doing this review. Don’t think I’ve ever stayed in a cleaner hotel!
Manager Response: Dear Katie M,  Thank you for reviewing the Country Inn & Suites. We're happy to hear you enjoyed your time with us. We pride ourselves on running a clean hotel and offering a hot buffet breakfast. We appreciate your comments and look forward to your next visit.

Summary: Exceeded expectations. Great view of Disney fireworks Very close to walk to Disneyland.  Parking was included unlike some other hotels. Breakfast was also very good with many different choices to eat..
Manager Response: Amazing! Thank you for your 5 Bubble Review. We are so appreciative of your response and look forward to  having you as our guest next time.  David J Gutierrez • General Manager

Summary Heading: Good Service for a reasonable price!
Summary: I found the staff friendly, courteous, helpful and professional. The room was spacious and clean. Breakfast was excellent, with a good deal of variety for everyone's taste and choice. Parking was free even though the hotel was very close to Diseneyland. Overall I found the hotel ideal for family stay and would recommend it to anybody.
Manager Response: Dear Flyer45595131960,   It’s reviews such as these we jump for joy as a hotel team. We LOVE our guests and we thank you for taking the time to share with the rest of the TripAdvisor community!  We look forward to taking care of you again.   David J Gutierrez • General Manager

Summary Heading: Great place to staywith family, close to the Disneyland but away from the chaos
Summary: Excellent location, so close to Disneyland and other fun spots in Anaheim. Dont miss the Hot Buffet Breakfast and those cookies in the reception! The kids will love the heated pool outside while you watch them from hot tub.
Manager Response: Dear Soum R,   Thank you for your review! Our pool is open from 6 am to 12 midnight ever night. We are looking forward to having you as our guest at the Country Inn & Suites by Radisson, Anaheim.   Have a fantastic Summer!   David J Gutierrez • General Manager

Summary: I stayed here for three nights with my husband and son. The hotel feels brand new.  Rooms are clean and decorated nicely.  Beds are comfortable.  Nights are quiet.  Breakfast is a typical free breakfast.  It’s about a 15 minute walk to the Disney parks.  It’s hard to find a hotel at this price point that is new and close to Disney.  I would definitely stay here again.
Manager Response: Dear platinumflyer2000.   We are thrilled at the Country Inn & Suites by Radisson, Anaheim  to learn of your comfortable stay! We can’t wait to have you back!  David J Gutierrez • General Manager

Summary: This hotel is awesome, super close to Disney but more than that super good service all the employees were super friendly and helpful. Loved the experience 😍  Mish and Tabby even gave us a space in the pool area to see the evening fireworks and arranged for us to have an outdoor heater because it was a little bit cool. Also, James and all the staff that were helping out during breakfast were very nice and helpful!
Manager Response: Dear primoh2g,   Thank you for recognizing  Mish, Tabby and James! All three of them will be thrilled to know they are mentioned on TripAdvisor. The Country Inn & Suites by Radisson, Anaheim Team looks forward to having you again  as a satisfied guest.   David J Gutierrez • General Manager

Summary: Great stay for Disneyland and the surrounding areas, breakfast was delicious, the complimentary laundry is a big plus! All of the staff were very friendly and helpful. Rooms came with fridge and microwave and were very clean and comfortable
Manager Response: Dear Climber15786904404,   Thank you for the 5 Bubble review; our complimentary laundry, hot breakfast buffet and in room fridge and microwave are available in all of our rooms. Country Inn & Suites by Radisson, Anaheim looks forward to your next trip to Anaheim.  David J Gutierrez • General Manager

Summary: Great customer service, loved the location had access to everything and the hotel was very clean. we enjoyed the complimentary breakfast they offered as well as the convenience of the parking garage. We had a great stay.
Manager Response: Dear Navigator04200160354,   What a fantastic 5 Bubble review!  We are very appreciative to of had you as our satisfied guest and look forward to welcoming you back to the Country Inn & Suites by Radisson, Anaheim soon!   David J Gutierrez • General Manager

Summary: We have stayed in ALOT of the neighboring hotels around Disney land & this one is by far, our new favorite. Super clean rooms, excellent staff, gorgeous pool (which is open late), free parking, a really nice free breakfast, comfortable beds in very large rooms AND it’s a VERY easy 2 block walk to the entrance of Disney land. I highly recommend staying here... you will not be disappointed!  Did I mention there are complimentary free warm cookies  AND a full bar (for the grown ups)?
Manager Response: Dear chutah,   When the team and myself read your 5 bubble review we high-fived all day!  We are so happy to know you enjoyed all that the Country Inn & Suites by Radisson, Anaheim has to offer, especially our free hot breakfast buffet and our amazing proximity to Disneyland! We can’t wait to have you back!  David J Gutierrez • General Manager

Summary Heading: Two separate visits within a week
Summary: Our first stay was in a king suite and the room was amazing in size! Our toddler had tons of room to run and play. The staff was amazing, super kind and courteous! Our second stay was in a regular king room which was still surprisingly spacious! The hotel is a short walk to Disneyland and has a nice little store open 24/7 for essentials. We could not recommend you and your family stay here anymore! This is one of the best hotels we have stayed at and the price is amazing! This will be our go to anytime we are in the area! You will not be disappointed and how can you beat free parking and breakfast on top of amazing rooms and staff!
Manager Response: Dear SKempista,   Thank you for the 5 bubble review! To learn that we had the pleasure of having you as a guests twice within a week made the entire team of Country Inn & Suites by Radisson, Anaheim so happy! We love that you enjoyed all of our complimentary amenities and look forward to your next stay.   Have a fantastic Summer!   David J Gutierrez • General Manager

Summary: I would definitely recommend this hotel for any families traveling to Disneyland. Modern clean hotel with parking & breakfast included. Staff & management are great.  Walking distance to park.  We've tried the rest & Country inn is definitely our preferred choice.
Manager Response: Dear Vacation03541889474,  We appreciative the 5 Bubble review and acknowledging all of the team at Country Inn & Suites by Radisson, Anaheim.  We can’t wait to have you back soon.   David J Gutierrez • General Manager

Summary Heading: Loved the Country Inn & Suites by Radisson, Anaheim.  Great price. Great amenities. Great staff!! Great placy to stay.
Summary: This is a fantastic place to stay for anyone.  We were a family with kids.  The staff is so friendly and courteous.  The hotel is quiet and clean and modern.  Price was good.  Plenty of parking.  Excellent food choices for breakfast hot or cold.  The kids loved making waffles with fruit and eggs. The Bar has good choice of drinks and wonderful food.  We enjoyed our evening ordering food and sitting out by the pool while the kids swam.  Amazing pool.  Great kids lounge and enjoyed our complimentary evening cookies.  I will be back again soon.   This is my go to place.  There isn't anything they could improve on except if they were right across the street from Disneyland.    It is only about a short 10 min. easy walk to Disneyland.   A++++   Thanks for a great stay!!
Manager Response: Dear Serrimomof3,  We are delighted to hear you and family enjoyed everything the Country Inn & Suites, Anaheim has to offer. From our spacious infinity pool to our delicious waffles in the morning make for a great vacation!

Summary: We stayed at the Country Inn & Suites Anaheim for a trip to Disneyland. We found all the staff to be very friendly and efficient.  The room was large and spacious, although it seemed there was a lot of empty space. (probably 8 feet between the bed and the window) It would've been nice if they could have managed to use some of that space to make the bathroom more spacious, but we didn't feel cramped at all.  The room was very clean, the bed was comfortable, and they had extra USB outlets near the bed. I also appreciated that I didn't need to duck to get under the shower, and it seemed to have decent water flow (well, decent for a low-flow shower head that is all you'll find in hotels these days)  It was also a convenient 15 minute walk to the main entrance of Disneyland on a nice
Manager Response: Dear SyracuseWolvrine,  Thank you for taking the time to review the Country Inn & Suites, Anaheim. We appreciate your feedback and look forward to your next visit!

Summary: Excellent hotel, great location but, rooms that overlook the highway are very noisy  Staff is great, front desk outstanding, kitchen staff very helpful, hotel is clean and location is amazing if you’re visiting Disneyland
Manager Response: Dear Nomad650678,  We are happy to hear you enjoyed your time with us. Our staff prides itself providing exceptional service and making our guests feel at home.

Summary: Talk to the front desk, talk to the sales manager Gary, they are very resourceful for tips on places to go. All the staff are nice, friendly, and accommodating. Enjoy your stay. Laundry is available for guest, and there is a relaxing Jacuzzi awaiting for your pleasure!
Manager Response: Dear godzchozengirl,  Thank you for the 5 our of 5 rating! We will definitely give Gary, our Director of Sales a pat on the back!

Summary: Every aspect of this hotel has been amazing. Every employee has been super nice and cordial. The accommodations are amazing. I will stay here on every future trip to the area. The management went above and beyond during our stay. If I could give a score higher than 5 they deserve it.
Manager Response: Dear Teamtaylor520,   CONGRATULATIONS!   Thank you for the 5 out of 5 rating! We appreciate your comments and look forward to your next visit!

Summary: We stayed 5 nights and the staff is friendly, the facilities are very clean and comfortable. Complimentary breakfast is very good, Max and James are very friendly. Housekeeping and maintenance teams are very professional too, I would definitely stay here in my next visit. Thanks.
Manager Response: Dear RubenHRz,  Thank you for your kind words and comments. We will relay your message to Max and James!

Summary: Had a great stay with excellent service. James and Maria were amazing at their service and awesome . The food was good and it was a comfortable stay. They have so many things at this hotel and you won’t be bored .
Manager Response: Dear Bryan V,  Thank you for reviewing the Country Inn & Suites, Anaheim! We appreciate your kind words and will definitely relay your kind words to Maria and James!

Summary: Stayed here 2 nights over Memorial Day weekend for my daughters 12th birthday CA Adventure trip. I cannot say enough about how great our experience was! The hotel itself is immaculate & new. The free breakfast buffet is very good with many hot offerings, such as 2 types of scrambled eggs, bacon, sausages, 2 types of potatoes, waffle station, cereal, fresh fruit, yogurt, cottage cheese & coffee & juices. The rooms are spacious, clean & beautiful decorated. The large pool area is clean & heated with jacuzzi & not overly crowded. But the thing that impressed us the most was the incredible, courteous & helpful customer service we got, from the friendly reception staff to wait staff to maintenance staff. Every single employee we encountered went out of their way to greet us & ask how
Manager Response: Dear diskodeva,  Thank you for taking the time to review the Country Inn & Suites Anaheim. We are delighted to hear you and your family enjoyed everything our Hotel has to offer. From our complimentary hot breakfast to our spacious infinity pool! We appreciate your feedback and look forward to your next visit! Oh, Happy Belated Birthday to your daughter!

Summary: Great place to stay.  Pool was large and warm enough.  Breakfast was decent.  Guests were also mostly family so no bad interaction with anyone.  Check out time was late enough that I didn't have to rush out.  We even saw the fireworks from our room.  We would totally come back again.
Manager Response: Dear abbieg609,   Thank you for reviewing the Country Inn & Suites, Anaheim! We appreciate the 5 out of 5 rating and look forward to your next visit!

Summary: Simple enough. Life was getting hectic and we needed a break. This hotel was perfectly located to everything we wanted to explore as well as being far enough away from everything that we could forget the hussle and bussle of the disney crowds.
Manager Response: Dear Compass6848427428,  We're delighted to hear you enjoyed our hotel and our proximity to the Disneyland Resort. Being walking distance to the parks yet far enough to be away from the crowds is one of the many benefits of stay at the Country Inn & Suites. Thank you for your review!

Summary Heading: Here with my high school group
Summary: This is the first time I have stayed here with my high school group.  This is a great place for everyone!   The staff had been incredibly helpful.  The rooms are clean.  The breakfast has been a perfect way for the students to start the day.  One word.  Waffles.    I plan on staying here myself on future trips, and and will have my group stay when we come back in two years.
Manager Response: Dear tmuller1969,  Thank you for reviewing the Country Inn & Suites, Anaheim. See you during your next visit to the Anaheim area!

Summary: We had an amazing experience with the bartender, Josh! His personality and hospitality made our time at the bar outstanding. We would definitely recommend staying here, not to mention, Josh can make a mean Bloody Mary!
Manager Response: Dear Briirex,  We're happy to hear you enjoyed your time with us. We will definitely relay your kind words to our bartender Joshua!

Summary: The staff and especially the manager is are very good with the guests. All of them were accommodating to our needs. Breakfast was good, walkable to Disney. Rooms are spacious and clean. Coffee and cookiea after a tiring day at Disney were a pleasure.
Manager Response: Dear ViniNambiar,  Thank you for the 5 out of 5 rating! We'll be sure to have more freshly baked cookies waiting for you during your next visit!

Summary Heading: Really really nice place at an affordable price
Summary: The room was incredibly big, even with a sort of "living room". It was clean and modern as well. For the price, I was pleasantly surprised!  The poole and hot tub are great too. The shallow end is great for toddlers.
Manager Response: Dear Casey Y,  Thank you for reviewing the Country Inn & Suites, Anaheim! We're glad to hear you enjoyed your time with us and our infinity pool! See you next time!

Summary: For my 50th birthday, I decided on a bit of a staycation to Disney’s California Adventure. I decided to stay at the Country Inns, as it was close to the front gate, reasonably priced and, well, part of the Radisson family. From start to finish, it was such an enjoyable experience. Only glitch: they ran out of bacon at breakfast ;-)  For starters, I bought my Disney tix from there, only to have the Disney online box office crash hard. For over an hour the desk manager tried everything to contact the site administrator and get the site up and running. After an hour, they were able to print the tix, and then waived part of my lodging fees for the inconvenience. Awesome!!  Couple with that, meeting Josh at the bar later on, who was an absolute delight!   Simply put: if you go to
Manager Response: Dear MiltonTA,  Thank you for reviewing the Country Inn & Suites, Anaheim. We're happy to hear you chose to celebrate your birthday with us! Thank you for your feedback and we will definitely relay your kind words to Josh.

Summary: Need a towel rack in the restroom and a table and chair by the bed. Other than that it was excellent!  It is a reasonable walking distance to Disneyland and to local restaurants. Free parking and free breakfast make it all the better!
Manager Response: Dear Discover56635833596,  Thank you for the 5 out of 5 rating! We look forward to your next visit!

Summary Heading: They go out of their way
Summary: Stayed at this great hotel nearby Disneyland for the week. Close enough to the park to walk but not too close to be right across the street. Huge rooms. The staff goes out of their way. I asked one morning if there was bacon today on the amazing breakfast today and Max went out of his way to cook me a special serving of Bacon. Would definitely stay here again on my trips to Disney.
Manager Response: Dear msrcast,  Thank you for reviewing the Country Inn & Suites, Anaheim. We will definitely relay your kind words to Max!

Summary Heading: Newer property, huge rooms, wonderful breakfast
Summary: We loved this property, this will probably be my new go-to Good Neighbor hotel for Disneyland.  It is a newer property, so very clean and modern. The Studio King suites are humongous and would be perfect for a family with kids.  Parents in the King bed area with kids over in the sitting den/pull-out sofa. Each area has a tv. A large bathroom separates the two areas, so while not a traditional private 1-bedroom suite, it serve the similar purpose.  A breakfast buffet with hot options is a great way to start the day.  Eggs, meat option, potato/starch options, waffles, breads, etc.  Our final morning featured biscuits and gravy!    We were here for 3 nights, and our room was ready for check-in when we arrived around 12:30p on Sunday--this is not guaranteed though, we just got
Manager Response: Dear randompersun,  Thank you for reviewing the Country Inn & Suites. We are delighted to hear you enjoyed everything from our proximity to the Disneyland resort to our hot breakfast buffet. Thank you for the 5 out of 5 rating and we look forward to your next visit!

Summary: I stayed for four night earlier this month with my family and the hotel was fine. The location is near to Disney and you can walk there in about 20 mins. It looks and feels like a business hotel and lacks character which isn’t helped by the fact it’s situated in quite an industrial looking area.   The room was clean and basic. The air conditioning is very loud and either freezing or hot, there’s nothing in the middle. Breakfast is ok but the food is the restaurant/bar is terrible so don’t go there if you can help it.  The pool is lovely and the highlight of the hotel. They also provide a free laundry area which was really helpful.  The staff are nice and helpful and overall the place is fine. If you get a good rate then go for it. If not then perhaps look elsewhere with more of
Manager Response: Dear michellekellyjenkins,  Thank you for taking the time to review the Country Inn & Suites. We appreciate your feedback and will use it to better serve our guests.

Summary Heading: Great location, great rooms and great service
Summary: We've taken our little ones here twice while visiting Disneyland.  It's walking distance, so you can save on parking.  The rooms are very nice and clean, the breakfast is pretty good and the staff is always smiling.  During one busy morning I asked James for a to go cup while while another customer was asking him to warm his milk.  He handled it with aplomb, the staff sees families and kids running around and they are very kind and courteous.
Manager Response: Dear 3stacksandarock,  Thank you for the 5 out of 5 rating! We appreciate your comments and look forward to your next stay.  Jame's will definitely get a pat on the back!

Summary: My family and I stayed here to attend an Angel's baseball game. The facility is clean and welcoming. The kids had a blast in the pool and my husband and I loved the pool-side drink service. Breakfast was a great spread. Close to the highway but not loud in the room. Easy to uber to-from stadium. Would def stay here for future games.
Manager Response: Dear Theresa H,  Thank you for reviewing the Country Inn & Suites, Anaheim!

Summary: Located within walking distance to Disneyland plus shuttles are available.  Somewhat of a new facility with modern modest country style.  Rooms are a good size with microwave and small refrigerator.    Five story building.  A little advice at check-in...if your room is on floors 2 to 5, ask for an odd number room (1-3-5-7-9) which faces south.  North side rooms face Interstate 5.  The traffic noise comes right through the A/C unit ... very loud and clear!  Can keep you awake!  Bedding is comfortable with the exception of the pillows!  Need new pillows...way too soft and the lumpy foam lacks ability to support head and neck!  I had difficulty sleeping and ended up with a sore neck/shoulders.  Closet space is minimal...the doors are difficult to slide (off tracks maybe).  The iron
Manager Response: Dear flipnEG,  Thank you for reviewing the Country Inn & Suites. We appreciate your feedback and will use it to better serve our guests. We look forward to making your next visit a memorable one.

Summary Heading: Great family hotel close to Disneyland
Summary: We stayed here from May 6 -12, 2019 Most important for us was that this hotel is a 10 min walk to Disneyland.  Sidewalk and well lit at night.  There is also pay per day shuttle bus but we never used it.  The hotel has huge floor to ceiling windows at the end of the corridors and you can easily see the fireworks from every floor! I can’t say enough good things about this hotel.  Helpful and friendly staff.  Our check in was fast and efficient.  We had a king suite.  It was huge.  We put our 6 year old on the pull out couch. The microwave and bar fridge were adequate to store a few snacks.  There is no separate door between the king bed and the rest of the room.  If the was one flaw to the room it was the bathroom.  There was no towel racks! We hung out towels in the closet but
Manager Response: Dear Trek60879863834,  Thank you for reviewing the Country Inn & Suites, Anaheim!

Summary: From a friendly check in to complimentary breakfast to super clean rooms( including mattress protectors for cleanliness between guests), a very short walk to Disney, a bar with wine and beer, convenient parking, outstanding staff and I could go on and on!!! What an unexpected gem! We’ll be back next month! Take your family here and you’ll thank me. Management is on point and makes you feel at home! Thanks sooooo much for all of your hospitality! Well done, five stars!!!!
Manager Response: Dear Ashcaba,  Thank you for taking the time to review the Country Inn & Suites, Anaheim. We are happy to hear we exceeded your expectations and look forward to your next visit!

Summary: We went for a Disney trip and we ended up with a hospital stay when my daughter had a medical emergency. While our trip didn’t go as planned the hotel was very helpful during the difficult time we had and constantly checked to see if there was anything else we needed or they could do for us. They even had a welcome back gift and special cookie tray waiting for her in our room when she was released from the hospital. I appreciate the staff so much. Thank you for making a difficult time easier and less stressful for us.  Will definitely stay there when we have our Disney re-do!
Manager Response: Dear GoPlaces27680773557,  Thank you for reviewing the Country Inn & Suites, Anaheim. We are delighted to hear our staff was attentive during your troubling time. We appreciate your feedback and look forward to your next visit.

Summary: What an amazing place! An easy 10 minute walk to Disneyland and California Adventure and a couple of minutes to Anaheim Garden Walk for meals, shopping and bowling. We stayed on the 4th floor in room 442 and had a fantastic view of the nightly fireworks. All of the staff were incredibly friendly and helpful. The property was clean and modern and the pool area spotless. Service in the bar and restaurant were top notch. The reception staff were wonderful too with our questions. The only thing that could possibly make this hotel better would be more variety of wine at the bar. Also the tiny pool towels...everyone was taking 2 so probably more economical to supply larger ones! Thank you all for a fantastic stay.
Manager Response: Dear Bronwyn123,  Thank you for the 5 out of 5 rating! We appreciate your feedback and your suggestions are being forwarded to the appropriate manager. Thank you for your review and we hope you visit us during your next trip to Anaheim and the Disneyland Resort!

Summary: We spent 7 days here and the hotel is centrally located and close to food and Disneyland. The Garden Walk was basically right across the street, so lots choices for food. They are located on the local hotel shuttle line if 3 blocks is too far to walk to Disney.
Manager Response: Dear Greg H,  Thank you for reviewing the Country Inn & Suites, Anaheim. Its' great to hear you took advantage of the ART shuttle and our proximity to the Disneyland Resort. We appreciate the 5 out of 5 rating and look forward to your next visit!

Summary: This is a worth it hotel. Free breakfast, fast wifi, heated pool,cozy lobby, friendly hotel staff, and just 15 mins walk away to Disneyland. Also, the best part it has a big parking lot for free as well. Highly recommended!
Manager Response: Dear Mhu0320,  Thank you for reviewing the Country Inn & Suites, Anaheim. We appreciate the you recommending us. We look forward to your next visit to the Anaheim area.

Summary Heading: Great place to stay and great people!
Summary: We spent a week at the Anaheim “Country Inn & Suites” and will definitely stay here next time. The staff and management really care and do a great job of running things. Everyone was friendly and helpful. We had positive interactions with many levels of the staff. Special thanks to Alex Santana for his assistance and kindness.   -The room was spacious and bright.  -Clean room and facilities.  -Great pool, hot tub and patio.  -Great buffet breakfast included.  -10 min walk to Disneyland.  -10 min walk to California Adventure.   -5 min walk to “Garden Walk” shops.  -5 min walk to great restaurants.  -45 min drive from LAX airport.  -Great view of the nightly Disneyland fireworks from the floor to ceiling windows at the end of the hallways.  -Comfortable bar and lounge area.  -Nice
Manager Response: Dear K5314WTpeterj,  Thank you for taking the time to review the Country Inn & Suites, Anaheim! We appreciate your detailed feedback. Thank you for your rating and your kind words about Alex!

Summary: We stayed here last week for 5 nights. The rooms are huge! The breakfast is awesome. The staff are amazing as well. This hotel is very clean. We will only stay here when going back to anaheim. The pool is nice and big. Walking disntance to Disneyland was about a 10 minute walk. you can also take the ART bus. Hotel was very quiet.
Manager Response: Dear sashablondy,  Thank you for the 5 out of 5 rating! We're delighted and thrilled to hear you enjoyed your time with us. See you next time!

Summary: Really close to Disneyland like 15 min walking, but close to highway too ( really noisy) we got the last room besides highway. The noise was really a problem for my baby to sleep. But overall I will totally stay again. Very clean, the room was enormous. Breakfast  was great. Staff is really friendly.
Manager Response: Dear Arianne Enz Rib... K,  Thank you for reviewing the Country Inn & Suites, Anaheim. We are sad to hear you didn't get a good nights sleep during your stay. We understand how important it is to be well rested, especially while on vacation. We will be sure to take care of you and your family during your next visit.

Summary Heading: Good location to Disneyland - EVERYTHING ELSE BAD
Summary: I will begin the review with the positives. - The room was nice and fair sized. - Good location for Disneyland (walking distance maybe 10 mins) - Breakfast included with stay was good for a free breakfast.  - Could see a portion of the fireworks from Disneyland in the evening. - Laundry on site  The BAD : - Fridge in our room was broken  - Pool was extremely cold even though they claim it is heated. Hot Tub was nice. - Pretty expensive for the quality of the rooms but probably paying for the location. - NO AIRPORT SHUTTLES - 45$ shuttle from LAX & 90$ CDN uber to Santa Monica.  - Upon checking in I was told the resort fee was 20$USD per night. When I asked what the resort fee was for I was told it included the gym, pool, laundry machines and location. I questioned the location
Manager Response: Dear shawnr640,   As a General Manager of our Hotel, this is obviously upsetting to hear. I apologize none of this made it’s way to me but am confident that those that exercised their empowerment skills to attempt to solve  the issues your described did their best albeit not in the manner you expected.   I’d love an opportunity to discuss this over the phone, wish you congratulations on your new engagement and have an opportunity to hear more.   Please contact me directly at (714) 598-0600 x 702 or  David.gutierrez@countryinn.com.   Safe Travels,   David J Gutierrez • General Manager

Summary: even though it is not located at downtown Disney area, it is close enough to walk to disneyland with less premium rate. Excellent breakfast with self serve waffle! look recently refreshed and new. Love the room we had which was very spacious. Definitely will come back again!
Manager Response: Dear Yamli18,   Thank you for reviewing the Country Inn & Suites, Anaheim. We're happy to hear you enjoyed your time with us and look forward to your next visit!

Summary Heading: Nice hotel, but noisy with sounds of the freeway
Summary: Stayed the hotel for 2 nights- the staff, breakfast and rooms were all good. My only problem was the proximity to the freeway, I had trouble sleeping each night because I could hear cards driving by. Perhaps if I was in another room, I would have had a better experience. The positive was the proximity to Disneyland, which took us about 10 minutes to walk to.
Manager Response: Dear charlene c,  Thank you for your feedback. We appreciate your time and visit!

Summary: All you need to know if you’re planning a family trip to Disneyland, this hotel has: - tickets for purchase onsite - free breakfast - free parking - free WiFi - free laundry (though some of the machines could use maintenance or be updated) - convenient access to stores/restaurants  - best of all, easy walking distance to Disneyland!   The rooms were clean, bedding wasn’t to our liking but it was good enough. We would definitely stay here again :)  Thanks for making our 1st visit to Disneyland that much more magical!
Manager Response: Dear linayang84,  Thank you for the 5 out of 5 rating! We're delighted to hear we were a part of your first visit to the Disneyland Resort!

Summary: Right near Disneyland and the Convention Center.  Shuttle bus comes to the hotel, but we walked the 2 blocks to Disneyland.  New hotel with really nice & clean rooms.  Awesome breakfast (best food and seating arrangement I've seen).  Huge pool/jacuzzi.  The fitness equipment looked state of the art.  This place was in a great location for my business trip, while the family headed out to Disneyland. The hotel is right across the street from the Garden Walk Entertainment Complex (House of Blues, 24 Hour Fitness, Bubba Gump, PF Chang's, CPK, fun shops, etc).  Friendly staff... really well run hotel.
Manager Response: Dear Harry W,  Thank you for reviewing the Country Inn & Suites, Anaheim. We're happy to hear you took advantage of our proximity to the Garden Walk!

Summary: I really like this hotel has pool, bar, great breakfast, small store, WiFi, clean rooms, my room was super big for just one king bed but my son loved it he had space to run around since he’s 1 year old
Manager Response: Dear Fearless4050127117,  Thank you for the 5 out of 5 rating! We're happy to hear you enjoyed all our Hotel has to offer.

Summary: My family has been frequenting this property since it opened and we are always impressed with the facilities, amenities, and amazing staff.  This property is on the newer side of the equation and it shows.  The rooms are spacious with all the amenities you would expect.  The beds are comfortable and most importantly, it's CLEAN.  From the lobby to the breakfast area to the rooms.  It's a short walk to Disneyland (about 10 minutes) or you can take the bus which picks up right out front.  Breakfast is served 7 days a week and they offer all the standards plus some extras.  Nothing like starting your day with fresh fruit, coffee, eggs, and a waffle.  The pool and hot tub are modern, spacious, and clean and the fitness room is great if you are looking to work out during your stay.
Manager Response: Dear TahoeRyanP,  Thank you for taking the time to review the Country Inn & Suites, Anaheim. We will relay your kind words to David our General Manager and James! We look forward to your next visit!

Summary: Pleasant greeting upon arrival.  All paperwork in order for Disneyland.  Used the ART travel shuttle and went to a ballgame.  Morning breakfast was awesome.  James was especially helpful.  Room was neat and clean.  Free parking.  Would definately use again.
Manager Response: Dear Resort648397,  Thank you for reviewing the Country Inn & Suites, Anaheim. We appreciate your feedback and will relay your kind words to James!

Summary: I have to say this hotel has the most outstanding staff I have ever come across in all my travels to Disneyland. The front desk supervisor Nina, exceeded my expectations from the time I checked in to the restaurant staff that helped my son make a waffle. My room was very clean and spacious. My kids enjoyed the property and all it’s staff for the two days we were there. My wife was extremely impressed by our welcome amenity for my birthday celebration, which we briefly shared with Nina at check-in. Thank you for the memories... we will surely be back!!!!
Manager Response: Dear Luckypierre71,  Thank you for your 5 out of 5 rating. We will definitely relay your kind words to Nina!

Summary Heading: Lovely hotel with outstanding staff! About 10-15 minute walk to Disneyland.
Summary: The hotel itself is beautiful and close to Disneyland for a great price. Our room was lacking a table and chairs, there is plenty of space for one but instead a big empty space, but we made do. We had a king suite room and it was very spacious, the bed was super comfortable for me and the room was very clean and smelt nice and fresh.  From the moment of walking in the door until we left 4 days later, the staff were amazing. Friendly, polite and showed genuine care for us. Every single staff member, including the man who I think was the maintenance guy, greeted us with a smile and asked us if we needed assistance.The manager gets out there and gets his hands dirty helping to clean up in the breakfast area and talking to guests. I’ve never experienced this before in all of our
Manager Response: Dear Tammykinns,  Thank you for reviewing the Country Inn & Suites, Anaheim. We pride ourselves on making our guests feel at home and we're glad it shows. We appreciate your feedback and look forward to your next stay.

Summary: Country Inn was so nice!! So clean and such a friendly staff! The continental breakfast was very good and the pool and hot tub were so nice!. I would defiantly stay here again and would highly recommend it to anyone! It is close enough to Disneyland that you could walk.
Manager Response: Dear Lori W,  Thank you for reviewing the Country Inn & Suites. Congratulations! You are our 1,000th review! We appreciate your feedback and kind words!

Summary Heading: Great breakfast, no noise in the am, great pool.
Summary: I would say it’s perfect if you have older kids that don’t mind the extra walk. For price and amenities it’s the best in the area. The only complaint was the pillows in the room were super small and the view was the freeway. Still was quiet and enjoyable. Far better than the hotels on harbor that are old and loud   It’s worth the extra 5-7 minutes walk if you are able!
Manager Response: Dear KoleMusic,  Thank you for your feedback and kind words!

Summary Heading: Best Kept Secret, but not for long!
Summary: We absolutely loved our stay here! The rooms were clean, modern and the decor was warm and inviting. The staff, friendly and professional. We particularly were impressed by James. A quiet, efficient presence to a somewhat chaotic morning breakfast. The breakfasts were yummy and the staff was keen to keeping the flow of food coming and the tables clean. James was sure to check in with us to be sure we were all satisfied with everything. I am somewhat afraid to leave such glowing review, now everyone will come here. Ample parking, shuttle service, swimming pool, jacuzzi, bar and food available. Quick market on site. Only one thing I would suggest, the knob to switch the shower head on was very, very difficult to lift up. Thank you for a memorable stay! We WILL be back!
Manager Response: Dear sandy a,  Thank you taking the time to review the Country Inn & Suites, Anaheim. We appreciate your feedback and look forward to your next stay!

Summary: We’ve stayed in 3 other offsite hotels near Disneyland and this place is the BEST by far!! We stayed in a King Suite on the 5th floor and had plenty of room for our family of four. We requested a twin bed rollaway and still had plenty of space for our 2 children. This is definitely a family friendly hotel with free full breakfast, beautiful pool with views of fireworks and the #7 ART bus picks you up just feet from the hotel entrance. Be sure to buy your ART passes at the front desk. The walk to Disneyland is not bad (~10-15 min) but our children were too tired after a full day at the Parks so the short bus ride was a gift. Our youngest was too sick to fly home on our last day and the front desk staff were so accommodating in helping us plan our unexpected extra day. Bartender
Manager Response: Dear 996rhondam,   We're happy to hear you enjoyed your time with us and our proximity to the Disneyland Resort! We will definitely give our bartender a pat on the back!

Summary Heading: Very nice, clean, and modern hotel near Disneyland
Summary: Very nice, clean, and modern hotel. I only wished that the bathroom in our room did not have a sliding door, while it is a nice design, my kids are obsessed with playing with the sliding doors and the fact that it doesn't lock means no privacy while using the bathroom lol! But I won't let that be the reason to not stay here again. Staff was friendly, everything new and clean. Plus it's close to Disneyland! You could do 15 min walk there or take the Shuttle bus provided by ART which was extremely convenient. Breakfast in the morning was awesome with the usual eggs, bacon, waffles, fruits, toast, cereal etc. Definitely well worth it to stay here. Next time we plan to go to Disney, I will probably book this hotel again!
Manager Response: Dear Trek60164929255,  Thank you for the 5 out of 5 rating!

Summary: I chose this hotel for its proximity to Disneyland and the free breakfast and got so much more. The staff is amazing. We arrived on a Sunday morning and left our luggage at the desk. The staff invited us to have brunch and wished my mom and I a happy birthday. At the end of a fun day 1 at Disney, we got the keys to our room and found a hand-signed birthday card from the staff with a plate of cookies. We stayed for two nights. All staff no matter their roles, greeted us and checked in with us about our stay. The rooms are excellent. I would definitely choose to stay here again and I am grateful for the hotel staff making our birthday trip memorable
Manager Response: Dear emysand05,   We're happy to hear you and your mom enjoyed your time with us and our delicious cookies! Happy belated birthday and we hope you visit us again during your next visit to the Anaheim area!

Summary: I only stayed one night, but next time I do,  stay I will stay more than one. I did check in early, my room wasn’t ready but the clerk at the front desk offered me and my guest for breakfast at the hotel and let us check our luggage in some wouldn’t have to keep it in the car. The staff was wonderful, the hotel was clean and had many amenities. My favorite part was the breakfast! Yummy!
Manager Response: Dear Companion07678292349,  Thank you for reviewing the Country Inn & Suites, Anaheim. We're glad to hear you enjoyed our hot breakfast! The perfect way to start your day! See you next time.

Summary: Such a great hotel, very clean and the staff is so friendly and helpful! The breakfast was free and it was delicious. Went swimming as well and the pool and hot tub area was very clean!! I definitely recommend staying here!
Manager Response: Dear Global18810851124,  We're happy to hear you enjoyed your time with us and our infinity pool! Thank you for reviewing the Country Inn & Suites.

Summary: Good place to stay. Clean, efficient, friendly and I felt safe. 😚😚😚😚🤪🤪 ran out of things to say so filling this space with the remainder of minimal 200 characters 😅😂🥓🎶🍷🎉🥓🤪🎶👌🎉🎊😎 w love Disneyland MAGA
Manager Response: Dear 667kathleenh,   Thank you for the 5 out of 5 rating.

Summary Heading: Great features and huge shuttle to park
Summary: Another place we tried ran out of seats on the shuttle. Love the pool and exercise facility, breakfast was great but closes early at 9:30. would not buy bar food again but it's convenient. Great to not have to pay more for parking. Rooms immaculate and well maintained. A little noise from hallway but the place had tons of kids.
Manager Response: Dear C0D3monkey,  Thank you for reviewing the Country Inn & Suites, Anaheim. We're happy to hear you enjoyed our spacious rooms and infinity swimming pool!

Summary: Everyone is very friendly and they all provide great service, especially the kitchen staff. 10/10 would recommend. The beds and the pillows are very comfortable, great shower with good water pressure. I really liked everything about this hotel.
Manager Response: Dear chin1345,  Thank you for the 5 out of 5 rating! We appreciate your feedback and look forward to your next stay!

Summary: We arrived for a short three day stay, not knowing what to expect. What we found was one of the best hotel stays we have ever experienced. From the moment we arrived and checked in, to our relaxing evening with the fun and efficient bartender Veronica, literally every single person we came in contact with was pleasant, warm, and welcoming.  How could this be? All became clear this morning when enjoying our delicious full (FREE) breakfast. The breakfast area was packed, with families rushing to get to the park, and still everyone working was calm, efficient, and friendly. We noticed the General Manager was working alongside his staff - bussing tables!  It is clear these folks have a great leader and it shows. Never mind the fact the hotel is beautiful and well equipped, within
Manager Response: Dear SHable2019,  Thank you for reviewing the Country Inn & Suites, Anaheim. We appreciate your feedback and kind words! See you next time.

Summary: We’ve stay at this hotel a total of 3 times. Each experience has been great! Love that it’s walking distance to Disneyland. Rooms are nice and clean. Our room this last visit (4/22 - 4/26) was nice and roomie (Room 437) we had a livingroom with a sofa bed, the bathroom is in between the living room and the sleeping area which is nice if one persone wants to stay up while the rest sleep. The sleeping area is nice and roomie, we had a rollaway bed brought in and we still had plenty of room which was nice for the kids to play in. Our housekeeper Ines was great, she was very sweet, attentive and went the extra mile. every night when we returned from Disneyland my girls would find their stuffed bunnies nicely tucked in, in their beds. Our girls loved that touch and asked who would
Manager Response: Dear Marypoza75,  We are happy to hear you and your family enjoys your time with us during every visit! Thank you for the 5 out of 5 rating and we'll see you next time!

Summary Heading: Clean, comfortable, great staff and only 12 minutes to walk to Disneyland!
Summary: This was a very nice, clean hotel close to Disneyland. It was a 12 minute walk or a short bus ride. The shuttle was $5.50 per day and worth it. The pool was big and beautiful and there is also a hot tub. Our room was clean and comfortable. The bathroom was new. They have a Bistro where we had drinks, pizza, sandwiches and appetizers. They also have a little shop for incidentals and snacks. At first we thought we were going to be too far from Disneyland to walk, but that wasn't the case at all. The staff is very friendly and helpful. We really enjoyed our stay.
Manager Response: Dear Leslie R,  Thank you for the 5 out of 5 rating! We're happy to hear you took time to enjoy or Bistro and Inn Case Market! See you next time.

Summary: Great hotel clean friendly staff, hot breakfast  would have liked a few more  options, the parking was easy location was great, check in and check out was fast. I wish we would have checked out the pool just didn't have time.
Manager Response: Dear Daydream321786,  Thank you for your feedback! We appreciate you taking the time to review the Country Inn & Suites, Anaheim.

Summary: We are still at the start of our trip but have already had a delightful experience, starting with Veronica, our bartender in the lounge. She is charming, fun, and a great asset to the hotel!  The check in process was also great, and our rooms are simply beautiful.
Manager Response: Dear Lori H,  Thank you for reviewing the Country Inn & Suites, Anaheim. We are delighted to hear Veronica took care of you. We will definitely give her a pat on the back!

Summary: It all began with a friendly welcome and no hassle check-in. The lobby was nice and the store had the essentials stocked including small quick microwavable meals for the room.   The hot breakfast was more than I expected, both in quality and quantity.  They are more than helpful at the front desk helping with ride service, tickets, and other things you may not even need.  Basically, everyone goes above and beyond. This includes the service at the bar and bistro too.  I was even surprised when a manager stopped to talk to me about how my day and stay was. They know how to make you feel welcome.   Proximity to Disney and other destinations in Anaheim was a bonus when I thought it was the main reason I stayed here. The hospitality and cleanliness blew me away.
Manager Response: Dear That1Hooligan,  Thank you for taking the time to review the Country Inn & Suites, Anaheim. We're delighted to hear we helped you feel at home. Thank you for your kind words and we look forward to your next visit.

Summary Heading: Great Family hotel and very affordable
Summary: This is the second time I have stayed at this hotel and my children love the breakfast and pool. The room was very clean and updated. We like the close proximity to Disneyland and out of the busy streets.
Manager Response: Dear Vacation35468836076,  Thank you for reviewing the Country Inn & Suites, Anaheim. We appreciate your feedback!

Summary: Country Inn & Suites is the best.  We don't stay any place else.  The entire staff is very friendly & very helpful with all your needs.  We have been staying here since 2 weeks after they opened their doors.
Manager Response: Dear T9890YZlindaj,  Thank you for reviewing the Country Inn & Suites. We're happy to hear you enjoy your times with us and look forward  to your next visit.

Summary: We had an amazing stay.  Very friendly staff, excellent cleaning, great free breakfast and free parking! I wouldn’t hesitate to recommend this.  We could walk to the park in 8-10 minutes.  .35 mi away perfect stay and perfect hotel. Pool, bar, everything was excellent
Manager Response: Dear coreyjohnson2007,  Thank you for taking the time to review the Country Inn & Suites, Anaheim. We appreciate your feedback and kind words! See you next time!

Summary: That’s right, it was exactly 1km walk to the front gates of Disneyland. My 9 year old son and I did it back and forth every day except for our last when I realized there was public transit that took us there. While it took the same amount of time to ride transit vs walk, when taking 25 000 steps a day, it’s good to get a break when possible.   The bus stops immediately in front of the hotel inside the parking lot. And I believe it runs every 20 min until about 11:30pm.   Let’s rewind a little shall we? From LAX we were able to catch the “Disneyland Resort Express Shuttle”. Round trip it cost me about $70 usd for 1 adult and a 9 year old. The shuttle dropped us off and picked us up at Clementine hotel which is about 1 block walk across a busy intersection. With only carry on
Manager Response: Dear Guest,  I wanted to thank you for such an amazing review. We love to see our guest's comments and their stories while staying with us. I am so happy that you had a great time with us and also wanted to let you know that if we come across your son's item, we will certainly make sure you receive it sound and safe. My goal is to help as much as possible and I'm putting my "CIS" hat right now to try to locate your item and gain back that missing point on your review. If possible, can you please send me an email to my work email with a good description of the items. My email is alex.santana@countryinn.com I hope to hear from you soon!  Sincerely, Alex Santana Rooms and F&B Manager

Summary Heading: Love this place! Elegant and affordable
Summary: Love to stay here, lobby is nice, seating area for breakfast is big enough, has a children area, pool and jacuzzi are right outside. It's very family friendly, and they have a bar open at night. Ive stayed at many other places to go to Disneyland  but this is my favorite and I feel bad when it's fully booked
Manager Response: Dear Inspire23720768166,  Thank you for reviewing the Country Inn & Suites, Anaheim! We're delighted to hear we are your new favorite hotel near the Disneyland Resort! See you next time!

Summary Heading: Great place to stay for Disney visitors
Summary: My son and I stayed here for 2 nights and it was very nice. The location is perfect for walking to Disneyland. The hotel is only 2 years old, the free hot breakfast was one of the best I have experienced in several years. There was a waffle maker, fresh cut fruit, and tons of bacon! James was working both mornings and was friendly and helpful. Cherine at the front desk got us our room early and locked our bags up for us on our last day,so we could go to the parks before our flight.  I will highly recommend this hotel to friends and family and will use it on our future trips to Disneyland.
Manager Response: Dear funkyangela,  Thank you for reviewing the Country Inn & Suites, Anaheim. We'll definitely relay your kind words to James and Cherine!

Summary Heading: Great spot and plan to stay again
Summary: Big rooms. Big bathrooms. 24 hour shop downstairs. Ice machines work. Beds are ok. Sound proof from outside. Not from other rooms when kids are screaming about Disneyland but that’s on the parenting, you know who you are. Everything was great. I’d stay again. Maybe pay a little extra for a better room. It’ll be worth it I’m sure.
Manager Response: Dear Global14143677527,  Thank you for taking the time to review the Country Inn & Suites, Anaheim. We're delighted to hear you enjoyed your time with us and look forward to your next visit!

Summary: Nice spacious rooms! Friendly staff. Hotel was SUPER clean and smelled amazing. Great location. The breakfast buffet was very good as well. I would definitely stay here again and refer friends and family to stay ad well.
Manager Response: Dear Tiffany S,  Thank you for the 5 out of 5 rating! We appreciate your feedback and look forward to your next visit!

Summary Heading: Great place to stay for Disneyland visitors.
Summary: We have stayed her for a couple of basketball tournaments that my son was a part of and liked it so much we chose to stay here for our trip to Disneyland. Great hotel for the value and walking distance to front entrance at Disneyland.
Manager Response: Dear SAP5871,  Thank you for reviewing the Country Inn & Suites, Anaheim. We're happy to hear you took advantage of our proximity to the Disneyland Resort! See you next time!

Summary Heading: One of the best choices you can make.
Summary: I have stayed at this particular building twice and each time was amazing. Location wise it is very close to minutes from Disney.
