Also, it is right across from a large shopping area with several restaurants. Free parking, wifi, and breakfast buffet. If you can get a room here at the right time the price can be so low its unbelievable for everything you get. The rooms are clean and VERY spacious.
Manager Response: Dear mrjeremy2019,  Thank you for reviewing the Country Inn & Suites, Anaheim. We're delighted to hear you enjoyed your time with us!

Summary: Stayed here with family in late April. The room was clean and the location is excellent- walking distance to Disneyland. The breakfast was really good too.   The staff Tabby, Maria and Kimberly W were all particularly great as they put in every effort to make our stay enjoyable.   The downside was there are no kettles in the rooms, But tea/coffee is provided in the restaurant area. You also have to take all your luggage to and from your room as there is no porter service and most of there trolleys have a flat tyre. The quilts also need to be replaced as the infill had completely deteriorated.
Manager Response: Dear Connector702120,  Thank you for the 4 out of 5 rating! We'll definitely relay your kind words to Tabby, maria and Kimberly.

Summary: This hotel stay was great. Prior to our family trip a lot of research was involved and the reviews sold us. Our stay was flawless. The breakfast was a great way to start the day, the rooms were great and the staff was excellent.  The walk to Disneyland was approximately 15-20 minutes, other necessities were within walking distance.  Thank you country inn & suites
Manager Response: Dear kamikaze1701,  Thank you for reviewing the Country Inn & Suites, Anaheim! We're happy to hear you enjoyed our hot breakfast and our short distance to the Disneyland Resort!

Summary: Everybody was so friendly. The room was clean and The breakfast is really good and have everything you need. The location is so great, just blocks away from Disney Parks, good restaurants and a shopping center.
Manager Response: Dear Fearless05586126801,  Thank you for reviewing the Country Inn & Suites, Anaheim!

Summary: My husband and I booked through Expedia. A few things stood out to us when we were booking our trip to Disneyland - we wanted a hotel walking distance to Disneyland, free parking as we had a rental car and clean.  We got bonuses like free wifi and complementary breakfast. The service was amazing.  The walk to Disneyland was about 15 minutes which was perfect for us.  Each and everytime we walked in the door we were greeted by multiple front staff. We never waited more than a few minutes for anything - check in, check out, etc. Everything was super efficient! The entire hotel was extremely clean and breakfast was great. It was such a nice treat seeing managers and the general manager in the hotel during our entire stay - I found we don’t see this often in other hotels and they
Manager Response: Dear Kelseyw4321,   Thank you for your kind review! We look forward to your next visit!

Summary: Very good and clean hotel. Staff is friendly and helpful. Hotel GM walked to me in the morning and asked if I need anything and if everything is ok. Front desk staff is knowledgeable. Disneyland, California advantture and downtown Disney is like on walking distance but you can also uber for for like $7.00. I was able to purchase disney tickets from here and they also run shuttles for disney.  Room is pretty open and so as the bathroom. Breakfast was very good. Good seating area.  Cleaning was done every day and none of my stuff was moved.  You can buy water, soft drinks, quick travel related stuff as well as some Disney stuff on site.
Manager Response: Dear Travel60255732682,  Thank you for the 5 out of 5 rating! We're happy to hear you enjoyed our hot breakfast, spacious guest rooms and proximity to the Disneyland Resort!

Summary: Great family hotel very close to Disney land, it is also very close to Gardenwalk Anaheim which has plenty of restaurants, activities and stores to keep everyone happy. Great facilities and has all amenities you’ll need.
Manager Response: Dear Stay31835442040,  Thank you for taking the time to review the Country Inn & Suites, Anaheim!

Summary: room and bathroom were clean.  Staff was nice and informational.  Pool was very nice as well.  We had a little problem with cleanness of the refrigerator, didn't use it, anyway.  The location was superb.  Shuttle bus for Disneyland was inexpensive.
Manager Response: Dear Travel28594933930,  Thank you for the 5 out of 5 rating!

Summary: Modern hotel near Disneyland.  Do not look any further and book your stay at this hotel. The hotel is an easy 10 min walk to Disneyland. Free breakfast and parking! Maria and staff very friendly and will make your stay comfortable.
Manager Response: Dear herakales,  Thank you for reviewing the Country Inn & Suites, Anaheim! We appreciate your kind words!

Summary: Each time we visit Disneyland we try out different hotels in the area to see which one we like the best.  Country Inn & Suites is by far the best one we have stayed at and will plan on coming back here again on our next visit.  I wish I had found this hotel sooner!  This hotel is fairly new (I believe hotel isn't even 2 years old), clean, and well-maintained! From check-in to check-out, the entire family had a wonderful experience.  We drove in from Las Vegas and arrived early to the hotel.  Mish at the Front Desk was very friendly & helpful in getting us settled into our room a little early so we could rest up before we headed to the park.  Josh was also helpful and accommodating at check-out. The hotel has the best amenities by far... FREE PARKING, FREE WI-FI, FREE HOT
Manager Response: Dear FnJ808,  Thank you for reviewing the Country Inn & Suites, Anaheim. We're happy to hear you enjoyed our hot breakfast, proximity to the Disneyland Resort, free coffee and tea and our spacious rooms. We will give Mish a pat on the back! See you next time!

Summary: Just on our final day of a 7 night stay and really enjoyed this hotel. Rooms are large and well-equipped and the staff are lovely and couldn’t do enough for you. It’s nice to find an American property which offers so much more than just a room - there’s a pool, bar, restaurant and a great breakfast each morning. Special mention must go to Federico (who quickly fixed a minor issue we had with our wardrobe door) and Kimberly who served us at breakfast.  The only reason we didn’t give 5 stars is that the air con in the room was quite noisy and we would have preferred proper cups and glasses rather than paper and plastic. I would defineatly stay here again and recommended it to anyone.
Manager Response: Dear wheresnick,  Thank you for the 4 out of 5 rating! We'll definitely give Federico a pat on the back!

Summary: Service is a big factor in hotel stays for me and unfortunately I would not recommend this hotel because of the experience during our stay.  We checked in at supper time after the flight, picking up rental car....exhausted!  Hotel stay was paid before arrival for 5 days stay the staff took our credit card for incidentals and car information gave us our keys and off we went.  Time change had us sleeping by 10 PM, my husband and I get woken up from a phone call from front desk informing us the credit card deposit didnt go through I look at the clock almost 11 PM and tell her you have just woken us up and I am not getting dressed and going to sort this out at this hour and she says no big deal we can figure it out tomorrow just wanted to let you know...seriously!!  Then our key
Manager Response: Dear chelly0669,   On behalf of myself and our entire Service Team, I want to sincerely  apologize for the disruption in your rest after a long day of travel. As you  may have read, we have a phenomenal  review response rate from Travelers just like you. I am sorry this was not the case and assure you it is an isolated incident.  Your key points  about your stay have and will be addressed immediately.   I would love an opportunity to discuss your stay via phone call and can be reached at (714) 598-0600 x 702.   I look forward to speaking with you.  David J Gutierrez  • General Manager

Summary: Wonderful place, staff is great! So close to Disneyland and you can see the fireworks from the pool. We really enjoyed the bar area, with great pizza and beers. Service is wonderful. Clean rooms and lots of hot water.
Manager Response: Dear Sherpa44587117280,  We're delighted to hear you enjoyed your time with us! See you during your next visit to the Anaheim area!

Summary: The hotel is new and in great shape, but the rooms do not have sufficient soundproofing and you hear the noise from I-5.  General traffic basically becomes white noise, but there seems to be a motorcycle, sports car, or tractor trailer roaring by frequently.  We decided to check out early after everyone had a poor night sleep, deciding it was worth it to pay a $100 room rate fee adjustment and move a few blocks from the freeway.  Otherwise, the overall facilities are nice.
Manager Response: Dear Trek13098242161,    Thank you for taking the time to share your feedback.  We are sorry to hear you did not have a good night’s sleep due to the SoCal freeway traffic  We know a good night’s rest is very important.  We appreciate your comments as we are continually look for ways to improve the sleep experience for our guests.  I'd  love an opportunity to discuss via phone and ideally invite you and your family back to enjoy our hotel in the intended manner. I can be reached at (714) 598-0600 x 702   Safe Travels,  David J Gutierrez General Manager

Summary: In between the spacious rooms and the friendly staff this fantastic hotel is also boarded by a large water front. If your at the pool you can just give Josh a shot one of our favorite staff members. Thanks for the great holiday Country Inn & Sweets
Manager Response: Dear Global28534841038,  Thank you for reviewing the Country Inn & Suites, Anaheim. We will definitely relay your kind words to Josh!

Summary: Family friendly hotel with gracious staff, delicious breakfast with variety, coffee / hot tea in the afternoon and evening, beautiful pool, comfy rooms, child friendly spaces,  cute gift shop and close proximity to Disneyland (about a block and a half to the bus drop off area although a Disney shuttle is available as well)!
Manager Response: Dear Sightsee11865854592,  Thank you for the 5 out of 5 rating! We look forward to your next visit!

Summary: Didn’t have Rosè so he made me his own version...fabulous!!  Allie the chef is superb!   Great stay!!   Rooms are fabulous and staff very accommodating.  Large group, close to Disney, wonderful! Can’t go wrong staying here!
Manager Response: Dear  Cpythat,  Thank you for your kind words! We'll definitely give Ellie and Josh a pat on the back!

Summary: This hotel was awesome! Clean, staff was great and they have a free hot buffet breakfast with new things every day, also the AIM bus picks you up and drops you off rate in the parking lot! Will stay again!
Manager Response: Dear Sylvanlakejoey,  We're happy to hear you enjoyed your time with us. Thank you for reviewing the Country Inn & Suites, Anaheim.

Summary: overall a great stay 10 min walk to Disneyland park and California Adventure happy with the hotel would stay again great staff, great room size , love the pool and hot tub but the only thing that could be better is the pool towels were small and thin plus the room towels were just ok but the over all it was a great hotel
Manager Response: Dear Curiosity23118073462,  Thank you for reviewing the Country Inn & Suites, Anaheim. We appreciate your feedback.

Summary: Great hotel, only complaint was there is no lock on the bathroom, and only have a glass shower door which lacks privacy.  Walking distance to Disney and the Garden walk.  Staff was very nice and the breakfast was complimentary and was a good variety of options.
Manager Response: Derar Global368223472679,  Thank you for the 5 out of 5 rating! See you next time!

Summary: We stayed at this hotel during a family trip to Disneyland. We had three rooms and there were 11 of us. The staff at this hotel was very caring and made sure that everyone of our needs and desires were met in a timely manner. We were traveling with four small children and the front desk provided an early check so the kids could nap. It seemed as though the staff member’s days were made better by helping others. With this great service, and a short walk to Disneyland, this is now our go to hotel in the area.
Manager Response: Dear nancysK47PJ,  Thank you for taking the time to review the Country Inn & Suites, Anaheim. We're happy to hear you and your family enjoyed your time with us!

Summary: The rooms were clean and updated. The breakfast was good and fresh with variety of food. The staff were attentive and friendly. We had a blast with our kids in the pool and enjoyed our stay. It is a little bit of a walk to Disney Parks with no shuttle but we did it daily.
Manager Response: Dear Passport22091599626,  Thank you for the 5 out of 5 rating!

Summary Heading: All the little things add up to a great experience!
Summary: New hotel close walking distance to Disneyland and a couple of our favorite restaurants. (Cheesecake Factory and PF Changs) I   loved that they had complimentary washer and dryers and breakfast.  Lots of variety with breakfast including eggs, bacon, sausage, hash browns, tater tots, oatmeal, cereal, toast, waffles and fresh fruit.  The rooms were clean and comfortable and all the staff friendly and helpful.  The outdoor pool is heated and large and you can see the fireworks from the pool or view it from the large windows at the end of the halls.  Jacuzzi was relaxing after a long day on the feet and it is great that the pool area is open until midnight so you can close the park and still get a soak in before bed.  In the evening they put out complimentary chocolate chip cookies
Manager Response: Dear BonniePortCoquitlam,  Thank you for reviewing the Country Inn & Suites, Anaheim. We're delighted to hear you enjoyed everything from our hot breakfast and fresh cookies to our spacious swimming pool and view of the Disneyland fireworks! We appreciate your feedback and look forward to your next visit.

Summary: The hotel is nice, clean the staff is very professional and helpful. The compliment real fast is great, pool is heated and very nice and clean. And very close to Disneyland, will definitely stay there again
Manager Response: Dear Road316079383242,  Thank you for the 5 out of 5 rating!

Summary Heading: Great Place, Great Location, Great Service!
Summary: The Country Inn & Suites was a great place to stay during our recent visit to California. Disneyland was within walking distance, the breakfast had a good variety, the room was clean. Friendly staff, check-in and out was easy.
Manager Response: Dear rawson41,  Thank you for taking the time to review the Country Inn & Suites, Anaheim. We appreciate your comments. See you next time!

Summary Heading: Awesome stay at the Country Inn
Summary: Loved our time at this hotel- it's absolutely beautiful!  The rooms are huge and the beds are super comfy.  Loved the lobby, pool area, and breakfast area!  And it's so close to Disney!  Thank you for a wonderful time!
Manager Response: Dear Curiosity04789317861,  Thank you for reviewing the Country Inn & Suites, Anaheim!

Summary: What a great hotel  From the buzz light-year ride to our hotel room is exactly 1 mile on the third floor. It’s very accessible to Disneyland and an easy walk to many restaurants. The breakfast at the hotel was great and the food was plentiful. They had good water pressure and consistent hot water. The air-conditioning stayed at a constant level and the hotel was quiet.
Manager Response: Dear Voyager533164,  Thank you for the 5 out of 5 rating!

Summary: We stayed here for a family trip to Disneyland. It was a 10 minute walk to the parks. There is also a bus that picks up right in front of the hotel. It was $5.50 per adult for a day pass. The breakfast was great. They had many choices each day. There was plenty of seating in the breakfast area. The pool was nice but the hot tub was perfect after a long day in the parks. There is a little gift shop with Disney merchandise and the regular snacks/drinks. It was handy to have when we needed some Tylenol. The rooms are large. We had 2 queen beds. They were very comfy. Overall, it was a nice hotel and I would not hesitate to stay here in the future.
Manager Response: Dear katiedid25,  Thank you for your feedback! We appreciate your kind words and look forward to your next visit!

Summary: Close to Disneyland and eating establishments.  Quiet surroundings.  Breakfast other than the eggs was very good.  Room was very clean and spacious. Staff was very kind and helpful.Room was clean, though some days it was not cleaned until later in day.
Manager Response: Dear Fearless46040357153,  We are happy to hear you enjoyed everything the Country Inn & Suites, Anaheim has to offer! Thank you for your feedback and see you during your next visit to the Anaheim area!

Summary: I easily enjoyed our stay here.  I was very impressed with the kind staff.  The staff that took care of breakfast was so awesome! Never a dirty table. They cleaned up everything so fast.  The pillows weren't very comfortable but i thought the beds were.  Free use of laundry was a plus! We ended up having to use it.  Easy to get to Disneyland.  City buses available as well for a small fee. Pool was super nice.  Felt like it's own little oasis.
Manager Response: Dear valued guest,  We are delighted to hear you took time to enjoy our heated infinity pool! Thank you for reviewing the Country Inn & Suites, Anaheim and we look forward to your next visit!

Summary: The staff at this hotel are wonderful. Everyone was great and friendly. Crib was free of charge which was nice. Pool hours are amazing as you can be out in the pool and watch fireworks from Disneyland.  Walking distance from Disneyland was about 15 mins from hotel to entrance of the park. I had two littles and a 10 year old and I didn’t think the walk was terrible at all.
Manager Response: Dear Paradise46021886071,  Thank you for the 4 out of 5 rating.

Summary: Everything about our stay here was perfect- the continental breakfast, room service, proximity to Disneyland, customer service, the freshly baked cookies in the afternoon, etc.  We will definitely be staying here again.
Manager Response: Dear Joanne G,  Thank you for reviewing the Country Inn & Suites, Anaheim. We're happy to hear you enjoyed our delicious fresh cookies! See you next time!

Summary: I have nothing negative to say about this place! We were really impressed with the location (15 min walk to Disney and right off I5); the service was always friendly and welcoming; the pool inviting and fun for the kids; the breakfast was great to say it was included; and the room was huge. Plenty of space, and with a separate area for the kids to sleep in. There were building works and roadworks going on nearby, but we didn’t hear either, and they didn’t bother us in the slightest. Perfect place for our family!
Manager Response: Dear HolidaySpeak1,  We appreciate your feedback and look forward to your next visit!

Summary: This is a relatively new hotel building and we thought that it was going to be comfortable but was mistaken when we checked in and had the wrong room to house three (one a 17yr female).  No effort to fix this issue.
Manager Response: Thanks for posting a review. We feel sad to know that your stay was anything less than pleasing due to the situation with the rooming and the staff service at that time. We understand how frustrating this must have been for you and we assure you that our team does the best we can to fulfill each and every guest request as much as possible. We strive hard to provide 100% guest satisfaction for our guests and we sincerely apologize if we fell short of that expectation. Your feedback is highly appreciated and it will surely help us in the further improvements of our hotel. Hopefully, you will still be open to staying again with us in the future.

Summary Heading: Totally recommend it - service, cleanliness, pool, breakfast
Summary: We stayed Sunday - Friday during Spring Break.  Loved it!!!!  These guys delivered excellent service and we had a very pleasant and fun trip.  During our trip they had a staff appreciation BBQ for exceeding their March rating goals -- I love seeing good work recognized and this made all of us smile.    Pros -  * Service from everyone was helpful, prompt, friendly, accommodating.   * Free laundry access - so helpful to wash the clothes -  * gift shop was a hit with the kids...they always enjoyed exploring in there * breakfast was great!  eggs, sausage, DIY waffles (these were really good), juice, fruit, oatmeal, parfaits, cold cereal, coffee....a nice spread to start the day * Tabby at the front desk - friendly, helpful, very welcoming * Inez housekeeper delighted kids by
Manager Response: Dear Naovelo,  Thank you for taking the time out to review the Country Inn & Suites, Anaheim! Thank you for letting the world know about our property and we hope we see you during your next visit to the Anaheim area!

Summary Heading: Disney Trip was better with with Country Inn and James
Summary: The staff is always very upbeat and quick to respond.  We had a few bumps that families have and the Country Inn team easily and quickly resolved them.    Breakfast was made even better each morning by James and the rest of the cheery staff. Always kept everything clean and refreshed.  Country Inn, Thanks to you all.
Manager Response: Dear Mick W,   Thank you for the 5 out of 5 rating! We appreciate your feedback and will definitely give James a pat on the back!

Summary: It’s a good hotel. Rooms are decent and clean for a family. Breakfast was not the best with little variety. Location is ok but a relatively long walk to shops and restaurants. Staff are friendly and helpful. The pool is very good.
Manager Response: Dear Shamseldin,  Thank you for the 4 out of 5 rating! We appreciate your feedback and look forward to a future visit.

Summary: Clean quiet rooms and this is actually an easy walk to Disney.  Some say they are but they aren't.  Good breakfast with very helpful staff.  Just wish the shampoo and conditioner was better!!  The little store in the lobby and fresh baked cookies were a nice touch.
Manager Response: Dear Cheryl R,  Thank you for reviewing the Country Inn & Suites, Anaheim. We are happy to hear you enjoyed our hot breakfast and fresh cookies!

Summary Heading: Spring Break stay with Baseball Team & Families⚾️
Summary: Fantastic Hotel for families and large groups‼️They helped me organize early into the planning and when we arrived they assisted me in all elements of the week long stay‼️An extra appreciation goes out to Alex and his kitchen crew with helping me brainstorm ideas for feeding the Players & Families.  They prepared a Pasta Bar and Nacho Bar that were fantastic👍The layout of the hotel is warm & friendly. All the employees were wonderful and extremely helpful.. Fantastic Spring Break location for our team and families‼️
Manager Response: Dear bazballmom,  Thank you for reviewing the Country Inn & Suites, Anaheim. We're happy to hear you and your team enjoyed your time with us and the delicious nacho bar! See you next time!

Summary: Nice clean hotel, beautiful pool, friendly staff.  The breakfast was average.  It would have been nice to see weekend breakfast hours all week.    Large school groups and teams there during our stay which caused challenges for finding our own spaces to eat breakfast, to navigate the common areas and to enjoy the pool.    Disappointed with no on site restaurant as advertised.  There was a bar with minimal bar style appetizers but that was it.
Manager Response: Dear B550,  Thank you for reviewing the Country Inn & Suites, Anaheim. We are currently looking into different ways to spice up our Bistro and bar. Thank you for your feedback and we look forward to your next visit.

Summary: The location for the hotel is great for those who are visiting the convention center or Disney. Mind you is it a legit 20 minute walk. I would suggest purchasing a bus pass that will take you from the hotel parking lot to the Disney entrance in no time. Our room was clean, breakfast was good. My only flaw is the bed. Not sure if it was just my room but the beds were not comfortable. It so uncomfortable that my friend suggested that the floor was a better option.
Manager Response: Dear Explorer41415647583,  Thank you for reviewing the Country Inn & Suites by Radisson. We're sorry to hear you did not have a good nights sleep. We understand how important rest is, especially while on vacation.

Summary: Wonderful room in a great location got to watch Disneyland fireworks from our parking lot Breakfast is awesome!!!!! Will definatly stay again We normally try to stay at Country Inn Suites whenever we travel.
Manager Response: Dear Steven D,  We are happy to hear you enjoyed your time with us! Thank you for reviewing the Country Inn & Suites and we look forward to your next visit.

Summary: We had a great stay here and will definitely come and stay here again.  Walking distance to Disneyland.  Quiet and very accommodating.  Beds were a little harder than we prefer but we managed.  Clean.  Breakfast buffet was an upgraded continental breakfast which was good for us but the food quality could have been better.  All in all we had a great trip and this hotel met all our expectations.
Manager Response: Dear Extraordinary553034,  Thank you for taking the time to review the Country Inn & Suites, Anaheim. We are delighted to hear you enjoyed your breakfast buffet.

Summary Heading: This hotel is very nice for vist Disney resort.
Summary: This hotel is very nice for visit the Disney resort.  I want to stay again when we go to the Disney resort. I don't know the price is good but Im satisfied. Thanks for all staff of the Country Inn & Suites by Radisson.
Manager Response: Dear Voyage066320243720,  Thank you for taking the time to review the Country Inn & Suites, Anaheim. We're happy to hear you enjoyed your time with us and look forward to your next visit.

Summary Heading: Great place to stay for Disneyland!
Summary: Hubby and I took our 15 and 11 year olds to Disneyland and stayed at Country Inn & Suites for 4 nights.  The pool was great, free breakfast was awesome except for the mushy eggs), room was clean and bigger than expected. The only disappointment was that the ART shuttle to the park was around $5/day per person.  The hotel does not offer their own shuttle.  We chose to just walk it all three days.  It was walkable, but our feet definitely felt it by the end of the trip.  In hindsight we probably should have paid for the shuttle.  We will definitely consider staying here again!
Manager Response: Dear tinazim,  Thank you for reviewing the Country Inn & Suites, Anaheim. We appreciate your feedback and look forward to your next visit.

Summary: Nice and close to Disneyland. Use public transportation for 5.50 a day.  Close to the Garden Walk with lots of good restaurants,   Slight freeway noise.  Good free breakfast. Very friendly staff  Pool looks nice,
Manager Response: Dear Seaside05746609380,  Thank you for reviewing the Country Inn & Suites, Anaheim!

Summary Heading: Definitely will we be returning with my family
Summary: If you are planning a family get away to Disney, I would highly recommend the country Inn. Every one there is so friendly and willing to help, the rooms are huge and the beds are extremely comfortable. The breakfast in the morning is great, And the making your own waffles idea is genius. They have a shuttle that will take you to the Disney parks which is Convenient. the gift shop has all your essential needs if you forget anything at home.
Manager Response: Dear AshleyMad,  Thank you for reviewing the Country Inn & Suites, Anaheim. We appreciate your feedback and kind words!

Summary: Had a Great time my kids were so Exited to be in the pool.  Location to disneyland is good. Nice precentation on breakfast. ------Chef Maximino Luis was so helpful. Very good place to stay and Clean. ✌🏻🌙
Manager Response: Dear FG S,  Thank you for the 5 out of 5 rating! We will give a special shout out to Maximino Luis!

Summary: “ one of the most of not the best well managed hotel in Anaheim. As a mother of two kids, you want to ensure you give hem the best. We found it in country inn and suites  Anaheim. The employees appear to genuinely care about the guests and although check In was speedy,  as a first time guest, I felt welcomed.” Breakfast was perfect, hot fresh and neither of two kids complained with the menu items.  We ordered pizza at their Bistro after fireworks from the pool and patio and my son and I watched a movie in their bean bag movies room. Very well managed and cared for. Hope the secrets not out and room rates go up. Highly recommend.”
Manager Response: Dear Chea L,  We are happy to hear you and you family enjoyed all the Country Inn & Suites has to offer. From our Kids' movie room to our fresh baked pizzas we aim to make every stay memorable!

Summary: I stayed for 7 nights with my 5yr old son for spring break vacation to visit Disneyland and thought the hotel was very adequate and the staff was very attentive and accommodating. However, upon my check out at 2am on my last night we walked out of our room to find some older man sleeping in the hall on the floor with his shoes off. It was a little scary with such a small child at that time of night/morning not knowing why he was there or how he got in the hotel. I was nervous to walk past him to get to the elevators not knowing if he was really asleep or what his intentions were. I told the girl at the front desk while we were checking out and she laughed and said that it was a security guard and that she would talk to him. Learning that the man who was sleeping in the floor
Manager Response: Dear Venture54185185065,   I want to thank you for spending your week-long Spring break vacation with the Country Inn & Suites by Radisson, Anaheim, I also want to sincerely apologize for the safety shortfall you experienced.  Upon further review, we had a youth group with us during your stay. The group also included adult chaperones who also doubled as ''security.'' While we do not employ a third-party company security officer, this youth group thought is wise to position these chaperones throughout the hotel to maintain order in hallways, ensure the youth were in the respective rooms and since they were minors, these chaperones who you came in contact was assigned to watch that floor. I assure you this is isolated incident of a large youth group hoping and planning to maintain order with the tens of youth in their group and who also wanted to ensure other guests like your self were comfortable.  I've just recently installed an extra layer of security with regard to elevator access which is engaged 24 hours a day, we have electronic access on each one of our entry points and my management staff and supervisors are constantly checking all security measures throughout their shifts.  I would like to apologize for the information you received over the phone and ask you speak with me at (714) 598-0600 xt 702. Safe Travels,   David Gutierrez

Summary: This hotel is only a 12 min walk to DL or DCA. Friendly staff, great customer service, breakfast has a lot of variety, hotel and rooms are very clean. Can see DL fireworks from room. Cookies at front desk weekday evenings, complimentary laundry, so much to love here!!
Manager Response: Dear parentsof3boys,  Thank you for taking the time to review the Country Inn & Suites. We happy to hear you enjoyed our fresh cookies and complimentary laundry services. See you next time!

Summary: This resort property is very clean and well managed.    Staff are friendly, attentive and take pride in their roles.  The rooms are clean, the beds are comfortable,TV's, Mini Fridge and Air Conditioning all work. The lobby is warm and inviting, the pool and hot tub are clean and well maintained. The breakfast buffet offers a variety of both hot and cold selections. Evening coffee, tea and cookies are available.  Parking is included and it is a 12 minute walk to Disneyland. Recommended for families, couples or business travellers.
Manager Response: Dear Sherpa32142511881,  Thank you for reviewing the Country Inn & Suites, Anaheim. We are happy with your comments and look forward to seeing you during your future travels.

Summary Heading: Top notch location for family vacation
Summary: If you are planning to descend on Anaheim for a family holiday, this hotel is within walking distance of the Disney properties but in itself is a very pleasant facility with great staff, upscale design, large heated pool and a welcome, varied breakfast buffet to start your day.  Also:  easy access to freeways if a day-trip elsewhere is desired.
Manager Response: Dear Dr_Michael905,  We are delighted to hear you enjoyed your time here at the Country Inn & Suites, Anaheim. We appreciate your feedback and look forward to your next visit.

Summary: Our hotel people went out of their way to make sure all 139 of us were comfortable and they were patient with middle school noise! Thank you so much to TABBY and all the staff we came in contact with! Walking to Disneyland from your hotel was sooo easy! And it’s close to restaurants and other types of dining or entertainment.
Manager Response: Dear Tcj14,  Thank you for the 5 out of 5 rating and shout out to Tabby!

Summary: Traveling with a large group of middle schoolers for a special trip to Anaheim. Hotel is beautiful and within walking distance of the park - no shuttles needed! Staff is great and incredibly tolerant of the young teens. GM David has been especially helpful. Friendly hellos from all staff members, from the chief engineer Federico, to Josh the bartender. Everyone has gone out of their way to ensure we are comfortable. And did I mention the view from the pool deck of the Disneyland fireworks? Perfect for those days when you can't quite make it so late in the park.   A great breakfast is included and the bistro serves awesome pizza in the evenings.
Manager Response: Dear Pamela M,  Thank you for reviewing the Country Inn & Suites, Anaheim. Your feedback is greatly appreciated and welcomed. We look forward to your next visit and will relay your kind words to David, Federico and Joshua!

Summary Heading: AWESOME HOTEL! Clean, Convenient, and Close to Disneyland
Summary: Booked a night here early in March for a family trip with my husband and two small children and we were very pleased. The receptionist and staff were very welcoming and accommodating. We highly recommend a room with a pool view and as a bonus your are able to see the nightly firework show that happens at Disneyland. The pool area was large and inviting although the weather was a little too cool for my small children there were older kids and adults having a good time. Our room was clean, spacious and modern, appreciated the warm mickey mouse shaped cookies that they had for us. We spent the our first evening at the Garden Walk which is a very short walk. Lots of shopping and dining options for everyone. We had a great night's rest in our comfortable bed and enjoy the
Manager Response: Deat TinaTina01,  Thank you for your amazing review of the Country Inn & Suites! We are delighted you and your family enjoyed your time with us and look forward to your next visit!

Summary: The inn was bright and fresh. But, the part that kept me going to the Country Inn's bistro every night, instead of a restaurant in disneyland, was Joshua. He is pleasant and really brings your energy up at the end of the night!
Manager Response: Dear marlowgunterman,  Thank you for staying at and reviewing the Country Inn & Suites, Anaheim! We appreciate your feedback. We'll definitely give Joshua a pat on the back!

Summary: Clean hotel. Staff was very helpful and polite. Free breakfast was great. Location to Disneyland was good. A bit of a walk, but not bad overall. Was worried about being next to the freeway, but did not hear it at all during my stay.
Manager Response: Dear Jeff H,   Thank you for taking the time to review the Country Inn & Suites, Anaheim. We appreciate your feedback and 5 out of 5 rating!

Summary Heading: Great place to stay for a Disney vacation
Summary: Compared to the price of other hotels, this was reasonably priced. The rooms were clean, the staff was friendly and, it felt very safe. It is a quick walk to Disneyland and to restaurants like the Cheesecake Factory and California Pizza Kitchen. The room was quiet and the beds were comfortable.  We would stay here again in a heartbeat!
Manager Response: Dear Connector1238332280,  We're happy to hear our proximity to the Disneyland Resort and Anaheim Garden Walk came in handy! Thank you for your review and we look forward to your next stay!

Summary Heading: Great hotel - from start to finish
Summary: This was a great hotel for our first Disneyland trip. The General Manager was visible everyday and great dealing with the front desk lady, the kitchen staff and to the pub staff.It was great to go to the pub for refreshments after a day at Disneyland park. The bartenders were great to deal with, knew their drinks and especially enjoyed hanging out with Joshua and Roman. Loved our conversations.
Manager Response: Dear TertGen,   Thank you for reviewing the Country Inn & Suites, Anaheim. We will definitely relay your kind words to Joshua and Roman!

Summary: New, clean, comfortable hotel.  Everyone was very friendly.  Big pool area, lots of parking. Decent breakfast to get you going for the day.  In a convenient area close to Disneyland and I-5 off and on ramps . Would definitely stay there again.
Manager Response: Dear Ethel G,  Thank you for the 5 out of 5 review! See you next time!

Summary: We enjoyed our five night stay. Staff were friendly and helpful, hotel was clean, and room was comfortable. Close to Disneyland (walking distance or short Uber ride), very close to Garden Walk. We enjoyed the pool area, and buffet breakfast was good. Would definitely return!
Manager Response: Dear Voyage49005774737,  Thank you for reviewing the Country Inn & Suites, Anaheim. We're glad to your our proximity to the Disneyland Resort came in handy. Thank you for your comments and we look forward to your next visit!

Summary Heading: Quiet and easy walk to disney
Summary: Hotel is well kept and walking distance to Disney.  Pool looked nice and bar area well kept.  Mornings were a bit crazy as the breakfast area fills fast with Disney goers.  Front desk suggestion for authentic Mexican was excellent.  Overall good. A little issue with housekeeping not fully supplying our room one day but the desk sent supplies when the issue was pointed out. Would suggest this hotel for nice way to end a long Disney day.
Manager Response: Dear bcbarons,   Thank you for reviewing the Country Inn & Suites, Anaheim. We appreciate your feedback and hope to see you during your next visit to the Anaheim area.

Summary: Good location. Breakfast had a good selection. People were friendly. If you are looking for a place to stay that’s within walking distance to Disneyland I would recommend this place. We have stayed here a couple of times and never had major issues.
Manager Response: Dear 647rtvp,  Thank you for reviewing the Country Inn & Suites, Anaheim. We're happy to hear you enjoyed your visit.

Summary: Overall great experience.  About a 10 to 15 minute walk to gates of Disney.  Rooms were great and updated.  Breakfast was as good as any of the hotels around.  Good value for the price.  My kids swam in the pool/hot tub and said it was great (they are older).  Very few complaints and would stay there again for sure.
Manager Response: Dear Sightsee22325840045,  Thank you for reviewing the Country Inn & Suites, Anaheim and thank you for the 5 out of 5 rating!

Summary: Our stay and country inn and suites was very nice. Hospitality was wonderful. Had a good breakfast everyday. The staff was extremely helpful. They even had free laundry service so you didn't have to pack dirty clothes to take home.  The rooms were cleaned daily.  I was worried about our room being next to the elevators. But it was surprisingly quiet. Would definitely stay here again.
Manager Response: Dear Erica W,  Thank you for reviewing the Country Inn & Suites, Anaheim. It's great to hear you took advantage of our free laundry services. Just one of the many amenities we have to offer. We look forward to your next visit!

Summary Heading: Like new, spacious rooms, very nice breakfast, close to Disneyland
Summary: Hotel is a couple years old, but it looks new.  Rooms were quite large and included mini fridge and microwave.  There was a breakfast buffet included.  There is a small gift shop on site that sells convenience items, a (very) small selection of food, snacks, and drinks (including beer).  Bar has a happy hour in the evening.  Pool and hot tub outdoors were nicer than many.  Location was very close to interstate, but the rooms were very, very quite.  A little pricey, but worth it.
Manager Response: Dear mr_b_6805,   Thank you for taking the time to review the Country Inn & Suites, Anaheim. We are happy to hear you enjoyed all we have to offer. See you next time!

Summary: Wonderful experience from start to finish!  Great customer service and accommodating to  our changing needs.  The rooms were immaculate and updated.  Very nice variety for breakfast and close to Disneyland many restaurants.
Manager Response: Dear Shayna D,  Thank you for reviewing the Country Inn & Suites, Anaheim. We are delighted to hear you enjoyed our rooms and our breakfast. We appreciate your feedback and look forward to your next visit!

Summary: This is our second time staying here. We love the location because we can walk to Disneyland. We enjoyed the pool and food this stay. Our server was Josh in the bar and I have to say he was super polite and very helpful. Good service isn’t easy to find anymore but he went above and beyond to help make our stay enjoyable. Rooms are decent and clean. Beer is a little over priced at $9.00 for domestic but we would stay here again in the future.
Manager Response: Dear chrystal06,  Thank you for reviewing the Country Inn & Suites, Anaheim. It's awesome to hear you enjoyed your time with us. We will definitely forward your comments to Joshua!

Summary: My daughter and I were here for 3 nights and treated with so much care and felt very welcome! The rooms were nice and big. The lobby and lounge was also very spacious and offered cozy couches and seating with books to borrow and a bar with friendly service...thx Paula! We highly recommend this hotel! It's only 8 mins walking distance from the parks and across the street from a large outdoor shopping mall with restaurants!
Manager Response: Dear Vkirk123,  Thank you for the 5 out of 5 rating!

Summary Heading: Fantastic customer service and a great value!
Summary: Our family rented three rooms at the Country Inn and Suites for a recent trip to Disneyland in February, and we were all quite impressed with the quality of the hotel at this price point. The hotel rooms were clean, spacious, and well-appointed. Breakfast is included with the cost of your room, and that certainly helped to cut food costs during the trip. The fresh fruit and waffles were family favorites. The location is great as well, as I'd estimate that it's approximately a 10-12 minute walk to the gates of Disneyland. The absolute best part of our stay was the customer service. The staff were incredibly friendly and so helpful whenever we had questions or needed anything. We were so impressed, that we mentioned our experience to the hotel manager and he seemed to genuinely
Manager Response: Dear WhoDatToCA,   Thank you for taking the time to review the Country Inn & Suites, Anaheim. We are happy to hear you enjoyed your time with us. We'll definitely give a well deserved pat on the back to Fernando, Tabby and David! Thank you for your feedback and we look forward to your next visit!

Summary: Super gorgeous pool, outside abiance was so relaxing!♥️ Josh was so helpful and pleasant!  🙌🏽 Food was pretty and so tasty! Beds were so comfy! Highly recommend!   From the Fresno Cheer moms and cute besties! 😘
Manager Response: Dear ambera710,  Thank you for your 5 out of 5 rating! We will relay your kind words to Josh!

Summary Heading: Great hotel pitty about the breakfast!
Summary: I found the Country Inn & Suites to be a great hotel for a business trip. The rooms were huge! I was given a room with two queen size beds in it which turned out to be very handy to have the extra space to store things on the bed. The desk came in very handy and I was able to get work done easily. I really appreciated the charging points near the bed for my phone. The only negative is that the breakfasts were awful. I have food intolerances and was limited to eating the dried out potato gems and sausages which were very unappealing. There were no milk alternatives on offer, nor was there any gluten free bread. I managed to survive on porridge which I wouldn't normally eat, but I had to have something! So besides that, the hotel was great and the service staff were very
Manager Response: Dear Happiness25822998085,  Thank you for reviewing the Country Inn & Suites, Anaheim. Your feedback is much appreciated and will be forwarded to the appropriate department leader. Thank you for the 4 out of 5 rating and we look forward to the possibility of wowing you in the future.

Summary: Loved the hotel and staff. Room was clean and beds comfortable. Breakfast was great and pool area was beautiful although not as heated as we would have liked. Short walk to Disneyland park and shuttle available if needed. All around a good experience!!! :)
Manager Response: Dear Tour55157223436,  Thank you for reviewing the Country Inn & Suites, Anaheim. We are delighted to hear you had a good experience. We appreciate your feedback and look forward to your next visit!

Summary: The desk clerks, maid service and restaurant staff were very accommodating and kind. I switched hotels on the arrival date and the reservation clerks didn’t hesitate to find a room for my family and I.  The room was clean, there was a variety of breakfast foods available each morning with beverages,   10 minutes walking distance from Disney and across the street from a number of restaurants.   I enjoyed my stay and would recommend it for family visits. In the evenings there was fresh coffee and cookies out for the guests.
Manager Response: Dear Debra W,  Thank you for reviewing the Country Inn & Suites, Anaheim. We appreciate the 5 out of 5 rating and look forward to your next visit! We'll be sure to have plenty of hot coffee and fresh cookies!

Summary Heading: You get what you pay for
Summary: Proximity to Disneyland was excellent, most other components were average. Room was comfortable, breakfast was below average, cost of alcohol & extras was very high. Shower was good but overflow due to lack of door was disappointing as too was Lack of god Towels
Manager Response: Dear Rob1358,  Thank you for reviewing the Country Inn & Suites, Anaheim. We appreciate your feedback and look into ways to jazz up our breakfast selection. We look forward to the opportunity to wow you during your next visit to the Anaheim area.

Summary: This handsome guy was a very accommodating and took care of our every need with no hesitation and a smile. Love this place! We stayed here because we are going to Disneyland for the entire week. I hope Joshua is working every day we are here.
Manager Response: Dear Kevin P,  We're happy to hear you enjoyed your time with us! We'll definitely pass your shout out to Joshua!

Summary: Such amazing customer service from everyone in the hotel. Specially the bartender Joshua made my family experience an amazing one. Everything within the hotel lobby and parking lot is clean, rooms were amazing - can’t ask for anything better. Can’t wait to return!
Manager Response: Dear X1699DAchristinap,  Thank you for the 5 out of 5 rating! We will relay your shout out to Joshua!

Summary: Clean rooms, friendly staff, short walk: what else could you ask for on a disneyland vacation? Joshua in the bar was SO wonderful - he answered all my questions, brought my food out quick, and was overall a sight for sore eyes after a long day of travel.
Manager Response: Dear mkaustin18,  Thank you for reviewing the Country Inn & Suites, Anaheim. We hare extremely happy to hear you enjoyed your stay and we will relay your message to Joshua!

Summary: I would give this 3.5 stars. This hotel is close to Disneyland, the Anaheim Convention Center, and the GardenWalk. I stayed here to go to Disneyland, and it was a very short Lyft ride over. I did have an issue my first night, where all the plugs except the one on the desk decided not to work. However, when I brought it up the next morning, all the outlets worked, and they even gave me a chocolate wrench for my trouble. Sadly I don't know how it tastes because I forgot it in my room! The staff is friendly and willing to help. The only other notes I have is the bed and pillows were uncomfortable, but that is often a matter of personal opinion. I also wish the Fitness center had a weight section. Its basically a few elliptical, which I didn't use since I was walking in Disneyland
Manager Response: Dear Hillary P,  Thank you for reviewing the Country Inn & Suites, Anaheim. We are happy to hear you enjoyed your time with us.

Summary: If we come to Anaheim again I WILL stay here. I felt safe and very comfortable. Walking to the park took 10 minutes or a quick Uber drive. Hotel is clean and friendly. Carts to take luggage to your room were readily available. Breakfast was good and easy for families. This was a place that felt comfortable for business or with families. I wasn’t overwhelmed by small children in the public areas but also when my kids were with us, we felt comfortable. Staff was wonderful!
Manager Response: Dear Voyage730395,  Thank you for reviewing the Country Inn & Suites, Anaheim! We're glad to hear you enjoyed your time with us and look forward to your next visit.

Summary Heading: Room and bed comfortable, hot breakfast below average, noisy freeway, resort fee
Summary: Large comfortable king bed suite. Bed is comfortable with selection of pillow types. Noisy morning freeway traffic starts early. Resort fee increases cost above advertised rate by over 20 bucks per night. Sub-standard scrambled eggs (foam-like) and bacon (slimy/wet), but otherwise excellent breakfast. Room includes a safe. Refrigerator enclosure door was loose or broken, but otherwise room was in good condition. This hotel is the last ART shuttle stop, and the route doesn't start until 8am, so plan on a long walk in the morning to disney. Top-notch service and staff.
Manager Response: Dear 0x00_DEADBEEF,  Thank you for the 4 out of 5 rating. We appreciate your feedback.

Summary: I frequent Disneyland quiet often, as I have the top Disney annual pass. Even though I live close by, I enjoy staying the night to get an extra day. If I'm not staying at the actual DIsneyland Hotels, I will stay at one around the area. Over the years, I have stayed at a majority of the hotels around disneyland. I can say without a doubt, this hotel is the BEST hotel to stay at if you are visiting disneyland.  Location: It's just a short 2 block walk to the disneyland entrance. Since it's located to the east of disneyland, it's not a crowded walk either. When I mean short, it's less than 10 minutes. It's faster to walk to this hotel than a walking from the park to the Mickey and friends parking lot.  Rooms: The rooms are nice. They are well maintained. Much nicer than other
Manager Response: Dear angela j,  Thank you for your feedback and all your kind words. We will definitely give Fernando a pat on the back!

Summary: Loved our stay. Friendly staff, good location, delicious breakfast buffet. It’s about one block from Disneyland. We walked to and from park both days. Their breakfast buffet had a good variety, there was something each member of my family to enjoyed. Had plenty of Peking spaces, and beds were very comfortable.
Manager Response: Dear Road58925269174,  Thank you for reviewing the Country Inn & Suites, Anaheim. Thank you for the 5 out of 5 rating!

Summary: This hotel is an excellent place to stay if you want a nice clean hotel close to Disneyland. My wife and I came up from South OC for a date night without the kids. It has been forever since we both went to Disneyland without kids and got to ride the rides we wanted to. We call in the morning to see if we could check in early and the hotel was able to get a room prepared! We had a fantastic night and the hotel being so close by was definitely a benefit when we got soaked on splash mountain and had to go back and get dry close. We plan on coming back again with the kids in summer as they appear to have a great pool as well. I would certainly recommend this hotel.
Manager Response: Dear Ben H,  Thank you for reviewing the Country Inn & Suites, Anaheim. Thank you for recommending our hotel and we look forward to your next visit!

Summary: This is a great place to stay. Excellent staff and facilities! The pool and hot tub clean and warm.This hotel is within walking distance of Disneyland and California Adventure. If we go back to disney we will stay there again.
Manager Response: Dear Jet54670567121,  Thank you for taking the time to review the Country Inn & Suites by Radisson, Anaheim. Thank you for staying with us and we look forward to your next visit!

Summary Heading: Great hotel within walking distance to Parks
Summary: Breakfast was some of the best complimentary breakfasts I have had at any hotel.  Rooms were good and clean enough for a high traffic hotel.  Free parking along with additional underground parking was a huge plus.
Manager Response: Dear Voyage39842842623,  Thank you for the 5 out of 5 rating!

Summary: We stayed for a full week at this hotel and enjoyed it so much. We were left a card, cookies and champagne as a gift to welcome us and everyone was so friendly. Everything was clean and the atmosphere is perfect.
Manager Response: Dear Venture04137070002,  Thank you for reviewing the Country Inn & Suite, Anaheim. We are delighted to hear you enjoyed your honeymoon with us.

Summary: The hotel is located next to I-5 so you should know that there will be freeway noise.  One previous guest described the hum of the freeway as white noise, a perfect explanation.  The hotel is a 15-20 minute walk from Disney's main gate, not bad in the morning, a killer at the end of the day.  The Garden Walk, a shopping center with restaurants is a five minute walk and the convention center is a 20 minute walk. The room and breakfast were exactly what I expected for a hotel of this type. Breakfast on Saturday starts at 7:00 AM, the same time Disney opens if you have a hopper pass that allows an early morning entrance.  Then there is the dreaded resort fee that was not disclosed when I made the reservation but was not surprised when it showed up on my bill, 15.00 per day.  Sort
Manager Response: Dear Resort53956403471,  Thank you for reviewing the Country Inn & Suites, Anaheim. We are happy you enjoyed your time with us.

Summary: My fiancé and I came here to celebrate our 4th anniversary and had an amazing experience at this hotel. This hotel was very clean and to top it all off they offered a free full breakfast. Joshua was our bartender at the hotel and he gave us the best customer service experience that I’ve had in a very long time. Because of Joshua’s amazing customer service at the bar the beautiful hotel and it’s proximity to Disneyland we will definitely be coming here again and I highly recommend this hotel.
Manager Response: Dear cierac2323,  Thank you for reviewing the Country Inn & Suites, Anaheim. We appreciate your feedback and will relay your kind words to Joshua.

Summary: Visiting Disneyland was exciting, but staying at this hotel made everything about our trip exceptional. The staff is very helpful, patient and compassionate. This hotel was recommended to us, and they were spot on! Thank you Country Inn Anaheim
Manager Response: Dear Happytravellersharon,  Thank you for the 5 out of 5 rating! We appreciate your feedback and look forward to your next visit!

Summary: Check in was quick and easy.  Food and bar service was amazing... Joshua was a great bartender and provide great service!  We will definitely be back to enjoy the great atmosphere and it is also close to the parks and other attractions.
Manager Response: Dear Vramirez2209,  Thank you for taking the time to review the Country Inn & Suites, Anaheim. We will definitely relay your kind words to Joshua!

Summary: This property is located about 3 1/2 blocks from Disneyland. My room was a mini suite with a king size bed, very comfortable. The staff are friendly and accommodating. Breakfast was really good with make-your-own waffles, scrambled eggs, bacon, potatoes, etc. The pool looks very inviting even though I did not use it since it was  February and Disneyland was calling! There's also a parking garage which is complimentary. I would definitely stay here again.
Manager Response: Dear bonsky64,  Thank you for reviewing the Country Inn & Suites, Anaheim. We're looking forward to your next visit!

Summary: The Staff are wonderful.  They are super friendly, helpful, and professional.  They always greet me with a smile and make me feel welcome.  The amenities (parking, pool, hot tub, bar & bistro, free breakfast, free parking) and location make this the perfect place to stay.
Manager Response: Dear Cheryl E E,  Thank you for reviewing the Country Inn & Suites, Anaheim. We are delighted to hear our staff was so welcoming! We appreciate your time and look forward to your next visit.

Summary: Very good hotel, good location close to Disney & restaurants ( all within walking distance). Staff friendly and helpful. Rooms clean & light and big bathrooms. Free Wifi  Good selection of breakfast foods.
Manager Response: Dear Mobile51231153302,  Thank you for the 5 out of 5 rating!

Summary: I stayed with my family for 2 nights while visiting Disneyland. The location was perfect with a shuttle service to Disney. The lobby was very spacious and welcoming. The staff were friendly and the rooms were clean and modern. The breakfast was fabulous
Manager Response: Dear Julienne G,  Thank you for reviewing the Country Inn & Suites, Anaheim. We are happy to hear you enjoyed our hotel and breakfast!

Summary: Stayed here last week. Was put off at first as front desk weren't very friendly or helpful. But the rooms are spacious and clean. Great location for Disneyland and Gardenwalk.  Breakfast was provided, unfortunately the food is below average. Also had dinner here one night and it was almost inedible. It was nice to see the manager talking to guests and cleaning up around the place.
Manager Response: Dear Teegs2302,  Thank you for your review on the Country Inn & Suites, Anaheim!

Summary Heading: Love the Staff and the Hotel
Summary: This hotel was really great. Beautiful lobby, nice rooms, nice pool, great breakfast and the best staff ever! The customer service and friendliness at this hotel was just amazing. They treat you as if you are staying at a 5 star hotel. We really enjoyed staying here. Great staff!
Manager Response: Dear Christine D,  We appreciate you reviewing the Country Inn & Suites, Anaheim. We are happy to hear you enjoyed your time with us and thank you for the 5 out of 5 rating!

Summary: We stayed at this hotel for three days a week ago while visiting Disneyland and California Adventure Park from CT. Everyone was super nice and helpful. The general manager, David, asked about our stay while I was checking. He seems to be a very capable manager. Tabotu Amare at the front desk is just fabulous. Super nice.  The outdoor pool is heated. My kids had fun swimming while it was raining outside. They even have a couple of washers and dryers for the guests. Bring some detergent if you plan to do laundry. You can buy it from the front desk.  Highly recommend to anyone who goes to the parks.  A short walk from the park entrance.  Can't beat the location.
Manager Response: Dear Catherine_06840,  Thank you for reviewing the Country Inn & Suites, Anaheim. We appreciate your feedback and will relay your kind words to our amazing General Manager, David.

Summary: Great hotel just wish the beds/pillows were more comfortable other than that everything was great. Breakfast was awesome and was close enough to Disney to walk or short trip in the car. Everyone was very friendly!
Manager Response: Dear matabriana,  We appreciate your review of the Country Inn & Suites, Anaheim. Thank you for your time and 5 out of 5 rating!

Summary: My family came to this hotel after i researched for months.  It always seemed to be different when u get to a hotel...  from the pictures.  BuT this is just like stated.   The owner actually interacts with staff and the guests.  He was so very friendly.   Paula...our bartender was so nice!!!!   She was great with our son and very friendly with a great smile. Location to park was great.  Could see fire works from our room...4th floor.  Played some games from their collection while having a drink.    The pool area was great.   Hotel very clean.   Reception were all so friendly and noticed when we came in and out of hotel...asking how our day was!!! Spectacular memories here.  I apprecite how friendly all the staff are.   We live im canada and this trip was expensive.   But it was
Manager Response: Dear Tourist276287,   Thank you for reviewing the Country Inn & Suites, Anaheim. We appreciate your feedback and will relay your kind words to Paola.

Summary Heading: Beautiful Hotel, Exceptional Service, Close Walk to Disney
Summary: This hotel is our new go-to spot when we visit Disneyland (2 stays here so far). There is not one negative thing I can say about this hotel. It is only a 10 minute walk (or 5 minute run) down nice wide sidewalks to the park entrance. The rooms are really large with plenty of space to spread out, park our stroller, setup a playpen, etc... and the kids still have room to run around.  The included (free) buffet breakfast is a great plus, saving us ~$50+ if we were to eat the same meal in the park. The food, variety of choices, and service is great. Some food options change daily, but there is always eggs, potatoes, waffles, fruit, a variety of cereals, toast, yogurt, granola, biscuits and gravy, all sorts of juices, milk, coffee, and more.   All the staff are amazingly friendly,
Manager Response: Dear webb747,  Thank you for reviewing the Country Inn & Suites by Radisson, Anaheim. We appreciate your comments and feedback! Thank you for the 5 out of 5 rating!

Summary Heading: Newer hotel with excellent complimentary breakfast!
Summary: This is one of the best hotels I have stayed at in recent years! Only a ten minute walk to Disneyland entrance, the hotel was built recently, the rooms are large and modern, the shower was huge, the complimentary full breakfast buffet was absolutely delicious, the staff and service is excellent, free wifi, and the gift shop was convenient. In the evening, there is complimentary cookies, coffee, tea, and hot chocolate. I am very impressed with everything offered and I will definitely be returning to this hotel. The location is convenient. A couple blocks away is a walgreen and CVS, 7-11, restaurants, etc.
Manager Response: Dear OnAir11088513719,  Thank you for reviewing the Country Inn & Suites, Anaheim. We are delighted to hear you enjoyed everything the Hotel has to offer and our proximity to the necessary vendors. Thank you for your feedback and we look forward to your next visit to the Anaheim area.

Summary: The rooms are impeccably clean and very spacious.  Staff are very friendly and responsive to any requests.  The wholesome breakfast is amazing - lots of wholesome options.  Luis Maximino, the Chef, created a lovely “spread” for our family - pizzas, chicken wings, etc.  The pool is a big hit and the complimentary laundry is a bonus. Access to Disneyland is great - a 10 minute walk.  Highly recommend this hotel.
Manager Response: Dear Isabel H,  Thank you for reviewing the Country Inn & Suites, Anaheim. We will definitely relay your kind words to Maximino!

Summary: We booked only for one night, but I wanted to stay an extra night because its exhausting taking young children to Disneyland. They were completely booked when I checked in on Friday.  However the person working on the front desk said that she would keep her eye out if there's a cancellation and the let me know. We went to Downtown Disney Friday even and got dinner. During dinner, the person at the front desk called and left a voice mail that there was a cancellation and I would be able to stay a second night. She held the reservation for me and when I got back, I was able to pay for a second night. The price was even comparable to the price I paid on-line. They were so helpful.
Manager Response: Dear Guide59466881943,  Thank you for reviewing the Country Inn & Suites, Anaheim. We're happy to hear you enjoyed your time with us! Thank you for your feedback and we look forward to your next visit!

Summary: This is one of the best hotels I have ever stayed in. Rooms are spacious and clean. Staff is friendly and helpful.  Breakfast has many options and the food is fresh. We will definitely be back. Our family used  12 rooms and everyone was more than satisfied.
Manager Response: Dear Excursion63007607356,  Thank you for reviewing the Country Inn & Suites, Anaheim. We appreciate your feedback and look forward to your next visit!

Summary: The breakfast bar was delicious.  Here in California celebrating my birthday and was looking for one of my favorite breakfast foods....biscuits and sausage gravy.  Ask Maximimo Luis if it was on the menu today.  It wasn't but he was able to get a special batch made for me when he heard it was my favorite.   Made my day! Thank you.
Manager Response: Dear NICOLE R,  Thank you for reviewing the Country Inn & Suites, Anaheim. We are happy to hear Maximino took such good care of you!

Summary: We have been to Anaheim many, many times... Stayed in many hotels and gone to the in house bars.  The attention and service that we received here from Veronica, Paula, and Joshua has been spectacular. Come for the drinks and stay for the fun and great atmosphere...
Manager Response: Dear KevintK6748NK,   Thank you for the 5 out of 5 rating! We will relay your kind words to Veronica, Paola and Joshua.

Summary: Recently stayed here for two nights for our day at Disney. The location is ideal and close walking distance to the Anaheim Garden Walk and Disneyland.   Hotel is brand new and loved the extra touches such as the fireplace in the lobby and the pool was very nice as well. Great to have the free parking too!  All of the staff there were friendly and welcoming. The cookies at the front desk are amazing. We were disappointed when we went to get more cookies as the front desk told us that they had to remove them because a parent was complaining their child wouldn't eat their breakfast because of the cookies. I don't understand why the hotel would remove all the cookies just because a parent can't tell their child no? Anyhow, I'm not meaning to be negative, but hopefully they put them
Manager Response: Dear bellasnow,  Thank you for taking the time to review the Country Inn & Suites by Radisson, Anaheim. We appreciate your feedback and are looking into linen alternatives. Thank you for the 5 out of 5 rating! We're looking forward to your next visit.

Summary Heading: EXCELLENT HOTEL with DREAMY PROXIMITY TO DISNEYLAND
Summary: We typically stay on-property when visiting a Disney Theme Park/Resort.   This trip we opted for off-property in the interest of budget and were a bit nervous -- Happy to report we had an EXCELLENT experience with Country Inn & Suites by Radisson, Anaheim.  The staff was incredibly kind, helpful and hospitable.  The full, hot breakfast (included in price) was fantastic (including the coffee - critical!)  The room was clean, the bed and pillows were so comfortable.  The best part was the proximity to Disneyland -- So easy to get to/from park - approx. 15 min walk.  This was a big experiment for us -- And we are READY TO RETURN.   We will absolutely be visiting again this fall - this time, bringing with us our two teen boys.  SideNote: the King Suite is HUGE.   With a fold out
Manager Response: Dear Maps10251362409,  Thank you for reviewing the Country Inn & Suites, Anaheim. We are happy to hear you enjoyed everything from our hot breakfast to our proximity to the Disneyland Resort. We appreciate your feedback and look forward to your next visit.

Summary Heading: Perfect for a trip to Disney
Summary: I can't fault this place. Checked out today after a 3 night stay. I stayed here with my family, it was a 10 minute walk to the park but buses are there if you don't fancy a walk.   Breakfast didn't have a massive variety but had cereal, toast, eggs etc. Breakfast service was great, Miguel was really good.  Room was clean and very spacious and reception staff always answered promptly.   Really perfect hotel for the stay!   Thank you
Manager Response: Dear Alwayswithchilderen,  Thank you for reviewing the Country Inn & Suites by Radisson and thank you for the 5 out of 5 rating!

Summary: New hotel within walking distance of the Disney parks but the best part is their service!  Was especially impressed by the servers working the (free) breakfast (James, Robert & Miguel).  Every morning their big smiles and customer focused approach really started our day off right...thanks!!
Manager Response: Dear LadybirdAZ,  Thank you for reviewing the Country Inn & Suites by Radisson, Anaheim. We appreciate your kind words and will relay your message to James, Robert and Miguel.

Summary: Clean hotel with free breakfast and parking. All the other hotels right across from Disney are not as clean as this one, the extra 10 minute walk to the park is worth it. Very friendly staff as well. Will be staying here from now on.
Manager Response: Dear Wanderer30494458841,  Thank you for reviewing the Country Inn & Suites, Anaheim. We are happy to hear you enjoyed your time with us and look forward to your next visit to the Disneyland Resort area.

Summary Heading: Great hotel easy walk to Disney
Summary: This hotel is a great option for visiting Disneyland. Might be more pricey than other hotels in the area, but worth it in my opinion.  Pros: -Breakfast!!! it was delicious and well laid out, hot and cold options. Very clean buffet and eating area, even an adjoining TV room for the kids so parents can linger over their coffee and plan out the day. Tons of excellent staff restocking food and clearing tables. -Bar and cafe was also great. we came back from Disney at 8pm and we were all hungry, able to order a fresh made pizza and bring it up to our room, tho there was plenty of seating if you wanted to stay down and eat -Rooms are standard size, but super clean, very nice bathrooms, hair dryer etc. Beds were comfortable and room temperature was not an issue.  -Check in and out was
Manager Response: Dear Roam02148504242,  We are happy to hear you enjoyed your time with us. Thank you for reviewing the Country Inn & Suites, Anaheim and we look forward to your next visit.

Summary: Clean room, lots of space. So-so water pressure and TV remote didn't work,  it was a short stay so didn't attempt to bring to staff attention. Was still very happy with choice and will stay again, if I can get on a deal again
Manager Response: Dear Daydream45914991206,  Thank you for reviewing the Country Inn & Suites, Anaheim. We appreciate your feedback and hope we can make your next visit a 5 out of 5 stay!

Summary: Could get 5 stars without the freeway location and better bath towels (they were like garage rags). The location is very convenient to Disneyland. Lots of kids, so probably not a good choice if you are on business.
Manager Response: Dear Boxztsr,  Thank you for reviewing the Country Inn & Suites, Anaheim. We appreciate your feedback and look forward to your next visit.

Summary: We loved staying here. Our room was modern, clean & comfortable. Breakfast was delicious w/lots of variety. The staff was friendly, and there was plenty of parking. And, only a short walk to Disneyland - it took us about 13 minutes from from the security checkpoint to the hotel, even when we were exhausted after a long day at the parks. We will definitely stay again and recommend to our friends!
Manager Response: Dear Sightsee36054900204,  Thank you for reviewing the Country Inn & Suites, Anaheim. We are happy to hear you had a comfortable stay! See you next time!

Summary: The service was excelent, our room clean and very close to the location Disneyland. We had breakfast enough to last until afternoon. As I said the location is very close to Disneyland so we walked and had no worries about parking. Overall service was excelent!
Manager Response: Dear Report29827250251,   Thank you for reviewing the Country Inn & Suites, Anaheim. We are delighted to hear you enjoyed your time with us! Thank you for the feedback and 5 out of 5 rating!

Summary: Super clean. Great Location( 10 min walk to disneyland gates). Pool was great after being in Disneyland all day. Coffee tea and cookies always available, making for a homey experiance. Continental breakfast was perfect to full up on before a day of leisure.
Manager Response: Dear Paige C,  Thank you for reviewing the Country Inn & Suites, Anaheim. We appreciate your feedback and look forward to your next visit.

Summary: Very friendly & helpful staff. Good food at the restaurant/bar. Kids loved the pizza. Pretty good breakfast if you don’t have dairy & gluten allergies! (I just loaded up on protein for our long day at the parks!) Complimentary washer & dryer and they sell soap in their gift shop. My kids weren’t letting 52 degrees and gusty winds stop them from the awesome heated pool. Thank you to the awesome staff for firing up the heaters for us freezing moms sitting pool side!
Manager Response: Dear Mobile65032276952,  Thank you for your feedback and taking the time to review your stay at the Country Inn & Suites, Anaheim. Your suggestions are appreciated and helps us make the necessary changes to better accommodate our guests. Thank you and we're looking forward to your next visit.

Summary: LOVE this hotel!  Loved everything about it!  The beds were great, the breakfast was delicious, and we loved the free hot chocolate at night after getting back from Disneyland in the cold!  Everyone at the hotel is very friendly!  It’s just a short walk to Disneyland, but if you want to take the shuttle it practically stops at the front door. Love that it has underground parking and a laundry room. This hotel has it all!  Love, love, love it!  Can’t wait to go back again and again!  Fredrico at the front desk was especially kind and helpful!
Manager Response: Thank you for reviewing the Country Inn & Suites, Anaheim. We appreciate your feedback and look forward to relaying your kind words to Federico!

Summary: People very friendly and hotel was well kept. Fitness room was clean and breakfast was busy, but great. Location very key as well. Quiet at night as well. Overall it was a great place to stay and pricing was reasonable.
Manager Response: Thank you for reviewing the Country Inn & Suites, Anaheim. We are happy to hear you enjoyed your time with us. See you next time!

Summary: We stay here every year for a convention. Nice, new, contemporary hotel, very friendly staff, comfortable rooms. Only negative is the evening "dining experience", but even so, we will most likely come back next year-and eat somewhere else.
Manager Response: Dear Chrisanna667,   Thank you for reviewing the Country Inn & Suites, Anaheim and thank you for the 5 out of 5 rating!

Summary: I was late coming down for breakfast, the eating area had already closed and Max was kind enough to go put one together for me and bring it out to me. It made the difference of missing breakfast or a meeting, much appreciated Max!
Manager Response: Dear Buck S,  Thank you for reviewing the Country Inn & Suites, Anaheim. We will definitely share your kind words with Max!

Summary: Amazing hotel from checkin to pool to location. Easy walk to the front gates of Disneyland in about 10 mins and great hotel to watch the fireworks from your room. Staff are super helpful and friendly, go out of their way to make sure you have everything you need. Only complaint, which is a small one but the towels are the pool are extremely small......more like a tea towel. You have to walk through the bar area to get back to your room so having a towel that doesn’t cover you much isn’t that great. Overall this was an amazing vacation and would most definitely come again.
Manager Response: Dear Discover42488556523,  Thank you for reviewing the Country Inn & Suites, Anaheim. We appreciate your feedback and are happy to hear you'll visit us again!

Summary: Just got home from what was supposed to be a 2 day stay, but turned into a 3 day stay because we enjoyed the property so much. Even with Disneyland close by we ended up staying in the hotel until 6pm one day (with a 5 year old! She didn't want to go to Disneyland, she wanted to stay at the hotel! THIS SAYS SOMETHING!).  Highlights: - Brand new property so everything is fresh, clean and well maintained.  - Employees are wonderful! Literally everyone we encountered was friendly and went above and beyond to make our trip nice. The bartender Leo (I think that was his name) heard it was my daughter's birthday and called her as Mickey Mouse!! Chermine (I'm bad with names) took time to chat with my daughter about her where she was from (Cairo). They also left us special Mickey shaped
Manager Response: Dear sb0323,  Thank you for reviewing the Country Inn & Suites, Anaheim. We are delighted to hear you and your family enjoyed your time with us. Both Leo and Cherine deserve pats on the back for making you and yours feel at home. Thank you for the 5 out of 5 rating and we hope to see you during your next Disneyland Resort visit.

Summary Heading: Great location to Disney & quality stay.
Summary: Overall we were looking for a location close to Disney. This hotel was a 15 min walk and offered shuttle services. Vehicle parking and breakfast included is a plus. Breakfast was good and the kids area/tv was an added bonus. Coffee available throughout the day and multiple TV’s/pounding area in the lobby to pass by the time. Our 2 Queen room was standard. The in-room television offered multiple channels and options. We also had a microwave/fridge, but did not end up using. We would definitely stay again.
Manager Response: Dear Connector52512083168,  Thank you for reviewing the Country Inn & Suites, Anaheim. We try to have all the amenities you'd find at home. We look forward to your next visit.

Summary Heading: Best place to stay in Anaheim!
Summary: Amazing location that is very close to Disneyland. Heated pool/hot tub were awesome for the cold January winters in Cali. Wifi was free and had great connection. Parking was great. Staff were friendly. Rooms were clean and modern. 10/10 would stay again.
