Manager Response: Dear Charlie C,  Thank you for reviewing the Country Inn & Suites, Anaheim. We are glad you were able to take the time to enjoy our heated pool and spa. Thank you for the 5 out of 5 rating and we hope to see you during your next visit to the Anaheim area.

Summary: Max works in the dining area and he is a great addition to the country inn team. He is very attentive to the guests and very nice and accommodating. We wanted fresh potatoes and he gave us some from the back. We also wanted to go cups for our coffees to take to Disneyland and he gave them to us promptly. I appreciate his attentiveness and great customer service
Manager Response: Dear Shyenne D,  Thank you for reviewing the Country Inn & Suites, Anaheim. We're happy to hear you enjoyed your time with us. We will give this message to Max. See you next time!

Summary: This hotel is in a convenient, quiet location, close to the Disneyland parks. The first morning we came down to breakfast and the manager, Alex, noticed that I was looking around for something(hot sauce). We started talking about our shared love of spicy foods. He proceeded to tell me about this breakfast quesadilla that they make and said that he would see if they could have them available for breakfast tomorrow if we were going to be there. I assured him that we would be. The next morning, Maximo Luis, the chef, sought me out and asked if I’d like a brefaat quesadilla and what I wanted on it. I told him to put whatever he wanted in there. A few minutes later, he brought me over my very own breakfast quesadilla with bacon, cheese, cilantro, green chilies, and eggs all wrapped
Manager Response: Dear Deerarat1,  Thank you for the 5 out of 5 rating! We will relay your kind words to Max and Alex!

Summary: The front desk people were super friendly and the whole property was very clean.  The room was large and the extra living room in the front was a nice bonus. We didn’t want to leave - it was all way too nice!
Manager Response: DEAR GoPlaces56777385720,  Thank you for reviewing the Country Inn & Suites, Anaheim. Thank you for your kind words. Hopefully you stay longer during your next visit.

Summary Heading: 3 Night Stay End of January for Disneyland
Summary: Stayed here for 3 nights to go to Disneyland and California Adventure. From the get-go check-in was great as we were able to check-in around 9:30am hours before the 3pm check-in time as our room was ready.Our room and the entire hotel was meticulously clean. Staff was always friendly with smiles. They offer free chocolate cookies at the front desk during the day around 3-7pm.Location was great as it was near the freeway and about 7 minutes away from Disneyland by car. Tip: Lyft/Uber to Disney as it is cheaper than the $5.50 shuttle per day the hotel offers.
Manager Response: Dear Day Trip67259179432,  Thank you for reviewing the Country Inn & Suites, Anaheim and thank you for your detailed feedback! Hope we see you during your next visit to the Anaheim area.

Summary: The customer service was AWESOME!!! From Cherine at the front desk to the staff in the kitchen everyone was so nice. They had fresh baked cookies and coffee and tea throughout the day. Super short walk to Disneyland and FREE parking!! We will definitely be back. Rooms were clean, beds were comfy it was worth every penny! (Which wasn't even a lot super affordable room!) Breakfast was good and they had a kids room with bean bags and movies playing!
Manager Response: Dear MAGGIEMAIL,  Thank you for reviewing the Country Inn & Suites, Anaheim. We appreciate your feedback and will relay your kind words to Cherine. She's the best!

Summary: Breakfast here was amazing. They had lots to choose from. Rooms are very spacious. Also the art bus for Disneyland picked us up right at the parking lot . Also close so you can walk to Disneyland. Would stay again for sure
Manager Response: Dear Madalyn S,  Thank you for reviewing the Country Inn & Suites, Anaheim. We appreciate your feedback.

Summary: We were just looking for a quick stay within walking distance of the Disneyland Resort and found the nicest people.  Our room was nice, clean, and comfortable. Breakfast was fresh, plentiful,  and tasty. But the service provided was excellent! Fernando Castro and Cherine Guirguis were so very helpful,  friendly, and courteous.  They went so far as to send a half dozen chocolate chip cookies up to our room for my birthday which I only mentioned in passing.
Manager Response: Dear Kathy B,  Thank you for reviewing the Country Inn & Suites, Anaheim and thank you for the 5 out of 5 rating! We will relay your kind words to Fernando and Cherine!

Summary Heading: A decent hotel....too close to the freeway.
Summary: The hotel is next to the freeway, and the noise is inescapable at night. Our beds and pillows were uncomfortable too. In all other respects it was decent, and the staff was very friendly, but providing a restful place to sleep is a hotel's number one job. It's the reason you buy a hotel room in the first place. No other amenity can trump a crappy sleeping experience.I visit Anaheim once a year, and I won't be staying here again.
Manager Response: Dear Journey53183614342,  Thank you for reviewing the Country Inn & Suites by Radisson, Anaheim. Rest is a very important part of traveling and we are sorry you didn't enjoy your time with us. Your feedback is appreciated and will be used to make modifications if needed.

Summary: Great property!!! Great price!!! A few minutes walk to Disneyland to help shed the calories from the free breakfast buffet that was excellent.  Maria in the kitchen and helpers were all thumbs up.  Parking is comp... this place is savings from the time you drive in til the time you leave. AND this property is clean clean clean... lobby, rooms, restrooms, and restaurant were immaculate. As you can tell I’m a fan
Manager Response: Dear thequez78,  Thank you for reviewing the Country INn & Suites, Anaheim. We're happy to hear your enjoyed your time with us and we will definitely relay your kind words to Maria!

Summary: We initially booked 3 nights but added a 4th while we were there with no trouble.   Its a large, modern hotel with large rooms, comfy beds and good sized bathrooms.  The complimentary breakfast was excellent.  It was an easy walk to Disneyland, and there were plenty of dinner options nearby.   Free guest laundry was a big plus.   Very professional and courteous staff. Excellent price for a hotel of this quality.  Would definitely stay again.
Manager Response: Dear Chris P,  Thank you for reviewing the Country Inn & Suites, Anaheim. We are happy to hear you enjoyed your time with us. Thank you for the five out of five rating and we look forward to your next visit to the Anaheim area.

Summary: I was in town for business, but wanted to check out Disneyland as well.    This hotel is only a couple of blocks from the maingate of Disneyland, and easy access to/from the parks.Very nice decor and set up, but the only knock against them as far as I was concerned, as the bed was a bit too hard, and the pillows were smaller than normal.   Otherwise, the staff was fantastic and the hotel itself was very nice.   Close to all the activities in the area.
Manager Response: Dear Mike E,  Thank you for reviewing the Country Inn & Suites, Anaheim. Our proximity to the Disneyland Resort and local attractions makes us a prime choice of stay. Thank you for your feedback and we look forward to your next visit.

Summary: This hotel is perfect for a family visiting Disneyland.  It is within walking distance or only a $5 uber ride away if you have already walked too much.  Breakfast is a good mix of hot and continental foods.  Staff was wonderful.  We definitely would return!  My only request is that the consider upgrading their towels.  They are quite small and leave a lot to be desired.
Manager Response: Dear Culture48366620345,  Thank you for your feedback!

Summary: great property,  and walking distance to disneyland.    great breakfast,  very comfortable and large rooms.    very nice staff.   good restaurants nearby.     no extra charge for parking the car.   was not aware of  extra charges such as anaheim resort fees.
Manager Response: Dear Sunshine50805152529,  Thank you for reviewing the Country Inn & Suites, Anaheim. We appreciate your feedback and look forward to your next stay.

Summary Heading: Excellent Management, Creative Team, All the essentials!
Summary: This is my second year at this hotel during the NAMM show.  I deeply appreciate the service I received from the staff and their flexibility to my needs.  The General Manager leads a team that can make decisions for themselves to accommodate guests and I see creativity and happiness in all tiers of service here.   Also, this hotel is close enough to walk to NAMM, but still quiet and peaceful enough to recover from all the stimulus of a big convention.   Their breakfast is above average and varies slightly from day to day, so I could have something different every day during my stay.  You can call ahead for special dietary needs and the manager will have Almond Milk or gluten free options provided.   Well done!!
Manager Response: Dear BusinessExecutive1,  Thank you for reviewing the Country Inn & Suites, Anaheim. We do our absolute best to accommodate our guests and make them feel at home. Thank you for your feedback and we look forward to seeing you next year!

Summary: Newer facility, clean and friendly staff. Stood for 3 days. Breakfast was good. Better than other places. They were very accommodating. Parking is kinda a pain in the rear. It gets packed during the evening
Manager Response: Dear Connector66238413126,  Thank you for reviewing the Country Inn & Suites by Radisson, Anaheim. We appreciate your feedback and hope you visit us during your next stay in Anaheim.

Summary: Excellent breakfast, And it was included! Excellent room accommodations, excellent staff! Besides all that, you’ve got free parking to boot!   We went for a volleyball tournament at the American sports Center. It’s a short jaunt from there and was perfect for the two day event.   When you take into account free parking and free breakfast, you can’t beat that price anywhere!  I must say, besides the value, The lobby was beautiful and it was laid out very nice.
Manager Response: Dear Tourist12393294028,  Thank you for reviewing the Country Inn & Suites by Radisson, Anaheim! We're glad our proximity to the American Sports Center came in handy. Thank you for the 5 out of 5 rating and we hope to see you during your next visit to the Anaheim area.

Summary: This great hotel is conveniently located about 10 min walk from Disneyland. The staff were fantastic, the rooms very large and clean and great facilities. They offered a generous complimentary breakfast with hot and cold choices ( bacon, egg, sausages, waffles, fruits and cereal). I booked via expedia and had some complications regarding the resort fee. Management reached out to contact me ( thank you Alex and Nina) and clarify and couldnt have done more.  Staff all engaging and knowledgable with local activities, shops dining etc. Had a meal in the hotel which was also great. Massive pizza $13. Very handy after an exhausting day at the parks. View from room was spectacular and a great view of Disney fireworks from room 1539!!!!  Thank you for a lovely stay!
Manager Response: Dear M W,  Thank you for reviewing the Country Inn & Suites by Radisson, Anaheim! We are happy to hear you enjoyed our hotel and all it has to offer. We will definitely relay your kind words to Nina and Alex!

Summary: Volleyball tournament  with girls.  Enjoyable weekend with everyone.  Hotel very nice and clean and the Staff Great !!    I would definitely stay here in the future.  I will recommend to family and friends in the near future
Manager Response: Dear Quest19899932416,   Thank you for reviewing the Country Inn & Suites by Radisson, Anaheim and thank you for the 5 out of 5 rating!

Summary: We stayed from Jan 16-20, 2019 and we were extremely happy and satisfied. We are seasoned travelers and everything about this hotel was amazing! The location is close enough to the theme parks minus the noise and pollution of being on main street. Love the complimentary parking (plenty for all guests), breakfast (great spread), and use of laundry facility (handy if you plan to pack light). The hotel is very clean and my goodness, I can't believe how spacious the rooms are! We had a 2 queen sized beds and I'm sure another queen size would have fit. This is perfect for those who have little ones in tow and need room for buggies and bulky car seats. The heated swimming pool was also great! The staff are super friendly. We would definitely go back! I highly recommend this hotel, you
Manager Response: Dear ssubido,  Thank you for reviewing the Country Inn & Suites by Radisson, Anaheim! We're delighted you enjoyed your time with us. Thank you for your kind words and we hope to see you during your next visit to the Anaheim area.

Summary: Hotel is about 5 mins or less to the Mickey & friends parking structure! Right off of the freeway. Staff is super nice. Breakfast is included and it’s super good! Eggs, tator tots, sausage, waffles and more! Beds are fluffy that you just sleep so well after a long Disney day! Only complaint was we had such a noisy family above us who stomped wherever they walked. Hotel was nice enough to let us move rooms! Overall great hotel! Will be staying again :)
Manager Response: Dear Stay61122279168,   Thank you for reviewing the Country Inn & Suites by Radisson, Anaheim! We are happy you enjoyed your stay and look forward to your next visit!

Summary: Very happy with our stay, overall great stay, great breakfast, nice size rooms, friendly staff, nice location, centrally located for different places we were visiting. Close to Disneyland, but short trip to coliseum.
Manager Response: Dear Coastal06982410908,  Thank you for reviewing the Country Inn & Suites by Radisson, Anaheim!

Summary: Stayed in a suite with two toddlers. They slept on the pullout sofa. Plenty of room, but only three drawers to store clothes.  Everything was neat and clean. The bathroom was modern but had a barn door so no latch. Which means no privacy with toddlers! I used the supplied conditioner and it did absolutely nothing.  The towels were scratchy and very small.  Other than that the stay went well.  The freeway was a little loud so a sound machine or something if you're a light sleeper.  We walked to disneyland and it was pretty quick and easy.
Manager Response: Dear treqtulip,  Thank you for reviewing the Country Inn & Suites by Radisson, Anaheim. We appreciate all feedback and use it to improve our guests' stay.

Summary Heading: Cali visit - hockey games - beach visits
Summary: Excellent hotel great location, comfortable bed & linens, clean hotel, excellent breakfast, free parking, close to Disney if that’s in your plans, nice pool area just too cool to use while we were there.
Manager Response: Dear jcarlisle6220,  Thank you for reviewing the Country Inn & Suites by Radisson, Anaheim. Thank you so much for the 5 out of 5 rating! We're happy you enjoyed your time with us and look forward to your next visit!

Summary: Hotel very clean and neat. Bed comfortable.  Could see Disneyland fireworks from room window.   Breakfast had a lot of warm and cold choices.  Had king suite,  sitting area comfortable with large TV.  Bedroom very large.  A lot of dead space, could have used a chair in bedroom to sit on when putting shoes on.
Manager Response: Dear sharon63701,  Thank you for reviewing the Country Inn & Suites by Radisson, Anaheim! We are happy to hear you enjoyed your time with us and look forward to your next visit.

Summary: Despite a very late check in for my wife and I, the good folks at the Country Inn & Suites were extremely friendly and helpful.  We were very happy with the speed of check in, room service, proximity to Disney (which is why we were in town), and cleanliness of our room and the hotel.  As much as we travel, I would have to put this facility in the Top 5 of all the places we've stayed in the Continental US.  We will definitely be back upon our return trip to Disney in the fall.
Manager Response: We are pleased to see that you enjoyed your time at the hotel.  On behalf of our entire staff at Country Inn & Suites by Radisson, Anaheim, CA we thank you for your business and we hope to see you again when your travels bring you back to the area!  Sincerely,   Country Inn & Suites by Radisson, Anaheim, CA

Summary Heading: Great facility, Great manager, and great staff
Summary: .Excellent customer service and facility is amazing.  The manager is very responsive to all requests Rooms are spacious and clean.  !0 minute walk to Disney.  Safe area.  Pool and hot tub.  Safe in the room was appreciated.
Manager Response: Dear Maps544616,   Thank you for recognizing our Staff at the Country Inn & Suites by Radisson, Anaheim! All of us are thrilled to know we met your expectations and look forward to seeing you again.

Summary: Great hotel in Anaheim. I highly recommend staying here especially if you are going to Disney since it is so close to the main gate. The rooms are big and clean, and the staff is friendly and accommodating. Dry cleaning is available at the front desk for those who need it with same day service. The soft chocolate chip cookies are amazing, and the morning breafast has a great variety. This will be our go to hotel whenever we come to Anaheim.
Manager Response: Dear alex_sixty,   Thank you for taking the time to share your experience! We are thrilled to know your stay was comfortable.   We look forward to seeing you next time!

Summary: We arrived 28th december to be greeted by the smell of Christmas (cinnamon) as you walk through the doors which I thought was a lovely Christmas touch! The receptionist who checked us in was lovely, she was very helpful and also was more than happy for us to help our selves to the cookies 😁! The bedrooms are lovely, very clean, lovely bathrooms and big shower!! Only 15 minute walk to Disney and there is also a bus you can get daily for $5:50 or $4:50 ( can’t rember) and can use the pas as many times as you like in that one we used this each day as my mum struggles to walk long distances! The breakfast was amazing lots of different choices and you can make your own waffles which is a bonus....so Thankyou for making out Disney trip Extra special we will defiantly be back!!!
Manager Response: Dear Zoe M,   WOW!  Thank you for the very complimentary review of the Country Inn & Suites by Radisson, Anaheim!   We are so excited to know we hit a home run on your December stay and we can't wait for your next visit!

Summary Heading: Would not stay any other place by Disneyland
Summary: The hotel was very clean. Kid friendly. Great customer service. Pool area was perfect. Great breakfast. About a 15 minute walk to Disneyland. Our kids loved the TV room with large bean bags and there were two sitting areas with electric fire places that were nice to sit and have a cup of coffee.
Manager Response: Dear Getaway64210873192,   Thank you for your FIVE BUBBLE review of Country Inn & Suites by Radisson, Anaheim! We  are so happy you enjoyed our kids movie room and our lobby/library space.   We can't wait to see you again!

Summary: After coming from Legoland and visiting at Disney parks for 4 days, there were good things and bad with the room.  Worst first.  I know smoking may be an honesty issue but no bathroom fans with no lockable bathroom doors are off.  This means steaming mornings and since kids struggle with privacy, it can be early morning fuss at best.  ~~~As for good things.  Great breakfast variety and super SUPER clean.  Due to changes in new shoes my wife had a sore foot that developed a blister.  On heading out for the day we realized that we had no time to run back in to the store and when the manager Fernando Castro understood this, he made a bandage happen and it was with genuine concern and in my opinion?  The little things add up and this was fantastic help with polite service.   Good
Manager Response: Thank you for reviewing the Country Inn & Suites by Radisson, Anaheim. We are happy to hear you enjoyed your time with us and we will definitely relay your kind words to Fernando!

Summary: My husband and I spent all day Sunday in our hotel room because we didn’t want to drive home on the Sabbath and we felt quite comfortable like at home. We went downstairs to the lobby and lounged in front of the fire for a bit. So enjoyed our stay.
Manager Response: Thank you for reviewing the Country Inn & Suites by Radisson, Anaheim. We are happy to hear you enjoyed your stay and look forward to  your next visit!

Summary: New hotel, very family friendly. Good breakfast. Shuttle was late and then it was full so had to wait for another one. Pizza was not very good especially for the price. Overall was a family friendly hotel. Kids loved the little movie room and the pool
Manager Response: Dear Go33058571300,  Thank you for the feedback. We're happy to hear your family enjoyed their time with us!

Summary: This is a good place to stay for a family Disneyland adventure or business travel.  Close to I5 freeway, very good and helpful staff, check in-out was a breeze, pleasant atmosphere, Bistro Bar / Restaurant on premises, small store on premises, nicely furnished clean and up to date rooms, heated swimming pool, a very good free full buffet breakfast and free self-parking all within walking distance of Disneyland.  Shuttle available. There is a $17 daily resort fee, but considering the rates and all the other freebies, this is still a very good deal.
Manager Response: Dear Jeff R,  Thank you for the 5 out of 5 rating!

Summary: The beds and pillows are horrible! The staff members at the front desk could at least smile when a customer walks by instead of just staring at them and talking with other workers. The rooms were clean and they offer free breakfast. Location is good.
Manager Response: Dear Resort56993139265,  We are sorry to hear you did not fully enjoy your time here at the Country Inn & Suites by Radisson Anaheim. Please feel free to reach out to any member of management at property level should you want to discuss your stay any further.

Summary Heading: Good value for money and close to Disneyland
Summary: 10 min walk from Disneyland. Huge rooms from a european perspective. Good pool area, very good check-in and check-out experience. Quite poor breakfast assortment/variety. Beds quite stiff. Overall good value.
Manager Response: Dear Martin S,  Thank you for taking the time out to let us know about your recent stay. We look forward to your next visit!

Summary Heading: The hotel was in great shape; nice buffet, friendly staff
Summary: Close enough to walk to Disneyland.  The hotel is fairly new and was very clean; nice room and bathrooms.   The breakfast buffet was better than most free breakfasts in US hotels. I was warmly greeted by the staff, when I tried to check in at 10AM.  They apologized the room wasn't ready (as expected) and nicely offered to store luggage. I had no problem with the freeway noise and was 4 rooms from freeway end of the hotel.
Manager Response: Dear TravellingHusky,  Thank you for your feedback. We're happy to hear you enjoyed your time with us!

Summary Heading: A New Fave Place to Stay
Summary: Country Inn was clean, conveniently located & comfortable. We were provided with exceplent customer service and the breakfast was a great perk and included eggs, bacon, sausage, waffles, etc... We will definitely be staying here again.
Manager Response: Dear Excursion773621,  Thank you for the 5 out of 5 rating! We're looking forward to your next stay.

Summary: Great value for Disneyland vacation. 10 minute walk to parks. Great hotel, very clean and updated. Breakfast included made mornings easy with the kids. Very pleased with our stay. Didn't get to use the pool based on the weather but looked nice.
Manager Response: Dear Happiness3063964756,  Thank you for the 5 out of 5 rating!

Summary: This was a great hotel at a great value. Brand new and not too far from Disneyland, if I had any complaints it was that they advertise free breakfast and parking but they charge you a $17 daily "hotel fee" which is basically a parking fee but even with this fee it was the least expensive and very nice and comparable to a luxury hotel.
Manager Response: Dear Cucosil,  Thank you for taking the time to review our property. We appreciate the 5 out of 5 rating!

Summary Heading: Nice stay. Front desk not good at problem solving
Summary: All was good until an alarm in the room next door was going off early one morning for more than 15 minutes. The front desk staff said they couldn’t do anything. I suggested they call the room to check on the guests and ask they please turn off the alarm. If the room was unoccupied, then I asked if they would please enter the room and turn off the alarm themselves. They were unable to problem solve or help with the problem.
Manager Response: Dear Trisha F,  Thank you for taking the time to provide feedback regarding your recent stay at the Country Inn & Suites by Radisson Anaheim. We would love further details regarding your concerns. Please feel free to reach out to any member of management to further discuss your stay.

Summary Heading: Great place to stay with family!
Summary: Our family stay was great! The noise from the highway was a little loud at night, but overall our stay was wonderful! We were visiting other areas in CA on a mini vacation to see the stars in Hollywood, Warner Bros Studio, and Pacific Pier in Santa Monica, but were close enough to drive all those places. Breakfast was nice at the hotel and so convenient! We liked seeing the Disneyland fireworks from our room window the first evening of our stay. We also liked that we could walk to Disneyland and see some of the shops our last day before checking out of the hotel and driving to the airport.  We'll stay here again the next time we are in the area.
Manager Response: Dear Adventure49440278045,  Our location in the heart of Anaheim's entertainment district makes us an ideal place to stay when on vacation in SoCal. We're happy to hear you enjoyed your time with us and our proximity to all the popular attractions in the area. Thank you for the 5 out of 5 rating and we hope to see you during your next visit to the area!

Summary: Loved our stay! Great hotel, great service! The rooms are spacious and very clean. Staff is friendly and helpful. Love the Bistro and Bar. It’s our go to hotel for our Xmas Disney trip and look forward to our stay next year!
Manager Response: Dear Journey24794534464,  Thank you for the 5 out of 5 rating! See you next year!

Summary: One of the newest hotel to stay at around the Disneyland area. Not too bad of a walk to the park, about 12-15 mins. But there is a ART that picks you up right outside of the building. Had the king suite that had pretty much its separate living room that had another tv and a couch bed. Which worked out great for my 2 boys. The room was spacious and the bathroom was really nice. Although the shower was really hard to turn on. The pool opened until midnight which was awesome because my boys loved swimming after we got back from the park at the end of the night. It’s also heated and huge for a hotel. The free breakfast was really good too. They had eggs, potatoes, waffles, oatmeal, fruit, yogurt, juice, coffee, cereal, toast, and on some days it would be sausage or bacon. So not bad
Manager Response: We are happy to hear you and your family enjoyed all the Country Inn & Suites has to offer! We will definitely relay your kind words to our breakfast team! Thank you for your feedback and we hope to see you during your next visit!

Summary: Myself and my family had a great stay highly recommended. The breaakfast was superb  with lots of choice, and the staff are lovely. Walking distance to Disney land is less than 10 minutes. Car parking is free, WiFi is free and cookies in reception are free!!
Manager Response: Dear Raybeech1977,  Thank you for the positive feedback! Hope we get to see you during your next visit to the Anaheim area.

Summary: This hotel was an amazing find!!! We were looking for a fairly priced hotel with breakfast for the kids. The location was great, room was clean, staff was excellent, parking was amazing, and breakfast was warm with a variety (eggs, waffles, sausage, hashbrowns, yogurt,granola, oatmeal, different juices, etc) and actually tasted good. The general manager introduced himself to us during breakfast asking how we were and if we needed anything. The front desk was extremely friendly. I just can't say enough about our stay.  THANK YOU for all your hospitality!!! I wish I remembered the gentleman's name at the front desk (Friday, 12/21 at around 11 a.m) he is a star!! So warm and friendly.
Manager Response: Dear ChrissyJ1114,  Thank you for your kind words! We pride ourselves on making each and every one of our guests feel at home, and we're happy to hear it shows!

Summary: Great location and staff! Walking distance to Disneyland. The overall room are exceptionally clean. Quiet and peaceful. Staff are amazingly attentive and approachable. The pool was really warm. My son enjoyed it very much. Overall - we had a great experience and will definitely come back in the future.
Manager Response: Dear Sherpa51902441133,  Thank you for the 5 out of 5 rating! We are delighted to hear you and your son enjoyed your time with us. See you next time.

Summary: Had a 6 night stay here with three adults. Very short, flat walk to the Disneyland main gates. Think there may have been a Disney shuttle close by as well ,however we didn’t use it.Could see the fireworks clearly at night.Arrived very early but check in was no problem. Hotel appears to be fairly new.  Good sized room which was very comfortable and clean. Breakfast was included and consisted of both hot and cold choices. Even though the hotel was very full, the kitchen kept up with demand and food was constantly being refreshed. Small shop in the lobby for those forgotten items or late night snacks. Guest laundry was complimentary - powder was $2. All staff we came across were very pleasant and helpful. Lovely lounge area with tea and coffee available.Was no problem to stay in
Manager Response: Dear Roslyn G,  Thank you for taking the time to provide feedback regarding your recent stay. We're happy to hear you enjoyed your time with us and all that the Country Inn & Suites by Radisson Anaheim has to offer. Thank you for the 5 out of 5 rating! We're looking forward to your next visit with us.

Summary: Customer service was very good, about 5 minutes walk to Disneyland main gate, very clean hotel, breakfast was very good, after checking out I found a error with the billing, called the hotel right away and they took care of the error within minutes, I was very pleased with the fast response. I will definitely stay at this hotel in the future.
Manager Response: Dear Dartboy777,  Thank you for the 5 out of 5 rating! We are happy to hear your billing concern was addressed and rectified promptly. We hope you visit us during your next visit to the Anaheim area!

Summary: They gave early check in because our flight was way early. Very helpful info regarding Disney land, you can buy the tickets here as well so no need to pre-purchase online. Very nice hotel, would recommend to families
Manager Response: Dear sup3rki3t,  Thank you for your feedback!

Summary: We had great hospitality while staying at the Country Inn, from the clean room to the pool, this place ranked highly to our family. The breakfast was certainly one of our favorite, great tasting variety. Max and Maria were two of the cooks we met as they served breakfast, both extremely polite, welcoming and overall made our stay pleasant. David G. the GM was also great making sure our stay was everything we expected and more. We will be staying here for our future trips to Disneyland.
Manager Response: Dear Swivyluv,  Thank you for your feedback. We will relay your kind words to Max, Maria and of course our GM David!

Summary Heading: Amazing value so close to Disney
Summary: I would definitely recommend this for families! Such a good value the hotel was clean and spacious! Free parking! Overall great value and a wonderful hotel!  I don’t ever take my time to review hotels but I really recommend this place because I know that Disney hotels can be pricey and a let down but this place was great and the walk to Disney was 10 minutes away!
Manager Response: Dear Odyssey10698195370,  Thank you for the 5 out of 5 rating! We're happy to hear you enjoyed your time with us!

Summary Heading: Great Place to Stay in Anaheim
Summary: This hotel was very clean and the rooms and common areas were great.  The numerous fireplaces made it cozy and I like the fact that they had a bar in the hotel.  The breakfast was really good, better than most that come with your stay. It was convenient to the House of Blues, a very short walk.  Before the show at the House of Blues, we ate at the complex where the venue is, lots of choices for dinner.  Wonderful experience, I would stay there again.
Manager Response: Dear Patty K,  Thank you for the 5 out of 5 rating!

Summary: This is a beautiful, newer property within easy and safe walking distance of Disneyland. The hot breakfast is a nice touch. The pool is nice and has long hours. It would be lovely to see the resort fee incorporated into the overall rate rather than a tack on at the end of the stay. The cleaning staff were friendly and prompt with in-room issues. The front desk staff were very friendly but unable to answer our questions about the hotel policies and local area.
Manager Response: Dear We_heart_adventure,  Thank you for your kind word!

Summary: This is a pretty spartan hotelbut should meet any Disney visitor's need. It is an easy three block walk to the Harbor St entrance and rooms are adequately furnished. The restaurant/bar is very limited, but does offer a good pizza. (We were the only dinner guests). The included breakfast is very good. Don't expect much of a view .(Ours was  looking at a huge power line structure). Parking is easy.  There is a small resort fee which was annoying for an overnight stay. The shower diversion valve on the tub/shower is apparently problematic so see if it works before you hop in.
Manager Response: Dear Joe M,  We are happy you enjoyed your time with us! Your shower concern has been forwarded to the appropriate department and inspections take place to ensure similar issues do not occur in the future. Thank you for your feedback and we hope we see you during your next visit to the Disneyland Resort.

Summary: Staff was excellent.. My stay was perfect.. I’m definitely coming back.. Me and my family went to Disneyland and stayed one night.. the rooms were super spacious and clean.. Location was perfect.. The lobby smelt just perfect and breakfast was a bonus!!
Manager Response: Thank you for your kind words. We are delighted to hear you and your family enjoyed your time with us!

Summary Heading: Great new hotel walking distance to Disneyland.
Summary: This is a lovely new facility with spacious rooms, comfortable beds and an extensive breakfast. There is a bar off the lobby for an evening drink and a large nicely furnished outdoor pool and spa. It's only a 2 block walk to Disneyland, and the House of Blues is also only a block away. We really enjoyed our stay and look forward to returning.
Manager Response: Dear Getaway57307069675,  We are happy to hear you found our rooms and beds comfortable, and enjoyed your stay. Thank you for the 5 out of 5 rating!

Summary: Great Place To Stay For Vacation at the resorts location is perfect walking distance from Disneyland parks, great room and great breakfast for a reasonable price for what you get I recommend this hotel to anyone will stay again
Manager Response: Dear Tour10864819569,  Thank you for the great review! Hopefully you'll visit us during your next stay in the Anaheim area!

Summary: Clean and newer hotel about 2 city blocks from Disneyland. Friendly staff, free parking and WiFi also good continental breakfast included.We are annual pass holders and this was our first time here- will definitely stay again.
Manager Response: Dear Lorine C,  Thank you for the 5 out of 5 rating!

Summary Heading: Great property for price, close to Disney, great staff, clean rooms.
Summary: We stayed here for six nights and had a wonderful time.  It is a $7 Uber/Lyft Ride to Disney and easy to use both to and from hotel. There is also a bus but we did not take it even though the drop off/pick up points are right at Disneyland.The hotel staff was very helpful and friendly. The breakfast was the usual hotel free breakfast.  There are restaurants close by that you could walk to but we used Uber. The pool is basic but pleasant as is the hot tub.  Lots of seating around the pool.  Bar service at night. I would definitely stay there again.
Manager Response: Dear HollyD723,   We are happy you enjoyed your time with us. Thank you for your feedback!

Summary: We always stay here. Love the breakfast,  friendly staff, big rooms and easy access to Disney, even with a stroller. They even had "Mickey Mouse" leave a plate of cookies in our room for our 2 year old son's 1st trip. I always recommend this hotel. We've tried others but they are simply amazing.
Manager Response: Dear DayTrip26604787165,  We are happy to hear you and your family enjoyed your time with us! See you next time.

Summary: I would definitely go back to this hotel, everything I liked I recommend it, Friendly staff, everything was very easy, very clean, very nice decoration, in the bedroom the pillows I loved.  all very nice, thank you.
Manager Response: Dear GoPlaces52672877177,  Thank you for the 5 out of 5 rating! We hope you get a chance to visit us in the future.

Summary: The check-in on the night shift was awesome friendly very informative very happy to see me treated us like royalty awesome experience The Saturday morning staff not so well it's funny how you can have a great experience through your whole stay and than it's some employees will ruin your stay but I didn't let there energy destroy my good time just would like the management to  know you have a difference in the morning staff than the night staff
Manager Response: Dear Sightsee141186820696,  Thank you for taking the time to provide feedback regarding your recent stay. We would appreciate further insight to your visit. If you are up to it, please reach out to any member of management at property level to further discuss your stay.

Summary Heading: A great place to stay when visiting Disneyland
Summary: We stayed three nights during our Disney adventure. Our room was comfortable and clean. It was nice to have the additional sitting room and the microwave.  The staff is friendly and helpful.  We appreciated being able to order appetizers from the bar when we came home in the evening. Breakfast was just what we needed. Best of all, it’s only a 3/4 mile walk to the entrance to Disneyland!
Manager Response: Dear curlygramma,  Thank you for the 4 out of 5 rating! Hopefully we'll see you during your next visit to the Anaheim area!

Summary Heading: Nice, new hotel close to attractions
Summary: My husband and I really enjoyed our 4 day stay. Breakfast is pretty good and the staff is very friendly and helpful. The heated pool is clean and a bonus for the chilly weather. There are a lot of restaurants and attractions close by so the location is perfect. We want to give a shout out for exceptional service from Tabby and Federico Navarro. They both went the extra mile to accommodate us. Federico took time out of his busy day to help my husband change our flat tire - we really appreciated it.
Manager Response: Dear sadafyounas,  We are happy to hear you enjoyed your time with us and we will definitely relay your kind words to Tabby and Federcico!

Summary: The complimentary breakfast was full, and fresh. I showed up at 9:45 AM to get my breakfast, and little did I know that it closes at 9:30. Maria was nice enough to open the doors to let my family, and myself in to get food for the day. Thank you Maria!!!!!
Manager Response: Dear trung711,  Thank you for the 5 out of 5 rating! We will relay your kind words to Maria.

Summary: This is the nicest hotel near Disneyland. The staff is extremely professional and is always willing to help out in any way they can. The rooms are spacious and clean. I am already planning our next trip back.
Manager Response: Dear Fearless09600475402,  Thank you for taking the time to provide feedback regarding your recent stay. We're looking forward to your next visit!

Summary Heading: As Good or Better than the Reviews
Summary: This hotel is every bit as good as the reviews and recommendation that we received.  Clean and inviting with a great lobby and eating/seating area makes it feel comfortable and relaxing.  The hotel grounds are beautifully landscaped (especially around the pool) with luxurious pavers and hardscape throughout the parking and drop off entrance area.  The staff are very friendly and professional.  We enjoyed the breakfast, hot tub and pool before and after our visit to Disneyland.  The walk to the Disneyland east entrance goes by quickly with great lunch and dinner options along the way.  Our family of 4 slept comfortably in a King / Couch with pull out bed suite, and we added a cot for full comfort.  The pull out bed can sleep two younger children, but only one older kid or adult
Manager Response: Dear Camper14993886316,  We are happy to hear you enjoyed your time with us. Thank you for the 5 out of 5 rating!

Summary: I was very surprised about how spacious the hotel and the rooms were! Ample parking, too. It’s about a 10-20 minute walk to/from Disneyland depending on who is with you. The staff was very friendly and accomodating. Breakfast was pretty good. They also have free cookies at the front desk during the day! The bar is nice - it has three really good beers on tap, and you can see the Disneyland fireworks from there! Pool is warmed, and there is a hot tub next to it. Overall I saved a lot of money by eating breakfast at the hotel and walking to the parks. The only gripe I have is that the bathroom in the room has a sliding door that cannit be locked. It can get awkward.
Manager Response: Dear Sherpa58116982802,  Thank you for the positive feedback!

Summary: This has really become my go to hotel for visits to Disney and the Anaheim area.  Perfect location that is close enough to where I need to be but just far enough away from the craziness.  Comfy rooms, friendly staff and a free breakfast with lots of options.
Manager Response: Dear JasonFromCalifornia,  Thank you for the 5 out of 5 rating! We appreciate your feedback.

Summary: The location is perfect for Disneyland, just a short 10 minute walk. The room super clean, the breakfast just wonderful, the beds super comfortable, everything so relaxing. I felt my Disney experience started just by walking inside the lobby.  The only small issue we had was with the driver provided by the hotel who took us to the airport, he demanded a bigger tip after the drive but then again we don't know if this is just a cultural thing. Aside from that very small incident, everything was perfect.
Manager Response: Dear aquirogadelagarza,  Thank you for the 5 out of 5 feedback.

Summary: Check in  Horrible frustrating check in. Front desk guy had a terrible attitude asked for south facing room and 2 rooms next to each other. The same request I had in my file from a week before hand. When we asked him about south facing room 3 times he ignored our request. Got to room and both at east end and north facing very noisy from freeway. Went back to front desk original guy disappeared as soon as he seen me but luckily that’s  where the bad with the hotel stopped. A young lady took over switched us to south side. Unfortunately couldn’t get side by side but we were close. She was very helpful.   The room  Excellent new well maintained clean hotel room. Staff does excellent job. A/C works well. Clock Radio has white noise function. Lots of plugs for chargers and USB as
Manager Response: Dear johndeere844,  YAY! Thank you for your feedback and kind words. We look forward to your next visit.

Summary: This hotel surprised me. I think the name of it through me off and I expected something older and just ok. This hotel seemed brand new and the staff was fantastic! The rooms were very clean and the pillow was one of he best I’ve ever had. My mom and I scoured the internet finding the same one to order for home! My only complaint (if I had one) was that the bathroom wasn’t very functional. There wasn’t anything for towels to dry or hang on and we couldn’t figure out the shower for awhile and when we did it was a large trickle of water and we couldn’t get a good spray. Other than that this is a gem of a hotel. Such a convenient location. Just a 12-15 minute walk into the park. The swimming pool looked amazing but we didn’t have time to use it and it was open super late. If we had
Manager Response: Dear ECornia,  Thank you for staying with us. We appreciate any and all feedback. See you next time!

Summary Heading: Great for a family stay close to Disneyland's main gates!
Summary: We were so pleased with this hotel! It's always hard to tell on a map how long a walk will take (we were thinking maybe 15 minutes to the gates..?) but it was 7-10 minutes door to door with a 3- and a 5-year old each day! The hotel itself is nice and new with clean rooms with nice decor. The beds and pillows were comfy. It's located near a major road but we never found it too disruptive. The kiddos loved the outdoor pool and we thought it was nice that they had a lift into the pool for any disabled guests (not something you'd see everywhere). The best part for us was the hot breakfast - it has an amazing selection and it's a nice large breakfast room so it never felt really congested even at peak times. So nice to start the day with breakfast on site and not have to worry about
Manager Response: Dear Amy S,   Thank you for the 5 out of 5 rating! We look forward to your next visit.

Summary Heading: Great Accomodations - Excellent Breakfast - Small Towels
Summary: My husband and I stayed at this hotel for 4 days and 3 nights and found it to be a great value AND a very comfortable stay!  The property is new; the decor modern and missing the old Country Inns Kitch. Common areas are well maintained and the staff was professional and accommodating. The breakfast was awesome with plenty of space and food even late in the breakfast window.    Our only complaints were with the linens. The towels were small and scratchy, the topper blanket was cheaply made and snagged easily causing runs, the fitted sheet kept coming off and the pillowed were flat.  These were only minor inconveniences though.   There was quite a bit of freeway noise, but we bth were able to sleep well.  The room layout made it easy for one of us to take a nap while the other
Manager Response: Dear Wander41672221562,  Thank you for your feedback. We are currently looking into linen alternatives. We appreciate your comments and look forward to your next stay!

Summary: We were advised to use this hotel from a travel agent who had stayed there. She was right, it was a very nice stay a twelve minute walk from Disneyland and 4 minutes to an entertainment area with a good choice of restaurants. The bus shuttle comes to the hotel and cuts the 12 minutes to 5 and saves elder and young feet the extra steps they may need later.  The hotel is handicap friendly with lifts into both the pool and the hot tub so that everyone can have that experience. The rooms are fairly quiet, there is no escaping the traffic in LA/Anaheim, the rooms comfortable and the breakfast substantial. There is a large seating area, the service is wonderful and the self serve breakfast varied and tasty. The front desk was welcoming and helpful. The only glitch we had was being
Manager Response: Dear Larry F,  Thank you for taking the time to provide feedback regarding your recent stay at the Country Inn & Suites by Radisson, Anaheim. We are happy to hear you enjoyed your time with us and look forward to your next visit!

Summary: Had a great stay here! Fernando at the front desk is The one to go to for any questions! He was super helpful and gave us insider tips to a great Disneyland experience. The staff was all very friendly, room was clean, and a quick walk to Disneyland!
Manager Response: Dear Sunshine40991771930,  Thank you for the 5 out of 5 rating! We will definitely let Fernando know about the positive impact he had on your stay.

Manager Response: Dear OnAir10316409270,  We are happy to hear you enjoyed your time here at the Country Inn & Suites by Radisson! Thank you for your feedback.

Summary: Rooms and hotel very clean. Staff very friendly and pleasant. Wonderful breakfast selection.  At Check in we where treated with respect. Staff was very polite. We enjoyed the accomidstions through out the hotel Enjoyed our stay
Manager Response: Dear Resort55043947703,  Thank you for the 5 out of 5 rating! We appreciate your feedback.

Summary: I have to say I was so pleasantly surprised with this hotel I will definitely come back to stay again!   To start, we were early for our check-in thought that we could just park our vehicle at the hotel and head over to Disneyland for the remainder of the day. To our surprise our room was already ready and we were able to check-in. Check-in was friendly, easy and thorough.   The hotel was fabulous, especially for the price we paid. The rooms were great and well appointed with coffee, fridge, and microwave, plus great bath products, plus evening cookies!   I must say though that their breakfast buffet was incredible!  Huge choice of options to please just about everyone to start your day before heading off to Disneyland.  The other great part was there was a family room just
Manager Response: Dear JenUdy,  Thank you for your feedback and kind words! We are happy to hear you and your family enjoyed your time with us. See you next time.

Summary Heading: The best home away from home
Summary: Cherine is always customer oriented knows me by name and always great in detail. Love this place the pool clean. Hidden treasure no drama no loud parties.breskfast real breakfast not milk and bananas !
Manager Response: Dear Odyssey2202310624,  We are happy to hear you enjoyed your time with us! We will relay your kind words to Cherine.

Summary: Overall we loved our stay. It was a short 10-15 walk to Disney only .7mile. The pool was large and beautiful. It was an infinity pool. The towels were horribly and small really could use better towels. Breakfast was very good and hot items. Rooms were nice and clean, beds were really comfortable. Shower pressure was lacking and the bathroom door was a “barn door” style which was cute but it was not rolling well and was difficult to close.
Manager Response: Dear Melimeg,   Thank you for taking the time to let us know how your recent stay was. Your concerns regarding the towel selection has been forwarded to the appropriate department leader. We appreciate your feedback.

Summary: We have tried many different hotels near Disneyland past 8 years and this one turned out to be one of the best hotels that we stayed.  The room was very spacious and kids enjoyed their own space with their sofa bed with their own TV! Also the room already had a nice size fridge and a microwave so it was great heating up some leftover food and coffee. The room had A LOT of power outlets and it was super convenient in our digital age. We have a lot of devices to charge up every day but had no issues with that! (It’s getting pretty common nowadays but there are USB outlets too)  Their complimentary breakfast was awesome!! It was actually really great quality and variety of food and they changed slightly everyday! I was just so impressed with what they offered especially the price
Manager Response: Dear 179susumuy,  We are happy to hear you and your family enjoyed your time with us! Thank you for the 5 out of 5 rating!

Summary: Beautiful new and modern hotel for Disneyland Park.  Super easy walk to the park and the value is incredible. Delicious hot breakfast and fresh fruit.  The only ding is the beds are not comfortable, but the rooms are new and spacious.  Great for families and the pool is spectacular.   Highest praise for the staff that works here.  They are remarkable!
Manager Response: Dear Malorie S,  Thank you for the 5 out of 5 rating!

Summary Heading: A place I would stay again and again

Yes there is a little bit of a walk, but this hotel is well worth it. I read reviews that said there wasn't many options for breakfast or that there was too much freeway noise, that the beds were uncomfortable and that staff were rude. Well I believe those individuals must be smoking crack because this place is amazing! We arrived after an early flight and the amazing woman (unfortunately I can't remember her name) behind the counter had house keeping have a room ready for us in less than 30 minutes. Every interaction with staff was amazing.The room was large and clean. Housekeeping was so friendly. Breakfast
Manager Response: Dear JoleneRose,  Thank you so much for your kind words! We appreciate your feedback and look forward to seeing you again.

Summary: I booked this hotel after reading reviews on Trip Advisor through the WDT company as a Good Neighbor hotel. It was a fantastic stay. The staff are friendly, the location is amazing. We were a 15 walk to the front steps of Disneyland and the restaurant selection within walking distance is amazing. We didn’t do any of the local restaurants after a long day at Disneyland but opted for Grubhub instead. Great local selection of restaurants! There is no restaurant at this property but I don’t think we really missed it. The hot breakfast buffet was average. It has those fake scrambled eggs that no one would eat. I wish it opened earlier on the weekends as we were already out the door for Magic Hours on the weekend. Just a note about that...you only get one Magic Hour day for your
Manager Response: Dear louisen042,  Thank you for taking the time to provide feedback regarding your recent stay with us. We look forward to your next visit.

Summary: Staff, room, cleanliness were all outstanding!  The young lady at the front desk was very helpful with our Disney questions. Close proximity to Disney was a plus. We chose to park in the Woody parking lot and ride the shuttle. But the park it is only about a mile from the hotel I’d you don’t mind the extra walking. We have stayed at five star hotels and the staff at this hotel could compete with any five star hotel we have experienced.

Summary Heading: Great hotel with a few little issues
Summary: We stayed at this hotel for a week with our two kids. We generally loved it, although there were a few little issues. PROS: - Clean room with comfortable beds. - Friendly and helpful staff, including front desk, housekeeping and food service staff. - Free laundry facilities. - Great free breakfast with a large variety of options, both hot and cold. - Large pool. - Close to Disney - 10 minute walk with a 7 and 9 year old. Also close to lots of restaurants. - Set away from the busyness of Disneyland.   CONS: - Limited clothing storage. One small dresser with three shallow drawers and three small open shelves was not enough for my husband and I, let alone our two kids. We stayed for 7 nights and had to mostly live out of our suitcases. My husband commented that it was the messiest
Manager Response: Dear Sara B,  Thank you for your 4 out of 5 rating and feedback!

Summary: First off, the hotel is walking distance to Disneyland- definitely a bonus. Yes, it's about a 10 minute walk, but it's entirely flat. Absolutely everyone that works at the hotel is super friendly and helpful-they really go out of your way to help you enjoy your stay. Smiles all around! Special shout out to Cherine at the front desk and Miguel in food service. The room was modern, large and comfortable. Two suggestions: couldn't get the temperature just right, either too hot or too cold, but that's probably me not being able to adjust it correctly. The other thing is that the shower has a slippery floor. We actually put towels down to stand on in the shower so that we wouldn't slip. Otherwise, a 100% satisfaction score. The breakfast that was included had scrambled eggs, sausage,

The pillows were very small and there were only 2 provided for the whole bed. Bath towels were old and rough and the bathroom tub was stained with a urine yellow that just felt gross and dirty. Manager Response: Dear Sunshine64887928710,  We are sorry to hear you did not enjoy your time here at the Country Inn & Suites by Radisson. Please reach out to any member of management to further discuss your concerns.

Summary: The staff was friendly, helpful and accomodating! We had a very nice, pleasant stay with our kids. They serve a nice hot buffet breakfast.  It was a nice 10-15 minute walk to Disneyland. The walk feels long after playing at Disneyland all day and night but it's not bad. I love that the hotel room was spacious and modern and we all had plenty of space.

Solid breakfast with a variety of options like oatmeal, waffles, potatoes, scrambled eggs, etc. along with toppings and seasonings like cinnamon or syrups. The breakfast also included drinks, but I forget specifically which.   As for the rooms, they were reasonably clean, tidy, and modern. My partner and I have stayed here twice, both with good experiences. The first time was awesome considering we got a nice room with a great room design and floor plan - I just wish we were able to get it again as the other rooms weren't as well-made, not to say they weren't good. Almost

Summary Heading: One of the nicest hotel nearby Disney
Summary: I am very picky on hotels.  It has to be very clean, well maintained.   Whenever I’d visited Anaheim areas, I had have hard time to pick a right one because most hotels around here are kind of old or not really maintained.  I found this hotel, and decided to try.  It was the best choice!!!    Room was clean 10/10. Breakfast was great, and a lot of staffs are cleaning the tables non stop!!   That was the best part!  Highly recommend this hotel!!!

Summary: Our first time to disneyland and we wanted a nice hotel that wouldnt break our budget, we were not disappointed. The breakfast buffet was the best I've ever had at a hotel...waffles,sausage,bacon,eggs,hashbrowns etc. The pool and hot tub are open till midnight and there is a nice little bar downstairs as well. We will not hesitate to stay here again. Loved it!
Manager Response: Dear Ambassador826541,  Thank you for the 5 out of 5 rating!

Summary Heading: Clean, Cozy place Near The happiest place on Earth Disneyland
Summary: Where should I start.. I booked This hotel because it's close to Disneyland and breakfast included. It was only 1 block away so cool. Not to mention so many shops near by that I can walk to. House of blues, Garden walk, downtown Disney, movie theater all within walking distance. It was my wife and son and son had a blast. He loved the breakfast and I did too. Eggs, sausage, waffles, fruits, and lots more. I love that they always have coffee near restaurant/ bar area. It's a very cozy place. Fire place in lobby, computers to use, heated endless pool with bar.. Laundry room on parking level. Fitness room near lobby. Manager Response: Dear Michael A,  Wow! Thank you for your kind words and feedback. We are happy to hear you enjoyed your time with us. We are especially delighted to hear David G. and Fernando made such a positive impact on your stay. We look forward to your next visit!

Summary: Country Inn is a wonderful place if you're out in Anaheim for a Disney trip, or whatever the case may be! Staff are so nice, polite, and welcoming, I felt so at home here.  The hotel itself has a very cozy feel, and it has a really nice design! For me, I had a wheelchair accessible room, and it was very nice! It also had a lot space for me to move around. The breakfast here was very delightful, especially the waffles. I highly recommend you stay here while you're in Anaheim, and every time I'm out here, I stay at Country Inn. :)

Summary: Hotel is quite new and in a good location in relation to the Disney Parks. You are just far enough away from the park to be out of the busy traffic and swarms of people but close enough to be just minutes away.  Good restaurants within a block's distance plus breakfast every morning included in the price.

I have no complaints and would recommend this hotel to anyone.

I booked a mini suite, there was barely enough room to walk around beds. First day, we had to shower in a pool of dirty water. Had to call for plumbing.   Breakfast: First hotel to come across that shuts down complementary breakfast at 9:30 am on weekdays. Manager Response: Dear Guest,    Thank you for taking the time to share your feedback.  We apologize for the dissatisfaction of your stay. Should you have any concerns during or after your stay, please reach out to me directly at 714-598-0600 Ext 705  Sincerely, Alex S. Rooms and F&B Manager

Summary: Completely happy with the luxury of this stay while our family (8 total in 2 rooms) enjoyed down time after Disney time. I’ll return as often as my travels allow me!!!

FREE Breakfast included (not your norm), and a spacious bar area. There was a bus ride that picks up at hotel and takes you directly to Disneyland. I arrive at the hotel to a warm welcome like no other Joey took that bad cab ride and my frown and turned it upside down.5 star customer service. Staff was great with kids.  Best day ever!

It was a great start to a busy day of adventuring. When we booked our trip we made sure that the hotel had a few things the bar being one important part. Manager Response: Dear Lisa B,  Thank you for the 5 out of 5 rating! We appreciate your feedback.

Manager Response: Dear Robert R,  We will let Federico know what an awesome job he did!

Summary: good location, check in procedure is fast and simple, room is nice and big, overall experience is great.Only thing very dissappointing is we got charged with an unknown reason when we check out the hotel, we have no response even when we emailed to ask for the reason of being charged. we also got a receipt of balance zero when i check out at the counter, but still i have been charged for no reason given.
Manager Response: Dear j0eyy123,  We are sorry to hear you had concerns regarding your billing. Please call any member of management at property level.

Summary: First of all... I need to give a shout out to Christine who works the front desk.  She was wonderful everytime we saw her (which was a lot).  When we needed a rollaway bed, towels, pillows, blankets, etc... it was all taken care of immediately because of her.  This was our first stay at this hotel and we will definitely be back!  The hotel is very clean (and I am very picky), quiet, and serves a great hot breakfast every morning.  There was always parking available when we got home late from the Disney parks and the wifi was really good as well. This hotel is only a mile and a half away from the parking entrance so we were there in five minutes.  They do offer a shuttle but if you have four or less people in your party, its cheaper to pay for parking. The only thing I prefer is
Manager Response: Dear Rachel D,  Thank you for taking the time to provide feedback regarding your recent stay. We look forward to your next visit.

Summary: We loved everything about our stay here, mainly that the employees treated us like family.  They bent over backwards to make my kids feel like everyday was the best day!  They did have cookies at the desk daily, and offered them regularly.  The pool wasawesome!  We went back to the hotel everyday in the middle of the day to relax in the pool as a break from Disneyland. The deepest part is 4'6", my 7 and 9 year old loved it.  The walk to the park was fine.  We walked over & back each morning and evening with a 9 and 7 year old.  It was certainly a hike.  I would say it took us 15 min each way, but the bus that comes around picks up other locations and took a little longer, so we chose to walk.  Many guests at the hotel took the bus.   We loved the breakfast! It was worth it.
Manager Response: Dear alisonsmith31,  Thank you so much for your feedback! We look forward to your next visit.

Summary: This is our go to hotel. Wed had the best experience here. Staff is beyond friendly. Breakfast was great. There was a variety of ideas to chose from. I have a kids & they enjoy the movie room they have available for kids.
Manager Response: Dear adryt202018,  Thank you for the 5 out of 5 rating!

Summary: My family of 4 stayed 4 nights during a Disneyland trip and I would stay here again. Clean rooms & facility, friendly service, heated pool and hot tub, free hot breakfast, and about 10-15 min walk from the park.There is a bus stop in the parking lot that runs every 20 minutes and takes you to Disneyland. We bought bus passes at check in expecting to use the bus but only used it once. It always seemed easier and faster to just walk then to wait or the bus and then sit through the stops.The hotel room was clean and quiet at night, not a lot of noise from the hallway or other rooms, but the room AC/heater was quite loud and seemed to have a hard time keeping a consistent temperature. There is a friendly person at the front desk 24/7. The hot breakfast was decent and saved a lot of
Manager Response: Dear NorCal0303,  We're happy to hear you enjoyed your time with us. Thank you for your feedback and we look forward to your next visit!

Summary: This hotel was very close (easy stroll) to Disneyland so was perfect for this first stage of our trip.  The staff were very welcoming and gave good advice on things to see and do other than Disneyland.   The rooms were spacious and clean and all facilities worked very well (showers/aircon/TV). The room cleaning was very thorough and regular.   The included breakfast was edible and pretty normal for this style of accommodation and there was no shortage.   Complimentary tea and coffee in foyer area was a nice touch and gave a reason to leave the room.    The complex had a good pool and gym but we didn’t use either so cannot comment.   I rate this hotel as very good for the price and proximity to Disneyland.
Manager Response: Dear ChrisGoldy,  Thank you for taking the time to provide feedback regarding your recent stay!

Summary: everything about this hotel was so nice. everyone was super helpful and friendly, the breakfast was amazing and it is in such a nice location. (we were there for the Disneyland park and it was only a 5 min walk!)
Manager Response: Dear laurentropeck,  It's great to hear you enjoyed your time with us! We look forward to your next visit!

Summary: The hotel was very clean, organized and had a nice complimentary breakfast. Customer service was great. Friendly staff, helpful. I would have liked if we were closer to restaurants or other eateries, but we ordered food which was fine, so we didn't starve. Pool was not heated as it states on website, but it was spacious, clean and kids still enjoyed.
Manager Response: Dear Voyager698447,  Thank you for the 5 out of 5 review!

Summary: If you are looking for a great clean hotel with comfortable beds, a beautiful pool, great happy hour and excellent breakfast then you have to stay here. The staff provides excellent customer service, especially Cherine. Thanks for making our weekend a relaxing one!
Manager Response: Dear zoes1pops,  We will definitely relay your kind words to Chrerine!

Summary: This property is our all time favorite when visiting Disneyland. Upon arriving we are greeted with a welcoming smile from Cherine Guirgius. Cherine is always willing to make sure we have everything needed to be comfortable. The rooms are spacious, clean and comfortable. The breakfast is amazing, the pizza and bar happy hour are always a treat while the kids swim. I’d highly recommend this property.
Manager Response: Dear Susan W,  Thank you for taking the time to provide feedback regarding your recent stay and your kind words about Cherine!

Summary: We had an amazing stay here, I have to give a huge shout out to Cherine Guirgus, she made it possible for us to have an amazing stay. Our room was very nice and the beds were so comfortable. Thank you Cherine for making it all possible!
Manager Response: Dear TaylorCaseyW,  We will definitely give this nice review to Cherine!

Summary: Super Clean, nice.  Met my expectations which is hard to do.  We liked it here.  King suit was nice two TVs my son loved having his own portion of the room.  I would definitely stay again and hold this place as what others should strive for.
Manager Response: Dear Jqesada83,  Thank you for the 5 out of 5 review!

Summary Heading: New Hidden Gem for Disneyland visit
Summary: We visited Disneyland Theme Parks on short notice and loved this property. The staff (Cherine) was very helpful and was able to accommodate us on the short notice when most all rooms in the area were booked due to events at Disneyland Resort and Anaheim Convention Center. It is a new property all within walking distance of the Anaheim Garden Walk (restaurants and shopping mall), Disneyland Theme Parks (approx. 1 mile), Anaheim Convention Center and Downtown Disney District. We will be staying here again.
Manager Response: Dear Battalion39,  Thank you for your feedback. We will definitely relay your kind words to Cherine!

Summary: This Country inn and suites was an great place to stay and was a short walk to the park. The free breakfast was out of this world. We will stay here again when we visit again. The staff was fantastic everyone from the general manager to the front desk staff to the maintenance personel were all so friendly.
Manager Response: Dear ktippie1,  Thank you for taking the time to provide feedback regarding your recent stay. We look forward to your next visit!

Summary: I decided to make a stop at Disneyland while driving solo across the country and ended up at this hotel. It turned out to be the perfect decision. The room was super clean and comfortable. The bed was great and the hotel was really quiet, at least where I was located was quiet (1st floor.) The washing machine and dryer are free and work quite well. The place is also fairly close to the parks (depending on how much you want to walk) and they are also on a shuttle route. If you get super lazy the Uber cost rom the hotel is cheap too. I enjoyed being close to the parks while not being right up next to them.
Manager Response: Dear LaurieG384,  We are delighted to hear you enjoyed your time at the Country Inn & Suites by Radisson. We look forward to your next visit!

Summary: Hotel is very close to Disneyland and is newer and clean with large rooms.  You could add a rolling bed or sleeping bags on the floor for the kids if you wanted.  Breakfast Buffet is included.  They also have a shuttle for a fee if you don't want to walk.
Manager Response: Dear sherryliken,  Thank you for the 5 out of 5 rating!

Summary Heading: Perfect place to stay for couples and families
Summary: This hotel was a great experience for us. Close to the parks, good variety of breakfast choices, free underground parking, clean facilities throughout, and good staff. Highly recommend staying here!!!
Manager Response: Dear ragehmlich,  Thank you for your kind words! We look forward to your next visit.

Summary: Hotel facilities were new, great swimming pool, breakfast was great. Staff fabulous. We will stay again on our next Disney trip. Had an awesome room for the kids with giant beanbags and TV. Bus to Disneyland picks up and drops off at hotel, Purchase tickets at front desk. We stayed in a room with 2 queen beds which was great for 2 adults and 2 kids
Manager Response: Dear dkdemers,  Thank you for your feedback. We appreciate the 5 out of 5 rating!

Summary: We recently stayed at this property and our experience was wonderful.  The staff, without exception, was gracious and helpful and the breakfast was terrific with a good selection of cold and hot breakfast items. Our king room was spacious and quiet.  But in my opinion, what really sets this property apart is the pool area.  It's beautifully done and the swimming pool is HUGE and perfect for kids.  Families with younger children will want to be aware that from the hotel lobby to the front gates at Disneyland is about a 20 minute walk.  My only beef about this property would be the fairly steep "resort fee" of $17 a day.  It certainly takes the "free" out of free parking.  While this fee wasn't a surprise and many other hotels have embraced the same revenue stream, I'm not a fan
Manager Response: Dear Dale6284,  Thank you for your feedback!

Summary: This hotel is perfect in every way. The location is within walking distance to Disneyland which is why we chose Country Inn & Suites. However, I was delighted with every aspect of this Hotel. It was welcoming, open, light, and fresh smelling with no stale odors. We walked to the parks the first day, which was about 4 blocks. However, we chose to purchase a daily bus pass at the front desk for the rest of our stay because by the end of a day in the parks we were beat and welcomed a ride back. The bus stop is a few yards outside the front doors, the bus comes about every 30 minutes, and there is only one stop before you get to the park.  Coming back there are 3-4 stops. The front desk staff is so friendly and helpful. Especially if you are fortunate to interact with Cristine or
Manager Response: Dear Renske C,  We are happy to hear you enjoyed everything the Country Inn & Suites, Anaheim has to offer. We appreciate your feedback and will relay your kind words to Fernando, Christina and Dave!

Summary Heading: Great service for an unexpected stay!
Summary: Mish, front desk agent, went out of her way to accomodate our needs. Beautiful hotel in a convenient location. We love that breakfast is provided. The staff was very nice. Highly recommend this hotel.
Manager Response: Dear dencat012001,  Thank you for the 5 out of 5 review. We will relay your kind words to Mish!

Summary: Our stay was awesome. Our room and the entire property was very clean and well maintained. The breakfast was hot and fresh. The pool is large and open 6:00 am until midnight. Each staff member was amazing and so helpful with any questions that we had. Joey at the front desk was especially great and went out of his way to make our stay comfortable and fun! Free WiFi.  A ten minute walk to Disneyland or ART bus stops right in front of the property. We will definitely stay here again..
Manager Response: Dear Barbi D,  Thank you for taking the time to provide feedback regarding your recent stay. We appreciate your review.

Summary: I am so pleased to see by the recent reviews that others have equally enjoyed this property. The staff were outstanding. Cherine and Joey thank you.  We had rm342. It was a twin room and more the adequate for the 3 of us. We could watch the fireworks from our room. Yes there was a little road noice for us but then we live out in the country in NZ so we were always going to notice that.  The walk is just 10min to the entrance of Disney and 1/2 that to several restaurants nearby. Breakfast was more than adequate and came complimentary.  The pool area was great and given the time of year very quiet.  The complimentary wifi worked very well which our daughter loved!  The TV channel choice was also more than adequate.  All in all I'm pleased we followed those that gave this place a
Manager Response: Dear Steve D.   Thank you for your feedback. We will definitely pass on these kind words to Cherine and Joey!

Summary: Stayed here with my family for over a week, and every employee we came across with were kind and professional.We will definitely stay here again as we travel to LA/Anaheim quite often.The room was clean, the pool was nice, and the food was quite decent.
Manager Response: Dear Justin L,  Thank you for the 5 out of 5 rating!

Summary: As a Travel Agent I like to visit hotels that I suggest to my clients.  Country Inn & Suites Anaheim, provided me with a wonderful experience that I intend to share with all of my clients who visit the Anaheim area.  The rooms, community area, pool area, buffet breakfast were beautiful designed, clean, comfortable and inviting and each staff member that I met was extremely friendly and helpful.  I'll definitely stay here again with my family!
Manager Response: Dear Terri H,  Thank you for visiting us and thank you for your kind words! We look forward to your next visit.

Summary: The website and the outside appearance made me book this stay. The $17 resort fee was a bit overboard. This was definitely not a resort. The breakfast was good. There was a bar but with limited food options.
Manager Response: Dear kcjhwk,  Thank you for your feedback. Your concerns have been forwarded to the appropriate department head.

Summary: Our stay has been great. The hotel is clean, new, and well taken care of. We had an issue in the room with the light not turning on, we weren't pressing the button hard enough. Sent a person up to help immediately. Maximino has been a life saver in the breakfast area as he has accommodated our special requests. So far so good, will update when we leave. You can buy your disney tickets in the lobby, has a cool tv/teen area near the breakfast area. Uber is about $7 to Disney from here.
Manager Response: Dear purochihuas,  Thank you for your kind words! We will let Maximino know what a great job he's done.

Summary: My wife and I spent a couple of days at Disneyland.  The hotel is only a couple of years old so everything is new and well maintained.  It is walking distance to Disneyland which is a big plus.  Parking is included with the resort fee.  Resort fee is resonable at around 20.00.  Manager and front desk employees are very nice.  Will definitely stay here again.
Manager Response: Dear cuaman,  Thank you for the 5 out of 5 rating!

Summary: All staff from front desk to cleaning crew to breakfast team were friendly and helpful.  Hotel was clean.  Nice pool and whirlpool.  Great hot breakfast.   Short 10-15 minute walk to Disneyland.  Only drawback was that the bathroom had no place to hang your towels.  Only one hook in the tub/shower.   But we asked for extra clean towels and we got them fast.
Manager Response: Dear GJCCamden_Sc,  Thank you for your feedback and kind words!

Summary: Comfortable and convenient in terms of location and proximity to Disneyland; unpretentious and with access to all the basic amenities and services one requires for a complete stay.  Friendly and cheerful service at front desk. We arrived about an hour prior to check in yet were able to check in without delay.  We enjoyed the complimentary breakfast; basic but filling.  Overall a great start to our vacation and recommended.
Manager Response: Dear prwoo,  Thank you for taking the time to provide feedback regarding your recent stay.

Summary: All of the staff that we interacted with at this hotel was very friendly.  The bistro service was excellent and the pizza was terrific.  The breakfast was quality and the staff attending the breakfast area was great.
