Manager Response: Dear cadurbin15,  Thank you for your kind words. We will definitely let our Chef know you enjoyed his pizza!

Summary: Clean rooms, friendly staff. Nice view of Disney from hotel window.  Close to amenities and entertainment. In house amenities such as pool and hot tub were nice.  Gym needs more equipment but is functional.
Manager Response: Dear holnessnm,  Thank you for your feedback.

Summary: Our hotel stay was great! We came to go to Disneyland for a couple days and we loved being so close to the park! Was able to use the pool also and loved it, the jacuzzi was my favorite!! Our room was very clean and comfy!! And breakfast every morning was fantastic lots of choices!! Will definitely recommend this hotel and look forward to staying again!!
Manager Response: Dear chevonp2001,  Thank you for taking the time to provide feedback regarding your recent stay. We look forward to your next visit!

Summary: I was so surprised by the quality of this hotel! 10 min walk to Disney (bus stop also available for the ART), huge pool, great free breakfast, friendly staff, very large room... great value for this hotel, we will stay again!
Manager Response: Dear mrskelleelyn,  Thank you for your feedback. Our proximity to the Disneyland Resort makes for a great vacation. We look forward to your next stay!

Summary Heading: I want to back this hotel....
Summary: Very clean hotel, kind and friendly staff, good service. 英語がうまくできなくても気軽に話しかけてくれて助けてくれるスタッフ、新しいためにシンプルかつ綺麗でおしゃれなホテル内、朝ごはんもメニューはあまりかわらないけど美味しいし、洗濯プール筋トレまで無料でできちゃいます！！！ディズニーのチケットもホテル内で購入できるため、とても便利でした。また行きたいです。
Manager Response: Dear ppds246nyp,  ご意見ありがとうございます。

Summary: Had an unforgettable experience at Country Inn & Suites. The staff is incredibly nice. Beautiful pool. Super clean rooms and bathroom. Rooms have microwave and small fridge. Overall perfect. I'm sure we will be returning.
Manager Response: Dear oceanadri,  We are happy to hear you enjoyed your time with us. We look forward to your next visit!

Summary Heading: Best Hotel I've Stayed in long time that was Immaculate!
Summary: I stay in a lot of Hotels because of work  this Hotel is the Best Immaculate Clean Staff is Top of the line  anything you want or need its rite there Wouldn't Stay anywhere else in the Anaheim Area Very Safe Parking Well Lit Breakfast is Great too I Definitely will be staying here again Oh and I Forgot BRAND NEW!!!
Manager Response: Dear Granny M,  Thank you for the 5 out of 5 rating!

Summary: if you want a clean family friendly hotel that offers great service and make you feel at home, within walking distance to Disneyland this is it. Plus parking, breakfast and WiFi included Yes you pay resort fee but is a lot less then what you would pay for breakfast, parking and WiFi at other hotels. Maria and Bryan made breakfast a little extra special with there great hospitality. Can’t thank Alex enough for his great service. This is definitely our go to hotel around Disneyland.
Manager Response: Dear romerom951,  Thank you for the 5 out of 5 rating! We will let Maria, Alex and Bryan know what a positive impact they left.

Summary: Everyone was very friendly and helpful here. I requested a special room that was easily given us when we arrived. I loved the breakfast, although they could have mixed it up a bit with a different variety of food every day. The pool was like salt water, kind of gross, but the kids had fun anyway swimming. Overall a good stay, super close to Disney, we easily walked each day.
Manager Response: Dear LiCB14,  Thank you for your feedback!

Summary: This is a fantastic hotel.  Took the kids on a road trip (flew in to San Fran and then down the coast all the way to Anaheim).  We stayed in 5 hotels on the way down, all of them higher star rated (4.5 and 4’s) and significantly more expensive - funny enough this was the one that knocked it out of the park on every level.  The rooms may not be as “glitzy” as some of the others, but it better suited the needs of my children and was completely comfortable.  Laundry facilities  available free of charge, a pool that is open till midnight, free parking and breakfast included, who can beat that?  Breakfast was well run with really efficient service from serving to cleanup.  The location is ideal for Disney, but what truly makes this hotel stand out are the people - the staff here make
Manager Response: Dear rrand,  Thank you for your feedback and the 5 out of 5 rating! We are happy to hear you and your family enjoyed your time with us.

Summary: This hotel was so much better than expected. My wife and I were looking to try different hotels as we are annual pass holders for Disneyland, and luckily we came across this hotel. First, it's relatively new and the exterior and interior features is modern and nice. We arrived and the front desk staff were very friendly and it was a quick check in. Also, we arrived around 12 pm and the room was ready! We were in room 532 and the it was HUGE! Loved it. It was clean and the hallway was very quiet at night, which was a major plus for us since we stayed at nearby hotels that were nosey.   Also, the distance between here and Disneyland is about a 15-20 minute walk, but if you Lyft it'll take about 4-5 minute drive. Do use those Lyft promo codes as it will cost you about $6 each trip.
Manager Response: Dear David V,  Thank you for your feedback and kind words! We are happy to hear you and you wife enjoyed your time with us. We look forward to your next visit.

Summary: Great hotel. Clean, staff was friendly, and helpful.  Nice rooms with microwave & fridge.  Breakfast was great too!  Good location.  ART picks up right on the property.  Ten minute ride to Disneyland.  I would definitely recommend this hotel & will stay there again I the future.
Manager Response: Dear lattegirl443,  Thank you for the 5 out of 5 rating! See you next time!

Summary: Stayed here for 3nights during our visit to Disneyland. We were in a suite with a king bed, a queen bed and a sofa bed, so it was extra roomy and comfortable for our family of 2 adults and a toddler. The room and facilities are well kept, clean and quiet. Staff are attentive and welcoming. Decent breakfast buffet selection. The hotel doesn't provide shuttle service to Disneyland, but the hotel is a close walking distance to Disneyland....only as far a walk as the overflow parking to Disneyland, so save the $20 Disneyland parking fee and just walk.
Manager Response: Dear Mailao V,  We are glad to hear you and your family enjoyed your time with us! Our proximity to the Disneyland Resort definitely helps. We look forward to your next visit.

Summary: The African American woman at the front desk was so polite and accommodating our stay and our Disneyland plans. Anytime you seen any staff they were smiling and polite. The pool was amazing and you could see the Disneyland fireworks from the pool. Buffet breakfast was a great way to save. The warm chocolate chip cookies in the evening were a bonus. We will definitely choose CI for our next Disneyland vacation.
Manager Response: Dear JacuelynW57,  We are happy to hear you enjoyed your time at the Country Inn & Suites by Radisson. Thank you for the 5 out of 5 rating!

Summary Heading: Best price, Great location, great Hotel!!
Summary: The hotel was exceptionally clean and it looked like it would cost a lot more to stay there then it actually did. The amenities are great, pool is open 6 am to 12 am, great for those long days at Disney. if you are looking for a great leisurely time in a great hotel at a great price then chose Country Inn in Anaheim.
Manager Response: Dear h4mne66z,  We are happy to hear you enjoyed all the Country Inn & Suites has to offer. See you during your next visit!

Summary: Great family stay for two small children. Everything was perfect. The 15 minute walk to Disneyland was easy. Shop was handy. Room was clean and well presented. Parking was easy. Very good stay thank you!
Manager Response: Dear RegDeany,  Thank you for taking the time to provide  feedback regarding your recent stay.We are delighted to hear you enjoyed your time with us!

Summary: We called Country Inn at midnight after finding out we had been overbooked at an extended stay America in Burbank.  It was Saturday night on Labor day weekend.  I have my family in the car with no place to stay!  Never book with Expedia- call the hotel directly. The service and staff here are exceptional! Will definitely stay here again.
Manager Response: Dear Brian M,  It's great to hear we able to accommodate you during your visit to the area. There is nothing worse than not having a place to sleep, especially during a busy Holiday weekend.

Summary: This was my second time staying in this hotel and I was not disappointed. I love this hotel’s energy effieciency in each room. The staff are all friendly and helpful. I would definitely recommend this hotel to a friend, and I would definitely stay here again.
Manager Response: Dear mwitthuhn94,   Thank you for staying with us again! We're looking forward to your next visit.

Summary: Many hotels to choose from and picked this one because of distance to DL, free parking and breakfast: So glad we did!!! Walking distance to Disney Land - wonderful free breakfast  with many items to choose from with beautiful large seating area - kids have cute "veg out room" next to lounge area - free parking - large pool and hot tub - work out room - wonderful friendly staff - large rooms - very clean property  - only set back construction right next door - but would definitely stay again - great value!!
Manager Response: Thank you for your 5 out 5 rating!

Summary: Booked a one-night stay through the Hotel Tonight app, so I believe we got a good deal. It's close to Disneyland, which is a huge plus. Was pleasantly surprised by the free breakfast. As a low/no carb vegetarian, there's not much beyond scrambled eggs, but the mere fact that they were an option was nice. Also, if you're a child-free couple that finds kid noise unbearable, steer clear. It's mostly families staying here.
Manager Response: Dear Regina G,  Thank you for taking time to provide feedback regarding your recent stay at the Country Inn & Suites Anaheim.

Summary: Hi h r u everything is ok , staff , hotel and breakfast staff everything is ok , I am satisfied with this hotel , hopefully I visit again and stay this hotel. I tell my friends to clean & good service this hotel ok thanks
Manager Response: Dear Amandeep G,  Thank you for your review!

Summary: Not worth what we paid. But not horrible. it is a 3 star place for 4 star prices. Business center computers not functioning, cheap towels, quilt with the stuffing all bunched up in corners, situated right on a major highway surrounded by major power lines means this is not about any kind of special experience, just a place to sleep that will not kill you. Do not book this to impress a date by any means.
Manager Response: Dear nielsh928,  We are sorry to hear you did not completely enjoy your time with us. We hope we can make things right the next time you visit.

Summary: Before our check in Ruben, the front desk manager helped us out a lot. Their staff is very welcoming and friendly.  The hotels decor is sleek, modern and cozy.  Their rooms are clean, modern and fairly sized.  The location of the hotel is great, walking distance to Disneyland and to many restaurants and shops.  The breakfast is actually pretty good, the options are enough to give variety.  Nothing negative to say.  If I ever visited Anaheim I will definitely stay here again.
Manager Response: Dear Ebru S,  Thank you for your kind words! We look forward to you next visit!

Summary Heading: The place to take your family
Summary: Such a friendly place to take family on vacation.  Front desk was amazing from check in to check out after staying for several days we felt we were leaving friends behind and invited them when they come our way to let us know to see if we could match the wonderful hospitality back to them that they offered us.  So very clean!  Everywhere from our hotel room to the washer/ dryer facilities everything was spotless.  The housekeeping crew should get 5 stars!  Words can not express our thanks for making our family trip memorable.  Pool / hot tub is over the top with cleanliness, towels, chairs and the exact right temperatures.  I have never watched fireworks from a pool before and it was very fun.  Just the right touch with warm cookies- Great job Country Inn we WILL be back!
Manager Response: Dear KjC830,  Thank you for the 5 out of 5 rating! We're happy to hear you and your family enjoyed your time with us. See you next time!

Summary: A great first impression when booking this hotel. I was helped by a friendly and knowledgeable staff person, Cherine, who was able to accommodate all of our special requests for our rooms. She went above and beyond to meet our needs. I am so grateful and thankful for her patience and we are looking forward to our stay this weekend. If all the staff were like Cherine, I am sure we will have a fabulous experience at the hotel!
Manager Response: Dear TripMom2001,  Thank you for the 5 out of 5 rating! We will definitely relay your kind words to Cherine.

Summary: This was a great hotel for our family. We had a king suite and had more than enough room. Friendly staff, clean hotel. Breakfast was nice even offered to go cups for coffee. Pool was great for kids of all ages. Just wish they had more hooks in the room to hang towels up and swim suits.
Manager Response: Dear Melissa O,  Thank you for your feedback. See you next time!

Summary: We enjoyed our stay at this hotel. We were uppgraded at the incheckning at no cost. Pleasant surprise. The room was enormous with a separate bedroom and lounge.  The pool area was a bit dull but luckily it was a quite a big pool. The breakfast was allright, better than other American breakfasts we have eaten.  It was close to Disneyland, approximately 15-20 minutes to walk. Just remember which entrance at Disneyland you enter,  cause we mixed upp and went out at the other side of the park. It was frustrating being tried after 13 hours On feet. There are a couple of things that were bothering about the hotel: the highway is right beside, however we were not disturbed by the noise. There is a new hotel under the construction right next to country inn. Again it didnt bother oss so
Manager Response: Dear Saga K,  Thank you for your feedback regarding your recent stay.

Summary: Very comfortable good facilities helpful staff good breakfast overall very comfortable  I chose this hotel because I had underground parking and I want to secure parking for my car because I was moving my daughter into college and we had a car full of her belongings
Manager Response: Dear Rachel D,  Thank you for your feedback! Best wishes to your daughter and her college career!

Summary: A convenient stay close to Disneyland - an easy 10 minute walk or cheap Uber. Parking free and gift shop great for beverages if needed.  Room was comfortable, clean and modern.  The only major negative was the breakfast. Stale bread, inedible hot food and no fruit at 2nd breakfast. The breakfast staff physically locked and bolted the buffet room door when breakfast was over, rather than just start taking items away as normal, which was very uncomfortable for all the guests. I can't say I've ever encountered that before.  Fix the breakfast and this would be a 5/5 hotel.
Manager Response: Dear Tomby1,  Thank you for your feedback regarding your recent stay at the Country Inn & Suites by Radisson. Your comments have been forwarded to members of management in hopes of improving the breakfast experience. Thank you for your response and we look forward to your next visit to the Anaheim area.

Summary: We love this hotel. We stay here at least once a year when we visit Disneyland. It’s close enough to the park and offers a decent breakfast and the amenities are nice. Best part is the property is newer and the service is amazing. We have been helped by Fernando our previous 2 stays and  I can’t say enough about how amazing and professional he is. This hotel is lucky to have him.  We were also helped by Nina and she is really good too. My only suggestion is to upgrade the pool towels. They are poor quality and too small.
Manager Response: Dear rparkerTahoe,  Thank you for your pleasant feedback! Your kind words for Fernando and Nina have not gone unnoticed. We look forward to your next visit!

Summary Heading: Excellent hotel in easy walking distance of Disneyland
Summary: This hotel gave us a perfect base for the Disneyland parks. No need to drive at all as both the parks plus Downtown Disney are within easy walking distance, as are various cafes and restaurants. Breakfast filled us up nicely and later in the day there were complimentary cookies and coffee in the lobby. Pizzas and other food available at hotel bar. Also had a couple of cocktails and some wine there. Handy to be able to get these without going out. Pool area is lovely. Swam first thing and the pool also looked great in the evenings.
Manager Response: Dear kathstevens2017,  Thank you for the 5 out of 5 review and your kind words! See you next time!

Summary: Stayed here for 7 nights with my partner & our 11 month old son & it was awesome. We arrived at about 9pm & were greeted with a smile by the manager on duty (cant remember his name) who promptly checked us in, gave us our parking pass & directed us to our room. Throughout our stay all the staff who we came into contact with were helpful, courteous & always smiling. The daily breakfast was nice, free wifi & free parking a definite bonus considering alot of other hotels in the area charge for both. Walking distance to Disneyland but also the option of buying a day shuttle pass for a small fee. Room was huge, lots of space for bags. Nice & clean bathroom, we had a king bed which was awesome! Always had a good nights sleep. Pool is nice & big. Could do with a few more umbrella’s in
Manager Response: Dear Levi D,  We are happy to hear you enjoyed everything the Country Inn & Suites has to offer! Your comment regarding more umbrella's has been forwarded to the appropriate manager. Thank you for your feedback and we look forward to your next visit.

Summary: Great food, staff and pool.  Location was perfect and love self-parking. Gift shop was perfect for food and beverages; although, selling wine would have been better :) Our room was spacious, which is great for kids.
Manager Response: Thank you for the 5 out of 5 rating!

Summary: Here is why i wouldnt come back to this hotel: I booked through hotwire, and it was a little pricer than the others because it was by Disney, but i wanted something clean, that included breakfast and parking. However, the price was a LIE. When you there, breakfast and parking is NOT INCLUDED. Do not fall for free breakfast. Its not. I left paying them $39.85 for breakfast and parking for two nights. Breakfast was CRAP. It was soooo horrible. Not worth waking up to eat at all.  The staff was extremely friendly, the hotel is super clean and nice, but i gave it 3 stars because the hotel description on Hotwire was a lie, AND breakfast was disgusting. No exaggeration, my husband and i ate oatmeal and toast. The orange juice was gross, the coffee was gross, the waffles were gross,
Manager Response: Thank you for reviewing our Hotel. We are sorry for the miscommunication from Hotwire. Though the Country Inn & Suites does not mandate placement of information on Hotwire's website, we will definitely reach out to them to ensure notice of our nightly resort fee is more visible. We appreciated any and all feedback and would love to speak with you in person to see how we can better serve you in the future. Please feel free to reach out to any member of management at your convenience.

Summary: This place more than met my expectations! It appears to be a relatively new property just a couple blocks from Disney (bus route #7 - hotel circle) or about a 15 mins. walk. The amenities checked all the boxes and then some! Free parking, nice, clean lobby with a bar (happy hour from 5-7pm!). The rooms were comfortable and clean. Again, everything seems pretty new which is a bonus. Our favorite was the pool! Nice, big, warm, salt water with shower and restrooms. It was a nice break from the park in the middle of the day! Full breakfast in the morning was unexpected and welcome!  The GardenWalk shopping center is around the corner and has lots of restaurants, just an 8min. walk away! Super convenient!
Manager Response: Dear SuzieBlitz1,  Thank you for the 5 out of 5 rating and the kind words. We look forward to your next visit to the Anaheim area!

Summary: My family had 2 wonderful nights here.  The value is excellent given that our booking included a nice buffet breakfast, free outdoor or underground parking, a beautiful pool, and WIFI in our room.    The main lobby and dining area are sleek and modern in design, and kept very clean.  Breakfast included scrambled eggs, sausage/bacon, waffles, oatmeal, fresh fruit, toast and bagels, and coffee and tea.    Our room was very clean and comfortable, and included a mini-fridge to store our drinks from a nearby Walmart!  We stayed on the 4th of 5 floors, and enjoyed a decent view of the nightly fireworks at Disney.  The only criticism I have is the hotel's location.  While it was awesome that it was VERY close to a highway off-ramp exit (Santa Ana Freeway #5),  the downside was that we
Manager Response: Dear spuddybun,  Thank you for the 5 out of 5 rating!

Summary Heading: ABOVE AND BEYOND IN CUSTOMER SERVICE
Summary: My husband and I manage and coach Foothill Gold Fastpitch Softball and travel often with the team for out of town tournaments.  Our team has stayed at this hotel twice now and both experiences have been amazing.  The families on our team requested this hotel following our first experience.  All staff members went above and beyond, from Debra Tripp, Sales Coordinator, making arrangements for the Team to have a dinner prepared and ready when we returned from a day of play to Gary Garcia, Director of Sales, personally speaking to the families to ensure that we were taken care of.  We were in the SoCal area for a week long tournament, July 28th-Aug 4th, and had the opportunity to speak to several other members of the staff, all making sure all our needs were met.  Our team will be
Manager Response: Dear Jennifer P,  Thank you for your feedback. We will relay your kind words to Debbie and Gary!

Summary: I’ve stayed at this hotel twice now and both times everything was great. The location is close enough to walk to Disneyland, the rooms have been very clean and comfortable, the breakfast and gift shop are great. I haven’t had time to use the pool or business center. I will definitely stay here again!
Manager Response: Dear sarahjzaugg,  Thank you for your agreeable comments and the 5 out of 5 rating!

Summary: Beds are itchy. Bed bugs. A local advised me that this hotel is known for bed bugs. Linen on beds had holes. Sheet did not fit bed.Female reception advised of a doctor to use he came to my room and trapped me into charges of $3450 US for a 5 minute consultation. Variety of food at breakfast was non existent Breakfast closes at 9.30am during the weekWould never stay here again!!!Also hotel right next to power poles and power lines which is not ever disclosed! Most people wouldn't care about this but I do.I would give a minus rating if I could!
Manager Response: Dear Lenny121,    We appreciate you taking the time to complete a survey regarding your recent stay with us.   Please reach out to any member of management to discuss your recent stay in further detail.

Summary: This is a great place to stay if you are visiting the Anaheim area. Walking distance to Disney theme parks and also garden walk, which is a selection of restaurants. The pool and spa area were great, the rooms clean and nice decor, the staff friendly and helpful. Free wifi, free parking and free breakfast. The breakfast was basic but ok, the eggs i would give those a miss!! Nothing for a gluten free person either. The bar was good and does offer a really basic snack/pizza menu, best to walk down the road to the garden walk.
Manager Response: Dear TripMember02202017,  Thank you for your feedback.

Summary: awesome bed and staff and the internet's feast too it was close to everything and there was a lot of stuff to do while relaxing. the cleaning staff were amazing and my room was perfect every night. 10/10
Manager Response: Dear tomdetrain,  Thank you for the 5 out of 5 rating! We are happy to hear you enjoyed your time with us. See you next time!

Summary: We stayed here for two nights. The rooms are very modern and clean. The staff is very friendly and answered all of our questions. The breakfast was good . The pool was a good size and very clean. The bus to Disneyland is a few steps away in front of the parking lot. We ubered to downtown Disney for 6 bucks.
Manager Response: Dear Karen B,  Thank you for the feedback! See you during your next visit to the Disneyland Resort!

Summary: This is my second time at hotel, and I will stay here again. Very close to Garden Walk and the short walk to Disney is fine. It was nice to have a break at hotel in heat of the day. AC works great. I wish they had towel hooks or rack in or outside bathroom as there is no place to hang wet towels. Staff was friendly. Everyone said hi.
Manager Response: Dear Patricia H,  We are happy to hear this was your second visit with us! Thank you for choosing the Country Inn & Suites by Radisson and we hope to see you during your next visit to the Anaheim area!

Summary: Room fully equipped upon arrival, however don’t expect house keeping to replenish coffee/tea unless you complain, do not expect any helpful assistance with local information eg. How to send mail , as was travelling from New Zealand was not sure where to send birthday gift from , somewhat expecting assistance from front desk only to be told “to use Google and find myself a UPS OR FEDX “ being left no option but to do so I locate my nearest UPS who kindly redirect me to USPS (UNITED STATE POSTAL SERVICE) advising me they could send my card for me but would be 1/10th of the price at USPS . Personally I would have thought the front desk surely could of either advised me of this or hell sent it with their mail for me. Don’t bother ordering from Bistro forget whatever the menu states
Manager Response: Dear Cheyenne Carr, We are sorry to hear you have not fully enjoyed your time here at the Country Inn & Suites. Though our we are not a full service hotel our main goal is to ensure our guests feel at home at all times and we apologize that you feel we did not meet your expectations. A full investigation of service shortfalls that were brought to our attention is underway. We would like to discuss you visit if further detail. If you have the time please meet with any member of management before your departure.

Summary: Overall, happy with the Radisson. Wish there was a restaurant on the property though. Very friendly staff. Could have been better stocked in the gift shop with more of the basics a traveler might need and forgot
Manager Response: Dear hymiebrand,  Thank you for taking the time to provide feedback regarding your recent stay at the Country Inn & Suites by Radisson. We appreciated your feedback and will revisit the stocking of our gift shop.

Summary: We stayed here for 3 nights as a family and reserved 2 rooms.  Cleanliness is a priority and they met my expectations.  The breakfast was fabulous with a huge variety and the staff was very quick at cleaning the tables and restocking the food.  The front desk was friendly and helpful when we needed directions quickly!  The walk to Disneyland from the hotel was easy and close enough.  It was very well lit and had sidewalks.  We were always greeted when entering or leaving the hotel and the rooms were well maintained, modern and roomy.
Manager Response: Thank you for your feedback and kind words!

Summary: Good hotel nice and close to Disneyland (Roughly a 10 minute walk). Their breakfast every morning is more than adequate and the pool is nice. You can see the Disney fireworks from the hotel. Underground parking is also nice to keep your car out of the sun.
Manager Response: Dear Kyle P,  Thank you for taking the time to provide feedback regarding your recent stay here at the Country Inn & Suites by Radisson. We look forward to your next visit to the Anaheim area!

Summary: It's a bit dusty in the lobby at the minute due to refurbishment work going on, plus another hotel is being built next to it so that dominates your view now but overall it's well located for family visits to Disney. Limited bathroom products on offer so bring your own shower gel.
Manager Response: Dear Richard S,  We are sorry to hear you did not fully enjoy your time with us. We look forward to having a chance to better serve you in the future.

Summary: - 10 min walking distance to the Disney parks - pool open till midnight - breakfast  included (although you get tired of it after 2 days. It’s only scrambled eggs, hash brown, fruit, oatmeal toast  sausages and pancakes) - very comfy beds and pillows  - a bit loud as it sits between 2 noisy streets - free parking  - free WIFI
Manager Response: Dear Monika S.,  Thank you for your review!

Summary: My family of 2 stayed here and we had lots of fun. The amenities were great and I loved how we could see the fireworks from the pool. Mish was very helpful and had great customer service. Definitely recommend this hotel! Though, it would be great if there’s a shuttle to disney.
Manager Response: Dear Chloe R,  We are happy to hear you enjoyed your time with us! We will relay your kind words to Mish.

Summary: Veronica D. is always friendly and productive behind the bar. She makes a great Old Fashioned and engages with all her guests. The rooms are spacious, clean, and very affordable. This is my hotel of choice when traveling to Anaheim.
Manager Response: Dear WalterS88819,  Thank you for your kind words. We will definitely let Veronica know she did an amazing job at assisting our guests.

Summary Heading: Great place to stay within a short walk of Disneyland
Summary: Really enjoyed this hotel.  Friendly staff was very helpful in getting out Disney tickets arranged quickly.  Room was comfortable, amenities were great, and a short walk to Disney for a good price for a family of 5.
Manager Response: Dear glempe,  Thank you for the 5 out of 5 rating! We look forward to your next visit!

Summary: Great hotel. Well located for Disney. Room was spacious and clean. Overlooked the Poole so had some guest noise late into the evening, but not excessive. Staff helpful and efficient, but bar understaffed a couple of evenings. Would definitely stay again.
Manager Response: Dear Railto2,  Thank you for the 5 out of 5 rating! We look forward to your next visit!

Summary: Radisson introduces this new line of hotels and boy is the name misleading... I think rustic setting but in reality, it is modern, spiffy decor, and modern amenities in the room.   I booked it after seeing the photos on the site.   It certainly did not disappoint.  As we were pulling up to the hotel, the Disney fireworks were going off and it seemed like they were going off from the the adjacent hotel roof they were that close.    There is free parking, free internet, and a free full buffet breakfast for all included.   The only negative here was the $17 per night resort fee.  I hate resort fees and I guess parking and breakfast were not really free then... :(.  But, this was the only negative.   Well, there is one more...you just drove four hours to the hotel, you arrive late
Manager Response: Dear Calbuccaneer,  We are happy to hear you and your family enjoyed your time with us! See you next time!

Summary: This hotel was extremely clean and in a very convenient location for our activities for the week. You could see the Disney fireworks every night at 9:30pm from the pool area!! I would highly recommend.
Manager Response: Dear snbjones,  Thank you for your feedback!

Summary Heading: Country Inn and Suites Hotel Disneyland
Summary: This new Country Inn and Suites Hotel near Disneyland is amazing.  Very nice, clean, friendly hotel with great customer service.  We will definitely stay there again.  The hotel is about a half a mile away from Disneyland.  The hotel has good food and comfortable beds.  This hotel is also a great place to watch the Disney fireworks at night.
Manager Response: Dear DougDMH,  Thank you for taking the time to let us know about your recent stay at the Country Inn & Suites.

Summary: Very clean modern hotel Excellent free breakfast  Excellent staff 15 min walk to Disneyland  Free self parking  Very spacious room The kids loved going to the pool  We’ll definitely stay in this hotel again
Manager Response: Dear Willylucy,  Thank you for the excellent review! We are happy to hear your kids enjoyed our swimming pool!

Summary: This is a new hotel within walking distance to Disneyland (two to three city blocks).  This is not a luxury hotel but the amenities, cleanliness and staff are a deluxe level with moderate prices.  Great breakfast food, friendly, helpful staff.  My only complaint is the professionalism of the breakfast staff-they were not experienced.  They were helpful and friendly if they needed help but when they were standing around, you could hear them talking about partying and they used inappropriate language for a family friendly hotel.  Just teach them to talk about that stuff out of earshot of guests and they will be fine.  We would definitely stay again.  Everyone from the front desk staff to the housekeeping and maintenance people were friendly and helpful.
Manager Response: Dear janetholden,  Thank you for the 5 out of 5 rating!

Summary: This hotel is very good clean, new and child friendly, also very comfortable beds and excelent service from all the staff do I pretty recommend this hotel for everybody that would like to stay in this area
Manager Response: Dear Asultan17,  Thank you for recommending out hotel to future visitors to the Anaheim area!

Summary: We came to LA to watch a game at the Rose bowl, another at stubhub Center, and to go to Disney. I decided to stay in Anaheim, since it appeared to be within 30 minutes of all those events, and non-Disney days could be spent at their pool.   Check-in was quick. Staff super helpful. Free self-parking was great. There is an underground parkade also.   Rooms were clean and modern. USB outlets were handy. Wifi was good. There was an ironing board/iron in the closet, a small fridge/microwave, and a hair dryer. There is a small safe in the bathroom as well. We were facing the hotel construction next door and surprisingly weren’t woken up by any noise. Except maybe squeals from the excited kids in the hallways...but hey, it’s Disney!   There’s a fitness room with treadmill, elliptical,
Manager Response: Dear wem123,  Thank you for your feedback and kind words. We will definitely let Federico, Maria and Jesus of the great impression they left.

Summary Heading: Clean, convenient and modern hotel close to Disney
Summary: I didn’t have big expectations for this hotel, but I was pleasantly surprised.  Check in was okay, there’s no bell boy here so you have to take care of your bags yourself, but that was no problem as luggage racks were available. There’s a small convenience store located right next to the lobby where you can buy some drinks and snacks.  The room was big, clean and modern, with USB outlets etc.  The location is pretty good for a Disney trip, about a 10-15 minute walk to get to the parks. There’s also a shopping mall about 5 minutes walk away with a good selection of restaurants etc.  All in all I just felt at home here and everything was very convenient. Plus for free parking and breakfast.
Manager Response: Dear Tom G,  Thank you for your feedback. Our proximity to the Disneyland resort make for a great experience.

Summary: Friendly staff, beautiful and clean hotel. Breakfast was great and free coffee all day. Also the swimming pool was clean and so was the spa. They really do take care of the hotel and it shows!! So close to shopping and food.
Manager Response: Dear tapodaca,  Thank you for your kind words! We look forward to your next visit!

Summary: We had our last night of 30-day trip here. It was a pleasant stay. The room was really spacious and comfortable. Two TVs and a separate living room with a coach. The view from the room (#234) wasn't much to talk about. A construction site and the highway. The wifi was good. Disneyland is really close although we didn't need it. Maybe next time when the kids are a bit older. Laundry room with free washers and dryers. The breakfast was quite alright, nothing special really. Anyhow we enjoyed our stay and can recommend this hotel.
Manager Response: Dear Jan R,  Thank you for your review. Your feedback is much appreciated.

Summary: I love and appreciate the Military rate.  Very courteous staff.  Our room was spotless.   On our way out to dinner,  we requested a roll away bed and when we returned,  the bed was there,  made up with sheets,  blanket and pillows.   Room service went the extra mile.  Delicious complementary hot breakfast.   Beautiful heated pool.  I highly recommend this hotel. I will definitely return.
Manager Response: Thank you for your kind words. We look forward to your next visit! Thank you for your services.

Summary: We stayed one night in a King Studio suite. The room was huge and worked well for us and our kids. Great breakfast, pool and easy walk to Disneyland. The price was excellent for the area and room and hotel were very clean. The hotel allowed us to park there before checking in and after check out so we didn’t have to pay for parking at Disney. I’d definitely stay here again!
Manager Response: Dear amarion,  Thank you for the kind words and 5 out of 5 rating!

Summary: We stayed here for a family trip to Disneyland and it was great. The staff was friendly and knowledgeable, the rooms were very clean and comfortable. The breakfast was pretty good for a hotel breakfast, but I would by no means say great! We really loved the infinity pool and the nice location. It is set back about a block from the main road that the Disneyland entrance is on so it is a lot more quiet and peaceful! It’s near a highway, but not once did that even bother us and our room was right by it. I highly recommend!
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to provide feedback regarding your recent stay. We are happy to hear you enjoyed your time with us!

Summary: excellent hotel to stay for vacations or business . affordable prices and comfortable rooms. Family oriented hotel. Pool and gym are well maintained. Kids liked the hotel being close to Disneyland. . .
Manager Response: Dear nichocelis,  We are happy to hear you and the kids enjoyed your time with us. Thank you for the 5 out of 5 rating!

Summary: My daughter and I just stayed for two nights here as part of our summer Disneyland trip. We booked at the last minute and got a King suite. I thought it had a king bed and a pullout sofa, but was pleasantly surprised to find a king and a queen/full as well. The beds were comfortable and the room was nicely furnished.   The hotel provides a lovely free breakfast that we enjoyed. There are eggs, meat and potatoes as well as cereal, oatmeal, yogurt and bread. It really set us up nicely for the day.   The pool is large and salt water. It was nice to relax in.   It is a very short walk to the park.   My only quibbles were the sheets and towels could have been softer. We will be back.
Manager Response: Dear mer4cal,  Thank you for your kind words!

Summary: The property was amazing. Joey gave us a great room facing The Park, he gave us exceptional service. The room was fantastic! It was huge, and the bed was super comfortable. Overall the service and comfort was top notch!
Manager Response: Dear laineshapiro186498,  We are happy to hear you enjoyed your time with us. We will definitely give Joey the recognition he deserves.

Summary: The hotel was perfect for our Disneyland trip.  The location was within walking distance. The room was very clean and nice, the front desk attendants go out of their way to provide information we requested.  The pool was great--we watched the fireworks from there the 1st night after checking in.  The breakfast was very good. Our family loved this beautiful hotel.
Manager Response: Thank you for the 5 out of 5 rating!

Summary Heading: Great hotel within walking distance from Disneyland
Summary: We had a great stay at Country Inn & Suites, as families with young kids. The hotel check-in was smooth. We were able to park our car at the hotel, before and after check-in/check-out, so we didn't have to worry about parking while we were at Disneyland. The hotel was about 7 minutes walk to Disneyland, which was awesome! The hotel rooms were spacious and comfortable. Clean. Morning breakfast was complimentary during our stay, which gave us a good start to our day. We will be back on our next Disneyland trip, for sure
Manager Response: Dear suholla,  We are delighted to hear you and your family enjoyed your time with us! Thank you for the 5 out of 5 rating and we look forward to your next visit.

Summary: This hotel was perfect! Very convenient location and the staff were super nice. Our room was upgraded for free to a king suite. The king suite had so much room, I felt like it was big enough for 6 people. From the hotel, it was a 10 minute walk to the Disneyland entrance. I didn’t mind the location because it was away from the busy traffic but still close enough to go back and forth to the park. The free breakfast was awesome too.. it’s served from 6am-9am and they served cereal, oatmeal, toast, sausage links, waffles, scrambled eggs, and potatoes. The free breakfast probably saved us about $100.. I loved that they offered free parking. My husband and I pretty much walked everywhere to get food and didn’t use the car much which saved us in gas too. Would definitely recommend
Manager Response: Dear Elaine V,  Thank you for the review!

Summary: Affordable, comfortable, and clean accommodations very close to Disneyland. We easily walked to the park in 13-14min. Parking is free, but I bet there will be parking problems once the hotel under construction next to this property is complete. Room was great, breakfast was also appreciated.
Manager Response: Dear Stephen B,  Thank you for the feedback. We look forward to your next visit!

Summary: Friendly staff. Free parking, some spots underground. Great breakfast with spacious food and seating areas. Convenient location to Disney and I-5. Large updated rooms. Very nice pool area with infinity type pool.
Manager Response: Dear dachrist77,  Thank you for taking the time to provide feedback regarding your recent stay. We look forward to your next visit!

Summary: WE have been traveling with my daughter's softball team for 7 years.  We have about 6-7 hotel stays throughout the year, and I MUST say this is THE BEST hotel we have ever used! The hotel is extraordinarily clean, the amenities are wonderful. Pool area is large and beautiful.  The pool and hot tub water is perfect and crystal clear. The housekeeping does a terrific job. But most of all the PEOPLE are incredibly helpful and hospitable.  Boy are they in the right profession.  They give new meaning to the word hospitality. JOEY, RUBEN, and FERNANDO at the front desk are the best!!! They helped with EVERYTHING we needed from directions, to breaking large bills into change, recommending dinner places, or to just a wave and give a smile.  We will be using this hotel EVERY year, and
Manager Response: Dear jennifermarsalo,  Thank you for the 5 out of 5 rating! We will definitely relay your kind words to Joey and Fernando!

Summary Heading: 1st time to Disney and it was magical because of Mish and this property!
Summary: Single dad with 6yr old daughter 1st time visit to Disneyland. Alot of choices when I researched and lucky for me I picked the right one. Mish at the front desk was perfect, breakfast buffet was perfect, pool was the bomb! Distance to disney was perfect. Overall if your reading this stay at this property. You will not be disappointed.
Manager Response: Dear apphoenixtx,  Thank you for the 5 out of 5 rating! We are delighted to hear that you and your daughter enjoyed your time with us.

Summary: After complaining after 1st night nothing was done to better the mold smell. While showering notice several burger on shower curtains. Only was there to sleep so didnt make a big scene or anyth 7k bg. But room was not cleaned or sheets changed. Just needed place to sleep. More of motel quality. Even after complaint nothjng was done to solve and ignored.
Manager Response: Dear jnguyen0247,  Thank you for reviewing our Hotel. We appreciated any and all feedback and would love to speak with you in person to see how we can better serve you in the future. Please feel free to reach out to any member of management at your convenience.

Summary: Very friendly staff and clean hotel. The pool area is perfect for families. The location is the perfect distance away from the busy area of Disney. I strongly recommend this hotel. The only negative is there is not alot of onsite food options.
Manager Response: Dear Buffalobill52,  Thank you for the feedback regarding your recent stay! We look forward to your next visit.

Summary: Customer service was great very cordial and helpful the hotel is very very good condition and was extremely clean and I'm a germaphobe so look at every thing that most people overlook. The breakfast was pretty good and was always stocked well and very clean and the dinning area was continuously well cared for by staff.
Manager Response: Dear richardgutierrez0422,  Thank you for the 5 out of 5 rating! We pride ourselves on providing a clean and welcoming living area for all our guests.

Summary: This hotel is truly awesome. First off the free parking, free buffet breakfast and the proximity to the park are second to nobody. We stayed here for 4 nights on our road trip to Disney from Vancouver, BC and it was the best hotel we had the entire trip hands down. The service is friendly, the rooms are like small condos (650sqft) the AC works like a dream on the 40 degree days and the pool is perfect. After long park days we were able to come back and go for a swim at 11pm and also during the day because the parks are a 9 minute walk door to door. We already know of 3 times we are coming back and will stay here every time. Seriously don't look any where else!
Manager Response: Dear Kevin E,  Thank you for the positive shout out! We appreciate your feedback and look forward to your next visit to Southern California!

Summary: I would highly recommend this property if you are visiting Disneyland or just in the area.  Exceptionally nice property with excellent customer service.  Great for families with children.  Within walking distance to Disneyland (if you want to walk) and the ART bus picks up in front of the hotel ($6 adults, $2 kids) very convenient to several restaurants (Cheesecake Factory, Bubba Gump Shrimp, Subway, Walgreens etc).  You can also see the fireworks from Disneyland from the hotel.  I must give a shout out to the excellent customer service I received from Joey and Reuben.  I  was booked at the airport location by error  and the staff at that location was of no value helping me find the right hotel.  So I decided to contact the correct location to see if they would honor my
Manager Response: Dear pinckneyl2,  We are delighted to hear Joey turned your visit to the area around! Our proximity to the Disneyland Resort makes for a memorable experience!

Summary: Husband and I woke up very early for breakfast for the sole purpose of having their "fluffy waffles" as advertised. We get to the breakfast area and both hot wells were empty. So we grabbed the rest of the items we wanted and asked Maria if waffles were coming. She politely said yes maybe about 10 minutes. Then she magically appeared at our table after a little while with 3 waffles just for my husband and she even brought syrup. She did this before having the rest of the waffles available for people in the dining area. She went above and beyond. Great service thanks so much.
Manager Response: Dear jeanettepalafox,  We are happy to hear you enjoyed our breakfast! We will let Maria know what an awesome impact she made on your visit.

Summary: We got to the hotel about 8:30AM, to early to check in.  The desk clerk asked if we were going to Disneyland.  He gave us a parking pass and asked if we wanted to buy a bus pass to ride to Disneyland.  We stayed at Disneyland for a few hours and returned to the hotel at 1:00PM.  Still to early to check in rooms not cleaned yet.  Spoke with the desk clerk Mr. Garcia who said he would let us know when the room was ready.  Very nice and professional.  2:30PM room is ready. went to the room came back down for Happy Hours, met with I believe the manager "Alex", very nice, friendly and professional also.  All and all everyone was friendly, professional and very responsive to our needs.  As we were leaving our room Sunday Am, one of the maids on the 4th floor, cleaning the rooms said
Manager Response: Dear bill388Elcajon,  We are happy to hear you celebrated your 53rd Anniversary with us! Thank you for the kind words. Happy Anniversary!

Summary: My husband and I got an overnight getaway to Disney. Joey was so kind to us and gave us a wonderful room that we could see the Disneyland fireworks from. It was perfect. I would recommend this place. All staff has been polite and courteous.
Manager Response: Dear Stephanie H,  Thank you for the shout out! We will definitely relay your kind words to Joey!

Summary: our stay as this hotel was very satisfying, it was very clean, and breakfast was great, they offered a good variety of foods. I will definitely come back.  I also love that it's within walking distance from parks.
Manager Response: Dear Rose C,  Thank you for your positive feedback!

Summary Heading: Awesome place to stay for families and teams!
Summary: Gary and Debbie from group sales did a great job giving me a lot of info regarding this hotel for our basketball team and they had awesome follow up as well.   Our basketball team was playing at America Sports Center, a 10 minute walk from hotel so it was nice and convenient.  1) Upon arrival a plate of cookies and card waited for me that I was able to share with the team.  2) Breakfast always key for early games - options for everyone 3) Rooms are clean and comfortable  4) All of staff is friendly and helpful 5) Free machines to do laundry-important for smelly uniforms 6) Great view of Disney fireworks from pool area 7) Pool was great  8) Like the option of being able to do late check out if available 1pm-free, 2pm and 4pm minimal charge. 9) No parking fee and there is
Manager Response: Dear gregoryd894,  Thank you for the 5 out of 5 rating! We are delighted to hear you enjoyed your time with us. Gary, Debbie and Alex are definitely keepers!

Summary: If I could I would give 10 green dots... We have stayed at this hotel the past 6 times, that we have went to Disneyland. The staff is great and personal. Fernando, Mish, Nina have always made us feel welcomed. Any and every concerns that we have had were dealt with immediately and professionally. The staff that takes care of the breakfast area are also very attentive. The waiters / waitresses and even the cook was able to handle any issue I had. Surprising enough even housekeeping was able to handle certain things that we needed. Been to many hotels where the staff wasn't trained as well as this hotel staff is. The hotel rooms are  clean and quiet  ( except from the fireworks at Disneyland, that we requested a room to watch from.... lol).   I would and do recommend this hotel
Manager Response: Dear grtjr1117,  Thank you for your feedback. We will relay your kind words to Fernando, Mish and Nina!

Summary: Perfect place to stay for us. Checkin staff  well all staff very professional and  helpful. Great rooms well serviced daily. Great pool for the hot weather. Also the bonus of daily breakfast available to get you exploring the area. Well located to Disney and new eating area across the road. Very good for families.  Highly recommend.
Manager Response: Dear darrenn19672018,  Thank you for the 5 out of 5 rating! We are glad you enjoyed your time with us and look forward to your next visit!

Summary Heading: Honest review from a picky hotel guest
Summary: I am not high maintenance when it comes to a lot of things, but with hotels, I am super picky. I'm a germaphobe for one, so I hate feeling grossed out in a hotel room. I was blown away with how new and clean everything was. The bathroom specifically was a pleasant surprise. No gross shower curtains or tight spaces, very open and modern.  We have decided we will ONLY stay at this hotel next time we visit!
Manager Response: Dear travelingfamily20486,  Thank you for taking the time to provide regarding your recent stay. We pride ourselves on providing a clean and modern living space for our guests. Thank you for you feedback and we look forward to your next visit!

Summary: I loved this hotel it was definitely one of my Top 3 ever, maybe the best ever. The staff is super friendly and helpful. This is a great place for families they have a kids theater, free breakfast, pool, and a nice lobby/ bar for parents to enjoy themselves as well. I have no complaints about this place I will definitely stay there next time I bring my family to Disneyland.
Manager Response: Dear Christopher A,  Thank you for the 5 out of 5 review!

Summary: The customer service could not be better. They all genuinely care. The free breakfast was outstanding and the pool was super nice. Not super far from the park however after a long day it seems like a huge journey. Shuttle bus options would be great
Manager Response: Dear Jennifer H,  Thank you for your feedback!

Summary: We stayed 3 nights while visiting Disneyland. The hotel is great, quite new, on a short walk to Disney. The room was spacious and clean. The gym was ok, I went every day, it could use some free weights and it will be perfect.  The pool was with salt water and the kids liked it. The breakfast was the biggest disappointment - my husband and the kids did it like it.
Manager Response: Dear Yana7808,  Thank you for the 5 out of 5 feedback! You breakfast concerns have been forwarded to to appropriate department leader. Thank you for your comments and we look forward to your next visit!

Summary: I've stayed @ the Country Inn & Suites on several occasion and they do it all to make you feel welcome and enjoy your stay!   Really enjoyed their complimentary breakfast and all amenities.     I'm am a definitely a satisfied customer!
Manager Response: Dear Aly M,  Thank you for staying with us again! We are delighted to hear you continuously enjoy your time at the Country Inn & Suites by Radisson Anaheim!

Summary: The staff is very nice, breakfast variety is good, comfy bed and great location. The parking is a little crowded on weekends, but when we arrived one of the employees told us not to worry, we could have her spot. What else can I ask for?
Manager Response: Dear Lillianne G,  Thank you for your feedback and kind words. We hope you visit us during your next trip to the Anaheim area.

Summary: We stayed for 4 nights while we attended a volleyball tournament at the convention center.   We would definitely stay again.  The staff are wonderful.  They have complementary wash and dry and they have chocolate chip cookies at the front desk.. that are awesome. The breakfast was very good.   Only suggestion I would give to the hotel if they want to be more active in the sports events is Saturday and Sundays breakfast must be earlier.  Teams had to report by 7am.  Also in your kids room you need board games and things for the teens and kids to do.
Manager Response: Dear Karen G,  Thank you for the 5 out of 5 rating!

Summary: Excellent new hotel within 10 minute walk to disneyland maingate Great pool area with hot tub Free breakfast daily that is of very good quality Rooms are clean, spacious and beds are comfy Very courteous staff
Manager Response: Dear Spencer J,  Thank you for the feedback regarding your recent stay!

Summary: Extremely poor service. We checked into a King Suite on a Monday evening. We had a reservation for two nights so we were supposed to check out on Thursday. On Tuesday we decided we wanted to stay an extra night (check out on Friday). We spoke with the front desk Tuesday morning and told them we wanted to stay if the room was available. They said yes. We only had cash and we were told they do not take cash. I told them we would take a trip to the bank. On Wednesday I asked them if they could just charge 100$ to the original card they had on file for the reservation and the remainder of the balance to another card. They wouldn't/couldn't do it. So I said Ok that's fine, I was just trying to avoid a trip to the bank. I couldn't find one of my banks anywhere in the area. I told them
Manager Response: Dear cgmanners,  We are sorry to hear you did not enjoy your time here at the Country Inn & Suites, especially when on your honeymoon. Please reach out to the hotel directly to further discuss your stay.

Summary: We chose this hotel based on our budget and customer reviews on Tripadvisor.  It is within walking distance from Disneyland, parking and breakfast is included.  Gardenwalk and its restaurants are me deay between the hotel and the park.  Rooms were clean and just big enough.  Rooms facing the parking lot have a view of the fireworks.  Staff is friendly and helpful but no more that was required.  Except for Federico, the chief engineer, who went out of his way to help us find a table on a busy morning.  He even made sure the kids were able to watch their cartoons while we finished our breakfast.  Thank you Federico.  Pool area is clean and most afternoons we had the pool to ourselves.    If we were to return to Disneyland,  we would definitely consider staying here again.
Manager Response: Dear Brenda L,  Thank you for the 4 out of 5 rating. We will relay your kind words to Federico!

Summary: This place has a lot of great things.  Choice of covered/garage parking and outdoors.  A bit limited for the property though.  Amenities are plentiful.  Infinity pool, breakfast, discounted Disney tix, to name a few.    Clean property.  Spacious rooms.  Beds (both standard and pull out) could be a little more comfortable.  Complimentary water could be added, especially if you are walking to/from park.  Microwave/fridge standard.  Walking distance from Anaheim garden walk, convention center and Disney.    Recommend staying at this location if you are in the area.  Value was based on a group rate for an event.  Check prices before booking.  Worth it though.
Manager Response: Dear MBP77,  Thank you for your feedback. We will definitely reconsider the prospect of complimentary water in our rooms. Thank you for staying with us and we look forward to your next visit!

Summary: We had a great stay at Country Inn & Suites. Excellent staff (Cherine & Fernando). Free breakfast - perfect way to start our Disneyland vacation. Pool was beautiful. We couldn't have asked for a better place to stay for our family.
Manager Response: Dear dancerdancer2018,  Thank you for your feedback. We will definitely relay your kind words to Cherine and Fernando!

Summary: Our volleyball team was in Anaheim for the SCVA Summer Soirée June 28th to July 1st and since we were there, we all extended our stay to enjoy the Disney Parks.  Most of us checked out July 5th.  Pros: ~ FREE Parking ~ FREE yummy HOT breakfast  *(Bonus points to Chef Maria & her kitchen staff for accommodating our team’s request to open a 1/2 hour earlier on Sat/Sun so our players could get some breakfast before heading to the Convention Center) **Normal hours for breakfast:  M-F 6am-9:30a Sat/Sun 7am-10:30a  ***The mini Belgian waffles & biscuits n’ gravy were my family’s favs & the kids loved the room w/ the TV & soft cushions  ****Even the food we ordered at the bar in the evening was tasty - different specialty pizzas for $13 & wings hit the spot (I forget how much the wings
Manager Response: Dear Jenniffer T,  Thank you for your kind words and feedback! We understand how important a decent night's sleep is when on vacation. To ensure you have the best rest we can make sure your room is located as far away from the freeway as possible and more comfortable pillows are provided.   We will definitely relay your kind words to Maria. Thank you for you 4 out of 5 rating and we hope we see you during your next visit to the Anaheim area.

Summary Heading: Clean and quiet hotel but still near the parks
Summary: Stayed in early july on a solo trip to disneyland.   There were a couple of volleyball teams staying at the same time, but they were very courteous and it was really quiet the whole time.  The hotel itself is pretty new and so the rooms are very clean and modern, and very large.  I had a little trouble with operating the shower (the diverter was stuck) but front desk sent up maintenance really quickly.    The neighborhood of the hotel is next to the freeway in busy anaheim but somehow the neighborhood is pretty quiet and the room i got was also very quiet.  The breakfast is simple but hot and served at 6am every morning, which is early enough to make it to rope drop.  I walked to the parks every day, which takes about 10 min or so and is a level walk and very simple.  Morning
Manager Response: Dear AnonymousGBK,  Thank you for you for your feedback. We are happy to hear you enjoyed your time with us, even with a full house. We appreciate your kind words and look forward to your next visit.

Summary: Comfortable and clean rooms. Good location to attractions. Room had view of nightly fireworks. Breakfast included was very convenient. Pool facilities clean and well maintained. Special mention to employee Angel Velez. Very courteous and helped us out with local knowledge. Thanks Angel!!!
Manager Response: Dear sbasspring,  Thank you for the 5 out of 5 rating!

Summary: Good staff, got at the hotel earlier than check-in time but the staff was welcoming and got me a room! Very thankful. Room was clean with microwave and mini fridge with daily cleaning. Breakfast was awesome, good variety. 15 minutes walk from Disneyland and good restaurants! Will recommend to others.
Manager Response: Dear Naznin M,  Thank you for your kind words. We're looking forward to your next visit!

Summary: Just  2 blocks from Disney (4 normal blocks) is a family hotel, very clean, not too expensive and with many details that make your stay cozy. It has very very spacious rooms, with minibar and microwave, as well as internet and free parking. The breakfast is very good and complete. Highly recommended yo stay with family!
Manager Response: Dear Delta S,  Thank you for your kind words and we're looking forward to your next visit!

Summary: My family thoroughly enjoyed our stay here while we attended the volleyball tournament at the convention center.  Great accommodations and great staff!  It is also fairly close to the Disney entrance without being right on Harbor Blvd.
Manager Response: Dear Sal G,  We are happy to hear you enjoyed your time at the Country Inn & Suites by Radisson!

Summary: This hotel was beautiful, clean, and the staff was awesome. Our room and the pool had a view of the fireworks. A but far to walk to Disneyland if you have little ones but okay for adults.  Breakfast area was roomy but it was a basic breakfast (hot but mostly same items every day and eggs were meh).
Manager Response: Dear BeccaR1301,  Thank you for the feedback regarding your recent stay. We hope to see you during your next visit to the Anaheim area.

Summary: Great Pool, but needs more seating. Good breakfast. Free parking. Mattress was lumpy and needs to be replaced. Felt like something was poking thru. Newer hotel, less than 2  years old. Nice lobby, bar and seating area. Multiple fireplaces going. Coffee, tea and hot chocolate available all day/night for free.  Easy to get too, right off the 5 on Disney Way. Few minute stroll to Gardenwalk area. Nice area, never had any issue walking back after midnight. Very safe.   15 minute walk to Disney. If the Pumba shuttle is running at night, you can take it leaving the park and it gets you more than half way to the hotel. Some nights it ran, others not, even though the lot was open.  Nice place, prices fluctuate, so keep checking. $160 a night with free parking and breakfast, along with a
Manager Response: Dear 746jasonv,  Thank you for the 4 out of 5 rating!

Summary: We had an amazing stay here at this hotel. We traveled as a family, meeting here from all over the US to attend my sister's graduation.  Staff were kind and considerate. Accommodations were comfy, and the pool, free parking, and free hot breakfast were a welcome break after battling theme park prices! The pool is INCREDIBLE. It absolutely made our stay. It's just as big as it appears in the pictures (no photoshop or trick photography here), and it's salt-water. Plenty of shade around the pool and we had so much fun just hanging there. The location is perfect - just down the street within walking distance from Disney but not right up in the chaos. The windows/walls are thick so we did not hear expressway traffic, but totally enjoyed the convenience right off the exit when
Manager Response: Dear Shel R,  Thank you for your feedback and congratulations to your sister!

Summary: We stayed a week at Country Inn & Suites! The breakfast was perfect to start your day  before heading off to Disneyland and they open the buffet early! They had a nice spread of biscuits/gravy, waffles, eggs, bacon, sausage, fruit, cereal, and a variety of breads. There is a fun space for the kids to enjoy a movie while relaxing on bean bags which allowed us to enjoy our breakfast while they were entertained. We enjoyed swimming in the heated pool as well! It was refreshing after long days at Disney. All the staff was welcoming and friendly. The hotel room was spacious and the extra room to move around was needed/appreciated with two young boys. The view of the fireworks from the hotel room was Amazing and Disneyland was a short 10 minute walk (shuttles available). The hotel was
Manager Response: Dear crissys22,  Thank you for your kind words! We're looking forward to your next visit.

Summary: Every single staff member was friendly and helpful, from the front desk and management to the breakfast staff to the housekeepers and engineer we met in the elevator and hallways. We stayed for 2 nights for my daughter's 10th birthday and a family trip to Disneyland. It's within easy walking distance. She said this is her favorite hotel and wants to come back.
Manager Response: Dear ginabu22,  Thank you for your kind words and we would like to wish your daughter a Happy 10th Birthday!!!

Summary Heading: GREAT people. Great stay. Beautiful place.
Summary: Really enjoyed everything from the room, convenient location, free parking, free breakfast, the bar in the evenings. All in all, no complaints. We had stayed at other places in the area in the past, but decided to try something new. We weren't disappointed. Barbara, Cherine and everyone at the front desk went out of their way to be helpful. Maria and Veronica in the bar every evening were SO friendly. My wife and I had a great time! We sat at the 2-sided fireplace most evenings and just enjoyed being there. Next time we WILL be back!
Manager Response: Dear Dan C,  Thank you for your feedback. We will definitely relay your kind words to Barbra, Cherine, Maria and Veronica!

Summary: The stay was overall very relaxing, it felt like coming home each time we returned to the hotel. The breakfast was one of the better continetal breakfasts I've had, love those lil waffles. The pool is beautiful and relaxing, I wish it was open longer. And I highly recommend getting the ART bus pass, it's a life saver.
Manager Response: Dear ajabell,  Thank you for the 5 out of 5 rating!

Summary: Way too expensive for what you get. Car got socked by the pool (in the parking lot) noisy road noise, shower didn’t work right, had to leave early and was ignored by an employee. No thanks. I’ll try one of the others in the area next time
Manager Response: Dear Ajpierron,   We are sorry to hear you did not enjoy your time with us. If I am not mistaken your concerns have been addressed via another social media outlet. However, if you would like to discuss your recent stay any further please reach out to any member of management at property level.

Summary: Best hotel ever!! Clean!!! We like that it’s not a huge hotel. Even though it may be full, it never seems like it’s crowded. The free breakfast is super helpful. I wish they still offered ice water in the lobby during the day, but I assume so many people used it to fill large water bottles, it became difficult to keep it full. The bar gets pretty busy. I think it’s time to consider hiring a waitress especially because people are spread out all over the lobby and outside. This is the only place I’ll ever stay when in Anaheim!
Manager Response: Dear JillL196,  Thank you for your feedback. Your concerns are appreciated and will be forwarded to the appropriate department leader. We look forward to your next visit.

Summary: The staff was very accommodating. We checked in early and they found us a room away from the highway and looking out at Disneyland fireworks. Even though we were away from the highway we had noisy young children next to us, but never heard them through the walls of our room. Our daughter has severe food allergies and even though we brought her breakfast with us, they went out of their way to clean the cooking utensils and made her breakfast in a separate area and had it ready when we went down to eat. Staff was constantly cleaning floors, tables, and the pool area. The heated pool was large and fun for the kids. Very convenient location for restaurants, Disneyland and Angel Stadium.
Manager Response: Dear JulesAnne23,  Thank you for the 5 out of 5 rating! We appreciate your kind words and feedback.

Summary Heading: Got allergies? Try this new, very clean hotel (2018)
Summary: As a couple that suffers from allergies, and is especially susceptible to mold, we really appreciated the cleanliness and newness of the Country Inn & Suites in Anaheim. We appreciated seeing the hotel manager pitching in to pick up after guests during the breakfast rush, and were delighted by the surprise
Manager Response: Dear doughughes2,  We pride ourselves on maintaining a clean hotel. We are happy to hear you enjoyed your time with us and look forward to your next visit!

Summary Heading: Highly Recommended for Disney Resort Stay
Summary: The property was recommended by our booking agent as newer and close to Disney Resort; the layout and size of the rooms and pool were also factors in selecting this hotel. The spa should be larger though, in relation to the size of the pool.   Parking is not a problem for now as the lot is large enough and close to the lobby - as opposed to the old Wyndham Anaheim Garden Grove, now a Delta hotel -  when the new hotel next door opens, it may become an issue.   Beds are quite comfortable, very surprised the fold out bed was as well. No noticeable bar in the back as in other highly rated properties, this should also be considered if more than two are travelling.  Good breakfast - simple without any frills - with the exception of Embassy Suites which prepares egg dishes during
Manager Response: Dear erikingst,  Thank you for taking the time to let us know how your recent stay was. We appreciate your feedback and look forward to your next visit.

Summary: We chose this hotel because of its reasonably close distance to Disneyland. Not only do they NOT provide a free shuttle but the walk is a little king with children. Shuttle is over $5 per adult and $2.59 per child. We got to the hotel at 1am after a long day at the park, and there was NO ONE at the front desk. We waited over 30mins before someone finally showed up at the desk. There were several guests trying to check in. We were all trying to call on our phones ro get service. Disney closes at midnight you would think they would be prepared for large groups of people checking in at this hour. We finally got into our rooms a little before 2 am. The room was clean, but we could not control the fan to run.  The only way to turn the fan on was to put it under 70 degrees. The room
Manager Response: Dear Rinance,  We apologize for an unsavory experience. In order to investigate and rectify your concerns we would require additional information regarding your stay.   If you have a moment would you please reach out to any member of management at property level? Any information would be greatly appreciated.   Thank you for your time.

Summary: I had the pleasure of staying 3 nights at this beautiful venue, while visiting the Disney Parks. We found the room clean, spacious, and comfortable. The staff was most pleasant, greeting us with smiles wherever we went. The infinity pool was incredible; clean, large, and beautiful! Full breakfast was the icing on the cake--perfect.  All this, and within walking distance to the parks. We will definitely be back!
Manager Response: Dear Nancy T,  Thank you for your kind words! We are delighted to hear you enjoyed your time with us!

Summary Heading: Great experience at Anaheim Country Inn & Suites
Summary: Great location and new facilities, lots of amenities (good breakfast, computer room with desktops and desks for laptops, TVs around the lobby, kids' room in the lobby) at the hotel. Friendly staff.  Had a great 5 day stay.
Manager Response: Dear gstowers835,  We are happy to hear you enjoyed your time with us! Thank you for your kind words and we look forward to your next visit.

Summary: We found the staff and the hotel excellent, and the pool area was very nice period a short walk to Disney that only took about 10 to 15 minutes, we would definitely stay there again. I would recommend staying here if you have a family or if you are just getting away for the weekend.
Manager Response: Dear barbtk88,  Thank you for the kind words and 5 out of 5 rating!

Summary: Good choice for Disneyland visits by international tourists without a car.  My husband , sons and I stayed here for our trip to Disneyland. We walked everywhere , though there is a bus for $5.50 per person per day. The room had a fridge and microwave but no freezer compartment in the fridge.  ******BE WARNED****** there was a resort fee (+small taxes) of about $20 (almost $28 Australian) each day charged on checkout after what we paid through our travel agent - totally UNEXPECTED when we didn’t need parking and weren’t there much any day to utilise the ‘resort’- they should just charge a parking fee. It is not mentioned on booking sites or by travel agent.  It seems like a BIG rip off for international tourists but then a free breakfast was maybe a bonus to offset it.  Hotel is
Manager Response: Dear Trish T,  Thank you for the 4 out of 5 rating! We appreciate your detailed feedback.

Summary: Very clean hotel. Staff was friendly and kind. Disney was within walking distance. When calling hotel you reached a live person. I called several times before arriving and Joey seemed to always be the person to answer the phone. He was always helpful and informative. He never seemed annoyed. The parking was excellent and hotel is close to freeway.
Manager Response: Dear pixforyou2c,  Thank you for the 5 out of 5 rating! We will definitely relay your kind words to Joey!

Summary: We stayed here on our recent trip to Disneyland.  The hotel and our room were both very clean.  About a 10-15 minute walk to Disneyland.  Would definitely recommend this hotel as long as you don't mind the walk!
Manager Response: Dear raascha,  Thank you for the kind words!

Summary: The hotel was very clean and the staff was very friendly and helpful. The soap wasn't great, but if that's the only complaint, that's a good sign. Its an extra block away from Disney, but it was a nice walk, and the closeness to the Gardenwalk mall was helpful for food options.
Manager Response: Dear caddellmade,  Thank you for the 5 out of 5 review!

Summary: Very clean, great breakfast, 15 min walk to Disneyland and staff was very nice, maids keep the rooms very clean, pool was nice and a bar to have drinks, happy hour could be $2.00 off of menu but was all great
Manager Response: Dear jasontutaj,  Thank you for taking the time to provide feedback regarding your recent stay at the Country Inn & Suites by Radisson. We appreciate your comments and look forward to your next visit.

Summary: New, modern, clean and affordable.    We were very pleased with our stay at Country Inn.  Spacious room for a family of four, very clean and modern.  You're not looking for a 5 star joint near Disneyland and this fits the bill perfectly.    Self parking is free and check-in was a breeze.  We had a room facing the 5 freeway and I was concerned at first but it didn't really bother our sleep, it just became background noise.  The room was spacious and the WiFi works great.  Breakfast, while free, was just so so.  It's buffet style with pancakes, eggs, sausage/bacon, toast, fruit and cereal. Regardless, it's a nice bonus if you want to eat quickly and head straight for Disneyland.  Staff was very friendly and helpful.  There is also self laundry service which we needed.  .6 miles
Manager Response: Dear howardlam725,  Thank you for your feedback! We look forward to your next stay!

Summary: I absolutely loved my stay here. I came solo as a single parent with my 15 month old baby. I was meeting some friends at the park but I was afraid being alone and all. The staff was so amazing with my son and I! From the check in to check out they always made me feel special and the room was so clean, very very big for my toddler and really nice! The walk to Disneyland is 15 minutes. The store downstairs super convinient when I needed snack or some pain medications when my head was hurting. I will always stay here.
Manager Response: Dear W6114AMmariag,  We are delighted to hear you and your son felt safe and at home whilst staying at the Country Inn & Suites by Radisson. We appreciate your kind words and look forward to your next visit!

Summary: An excellent choice for a Disney vacation, within slightly longer but very doable walk (we were a senior and 6yr. old) to the park, with several restaurants on the way. Hot tub and pool were wonderful! A great choice for families!
Manager Response: Dear mimi272018,  We are happy to hear you and your family enjoyed your time with us. We look forward to your next visit!

Summary: Excellent hotel, service, comfortable beds, quiet, nice pool and hot tub. The breakfast was also very good and clean. Not too far from Disneyland, but if you don’t want to walk I highly recommend Lyft, worked perfect for us and very affordable.
Manager Response: Dear thehargraves2018,  Thank you for the 5 out of 5 review!

Summary: Maria, Jerikah, and Brian are the very example of what GREAT SERVICE looks like!  They treat everyone with kindness, respect, and all while still being able to keep everything in tip top shape.
