They make you feel welcomed, they are always smiling, and make your morning breakfast as enjoyable as if you were home. We have been coming once a month for the past 5 months and its always great!  Thank you for making our trips be Awesome!
Manager Response: Dear 408sergi0,  Thank you for taking the time to tell us about your recent stay at the Country Inn & Suites by Radisson. We will definitely relay your kind words to Maria, Jerikah and Biran!

Summary: Nice hotel, very close to Disneyland, exactly 1/2 a mile. The room is nice, very clean yet the queen size beds are more like a full size. The staff is friendly and the pool is very nice. The bathroom is also small, no place to hang a hand towel. They have a small fridge and a microwave. There is another hotel under construction next to this hotel but the noise doesn’t bother us at all. I love that there is a safe in the room as well. Target is right down the street for supplies if you need them. We were in room 221 which is right next to the elevator. Breakfast is free and pretty good if you ask me. Love the waffles. Lots of places to eat at the garden walk right around the corner too.
Manager Response: Dear Mike P.,  Thank you for your feedback. We appreciate your comments and look forward to your next visit.

Summary: Great service. Friendly staff.  Good breakfast. Clean rooms. Housekeeping ladies are very helpful.  The swimming pool is very clean. Walking distance to Disneyland. We enjoyed our stay.  Definitely recommend it and definitely coming back.
Manager Response: Dear Ana M.  Thank you for the 5 out of 5 review! We appreciate your comments and look forward to your next visit.

Summary: Slightly further away from the action however, nice and peaceful. Modern and clean. Great price for what you get. Front desk staff could have been more friendly.  I found them to be a little hostile/dismissive when we had questions. Room was never made up. We always had to ring for it to get done after a long day at Disneyland.
Manager Response: Dear Lkb20,  We apologize for the disappointing service you received from our staff. Our team works hard to make sure our guests are comfortable and receiving our best service. We appreciate you bringing this matter to our attention, and hope for another opportunity to exceed your expectations in the future.

Summary: We had a large group of officials staying at the hotel for a AAU Boys Championship tournament. The General Manager and Food Services Manager met with our staff. They went above and beyond to make our stay there the best I have ever experienced during a tournament. We had breakfast early, just for our group. The rooms were very nice and comfortable. All staff were very friend and helpful. We will be staying there again. Thank you for everything you did for us!!
Manager Response: Dear jhowarth5674,  We are delighted to hear you enjoyed your time with us. We look forward to your next visit and we will relay your kind words to our General Manager!

Summary: We were starting a trip back east when our son called and asked us to meet him in Anaheim. We didn't have time to book our regular stay, but we found this gem near where we usually stay. I've got to say, the rooms are nice and the lobby very accommodating and inviting.  The staff are pleasant and helpful,  and the location is near enough to Disney's entrance to walk, though the ART shuttles service the resort. This resort is nice for a 1 day as well as a multiple day stay.  We will return.
Manager Response: Dear Karla M,  Thank you for the 5 out of 5 review of our property. Your kind words are appreciated. We look forward to your next visit!

Summary: The staff were all super friendly The hotel was clean and modern. The children had a playroom with movies and were able to jump around so with toddlers was very helpful. We had a large party of 10, including 5 children. The complimentary breakfast each morning really was tasty and allowed all of us many choices. I definitely would recommend our family to return there again.
Manager Response: Dear kjl192018,  Thank you for the 5 out of 5 review!

Summary: Very nice, newer hotel.  About 0.75 mile walk to Disney maingate, which is probably one of the shorter walks compared to other hotels in Anaheim around Disney.  Nice warm breakfast every morning, but they serve the SAME thing every day.  Would have liked to see some variety, especially when staying multiple days.
Manager Response: Dear Jeff C,  Thank you for your feedback! We will relay your suggestion to the appropriate department.

Summary: My mom and I stayed here for 3 nights for a quick trip to Disneyland.  The hotel itself is clean and modern, the staff is friendly and helpful, and the breakfast is awesome.  I normally stay at a Disney resort hotel, but we were budget conscious this trip.  I booked on Getawaytoday.com, paid for 2 nights and got 1 free.  The hotel was easy to find with plenty of parking.  I had requested a room facing Disneyland and we were able to see the fireworks from our room.  The first day we were there, we just walked around Downtown Disney and then went back to the hotel to watch the fireworks from the comfort of our room.    The room itself was spacious and nicely appointed, however, the carpet in our room was stained with I'm assuming was coffee because it was right in front of the
Manager Response: Dear Renee B,  Thank you for taking the time to provide feedback regarding your recent stay. We will relay your kind words to Alex. Please feel free to reach out to the hotel directly to discuss your stay and provide your room number so our staff can rectify the stained carpet and lumpy beds. We look forward to your next visit!

Summary Heading: Good location, clean rooms.  Nice pool.
Summary: This was our second time staying here.  The location is nice and well within walking distance to the Disney Parks.  (About 10 minutes on Disney Way and another 5 on Harbor- with kids)  Rooms and bathroom are clean and spacious, beds are comfortable.    The room has a desk, coffee maker, mini refrigerator, nice A/C unit and multiple outlets/usb ports for charging phones,etc.  One pet peeve of mine in most hotels is having to search for an empty outlet to plug in devices and charge phones.  Not an issue here.   The pool and jacuzzi are nice.  Good temperatures for both.  Free breakfast has plenty of options, but time is limited (from 6-930) so if you want to sleep in, you'll have to plan for it unless you don't rolling straight outta bed and into the general public in your PJs.
Manager Response: Dear Terry U,  Thank you for your feedback regarding your recent stay. We will definitely look into adjusting the operating times of your in house Bistro. We are happy to hear you enjoyed your stay and look forward to a possible future visit!

Summary Heading: Great Hotel! Perfect Location for a Disneyland Vacation!
Summary: My husband and I celebrated our 1 year anniversary at Disneyland and booked 3 nights at the Country Inn & Suites. Our stay was amazing! The hotel was extremely clean and the staff was super helpful and sweet. The breakfast was delicious: eggs, bacon, potatoes, fresh fruit, cereal, oatmeal, yogurt, breads, etc. Everything was hot and ready to eat. This hotel's location is PRIME for anyone wanting to travel to Disneyland or California Adventure. It is literally only 2 blocks away from the front enterance of both parks and Easy 10 minute walk or 5 min Uber ride away. Parking is included in hotel price which is rare! Most hotels near Disneyland charge for parking each night that you stay, so that was also a huge bonus! The hotel is also super close to the Garden Walk which has lots
Manager Response: Dear BSTAV,  Thank you for taking the time to provide feedback regarding your recent stay at the Country Inn & Suites by Radisson. We are glad you enjoyed your time with us. CONGRATULATIONS on your 1 year Anniversary!

Summary Heading: Clean, Great customer service and aswome Hotel and excellent location
Summary: Awasome Hotel with grate people with great costumer service and awesome breakfast. Kids really liked the pool too. Totally clean place and we really liked the layout of the room. Shout out to Maria she was really nice during breakfast... Well everyone was nice. 5 Stars from me.
Manager Response: Dear mdenis2018,  Thank you for your kind words. We will definitely relay your kind words to Maria!

Summary: We came here to come to Disneyland for my moms birthday. This hotel was so nice and a great place to get a good nights rest before a fun day ahead. We were able to go to the pool till midnight which is really nice since not many hotel pools are open that late. It was heated to a nice temperate and the jacuzzi was nice because it didn’t burn my eyes like others do. Plus we were able to see fireworks from the pool. The rooms were very nice and modern which made it feel very clean and a nice place to be. The front desk people were very nice and polite and very efficient when we needed to buy a ticket to Disneyland. The next day we had the breakfast and it was a good regular breakfast with many options to chose from. It was a great place to stay and would highly recommend for
Manager Response: Dear Elizabeth F,  Thank you for the 5 out of 5 review! We're glad you enjoyed your time with us.

Summary: We have stayed in many hotels over the years and Country Inn and Suites in Anaheim was by far the best! Not only were the employees very nice and helpful, the full breakfast was great, covered parking, laundry facilities, fantastic pool, close walk to the park/restaurants but the most impressive was the cleanliness. The cleaning staff is incredible!!! Thank you
Manager Response: Dear joosfamily5boys,  Thank you for your kind words and feedback. We look forward to you next visit!

Summary: The staff here is way friendlier and accommodating than any other hotel in Anaheim. They make you feel at home and are great with the kids. Additionally they'll get everything you need right away. Keep up the great job.
Manager Response: Dear chroniclesOfAvila,  Thank you for the 5 out of 5 review! We appreciate your feedback and look forward to your next visit!

Summary: As we arrived at the hotel around 1:30 we wanted to know if we could check in.  Hotel manager said; we can't check you in system is down.  He agreed to take our backs and come later to check in.  My wife asked the other gentleman if we could check in her sister when we come back later.  No problem.  We came back a couple of hours later and my wife checked in.  Then she asked, if she can check in her sister.  He said; no we can't do it.  My wife told him, that he was nice before and said she could check in her sister.  Well there was a lady that helped my wife with checking in and she told her don't worry I will check her in.    Other than that, Maria the Breakfast attendant was very attentive so was the girl on Sunday morning.  There were 8 of us and all of us did not like the
Manager Response: Dear OpaRonny47,  We are sorry to hear you had a rough time checking in. We will definitely investigate the situation. Thank you for your feedback and we hope we can better serve you in the future.

Summary: The location of the hotel was very closed to Disneyland. The hotel has all the amenities you may need. Gym, laundry, convenience store, kitchen, bar. I recommend you try some delicious drink by Veronica at the bar. She definitely knows her way around the bar. We had room service by Mariela, who did a great job at refreshing the room.
Manager Response: Dear ai2rres,  Thank you for the 5 out of 5 review! We will definitely relay your kind words to Veronica and Mariela!

Summary: My husband and I stayed here for a quick trip to Disneyland. The service was top quality. The room was comfortable and very clean. All the ammenities were better than expected.  There was a fridge and microwave in our room. No freezer compartment in the fridge. Parking was free, but there was a resort fee of about $20 each day after what I paid through Expedia. Other reviews said this hotel is within walking distance, but it would be a long walk. If you are with tired kids, or just tired from walking around Disneyland all day, you are probably not going to want to walk that far. The ART bus stops right in front of the pool area and is $5.50 a day for adults. The Country Inn is the last stop right before the bus heads to Disneyland, but that means it's the last stop on the way
Manager Response: Dear Samantha R,  Thank you for taking the time to provide feedback regarding your recent stay! We are glad to hear you enjoyed your time with us, and especially happy to hear you enjoyed the freshly baked cookies we provide daily. See you next time!

Summary Heading: Good value choice for Disneyland visit
Summary: Nice value choice for Disneyland visit, but long walk away.   Pros: low price, new hotel, friendly staff, large and clean room, fridge and microwave in room, gift shop with mini mart open late, nice pool, comfy pillows.  Average: coffee (both in-room and at breakfast), free breakfast (standard stuff, same everyday), free internet (fast enough for email but not streaming shows), beds, a little freeway noise.  Cons: energy-saving features messed with power plugs so cell phones didn't charge, it's a really long walk to Disneyland.
Manager Response: Dear John H,  Thank you for the feedback.

Summary Heading: Nice clean hotel at reasonable price.
Summary: Hotel is clean and nice.  Staff is pleasant and courteous. Hotel breakfast is a bit of a joke.  I'm not a picky eater by any means of the imagination but I can't get most of their food down without wanting to throw up.  The food that is eatable typically runs out before you can count to 3 and staff is not on top of replenishing the more eatable items.  Stay here eat elsewhere.  I've stayed here over a half a dozen times in the last year and have seen no improvement on food as a matter of fact it has gotten worse.  I will not be returning again.
Manager Response: Dear arashp2017,  Thank you for your feedback. We are currently brainstorming ideas to jazz up our breakfast selection. We hope you visit us again the next time you're in the Anaheim area.

Summary Heading: Great place to stay for a Disneyland Trip!
Summary: This was our first trip to Disneyland and with all the hotels around it was hard to decide where to stay. We chose Country Inn & Suites and were VERY PLEASED!!! It is not on the main drag where Disney is, but the walk is really quick. (Maybe 10 minutes if lights are in your favor). We are walkers and enjoyed the easy walk (and I loved the honeysuckle along the way!) We also loved that it was across the street from the outdoor mall which had restaurants and shops...we went there twice!  Our room was upgraded to a king suite for free upon arrival. The room was very clean and new. The bed was very comfortable. The check in was fast and staff were so pleasant. We also utilized the pool a couple of days which was nice, although not a lot of seating but it was fine for us. The free
Manager Response: Dear Amy W,  Thank you so much for the 5 out of 5 review! We are glad to hear you were happy with our proximity to the Disneyland Resort and the Garden Walk. We hope you visit us during your next trip to the Anaheim area!

Summary: Loved this hotel. All of the staff was friendly, great pool, free parking, close proximity to Disneyland, restaurants, and freeways. There was a gift shop, bar, fitness room, free afternoon coffee and cookies. You just can't beat it. A++
Manager Response: Dear avallercorsa,  Thank you for the 5 out of 5 review! It's awesome to hear you enjoyed all the Country Inn & Suites by Radisson has to offer!

Summary: The place was very clean. The staff was friendly and only a few minutes walk to disneyland or take shuttle that's available for a small fee. I will definitely stay again also the pool was open till midnight, big perk for us.
Manager Response: Dear laracare7,  Thank you for the positive feedback. See you next time!

Summary Heading: We love Country Inn & Suites Anaheim.
Summary: We love this hotel so much we keep going back.  It's clean and nice and above all the staff is very kind and friendly, Mish, Joey, Fernando, Uzi, and Maria just to mention a few are exceptional!  We also enjoy the short walk to and from Disneyland.  Can't wait for the next trip.
Manager Response: Dear 820bernie,  We will definitely relay your kind words to Mish, Joey, Fernando, Uzi and Maria!

Summary Heading: Very clean hotel with wonderful staff!
Summary: The hotel was very clean from the lobby to the hotel room. The pool was great and heated and you can view the fireworks from the Disneyland show at night from the pool, which was fabulous! The walk to Disneyland was only about 10-15 min. There is a pizza place around the corner (Pizza Press) which was yummy! The hotel's breakfast was good for a complimentary breakfast buffet. We would definitely stay here again!
Manager Response: Dear kelli479,  Thank you for the positive review of the Country Inn & Suites by Radisson. We look forward to your next stay!

Summary: Friendly staff and kid friendly! As a mother I was very happy with how clean and friendly this place was. We have already booked a future stay! Staff always said hello and made sure we were taken care of. Mish,Joey,Deborah,Alex, Ruben and Maria are a few of the staff members you need to find and say hello too. They are amazing!!
Manager Response: Dear Melinda A,  Thank you SO MUCH for the kind words and shout outs! We are happy to hear you enjoyed your time with us. We will definitely relay your comments to Mish, Joey, Deborah, Alex and Maria!

Summary: Our overall stay was very nice.  Our room was very clean and spacious. We had a nice view to the pool and to Disney California adventure. The staff was very professional and caring .The breakfast was yummy. The only issue was parking but the staff resolved the matter quickly. I will definitely return when we are back in town.
Manager Response: Dear m0ni15,  We're happy to hear you enjoyed your time with us! Thank you for the 5 out of 5 review!

Summary: Hotel was reasonably priced. Close to Disneyland within walking distance or shuttle (with a small fee). Rooms were comfortable and clean. Complimentary breakfast was good and convenient. Definitely will stay again when we return. :)
Manager Response: Dear anonymousfra,  Thank you for the kind words. See you next time!

Summary Heading: Best hotel for Disneyland trips! Awesome stay like always!
Summary: We had an amazing experience at the Country Inn, we stayed here previously 2 months ago and decided to stay again and loved it! Right from check in the staff is so friendly, housekeeping was always so nice and kept our rooms always clean and very comfortable, and the breakfast buffet is so good. We also really enjoyed the pool and how parking was always available for us. I 100% recommend this hotel for any trip to Anaheim, we will definitely be back in July for our trip to Disneyland!
Manager Response: Dear lorenatrejo25,  Thank you for the 5 out of 5 review! Remember, call the hotel directly for the best rates.

Summary Heading: Family friendly modern Disney Family Vacay
Summary: Loved the value! Loved the location and included parking. Clean modern family friendly and includes breakfast albeit very salty! Great size room and amenities. Kids loved the lending library. Staff were great and friendly. Would definitely stay again in our next Disney trip. Only 10 mins drive from the park.
Manager Response: Dear Souwah28,  Thank you for your feedback! We look forward to your next stay!

Summary: Clean. Nice breakfast . Friendly staff. Great location.  Was in town for hockey tournament.  The team lived the breakfast and the pool . Rooms were spacious and clean .I would recommend this hotel. Close to Disney was a bonus
Manager Response: Dear Kim H,  Thank you for your 5 out of 5 review! We appreciate your kind words.

Summary: Our say at this hotel could not have been better.  The hotel is very clean, and our room was immaculate. The staff were, without exception, very friendly in response to a greeting or question.  The breakfast was good, for this type of self serve buffet.  Our room was quiet, clean, and comfortable, with very well maintained furnishings.  We are annual pass holders at Disneyland and we will be returning to this hotel when we stay overnight. We will also recommend this hotel to family and friends.
Manager Response: Dear KLLGlass,  Thank you for the 5 out of 5 review! We are delighted to hear you will recommend us to your family and friends. See you next time!

Summary: This was the best hotel experience I've ever had on a trip to Disneyland. The hotel is beautifully maintained and our room was immaculate. The staff was so friendly and attentive both days we were there. The included breakfast was fantastic and a great start to our day of fun at Disneyland. The first night there we were able to watch the fireworks from the pool. The beds are super comfy and we had a great nights sleep both nights we stayed. I could not have asked for a better stay and would highly recommend the Country Inn and Suites to anyone planning a Disneyland trip!
Manager Response: Dear Nicki C,  Thank you for all your kid words! We are happy to hear you enjoyed your time with us and look forward to your next visit.

Summary: I stayed at this location twice. My first visit was for 4 nights and I loved every aspect of my stay. The staff was polite and friendly, the room was clean and comfortable, and I could see the fireworks from the room. The bartender was the best and was very personable.   I came back to this location 4 days later and my stay was completely different!! The agent that checked me in wasn't friendly at all. She got an attitude because I was asking her about the resort fee that is added. The agent next to her was super friendly to her guest. I had requested a late checkout for 12:30pm and gotten it approved. Housekeeping knocked on my door 3 times starting at 11:00am. I totally understand the first time, but after I told them I had a late checkout, I shouldn't have gotten 2 more
Manager Response: Dear Allen A,  I deeply apologize for the confusion and inconsistency you encountered when staying with us. Your concerns will definitely be investigated. Thank you for bringing it to our attention, you concerns will be forwarded to correct department leaders.   If you would like to discuss your stay any further please reach out to the hotel directly.

Summary: Myself and my fiancé recently stayed at the Country Inn and Suites and we absolutely loved it. I was communicating with the hotel prior to arrival by email as we were traveling from Sydney, Australia and the employees were extremely helpful. We arrived early in the morning after a 15 hour flight and the hotel was able to offer us a room at this time! This was amazing as it gave us a full extra day to enjoy Disneyland as we were able to get in to our room and freshen up, otherwise we would have spent the day at the hotel waiting for our room. So thank you for this! The hotel was very modern, less than 2 years old if I remember correctly. We didn’t use the pool area but it looked gorgeous, and usually quite quiet. The WiFi was great. The complementary breakfast was perfect. The
Manager Response: Dear beth393,  Thank you for the nice shout out on Trip Advisor! We are glad you and your future spouse enjoyed your time with us. We look forward to your next visit!

Summary Heading: I would change one thing, otherwise a nice place
Summary: We stayed over Memorial Day Weekends for 4 nights. For the most part the hotel is nice, clean and staff is accommodating. We did have an issue our first night - our room was facing the HWY 5. The noise from the traffic kept us awake most of the night. We were given another room the next morning, further away from the highway, which was much better.  Pros: -Clean -Professioanal staff -Walking distance to Disney Land -Good parking -Charging stations for electric vehicles  Cons -Part of the hotel is facing HWY 5, which will be noisy -Breakfast was terrible (i.e. powdered eggs, NO BACON, sausage tastes like cardboard) -No room service -Food at the bar took forever to be made/served
Manager Response: Dear AK652004,  Thank you for taking the time to provide feedback regarding your recent stay at the Country Inn & Suites by Radisson. We appreciate your comments. All feedback, positive and negative are taken into consideration in order to improve our guest experience. Again, thank you for your comments.

Summary: This is an excellent hotel and amazing place to stay. We were first greeted Fernando who made us feel like family and made sure we had anything we needed. We will definitely stay here again in the future!
Manager Response: Dear Chris C,   Thank you for the 5 out of 5 review. We appreciated your feedback and will definitely relay your kind words to Fernando!

Summary: My family and I stayed here for a Disneyland trip. Very nice and clean, beds were super comfortable, and only a 15 minute walk to Disneyland. There is also a hot breakfast available (eggs, sausage, bread, fresh fruit, cereal, juices, coffee, tea). We enjoyed our visit and I highly recommend it! We also walked to a delicious Mediterranean restaurant 20min again called Zov.   My only con to this place, it is next to the highway which is convenient but was a little noisy.  The walls and windows kept most of the noise at a minimum. We would definitely stay here again.
Manager Response: Dear KWHAustin_Texas,  Thank you for taking the time to provide feedback regarding your recent stay. We appreciate all comments and kind words.

Summary: Great place and accommodations very close to the park with out being from Disney. Friendly staff, only problem is noise from freeway. Ask for side away from freeway 5. Upon can walk two blocks and enter resort. Watch for Uber cabs because they don’t know the area. We had a driver took us for a 40 min ride around the park :(
Manager Response: Dear Eugenio G,  Thank you for your 5 out of 5 review. We are happy to hear you enjoyed your time with us and look forward to your next visit.

Summary: Fernando and the staff go out of their way to make each guest feel welcome and at home during their stay! Clean, beautiful to look at, comfy beds, and a yummy breakfast make their own only choice for our monthly Disney trips!!
Manager Response: Dear LauraNCurt,  Thank you for taking the time to let us know how your recent stay was. We will definitely relay your kind words to Fernando!

Summary: Great location. Very friendly staff. Parking and laundry facilities included in resort fee. Free breakfast also. 110% on the Phoenix one. Only concern at the moment is they are constructing a new building next too it. Also the freeway is right next too it, so you hear some noise.
Manager Response: Dear 693suel,  Thank you for your recent review. We are happy you enjoyed everything we have to offer and we look forward to your next stay.

Summary Heading: Great New Hotel needs better service
Summary: Check in today May 23, 2018, great new hotel close by Disney, mall and cheesecake factory. The price was magnificent, large room 2 queen with microwave and refrigerator. The check in process was a terrible, one staff. It took her 20 mins to check in one guest and guest are piling up. I stated to her for a brand new hotel with only 1 guest services that they need to hire more folks, she stated the other person was on lunch. She did apologize for the delay. First impression always last, can sf o better.
Manager Response: Dear jamp0gi,  Thank you for your feedback. All comments are taken into consideration.

Summary: This was my second visit to the hotel and absolutely love it. One of the best choices for places to stay in the Disneyland area.  Clean and comfortable rooms.  Friendly staff.  Reasonably priced bar and food menu.  Plus a free breakfast that actually is good.
Manager Response: Dear JasonFromCalifornia,  Thank you for the 5 out of 5 review!

Summary Heading: Very new, spacious rooms, great pool, friendly helpful staff, good location
Summary: We stayed for 6 nights to visit Disneyland and Universal Studios with our daughter, son-in-law and two grandchildren.  Our two king studio suites were so spacious.  The pool was large, and warm enough to swim in while watching the fireworks.  The hot tub was great. The breakfast was good. It took under 15 min.to walk to Disneyland and liked
Manager Response: Dear Helen M,  We are happy to hear you and your family enjoyed your time with us! Thank you for the feedback.

Summary: Very friendly and helpful staff. Great food and drinks. Bartender and manager made our night there fun and enjoyable. The rooms are extremely nice and clean. Also very roomy. Very satisfied guests. 5 Stars.
Manager Response: Dear Chris22502,  Thank you for the 5 out of 5 review! See you next time.

Summary: What a great stay! The hotel team was super nice. Check-in/out was fast.  Room was large, clean & updated: our King room had a separate living room area/TV and mini fridge.  We could see the Disney fireworks out our window!  Free parking, free Breakfast and 24hr convenience store open. 10 min walk to Disneyland security gate/Uber/Taxi drop-off-- another 5-7min to entrance gates-- MUCH faster to walk from hotel than wait for Uber ($8.55 if you have tired kiddos at the end of the night) or in the past when we drove/parked/took Tram.  We'll definitely be staying next time!
Manager Response: Dear V K,  Thank you for your kind words. We appreciate your feedback and look forward to your next visit!

Summary: We spent 5 fantastic nights at the Country Inn & Suites Hotel. Great location from the parks, only 10/15min direct walk to Disney area. Staff very welcoming and helpful nothing is too much. Rooms size are very good with modern decor. Bed is very comfortable with a separate sitting area and TV. Free parking and breakfast included which has a great selection catering for everyone. I would highly recommend this hotel!
Manager Response: Dear hammers23,   Thank you for the 5 out of 5 review! We look forward to your next visit.

Summary: Thank you for the great services.  I was having breakfast with my 2 sleep deprived sons who were pulling me in different directions.  I appreciate the attention and the care of the servers, especially Maria A.
Manager Response: Dear phoebetis,  Thank you for your feedback. We will relay your kind words to Maria A.

Summary: I’m so glad I found this hotel! Very close to Disneyland, about a 10-15 min walk. The hotel is very modern and clean. Checking in and out was was easy. My stay included breakfast which was great. They had a really nice selection for breakfast. I would definitely be staying here again. The bed was really comfortable too, place is quiet.
Manager Response: Dear April M,  Thank you for the 5 out of 5 rating!

Summary: I’ll make it short and simple, stayed here because my girlfriend and I were going to Disneyland for a couple days. The staff service was very friendly and helpful. There is a free all you can eat breakfast with this well priced hotel. Rooms are clean, facilities clean, the hotel is close to a shopping center. Close to Disney which is the whole point of our stay, also close to another great destination Anaheim Packing District. Had no issues at all staying here. Will definitely go back and try other country inn and suite locations.
Manager Response: Dear Elijah E,  We're glad to hear you and your girlfriend enjoyed your time with us! Thanks for the kind words.

Summary: It was a deleightful stay , Room was wonderful( bigger then expected)  , staff was very nice, and the breakfast was perfect !  I recommend this place !!  Especially since Disneyland is close by . Diego Cortez
Manager Response: Dear digospacificcoast,  Thank you for your kind word!

Summary: Everything about the stay was almost perfect. For starters the pool is exceptional it is heated and so big and so nice along with the hot tub. The place is very clean there is always staff up and down cleaning. The only complaint we had is the schedule of the cleaning routine. The first couple of days the staff would come by @ around 11 so we started to leave the room around that time to give them space to clean. Then the next few  days they showed @ 1 or 2 so we would return from our errands where we thought we had given them enough time and they hadn't showed and by then we were tired didn't want to leave so didn't get our room cleaned. There is also some construction going on next door so it could get a little loud. Other than that it was nice right around the corner of
Manager Response: Dear Mario A.,  We are glad to hear you enjoyed your time with us here at the Country Inn & Suites by Radisson. Thank you for your kind words and we look forward to your next stay!

Summary: We wanted something close to Disneyland and they were just a short walk away. I was pleasantly surprised how nice this property is. It has free charging for,my electric vehicle and the pool is open until midnight. We loved it!
Manager Response: Dear John K,  Thank you for the 5 out of 5 review!

Summary Heading: Amazing property, Amazing staff, EASY walk to Disney
Summary: My family and I recently drove down to Anaheim from the Sacramento area and stayed at  the Country Inn & Suites for 5 nights. We could not have asked for a better experience and better stay. The front desk staff, to the management, breakfast area attendants, bartenders, etc., all were great.   When you google map the distance from the hotel to the center area between CA Adventure and DL, it says 0.8 miles. It doesn't feel that long at all. It's an extremely easy walk and we did it for 4 days straight with a 2 year old and a 5 year old. A couple of times we went there and back twice in a day. It's maybe a 10 minute walk. The fact that the Anaheim GardenWalk is legitimately across the street was a huge bonus as well. The shops, restaurants and bars were very convenient to have so
Manager Response: Dear Jareb S,  Thank you for taking time to review the Country Inn & Suites by Radisson Anaheim. We are happy to hear you enjoyed everything our hotel has to offer. Thank you for staying with us and we look forward to your next visit!

Summary: Ok... this place is amazing !!!! Very very best place to stay and worth every cent! Joey was great at front desk !! Super nice and helpful!! You have to go to the bar area .. Veronica serves the best drinks and food!! She goes out of her way to give you the best service !!!
Manager Response: Dear cgonti,  Thank you for your kind feedback. We will definitely relay your kind words to Joey and Veronica.

Summary: Great value, clean, friendly, location perfect. I will return to this hotel for my next trip. All the staff was friendly and the price was incredible. Breakfast was just right, there were lots of choices. We walked to Disneyland only took 15 mins.
Manager Response: Dear davidomedina,  Thank you for the 5 out of 5 rating!

Summary: I Ulster say so many positive things about this hotel, but simply put, you must stay here, you will not be disappointed! Staff are friendly, rooms comfortable and clean, breakfast great and plenty to eat and 10 minutes walk to Disney
Manager Response: Dear Laurence D,  Thank you for your kind words! We're happy you enjoyed your time with us and look forward to your next visit!

Summary: I just want to say this hotel and the staff where wonderful.  The rooms were clean the staff was so helpful and kind . I appreciate the hard work of all the employees from the bottom to the top . Thanks Dylan
Manager Response: Dear Dylan,  Thank you for the 5 out of 5 review! We're happy you enjoyed your time with us!

Summary: My wife and I recently stayed at the country inn and suites near Disneyland ca. What can I say, the rooms were spotless, staff was incredibly courteous and the breakfast was great. First time I’ve stayed anywhere where the GM and the head of HR were in the lobby and breakfast area asking patrons if they needed anything. Shows how much they care. We come here at least once a year and will definitely stay here again. A very pleasant experience!
Manager Response: Dear valued guest,   Thank you for taking the time to provide feedback regarding your recent stay at the Country Inn & Suites by Radisson. We are happy that you enjoyed your time with us. Your kind words will be relayed to David our GM and Geraldine our HR! Thank you and we hope we get a chance to see you during your next visit to the Anaheim area.

Summary: The hotel is within walking distance of Disneyland.  They serve a hot brk everyday, we have stayed here so often that the staff knows us by name.  They make us feel like we are coming home.  When we check in the front desk staff ( Cherine, Barbara, Misha, Nina, & Fernando)& I'm sure I've missed someone, always greet us like a family member.  We have no complaints with this hotel or any of the staff.
Manager Response: Dear Raphael R,  Thank you for your feedback. We will definitely relay your kind words to Nina, Fernando, Mish, Cherine and Barbara!

Summary: The Hotel is in a great location. Top notch service, and prompt to respond to services requested, Good amenities and very nicely kept grounds. Would recommend to anyone that is thinking about Disneyland area. And the Convention Center
Manager Response: Dear simplcleaners,   Thanks for your kind words!

Summary: I rarely write reviews, but felt compelled to do so because I like to give credit where credit is due.  First let me say that the location of the Country Inn & Suites couldn’t have been more convenient.  Our trip was for multiple reasons, a basketball tournament, family time, and a quick trip to Knotts.  We walked to the tournament games everyday which saved us a ton on parking. And there were plenty of conveniences close by.  The hotel was immaculately clean, had everything we needed, pool, gym, coffee 247 😀, and included a big hot breakfast everyday which was wonderful especially before game time.  The staff was super friendly and was always helpful, even when we needed some ointment for an injury.  I will definitely be staying here when we return for the next tournament in
Manager Response: Dear CW M,  Thank you for taking the time to let us know how your visit to the Country Inn & Suites by Radisson was. We are glad you and your family enjoyed your time with us and we look forward to seeing you in July!

Summary: Great price, great hotel, clean, beautiful, quiet.  Staff were very welcoming and helpful with all our questions and requests. It’s about a 10 Minute walk to Disney. I did hear that there is a shuttle but I didn’t see it or use it. Some of the other hotels directly across were charging at minimum double for what looked like a motel. Stay here you’ll love it. We were on 5th floor overlooking highway and had no issues with noise. They are building next door and still no problems. Free parking and free breakfast.
Manager Response: Dear Mycrazy7,  On behalf of the entire Country Inn & Suites staff we would like to thank you for your feedback! We are happy you enjoyed your time with us and look forward to your next visit!

Summary: We enjoyed a very last minute trip to Disneyland and needed to book a hotel on short notice.  We had never stayed at this hotel before but I would stay here again in a heartbeat.  The customer service was excellent, the room was very clean and spacious.  The pool was lovely and I was so impressed with the fact that even at 9pm there was an employee who came out and straightened all the lounge chairs and picked up leftover towels.  The breakfast was substantial and there was plenty of seating.  You could walk from the hotel to Disneyland but we chose to take a cab (Lyft or Uber) and found that to be easy to manage.  The beds were very comfortable which also made me so happy!
Manager Response: Dear mjjpower,  We are delighted to hear you enjoyed your time at the Country Inn & Suites by Radisson, Anaheim. Thank you for your comments and we look forward to your next stay!

Summary Heading: Everyone went out of their way to accommodate us and the hotel was very clean
Summary: All of the workers from the front desk, Joey, to the manager, Gary Garcia, to the utility staff were beyond nice. Being on a first name basis with staff at a hotel we’ve never been to before is very unusual. The outside of the hotel to the inside was clean, tidy and even smelled good. We were even greeted with discounts at multiple restaurants and fresh chocolate chip cookies. The variety of the food at the complimentary breakfast buffet was outstanding. Our room was spacious and clean. Even the use of the laundry facility was complimentary. Being able to park in a cool basement was nice. The hotel is walking distance from stores, restaurants and Disneyland. You can even see Disneyland’s fireworks from the pool. To sum everything up, this hotel is all around first class and will
Manager Response: Dear Dawna Z,   Thank you for your feedback. We will definitely relay your kind words to Joey and Gary.

Summary: Perfect location. Walking distance to Disneyland, Downtown Disney, Garden Walk, and other restaurants and shops. The amenities are wonderful (free breakfast, free parking, large pool and spa, gym, bar and food service).  Friendly and helpful staff who provide excellent customer service.
Manager Response: Dear Cheryl E E,  We are delighted to hear your enjoyed everything the Country Inn & Suites by Radisson has to offer!

Summary Heading: Convenience on the location, and the best attention
Summary: I highly recommend this hotel to anyone traveling to disney, disney california adventure and knott's berry farm... The staff is super friendly and helpful, the hotel is new and very convenient just a 10 minute walk from Disney, and the fireworks can bee seen from the pool and the jacuzzi, and from some rooms.
Manager Response: Dear santillanes,  Thank you for your kind words. We are glad you enjoyed everything from our infinity pool and hot tub, the the Disneyland fireworks. We look forward to your next visit!

Summary Heading: Nice, new hotel close to Disneyland Resort
Summary: The hotel is rather new and you can tell. The location is great, in that, if you want to walk to Disneyland, you can do so in about 15 minutes. Otherwise, the local Anaheim Resort Transit Shuttle Bus arrives and departs from the hotel's parking lot every 20-30 minutes for a cost of approx. $3-$4 per person. On hot days, the air conditioned shuttle makes spending the few extra dollars well worth it.  The hotel has a nice pool area where you can sit and eat, whilst your kids are swimming. Seemed like a lot of families stay here (not surprising). I would have given it 5 stars but the food was just o.k. and kind of expensive for the quality. I would definitely stay here again, but probably wont eat dinner there. If you are looking for a comfortable, clean and close stay to
Manager Response: Dear Casey D,  Thank you for taking the time to provide feedback regarding your recent stay at the Country Inn & Suites by Radisson, Anaheim. We look forward to seeing you during your next visit to the Anaheim area.

Summary: If you are hotel shopping for a Disney vacation, this is your lucky day. The Country Inn and Suites has it ALL.  Free parking! They even have a free parking garage. Which is really nice on hot days.  Free breakfast! Big full breakfast. Something for everyone.  Big comfortable rooms! The TVs have a sleep timer. It’s the little things.  Great water pressure in the shower!  The pool and hot tub are open late, as in midnight! That means when you drag yourself back to your room after walking an average of around the world twice at the parks and your feet and legs are so sore they don’t hurt anymore because they are numb, you still have time to soak the pain away in the sparking clean salt water hot tub.  You can watch the fireworks from the pool area or the big hallway windows on
Manager Response: Thank you for your feedback and kind words! We are happy to hear you enjoyed your time with us.

Summary: Our King Suite was very comfortable and spacious, but we would prefer a regular door on the bathroom, rather than the sliding door.  We asked for washcloths twice, but never saw one after the two we found at check-in.  There were numerous delicious choices for breakfast; we missed seeing bananas or yogurt.  Overall, it was a very pleasant three nights at a beautiful new hotel.  We will stay there again.
Manager Response: Dear Pam D,  Thank you for taking the time to provide feedback regarding your recent stay at the Country Inn & Suites by Radisson, Anaheim. We look forward to your next visit!

Summary: Nice hotel. The staff was great, the rooms were clean, The decor was very modern, convienant location, walking distance to shops, freeway and most importantly, Disneyland. The buffet breakfast was also a bonus.
Manager Response: Dear misstasha1020,  Thank you for your kind words and feedback! We hope we see you during your next visit to the Anaheim area.

Summary Heading: New, clean & close to Disney Parks!
Summary: This hotel is very clean and close to Disney entrance 10 - 15 min walk. Plenty of free parking and free breakfast also good free wi-if. There's only one thing letting this hotel down and that is that they choose not to install thicker windows as you can hear the noise from the highway behind the hotel, having travelled from the uk and staying in a hotel at the end of Heathrow airports runways and not being able to hear anything this is a great shame as this hotel hits all other points.
Manager Response: Dear Kim E.  Thank you for taking the time to provide feedback regarding your recent stay. Your comments and concerns will be forwarded to the appropriate department. Thank you for staying at the Country Inn & Suites by Radisson.

Summary: The parking is convenient.  Expedia listed the resort fee as $17 a night but when I got to the hotel they said it was $20 a night, so a slight discrepancy.  We booked the suite and it was exactly as pictured which I appreciate.  Our room was on the 5th floor so there was some freeway noise.  I am a light sleeper so I slept with earplugs in.  The breakfast was the standard hot hotel breakfast. It’s a 10-15 min walk to Disneyland depending on your pace.  I noticed the pool was open until 12 am which I thought was awesome and wish we had been able to take advantage.  Overall a good value if you don’t mind the freeway noise.  On the plus side, we could see the fireworks from our room.  Unfortunately if you’re trying to sleep it’s quite loud.
Manager Response: Dear VacationLover1985,   Thank you for sharing your experience. Our unique location and proximity to Disneyland definitely has its advantages. Thank you for your kind words and we look forward to your next visit!

Summary Heading: I'd stay again, but I hope they fix a few things
Summary: Pros: New, clean, amazingly friendly/helpful staff, breakfast, comfort, Disney shuttle, fast elevator, nice pool area that's open late! Cons: Minor things... only one hook to hang a towel (hard when more than one person), fitted sheets kept coming off the bed (we were in a group with two rooms). Food in bar area was sub-par at best (someone needs to talk to the food services manager!). Staff in bar area was forgetful. Beer was great.   We came on a no-kids Disney trip. We'd totally stay here again, but would definitely avoid the food at the bar when having a happy hour... which was a bummer. Chips and salsa were from a bag with what was definitely Pace Picante sauce. Spinach salad was obviously from a bag that was wilted and musty.   That said, we'd be back... just wouldn't eat
Manager Response: Dear ladybuggn,  Thank you for your feedback and taking the time to let us know how your visit was. The issues listed in your review have been forwarded to the appropriate department leader and we will take the proper steps to correct the issues mentioned.  We appreciate your feedback and look forwarding to see you during your next visit to the Anaheim area.

Summary: There are no vending machines. There's no bottled water provided. There's no minibar. Their small store's system was down and they wouldn't sell me a bottle of water.  Everything about our room screamed cut corners. The drywall in the bathroom is roughly cut and in places doesn't reach the floor; the sheets are thin; the towels are small and rough. Our room smells like new construction and they were repainting the hallway when we checked in (they didn't post a wet paint sign, so hopefully your kid doesn't touch the wall).  They signed us up for their loyalty program without asking.  The lady at the front desk made an active effort not to mention any specifics about money when we checked in or when we checked out - nothing about the cost of the room, the extra resort fee, etc (we
Manager Response: Dear robwpace,  Thank you for posting your review. I truly do apologize if your experience with us was not a positive one. Please know that the issues you mentioned will not be overlooked.  In order to ensure situations such as the ones you spoke of do not happen in the future I would like to investigate your stay. If you would like to further discuss your stay with us please feel free to contact me at property level.

Summary: We stayed at this hotel for the Disney trip. It's about 15 minutes walk from the hotel. If you walk fast you possibly can go to the main entrance of the Disney in 10 minutes. But with kids and backpack, you can only walk so fast. At the end of the day, 15 minutes walk seem really a lot. But that's a choice I made and the hotel has nothing to do with it. The room was big but lack of furniture. Not enough storage and the furniture is IKEA type. Maybe that's the trend but I didn't like it and we felt that we didn't have enough storage. The breakfast was really basic. Hotel and the room is clean. Staffs are nice. It's a busy hotel. So, you may have to wait to talk to the front desk but they are professionals. It was an OK stay.
Manager Response: Dear Sanowar H,  Thank you for taking the time to provide feedback regarding your recent stay at the Country Inn & Suites by Radisson Anaheim. We are sorry to hear you didn't fully enjoy your time with us. We appreciate your comments and will take them into consideration when improving our hotel.

Summary: There are a lot of nice things about this hotel. Ample onsite free parking with an EV charger to boot.  Decent breakfast and clean. However, if you get a room on an upper floor 4 & 5 on the freeway site of the hotel you will not sleep. I was in room 412 and others in my party on floors 4 & 5 on that same side of the hotel had the same issue. And I can't recommend nor would I ever go back someplace that I can't sleep.  If you can't sleep you can't enjoy the events you came here for in the first place.  They do provide ear plugs at the front desk upon request, but we were here for a convention and needed to be up. by 6am everyday so could not risk miss hearing our alarm in the morning.
Manager Response: Dear California2977,  Thank you for providing feedback regarding your recent stay at the Country Inn & Suites by Radisson Anaheim. I believe I may have already reached out to you via another outlet. If you would like to further discuss your recent stay please reach out to me at property level. Thank you for your time and comments.

Summary: I'm afraid to say the right words and have this hotel swamped like the other hotels on Harbour Blvd.  It's just perfect and literally my favorite. Better than the Paradice Pier!! Perfect from the staff in the front desk, housekeeping, the rooms, parking to the price. Oh and the complimentary breakfast is literally better than ihop!!
Manager Response: Dear HD M,  Thank you for your kind words!

Summary: The reviews on TA was 9.2, I DISAGREE I give it a 10!  Cherine and Joey at the frontdesk were absolutely amazing. Best host ever. The rooms were  spacious, roomy,  very clean, beds perfect and a/c cold. The free hot breakfast was fantastic and very good selection. The heated pool was very clean and big, grandkids loved it so much did not want to get out to head back to Disney.  The friendliest staff by far of any hotel I have ever stayed at, they were dialed in to meet all your needs, very impressive.   Two unsung heros who helped make our stay perfect was Federico Navarro and Maria Aguilera, just so accommodating, freindly and focused to make our stay perfect, one could easy tell they love their jobs.
Manager Response: Dear Jay L,  Thank you for your feedback. We will definitely relay your kind words to Federico, Cherine, Joey and Maria!

Summary: Location (10 min. walk to Disneyland/California Adventure), availability of restaurants at nearby Gardenwalk (shopping/eating area), friendliness of staff, and best free breakfast ever=OUTSTANDING experience in every way!
Manager Response: Dear onwings2018,  Thank you for your kind words! We are happy to hear you took advantage of all the area has to offer.

Summary: The staff was great from the moment we as arrived to the day we left. Very helpful and accommodating. Very clean rooms, great complimentary breakfast and within walking distance to Disneyland. Highly recommend!
Manager Response: Dear jessicanmiller3,  Thank you for your kind words!

Summary: Actually still a guest here and will be for several nights to come.  Rooms are spacious and very clean. Staff friendly of course.  Breakfast is amazing as included.  Free parking and Wi-Fi access.  10 minutes fwalking distance from both Disney parks.  Low cost considering so choose here.
Manager Response: Dear Darryl H,  We are happy to hear you enjoyed your visit with us! Thank you for your feedback.

Summary: We had great front desk service right from the get go!! Everyone from cleaning staff to maintenance was all very hospitable. Was nice to see management out and about chatting with the guests. It was a short walk to the main park entrance to Disneyland. For our 5 and 9 year old it was no problem but the Anaheim resort transit does pickup and drop off as well if you want to rest your legs. The breakfast was perfect for us! Great selection. We had a great view from our room to see the firework show! The salt water pool was just the right temperature for our family; hot tub was great in cooler evenings. Everything was clean. There is even an Inn Case store for all those little things you might forget and a Pool side bistro to get sandwiches and pizzas, drinks if you don’t wanna to
Manager Response: Dear ryanksharp,  Thank you for your feedback!

Summary Heading: Very nice stay and overall experience!
Summary: I chose this hotel based on reviews and price value and they truly lived up to ratings IMO.  My wife and I were very happy with the friendly staff, breakfast, and condition of the hotel and rooms.  Nice stay!
Manager Response: Dear Robert B.,  Thank you for your kind words and we look forward to your next visit!

Summary: Hotel is modern and kept very clean. Rooms are excellent with a lot of room. Shower and tub were great. No cheap shower head - and had great water pressure. Beds were comfy. Staff is great. We were surprised by the complimentary breakfast - the only we didn't like were the eggs but other than that everything was great! Much more fresh food than other hotels.  15 minute walk to Disneyland, or hop on the ART bus that stops right in the parking lot of the hotel.
Manager Response: Dear nicolelopez21,  Thank you for taking the time to give us a shout-out on TripAdvisor! We are happy to hear you enjoyed your time with us!

Summary: Cherine was amazing! She made sure our family of 5 got the exact room we needed after having to previously switch from another hotel to this one. It couldn't have worked out better, she was very accommodating and friendly.The room was great, the breakfast was always very good and the staff was very helpful. We walked to Disneyland all 4 days with no complaints from our 3 young children.The hotel is in a great location, you feel very safe walking around. Lots of shops and food nearby. We will defiantly come back next year!!!!
Manager Response: Dear skyandcc,  Thank you for your feedback. We are glad to hear you and the family enjoyed your stay!

Summary: This hotel is clean, modern and fresh. Massive rooms we had a studio suite which was great value. Modern decor with living room, bath with shower overhead and bedroom. Bed very comfortable and rooms really quite you can’t hear any neighbours. Complimentary use of washing machines and dryers but there are only two they do get busy. Good choice at breakfast and gluten free bread on request. Pool was nice and towels provided. Great location to Disney 10/15 mins walk. Would stay again!
Manager Response: Dear Ribena87,  We are delighted to hear you enjoyed your time with us. Hope we see you during your next visit to the Anaheim area!

Summary Heading: A must stay for future Disney trips!
Summary: Looking for a place near Disney, we decided to give this place a try and now, we'll only stay here in the future! Everyone was so kind! The rooms were big and clean. Complimentary breakfast was great and the only thing I could suggest to make better would be too have multiple coffee stations. There was one coffee carafe that was out when we were looking for coffee which they promptly filled but multiple stations might help solve traffic/supply issues? Federico, Fernando, and Christie stuck out to me as being especially willing to go out of their way to make me feel at home. Well done team!
Manager Response: Dear Amber N,  Thank you for your kind words and we will definitely relay your feedback to Federcio, Fernando and Christie!

Summary: Just checked out this morning. We were very pleased with our stay. Great amenities, welcoming atmosphere (our daughter loved Mickey in the lobby) and the staff was kind and accommodating. Only negative of the trip, was the water pressure in the shower! I’m not sure if that can be fixed, but it was non existent. Got the job done, but not ideal. Still, everything else was 5-star!
Manager Response: Dear Julie G,  Thank you for your kind words! Your water pressure concern has been forwarded to the proper department. Thank you for providing feedback. We look forward to your next visit!

Summary: This property was everything that other reviewers are saying. It is new, modern, clean and staffed with true professionals. Don't hesitate! You'll love it. City bus stops at edge of property. Perfect!
Manager Response: Dear scottcC5470KZ,  Thank you for taking the time to provide feedback regarding your recent stay at the Country Inn & Suites by Radisson Anaheim. We are glad to hear you enjoyed your time with us and we hope we see you during your next visit to the Anaheim area!

Summary: Nice clean hotel. Just a block or so away from Disneyland. Well worth it. You can tell that the staff there have pride in keeping that place in tip top shape. Really friendly staff and helpful too. This hotel has been my go to hotel whenever we go to Disneyland for more than 1 day. Beds are comfy and breakfast is provided.
Manager Response: Dear yosio116,  We are delighted to hear you enjoyed your stay with us and look forward to many more to come.

Summary Heading: Excellent Stay at a Great Price
Summary: Large rooms with a good breakfast.  Really enjoyed my stay.  None of the hustle and bustle of the crowds for Disneyland but close enough that you could walk.  Rooms can hold a family of 5 or 6 easily staff was great.
Manager Response: Dear Eric W,  Thank you for your kind words. We look forward to your next visit to the Anaheim area.

Summary: I selected this hotel because of the great reviews on TripAdvisor and I was a little disappointed.  I don't understand all of the 5-star reviews. The property is clean and in good repair but the rooms are very standard hotel rooms. I had a king suite which I would not recommend unless you want a lot of empty. The room was very large and practically empty of furniture. I felt like I was sleeping in a racquetball court. They explained to me that many international travelers love this space for roll-away beds and lots of luggage. If that does not describe you, then you may not find the suite to your liking. Overall, it is a nice property and about a 15 minute walk to Disneyland.
Manager Response: Dear jongrundy,  We appreciate your feedback and are currently looking into ways to utilize the empty space in some of our King Suites. Thank you for staying at the Country Inn & Suites and we hope we see you during your next visit to the Anaheim area.

Summary Heading: Great choice for Disneyland base camp
Summary: Picked this hotel for pricepoint, pool, proximity to theme parks, and provided breakfast. There is a $17/per Day Resort Fee that is basically parking and pool. You can walk to Disneyland in 15 minutes. The $5.50 day pass on the shuttle was 20 mins I was told for other stops. I had kids 10 and 15 who were able walkers so we did that. If you have a day built into your trip for recoup from So Cal theme park crusade as we did it was great to spend a day at the pool as it was largely empty. We found it also nice to be just far enough out of the Park mania that may exist with closer options. Granted we had an optimal room situation: as far away from the Freeway as we could get that overlooked the pool and Disney Firework show the night we weren't in the park. Other reviews had made
Manager Response: Dear scootersnw1,  Thank you for taking time to provide feedback regarding your recent stay. We are happy to hear you and your family enjoyed everything from our location in proximity to the Disneyland Resort to our large infinity pool. We will definitely relay your kind words to Fernando and the rest of the staff and look forward to your next visit to the Anaheim area.

Summary: Everything about this hotel was fantastic.  The staff at the front desk was welcoming and accommodating.  The bartender in the Bistro was very friendly.  Nice clean room and pool.  Free breakfast, Wi-Fi, and parking.  Within walking distance to Disneyland and an option for the bus.  We really enjoyed our stay and will definitely use this hotel in the future.
Manager Response: Dear mandy2lu,  Thank you for taking the time to provide feedback regarding your recent stay at the Country Inn & Suites by Radisson. We are happy to hear you enjoyed your time with us and look forward to your next visit!

Summary: I had hesitation booking here, as I did not recognize this hotel chain.  I called the hotel and spoke to Cherine, who was very friendly and helpful. After learning about all the amentites and distance to Disneyland, I decided to book. Only King Suites were available, and unfortunately, the sofa sleeper was not the most comfortable. The check in was friendly and easy, and the cookies were a nice treat. The room was modern, clean and roomy. Breakfast was good, plentiful and the staff amazing.  Uzi was especially pleasant and we had a great time talking to him each morning. The garage also had charging stations, and washer/dryers. I would highly recommend this hotel!
Manager Response: Dear sernazar,  Thank you for your feedback. We will definitely relay your kind words to Cherine and Uzi!

Summary Heading: Great hotel for older Disneyland goers
Summary: This was a great place to stay for families with older kids that don’t mind walking a few extra blocks for a less expensive option.  Comfortable, clean, modern room and a nice buffet breakfast.  Pool area and dining area looked really nice too, but we stayed all day in the parks, so didn’t get to enjoy much.  Only drawback was no shuttle, but it’s not so far to walk if your kids are out of stroller stage.
Manager Response: Dear Meredith R.,  We are delighted to hear you and your family enjoyed your time here at the Country Inn & Suites by Radisson. Thank you for your kind words and we look forward to your next visit to the Anaheim area.

Summary: Good cookies upon arrival. The queen beds didn't seem to be queens. We really should have booked the sofa bed plus king to fit our family better. The breakfast area was nice and large. I really like the little movie room off the side. The pool area looked fantastic, but we didn't use it. The walk to Disney is probably totally doable to save money on parking, but perhaps not as well lit as some other walking distance hotels where there is more action. I'm looking forward to staying here again when I'm in the area as I like the amenities of Country Inn and Suites and we're Club Carlson members.
Manager Response: Dear plezzka L,  Thank you for being a Club Carlson/Radisson Rewards member! We are delighted to hear you enjoyed your time with us. Thank you for your feedback and we look forward to your next visit!

Summary: Good hotel to stay with kids overnight for a visit to Disneyland. Walking distance from the parks and very accessible from the freeway. Very helpful staff and good sized rooms that accommodate luggage, toys, etc for a large family.
Manager Response: Dear ajfc1976,  Thank you for your feedback regarding your recent stay. We are happy to hear you and your family enjoyed your time with us!

Summary Heading: Amazing Hotel with an amazing pool!
Summary: This Hotel is amazing! The staff are friendly and helpful. The hotel is clean and the rooms are spacious. The pool is amazing! It's huge! And the hot tub has adjustable jets! We will be staying here again!
Manager Response: Dear mintrina,  Thank you for your kind words. All feedback is much appreciated.

Summary: A very clean hotel within walking distance to Disney parks. Very friendly and attentive staff. The restraunt was also very clean and nice. The rooms are clean no dead air / smoke smell. In my opinion this is one of the perfect hotels for the price. No bugs, all lights in working order, and paint not peeling from the walls. This place is AWESOME!!!!!
Manager Response: Dear Alejandra T,  Thank you for your kind words! Hope we get to see you during your next visit to the Anaheim area!

Summary: This new hotel was on my radar since I started looking for vacation getaways. From the moment I stepped in the doors I was greeted by a smile from Cherine in the front Desk. Her attention and attitude made me feel like we were family visiting for vacation. She was very detailed in reviewing all hotel perks, gym, pool, breakfast and parking. I have been using Disneyland hotels since 1993 and nothing compares to this place. I would like to thank all staff for keeping this place clean, friendly, and completely staffed for its traffic. Although our stay was short I WILL return because I know Cherine will be geeting me in the front when I return. Thank you again Cherine you made my vacation start the best way possible with treating me like royalty.
Manager Response: Dear Carmsdash  Thank you for your feedback. We will definitely relay your kind words to Cherine!

Summary: Stayed at this property for 4 nights with 2 adults and 2 large teens.  The 4 of us fit well in one of the King suites with a roll away and a sofa bed.  Property is very clean, rooms are clean, hot tub felt great after the 10 miles of walking in the park each day.  I was especially surprised at how friendly all the staff we're, including maintenance personnel.  Literally everyone asked us how our stay was, how we were doing etc.  Friendliest staff we have met at any property.  Breakfasts were good, plenty of food, just make sure you get there and give yourself time to eat before they close at 9:30 on weekdays as the breakfast area can get crowded.  Special thanks to those that found some blue lined paper for my son to do some homework while we were there. That was a very pleasant
Manager Response: Dear ghwk,  Thank you for taking the time to provide feedback regarding your recent stay here at the Country Inn & Suites by Radisson. We are delighted you enjoyed your time with us and look forward to your next visit!

Summary: Excellent choice when going to Disneyland. Hotel is new, clean, modern, HUGE room, free parking, free breakfast and free wifi. It takes about 10 minutes to walk to Disneyland or you can easily Uber if you don't want to walk. I would stay here again if going back to Disneyland.
Manager Response: Dear rowell21,  Thank you for your kind words! We look forward to your next visit!

Summary: Prime location. We were on the 3rd fl. We had a view of the pool and the beautiful display of fireworks every night. Within walking distance to Disney and surrounding restaurants. Just wish the breakfast was changed up a little.
Manager Response: Dear Missy S.  Thank you for your feedback regarding your recent stay. We are delighted you enjoyed our view of the Disneyland Fireworks. Thank you for staying with us and we look forward to your next visit.

Summary Heading: An "Eh" Experience that could have been so much better
Summary: Such a perfect experience outside of this hotel! Paid good money to stay at this hotel because I heard it was new, and the hotel itself is pretty nice but the management is awful. Housekeeping leaves A LOT to be desired. Breakfast is a joke. If you think the guy at the front desk is rude, you should talk to his manager Ruben. he's surprisingly ruder. Dry and sarcastic. I wasn't looking for compensation but to share my experience and no one even cared.
Manager Response: Dear tomcooley782,  I am sorry you had a poor experience at our property. I have researched your name, however I was unable to locate your reservation. I would like to invite you to reach out to me directly to further discuss your recent stay.

Summary: For some reason I really liked the color they chose for their doors. It was kind of a grey/brown and I want it for my house. But paint color really has no bearing on how good or bad a hotel is. So, the hotel is new and clean, and my minimal interaction with staff was fine. I found the beds to be uncomfortable, but I'm used to latex foam, rather than spring mattresses, so that's probably just me. The pillows were more like throw pillows than bed pillows, which was kind of weird. The breakfast was fine, but not spectacular. A selection of eggs, breads, cereals, biscuits and gravy, and sausage. However, there was no waffle iron and the available pre-cooked waffles were cold. Toilet paper is placed weirdly behind toilets. You'll want to remove it from the holder and put it on the
Manager Response: Dear ritteh,  Thank you for providing feedback regarding your recent stay. We apologize you didn't get the right amount of sleep due to the traffic of Disney Way. We understand the variation of sleep levels our many guests have and as a result offer room location changes and ear plugs for the lighter sleepers.  We would love to make it right and have you as a returning guest sometime in the future.

Summary: Excellent location, within walking distance to Disneyland. Spacious amd clean rooms. Decor is very modern and up to date. The staff is extremely friendly and helpful. Will definitely return for next family trip!
Manager Response: Dear ashcar27,   Thank you for taking the time to provide feedback regarding your recent stay at the Country Inn & Suites by Carlson! I will definitely relay your kind words to our staff. See you next time!

Summary: This hotel is modern, quiet, and totally friendly to kids and families. We were here for Disney, so appreciated the full breakfast and friendly staff. Three mornings in a row we chatted with Uzi Davila, who went out of his way to chat and put us at ease, while quickly cleaning up after kids, taking used plates, and refilling coffee. I would highly recommend this hotel to others and will return for our next Disney trip.
Manager Response: Dear vadavisockis,  We are delighted to hear you enjoyed your time with us. We will definitely relay your kind words to Uzi! Thank you and we look forward to your next stay!

Summary: We thought the rooms were very large for the price, and the facility was very clean. Despite a large number of families and a location right next to the freeway, our room was very quiet. The breakfast was a surprise: the eggs and waffles tasted fresh and soft and fluffy, not like they had been sitting out for an extended length of time. And the staff were all very friendly and helpful.
Manager Response: Dear andrewkaplan2018,  Thank you for your kind words! We look forward to your next visit!

Summary: This place was amazing from staff to service, rooms were clean, breakfast was great, bar area and food supplied from 5pm on was good.  Pool was heated, hot tub nice. I honestly have no complaints every single staff member was efficient and friendly.
Manager Response: Dear Wendy D,  Thank you for your feedback! We're glad you enjoyed your time with us!

Summary: Our last stay at this hotel was wonderful. Especially the front desk staff. Every single one of them  (day and night staff) were so helpful and polite and seemed genuinely happy to help with anything! We had a little bit of an annoyance the last trip and the manager said he would reach out and never did. But we decided lets try again and so glad we did. Their hotel staff is superb! They made our whole stay. Glad we stayed here and will again!
Manager Response: Dear DGunderson2177,  Thank you for your visit and your kind words!

Summary: We stayed here for a recent trip to Disneyland. Free breakfast parking and WiFi were great. Clean roims, friendly staff and very kid friendly. I was also i mpressed with the restaurant and the lack of noise with si many kids there. Within walking distance but one of the streets is s little quiet at night and kind of creepy so I would reco mend the shuttle.
Manager Response: Dear juliescarborough8.  Thank you for taking the time to provide feedback regarding your recent stay. We are glad you enjoyed your stay and look forward to your next visit.

Summary: The staff was welcoming and friendly. Our hotel room was spacious, with a  colorful sitting room and comfy king-sized bed. We enjoyed the lovely warm pool, hot tub, and pool grounds. Everything in the hotel was clean and well laid out and close to great dining and the Disney theme park. The breakfast was good and dining room staff was very friendly. Overall this was a super place and we hope to stay there again.
Manager Response: Dear sskavdahl15,  We would love to see you during your next visit to the Anaheim area! Thank you for your kind words.

Summary Heading: Great hotel but don’t use their taxi service
Summary: We loved the hotel stay here and had great service and have no complaints apart from the plastic spoons and paper plates for breakfast. The main warning we have is do not use their recommended taxi service, we made the mistake twice it’s called “vogera transportation” he was exceptionally rude on both trips and charged us an extortionate fare. Recommend to use Uber or another local company if staying here.
Manager Response: Dear Jlra1967,  Thank you for your feedback. We are sorry to hear your transportation to and from our property was not comfortable. We will definitely look into your concerns.

Summary: We had a 1 night stay after being at a Disneyland Resort for previous 2 nights.  Hotel is as others have said right off Interstate 5 so could be an issue if you are a light sleeper.  We booked this on the recommendation of "Get Away Today" customer rep and having read other reviews on trip advisor and yelp.  Sorry to say the room standard for us was not up to standards of previous reviews. Issues with cleanliness of bathroom and carpeting throughout the room was dirty and had not been vacuumed as evident of crushed Dorito chip pieces all over the floor.  Being we arrived later in the evening and were exhausted and it was nothing major health wise we pressed on and then informed the front desk upon checkout the next morning.  An email addressed to the manager a few days after our
Manager Response: Dear Gerald G,  I am sorry to hear you did not enjoy your time with us. I can say with utmost confidence that the occurrence with our housekeeping was an isolated incident and followup in the works.

Summary: Country Inn and Suites is a clean, modern hotel in the Disney resort area. They have a nice breakfast buffet which was manned by fast and friendly personnel. Items were promptly refilled and tables cleaned. There was plenty of seating as well.  Check in was fast and efficient and we were allowed to check in a few hours early with no problems.  The hotel is walking distance to Disneyland, but not really close walking distance. It was $5 for and Uber ride so we chose that route.  The only drawback for me is I booked the hotel thinking parking was free only to find out that there is a $20 resort fee. This included parking and WiFi. And it made no mention of this until after I completed the booking.
Manager Response: Dear trcrotelli,  Thank you for taking the time to provide feedback regarding your recent stay. We appreciate your comments and look forward to future visits.

Summary Heading: Reasonably Priced and Close to Disney
Summary: Positives: The room was clean and well-maintained with a comfortable bed. The free breakfast included plenty of options. The employees were all friendly. Disney is a short walk away. The pool is large and kept at about 80 degrees.  On the negative side: the pool towels are the size of a large hand towel. The bar/restaurant is completely inadequate with a limited menu with several items unavailable. Drink prices were also quite steep.
Manager Response: Dear traveling_wm,  Thank you for your feedback. All comments are taken into consideration and your concerns have been forwarded to the appropriate departments.   Again, thank you and we look forward to your next visit to the Anaheim area.

Summary Heading: We really loved it and it felt like a real Disney hotel. Joey is the best!
Summary: We were so pleasantly surprised. Booked because of some fast personal service from Ruben (they allowed a very fast credit card authorization via email... my mom was offering last minute to gift us a hotel room by Disneyland, but other hotels said we needed 48 to 72 hours in advance, but Ruben did it on the spot.)  We were just expecting a comfy place near Disneyland to sleep. But we were in for such a treat. My daughter was thrilled that she saw Mickey Mouse as soon as we walked into the lobby (it was a plastic Mickey on some kind of ad display holding balloons, so it was a nice "you are at Disneyland" signal to her). They had a cute little kid-friendly seating area with Disney channel playing the movie "Brave" and a gift shop with lots of Disney merchandise. It really felt like
Manager Response: Dear alanahidalgo2012,  On behalf of the entire Country Inn & Suites staff (Joey included), we would like to thank you for your kind words and look forward to your next visit!

Summary: We just returned from a three night stay at the Country Inn of Anaheim. We had a standard two queen room on the 4th floor. Here are the highs and lows:  Pros: Super clean. Great breakfast. Free parking. Helpful concierge and courteous housekeeping staff. Walking distance to theme parks. No weird smells. Little gift shop stocked with any necessity you may have forgotten. Nice pool and decent work out facilities. View of Disney fireworks from our window!  Cons: The beds were not super comfy. The bathroom sliding door does not lock and there is limited privacy in the bathroom from gaps in the door. Because of the location near the freeway, it is a bit noisy at night.
