Manager Response: Dear laureldncn,  Thank you for providing feedback regarding your recent stay. We are glad to hear you enjoyed your time with us and look forward to your next visit.

Summary: This property isn’t your typical Country Inn & Suites.  It has a modern decor and look to it.  But it is very nice and clean.  We stayed one night in a spacious room.  Four adults had no problem moving around in the ample space.  The biggest problem is the bathroom door is a barn door.  Very chic and cool, but sound and light come through when early risers are up and about and others are trying to sleep.  Change the doors!
Manager Response: Dear Donna O,  Thank you for taking the time to provide feedback regarding your recent stay. We look forward to your next visit.

Summary: Pretty decent hotel within walking distance to Disneyland. The hotel is right along the 5 and our first room was on that side of the hotel and the sound was constant. The staff very kindly moved us to the other side of the hotel after the first night and it was much better. The breakfast buffet is quite nice.
Manager Response: Dear brandables,  Thank you for your kind words and feedback.

Summary: This place was great! Very clean. Rooms are large and everything was new. Staff was very friendly and helpful. Breakfast options were not perfect but pretty good. Excellent location, about 1/2 to 3/4 mile to the Disneyland esplanade. The price wasn't bad either. It felt like a good value based on the location and quality of the hotel. I'm planning to stay here on my next visit.
Manager Response: Dear Landon S,  Thank you for your feedback!

Summary: Stayed at this hotel with a friend in September of 2017 for the Disneyland Half Marathon weekend. From the moment we checked in to check out the staff was very welcoming, the lobby was quiet and inviting. The room was quite spacious with two double beds and so was the bathroom. Walking distance from Disneyland park about 25-30 minute walk. Close to a handful of food locations on the walk to an from the park. Pizza press, mcdonalds, asian bistro, etc. Free Parking was deffinately an added bonus to our rental car. It is in a less crowded side of the anaheim resort district. The complimentary breakfast was great, they had a good variety of items waffles, eggs, sausage, bagels, cereal, fruits, juice, coffee, and pastries. They were kind enough to hold our bags at the front desk on
Manager Response: Dear RmasFL,  Thank you for taking the time to provide feedback regarding your recent stay at the Country Inn & Suites by Radisson. We are delighted that you enjoyed your time with us and look forward to your next visit.

Summary Heading: Exceeded my expectations- Great hotel for Disneyland for families- keep doing what you do!
Summary: When it comes to Disneyland hotels for families, there are just so many options. Country Inn & Suites definitely rises up above the rest.   First of all, the location is good. Right off the freeway and easy to find. A pretty short walk to disney (.6 miles to maingate) about a 12 minute walk with a stroller. The only minor drawback I would say about this hotel is it's can be a bit noisy for light sleepers since you can hear the faint freeway noise. I think every room will have some freeway view since the 5 is diagonally positioned to the hotel.   FREE PARKING! Thank you for all the hotels out there that doesn't feel like it need to gouge hotel guests more by charging sometimes up to $30/night parking fees.  The lobby/common area is great! Nice Mickey fixture greets you the moment
Manager Response: Dear Sammy Z,  Thank you for taking the time to provide feedback regarding your recent stay at the Country Inn & Suites by Radisson. We are delighted to hear you enjoyed your stay and look forward to your next visit!

Summary: Clean hotel. Friendly and accommodating staff. Joey was awesome. Good breakfast. Big and warm pool. Bed was a little too firm but we like very soft beds, no fault of the hotel. Close to the Disneyland main gate so you can walk but the ART bus stops in the parking lot and takes you there as well. Our second stay there and we will definitely stay there again. Recommend to all with a budget but want a fancy hotel.
Manager Response: Dear Michelle J,  Thank you for your feedback and for taking the time to write about your time at the Country Inn & Suites by Radisson. We are delighted to read that you enjoyed stay and we will relay your kind words to Joey!

Summary: This hotel is conveniently located 15 min walk from Disney 🎡with pleasant pool and lobby areas.  The staff and location are the hotel's best asset.  However, the complimentary breakfast food is poor in value and quality. Expect processed average food, the standard for any average USA hotel. The photos of the hotel on the website look much better than what it actually is.  - The food: the breakfast was rubbish. Boring options and no real value for the price of stay. It  consisted of waffles (that tasted like carton and looked made of plastic), sausages (that looked like something out of someone's digestive system), eggs (that looked made from powder), fried potatoes and sugary cereals ( only one option of healthy cereal). Apples were the only fruit available. The toast had a
Manager Response: Dear Couret Family,   We are sorry to hear that you were not satisfied with the “Be Our Guest” Breakfast and the variety and quality of the food. We work hard to ensure fresh food is provided and that each item is available for all of our guests. We are also happy to say that our breakfast appeals to the vast majority of our guests. Your review gives us the opportunity to correct any deficiencies we may have in our service. We hope you will give us another chance if you are in the area again.  Sincerely,  Alex Santana Food and Beverage Manager

Summary: This place is in a great loaction for the parks - close enough to hop skip and jump over but far enough so you aren't in teh madness. You can watch the fireworks from a lot of the rooms or everything the full length windows at the end of the halls. They have a great comp. breakfast, great pool, great bar and super great staff!
Manager Response: Dear Jessica R.,  Thank you for your kind words! We look forward to your next visit.

Summary: Staff was great, thanks to Luis Maximino(sorry if mispelled)the cook, very friendly and the food was soo tasty! Rooms were very clean. Beds were comfy. Price is awesome, I am very impressed! Definitely coming back!
Manager Response: Dear carmenvalcenica0818,   Thank you for your feedback. We will definitely relay your kind words to Maximino!

Summary Heading: Favorite Hotel Within 12 Minutes to Disneyland
Summary: Very clean, attractive rooms with comfy beds and good shower.  Wouldn’t book another hotel for my next visit!  Also wholesome breakfast included.  Also very helpful & courteous staff.  The beds were exceptionally comfortable.
Manager Response: Dear lindaanne2017,   Thank you for your feedback and for taking the time to write about your experience. We are delighted to read that you enjoyed your time with us. We look forward to your next stay.

Summary Heading: Late check in after a day at Disneyland and they were wonderful. Easy check out the next day, answered questions.
Summary: Cherine and Joey (and the gal working front desk on the night of Feb1st) - all were wonderful, helpful. There is a small shop off of the front Desk that has food, including frozen food you can take to your room to microwave. Utensils were provided. Such a relief not having to go out for food after exhausting day at Disneyland. Answered questions. Breakfast the next morning was great. Always fresh, clean, helpful staff.
Manager Response: Dear cstark777,  Thank you for your feedback. We will relay your kind words to Cherine and Joey!

Summary: We stayed here last April for 4 nights on a stopover to NZ. Staff on arrival were friendly and even presented the children with some freshly baked cookies.  Our room was huge and overlooked the pool and you could see disney park and enjoy the fireworks. Breakfast was of a high standard and plenty on offer. We will definitely be back.
Manager Response: Dear Laura H,  We look forward to your next visit!

Summary Heading: Great hotel, great staff, great location!
Summary: I stayed at the Country Inn & Suites by Disneyland with 2 friends and I will now say it's my new favorite hotel in that area!  The cost is reasonable, it's easy to walk to Disneyland, lots of food nearby, free parking and free breakfast which all makes this a GREAT hotel!
Manager Response: Dear im2tlkativ,  Thank you for your kind words. We look forward to your next visit!

Summary: Here’s what was Excellent: front desk service, included “real” breakfast, cleanliness, good room size, but most of all.... the price! Price is the biggest reason I booked the stay here.   If you keep your prices low you will always be booked - other inns nearby had a teaser rate when they first opened and now are unaffordable for a family of four.  - keep it low!!!! Thank you for the great weekend!!!
Manager Response: Dear KathrynOfCali,  Thank you for taking the time to provide feedback regarding your most recent stay at the Country Inn & Suites by Radisson. We are delighted to hear you enjoyed your time with us and look forward to your next visit.

Summary: We got this hotel through hotwire and it was an excellent hotel. It was super clean, all you need in a breakfast to start your day and i love how they have cookies for guests in the afternoon. Only thing is that there is a $20 resort fee which I feel is too much.
Manager Response: Dear Aroog,  Thank you for your feedback. We look forward to your next visit to the Anaheim area.

Summary: clean hotel,beautiful decor,friendly staff,great breakfast and coffee   did not get a chance to swim in pool but it too was very nice    quite a walk to disneyland  pillows did not seem to have support though they looked fluffy
Manager Response: Dear rae w,  Thank you for your feedback!

Summary: The hotel is beautiful and the staff is outstanding. The girl working the front desk Mish was a breath of fresh air. I found this hotel after a being at a horrible one the night before. I was on vacation with my 2 year old. We came in on the amtrak so sleeping in our car or driving to near by city was out. We couldn't find anywhere to go. We were literally locked into the Amtrak station till I spoke to Mish. It was close to 2AM and she went above and beyond to make accommodations for us. That was the best part of staying at Country Inn & Suites the level of customer service you receive is amazing. We were able to enjoy the rest of our vacation. We went swimming in pool which is very nice, very beach like. We were walking distance to Disneyland and we had a real breakfast in the
Manager Response: Dear Ravenhall85,  Thank you so much for taking the time to let the public know how great your recent stay at the Country Inn & Suites by Radisson was. WE are delighted you enjoyed your time with us. We will definitely relay your kind words to Mish!

Summary Heading: Fantastic Hotel with Friendly Staff, and Comfortable Amenities!
Summary: My family and I were so impressed with how comfortable, reasonably-priced, and the great customer service given by the staff! As soon as we checked into the front desk, we were greeted with a friendly smile from Barbara, and Joey gave us free maps, and told us to not hesitate to ask for whatever we needed. They really go the extra mile here, and we absolutely loved our stay. Amazing free breakfast included! Incredibly Blessed...Thank-you!
Manager Response: Dear Grace091,  Thank you for your feedback. We will definitely relay your kind words to Barbara and Joey. We look forward to your next visit to the Disneyland resort!

Summary: Large rooms, newly remodeled and very clean. The complimentary breakfast available is awful though. Everything was cold and potatoes seemed as if just removed from refrigerator. Why on earth do they have this nice breakfast area and not have steam tables?
Manager Response: Dear ttillich,  Thank you for providing feedback regarding your recent stay at the Country Inn & Suites by Radisson. I would be more than happy to address your breakfast concerns with my breakfast team, however I would need additional information to do so. If you would like to discuss your stay any further please reach out to me at property level.  Again, thank you for your feedback and I look forward to making it right during your next visit to our hotel.

Summary: Pros. We stayed here twice in jan 2018. Nice big suits and clean. Great pool. Great staff. Short walk to Disney and a heap of good restaurants.  Cons. The bar is a great place to relax if they don’t turn all the televisions to sport. This is a family hotel I didn’t see one group of men looking to get there sports fix. So if they fix this identity problem I feel they would get more couples using the bar when the kids are sleeping.  The free breakfasts are standard hotel fair. But the amount of disposable styrofoam plates, plastic utensils would seem to cost so much in waste I’m not sure why they don’t use real crockery. There environmental foot print should be better in 2018.  I would return to this hotel. I have voiced my concerns to staff. Hopefully they do what the say and fix
Manager Response: Dear Laurie G.  Thank you for your feedback. I am looking further into your concerns regarding our bar.   Again, thank you for your kind words and I look forward to your next visit.

Summary: We had a wonderful stay and experience at this hotel a year ago during a trip to Disneyland with friends, and were so impressed we booked another stay this past week. We have never experienced such outstanding customer service at any hotel, from the front desk staff with our initial contact giving us a discounted rate with upgrade to a suite, to breakfast servers engaging us in conversation and waiting on us, to managers and even the GM stopped by to chat with us at breakfast, to name names: Fernando, Mish, Cherine, Uzi, Edgar, Maria, Alex, and Gary, as well as  the GM David, super service from the top down and we will be back and certainly recommend to all who are planning a stay near Disneyland as it just a few blocks from the main entrance. Such a blessing to find this gem of
Manager Response: Dear sb2az,  Thank you so much for your feedback regarding your recent stay with us. We are happy to hear you enjoyed your time with us! We will definitely relay your kind words to David and the team.  Again, thank you and we hope we see you during your next visit to the Anaheim area.

Summary: This hotel is very nice.  I would say it's fairly new.  The pool area is gorgeous.  You can purchase Disney tickets on site which is nice.  There is a shuttle to Disney for a charge per person.  It's within walking distance of a restaurant complex with restaurants like Cheesecake Factory and Bubba Gumps.  Parking at the hotel is free which is nice.  The staff was extremely friendly.
Manager Response: Dear Erica B.,  Thank you for taking the time to provide feedback regarding your recent stay at the Country Inn & Suites by Radisson. We are delighted to hear you enjoyed your stay and look forward to your next visit to the Anaheim area!

Summary Heading: Great location, clean hotel, beautiful rooms.
Summary: Excellent hotel. After looking up the many reviews and hotels in the area, we decided to book this property for our two day stay in Anaheim. Rooms were spacious, clean, and modern. Breakfast was standard fare of waffles, eggs, sausage, fruit, etc, but very good. Free parking, and so close to many attractions. Disneyland and California adventure is about 5 minutes away, the outlets, and beach are a short drive. When we come back to Disneyland & the Anaheim area, will definitely stay here again!
Manager Response: Dear MKA7488,   Thank you for your feedback and we hope to see you during your next visit to the Disneyland resort

Summary: Checked in for 3 days for business. Granted the hotel is probably set up for Disney families but for a work even this hotel does a great job. Hotel front desk staff, Barbara, was very friendly and helpful. I came in early and inquired about an early checkin. Instead of brushing me off, she helpfully checked and was able to assign a tired traveler a room. I got room 433. Nicely done room with a living room area with a desk, a sofa, and a lounge chair. Tons of electrical outlets and USB charging ports throughout the room. Bathroom was a decent size. Everything was spotless. The cleaning staff is also very friendly. Bed was really comfortable and king-size. 4 pillows and a huge area around the bed. HVAC was very efficient. Interesting feature in this hotel is that they have an
Manager Response: Dear BrianGowing,  Thank you for your feedback! We will definitely relay your kind words to Barbara.

Summary: This property is excellent - close to a lot of attractions, excellent price, staff, and accommodations!  Room was spacious along with a nice bathroom.  This is a spacious hotel as others have mentioned.  Also, nice pool and hot tub!  Must stay for couple with or without children.
Manager Response: Dear Robfur,  Thank you for your feedback. We look forward to your next visit to the Disneyland resort.

Summary Heading: Home Away From Home During Disney Vacation
Summary: We just got back from our Disney vacation and truly have nothing but good things to say about this hotel.  We booked it because we were looking for something that we could use our credit card’s travel reward points and it was an option. I was a little apprehensive about it as it seemed to be away from all the other off-property Disneyland hotels I was familiar with, but we took a chance and were happy we did. Here are some of the things we loved:  1.) Easy, close walk to Disneyland. We took a stroller to push our kids and it was less than a 10 minute walk to front gates. The great thing is that because the hotel is tucked off to the side and away from the hotel zone, we weren’t walking through a crowd the whole time. It was quiet and peaceful.  2.) There is a gift shop with
Manager Response: Dear genhardts,  Thank you so much for your feedback and kind words! We look forward to your next visit.

Summary: This hotel was perfect for our large family/friends vacation. We got about 7 rooms for 4-5 days and it was perfect. Breakfast every day. Friendly, helpful staff. This hotel looks fairly new so the condition is great.
Manager Response: Dear Lina P,  Thank you for taking the time to provide feedback regarding your recent stay. We are happy to hear your family enjoyed your time with us and look forward to your next visit.

Summary: We stayed here for our family vacation to Disneyland and absolutely loved it! The hotel is beautiful! They are a newer hotel, but did not sardine their rooms in like a lot of other hotels! The rooms are huge and there was plenty of space in our room for our 2 year old to run around and get his wiggles out! The staff is exceptionally friendly, especially Gary and Debbie! They were fantastic! The hotel is kept very clean and fresh! I loved the shampoo and conditioner! The appliances in the room (mini fridge & microwave) were nice, and worked well! The beds are super comfortable as well! They also have a very nice pool area, with a good size pool and hot tub! I didn’t feel itchy after using the pool either, so I think they use saltwater. The breakfast was really good and they
Manager Response: Dear Danielle G,   Thank you for you feedback and kind words. We will definitely relay your kind words to Gary and Debbie!

Summary: Terrible customer service over the phone to book a room Rude couldn’t understand and will not allow me to speak to someone else have to hung up Once email for confirmation was received it stated no money will be hold that was a lie No price match warranty false advertisement  No checking in early!  Long time to check in (even though there were 2 agents to help) only one of them was working until the woman decided to help! No one to help unload baggage  No toilet paper and sheets from bed were dirty Hidden fees from beginning to end ! Do not recommend this place at all! Avoid it if you can! Customer service as rude over the phone and at hotel lobby  No parking!!!! Cars were parking on red curve
Manager Response: Dear X5679WUjuanm,  Thank you for your recent review. I am sorry to learn about your experience with our hotel. A member of management has attempted to get into contact with you via telephone and email.  Please feel free to contact me directly at property level to further discuss your concerns.

Summary: Facility to access Disney Parks and good options of restaurants by a walking distance. You can see Disney fireworks from the Hotal Parking Lot. Cookies and Cofee at anytime is always welcomed. Good cost benefit.
Manager Response: Dear Dorival G,  Thank you for your feedback!

Summary Heading: Nice hotel with a room for improment
Summary: Really nice hotel, light, open stylish and tidy.  Rooms are good, nice bathroom, comfortable beds. Pool area is nice with whirlpool, heated swimming pool and lot of seating.   Breakfast is limited, well under average in hotel segment.  Personal need training in service and hospitality.   Bistro concept is not worthy on such a nice hotel, need to be improved to be competitive .
Manager Response: Dear adersp473,   Thank you for taking the time to provide feedback regarding your recent stay at the Country Inn & Suites.  Your concerns will be noted and taken into consideration. We hope we will get a chance to surpass your expectations in the future.

Summary: Walking distance to the Disney park. Lobby is beautiful. Room was very clean and spacious. Complimentary warm chocolate chip cookies were a nice surprise on Friday night in the lobby. Would definitely stay here again.
Manager Response: Dear 533triciag,  Thank you for your feedback. We are glad you enjoyed your time with us!

Summary Heading: Fighting dogs in the next room kept us up all night!
Summary: Even though this hotel is NOT pet friendly, people in room 321 left two unattended dogs in the room. They fought until one hurt the other and it yelped and yelped. I called and called the front desk no answers. Finally went down and told security they said they would look into it. Hotel was sold out. They could not move us into another room, we didn’t sleep all night. The dogs fought and barked on and off all night. The owners came back at about 6:30 am!! Worst night ever with tired kids from Disneyland.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to write a review. It is understandable where your frustration is coming from. It is of our best interest to make sure that you are well taken care of during your stay. The experience that you had including the noise are quite surprising, as well as how the staff took care of your concerns at that time. This is certainly not the kind of experience we would like you to have. Please know that we are striving to keep good quality of service in all aspects which is indicative to our standards and these have been shared to our management for further improvements. We hope that you will reconsider and give us another chance to provide you an experience that is truly excellent in all aspects.

Summary Heading: Highly recommend if you are looking for the hotel near Disneyland
Summary: I was hesitating to book this hotel first because of the location being near the freeway. I chose it because of the complimentary parking and I am glad I did. The hotel room was very clean, simple and modern. The staffs were very attentive. They would give you free cookies at the front desk. We did not get one but saw people kept coming back for cookies so it must be good. The complimentary breakfast bar was excellent. They had various selections of scrambled eggs, bacon, fresh fruits, yogurts,  etc. We will come back for our next trip to Disneyland.
Manager Response: Dear sasiaz,  Thank you for your kind words. We look forward to seeing you during your next visit to the Disneyland Resort, we'll save a few cookies for you!

Summary: Our stay here was awesome, the hotel is walking distance from Disneyland, right off the freeway, very clean and complimentary breakfast was a major plus. I would definitely recommend this hotel to friends and family.
Manager Response: Dear mariaaQ773ZL,  Thank you for your feedback. We look forward to your next visit!

Summary: This is a newer hotel with nice amenities. Breakfast, heated pool, hot tub, and on the ART bus route for Disneyland. I saw a lot of people walking also. Very close to several nice restaurants. The rooms are compact and had all the room we needed for 2 adults and 1 child. Even a laundry is available. The sundries shop has Disney items and basic necessities. Microwaves and refrigerators are in room.
Manager Response: Dear Nancy H,  Thank you for your recent review of our hotel. We are delighted you and your family enjoyed your time with us!

Summary: This hotel is very fancy and clean and we absolutely love it. The lobby is very nice and our room was amazing. The swimming area is very relaxing and we liked how the staff gave us cookies everyday! Coming here for upcoming trips for sure!
Manager Response: Dear shadit2018,  Thank you for your kind words!

Summary: The front desk staff was VERY helpful, courteous and professional.  The room was very clean.  The bathroom was spotless.  The only thing that wasn't perfect was soap and lotion that were provided were not new, they were partially full and clearly used.  The breakfast area was clean and suitable enough, very early when it first opens.  The later it gets, the crazier it becomes, with no seating and with food items not being stocked in a timely manner, they even ran out of forks.  I suggest having breakfast when they first begin serving food at 6am.  This is obviously a newer property with very nice rooms and a capable staff, about .5 miles from the gate of Disneyland.  I would stay here again.
Manager Response: Dear C H,  Thank you for your feedback. Your concern regarding our breakfast has been forwarded to the proper areas and will be addressed. We hope we get a chance to see you during your next visit to the Anaheim area.

Summary: Great stay. Amazing service and pool. The breakfast alone was worth the stay. Very genuine staff. Super close to Disneyland. Less than a 10-minute walk. Late checkouts. The pool is open until Midnight. You will love it.
Manager Response: Dear E9508JZpaulm,  Thank you for your kind words. We look forward to your next visit!

Summary Heading: Good value near the Disney Parks
Summary: This property is located within 15-20 minute walk to the Disney Parks.  The property is clean with friendly staff and complimentary parking!  Our room was spacious and decent; however, it was facing a freeway.  The pool is nice and big for the kids to enjoy.  The only negative would be the breakfast, which was not very good,
Manager Response: Dear Samuel A,  Thank you for your feedback. We are currently looking into ways to jazz up our breakfast. We hope you enjoyed your time with us and look forward to you during your next visit!

Summary Heading: Absolutely fantastic place to stay for a Disneyland vacation
Summary: The hotel is located 15 minutes on foot from Disneyland, or 3-4 mins on the shuttle.  Even our kids were impressed by the friendliness of the staff!   Very clean, modern place. Breakfasts are fantastic - real food, not the sweets and cereals as in other places.  Highly recommended!
Manager Response: Dear Igal G, Thank you for taking the time to provide feedback regarding your recent stay. We look forward to seeing you during your next visit to the Disneyland Resort!

Summary: This hotel was awesome. One of my best experiences in hotel stay! Fro. The moment I entered to the moment I left I was highly satisfied. The staff was great and the rooms are updated and clean. I had more than enough room for my family of 4. Breakfast was delicious with good options. Highly recommended.
Manager Response: Dear b0rreg0,  Thank you for your feedback. We look forward to your next visit!

Summary: We stayed on the 4 floor facing Disneyland and had a full view of the fireworks from our window. The breakfast is excellent with everything , eggs, bacon, waffles, fresh fruit, cereal, oatmeal, potatoes, fresh brewed coffee and many juices. Free parking and you can take ART to Disneyland or the Outlets at Orange.  Both are minutes away. Beds are very comfortable and the rooms are super clean
Manager Response: Dear Jennee D,  Thank you for telling us about your recent stay at the Country Inn & Suites. We are delighted to hear you enjoyed your time with us and look forward to your next visit.

Summary Heading: Great staff and very good clean hotel

Summary Heading: Best place to stay near Disneyland

Summary: Amazing place, and friendly staff. There is no other place I would rather stay. The rooms were cleaned everyday, and we never had people knocking on our doors asking to clean them. It just kind of happened when we weren’t around.
Manager Response: Dear mustafa_3001,  Thank you for taking the time to provide feedback regarding your recent stay at the Country Inn & Suites. We look forward to your next visit!

Summary: We decided to do a Disneyland trip with out any kids!! Stayed at the Country Inn and was impressed from when we walked in the doors. The place is spotless and our was room was very roomy. We had a little sitting room when you walk in and then a very spacious bedroom. They use the “key in the light switch” method so you don’t leave lights on 😊 and breakfast was wonderful We could easily walk to Disneyland,10 mins and saved a lot on parking. A great place to stay !!
Manager Response: Dear Joanne G.  Thank you for your kind words. We hop to see you during your next visit to the Anaheim area!

Summary: My family and I stayed here December 2 to 12, 2017.  It was my wife, my 5 year old, my 7 year old and I.  We stayed in room 336 which faced the new construction beside the hotel and the highway behind that but when we looked out of our window and look to the left, we could also watch the fireworks at Disneyland.  I read a lot of people complain about highway noise but didn't notice it even once.  I did a lot of research of the area for this trip looking at other hotels and prices.  I have also stayed  at other similar hotels near Disneyland for Disney park trips as well.  I gave this hotel a 5 star rating because due to my experience there and for its price and it's proximity to the parks, this was a top pick for me.  I also think this hotel is pretty central.  It is seconds
Manager Response: Dear sunfun2492,  Thank you so much for your feed back and kind words regarding your recent stay at the Country Inn & Suites by Carlson. We are delighted that you and your family enjoyed all our hotel has to offer. We look forward to your next visit to the Anaheim area!

Summary: Staff at this hotel were very friendly and most helpful. The breakfast was ok. The stay was worth it.  A good place for families visiting Disneyland. Our event was at the convention center...too far to walk
Manager Response: Dear stevey576,  Thank you for taking the time to provide feedback regarding your recent stay at the Country Inn & Suites.

Summary: This hotel was lovely. It was clean, spacious, offered free laundry facilities, free WiFi, free breakfast and free hot cookies nightly! All the staff were lovely, Barbara was super helpful and lovely and Pablo at the bar was a gem! After a woeful start at another hotel, and moving over to here these guys made our 9 nights here really welcoming, relaxed and comfortable. The hotel is relatively new and is about a 15min walk from disney or 3min on the art shuttle. Plenty of free parking here too.
Manager Response: Dear tamm37,  Thank you for your feedback. We will definitely relay your kind words to Barbara and Pablo.

Summary: Early check in was allowed. We arrived around 2pm, so it took a bit to get checked in. When we got our key, my 3 kids and I went up to our room we walked in and noticed only one bed and that the room was wheelchair accessible. We returned back down stairs and spoke with the front desk. I was told that the room was booked that way, which I know it wasn't since I booked a room for 4 people and obviously I need more then 1 room and no one in my party was in a wheelchair. They fixed the issue and I was give a standard room with my sleeping spaces and a standard bathroom with bath tub. The room was clean, the view not so great. There was a large area of empty space which was odd, perhaps that empty area can be filled with a sitting area or something. The bedding had a few large rips
Manager Response: Dear ShareAloha77,  Thank you for providing feedback regarding your recent stay.

Summary Heading: Clean, affordable place to anchor your Disney Trip
Summary: We found this new hotel to be clean, very reasonably priced, convenient and the employees very pleasant and helpful.  The free breakfast was great AND entertaining (watching the young families and small kids enjoying the breakfast offerings - at a distance).  It's an easy 10 min walk to the Disney park entrance, and half that way is Anaheim GardenWalk (Restaurants, House of Blues etc.).  Pablo in the bar bent over backwards to make sure we were fed at the end of a long day travelling.  Gary came by at breakfast to make sure all was good.  Will be our new home base when we travel to Anaheim.
Manager Response: Dear Dan B.  We look forward to your next visit!

Summary: This hotel is an excellent choice for a trip to Anaheim or a Disney vacation.  The hotel is quiet, clean and very welcoming.  It is within walking distance of the resort and has numerous places to eat within waling distance.  There is a shuttle and the breakfast provided by the hotel is a full breakfast.
Manager Response: Dear Connie W.  Thank you for taking the time to provide feedback regarding your recent stay. We are glad you enjoyed your time with us and look forward to your next visit.

Summary Heading: Great price, close proximity to Disneyland, free parking and breakfast. Friendly staff, clean lobby and rooms.
Summary: I would definitely stay here again. Great price for area, clean, comfortable beds and included free parking and breakfast. Easy 10-15 min walk to Disneyland. Friendly staff and or room had view of park, which was an unexpected bonus!
Manager Response: Dear Donna G.,  Thank you for your kind words! We look forward to your next visit.

Summary: A short walk to the park, free parking, good options from the buffet breakfast, coffee and tea all day, clean rooms, and friendly staff! I would stay again! My husband forgot his toothbrush and  they gave him one, it wasn't the best toothbrush but we didn't have to buy one. There's a small shop in the hotel also which sells everything you might have forgot like a toothbrush and sunblock. It was a great hotel and we will probably stay again!
Manager Response: Dear E7508HVmelissam,  Thank you for taking the time to provide feedback regarding your recent stay. We are glad you enjoyed your time with us and look forward to your next visit.!

Summary Heading: Great location, lovely new property near Disneyland
Summary: Good value, clean and new. Lovely property with great location. Short walk to Disneyland or Anaheim Garden Walk shopping center/restaurants. Beds could be a little softer, but overall a really nice place to stay. Breakfast was good for the price. Would be nice if they rotated options each morning.
Manager Response: Dear E3605SNdeborahf,  We are delighted you enjoyed your time with us! Thank you for your kind words and we look forward to your next visit.

Summary: Very nice hotel and short walking distance to Disneyland. The rooms were spacious, clean and the bed is comfortable. The breakfast is nice and sitting area look out to the beautiful pool. The only complain we had is upstairs guests make a lot of noises when they walk around at mid night. We decided not to make a complain to hotel because we think that might be just some over excited kids during their visit to Disneyland. Overall is a good 3 days stay for us and we would definitely stay here again, and remember to ask for the top floor room next time.
Manager Response: Dear Kathy H.,  Thank you for your feedback and we look forward to your next visit!

Summary: My family of 4 (with 2 kids 6 and 8 months) stayed in this hotel for only one night. We chose this hotel because it was close to Disney. However I found it was still about a 15 minute walk to the gates. Not exactly steps to Disney but at least we didn't have to pay for parking.   The accommodations looked clean and newer than the hotel we were currently staying in LA. So I was happy with it and we got it for a very low discounted price. Well worth it in my opinion. And we had a complimentary breakfast in the morning.
Manager Response: Dear Binibini_M,  Thank you for taking the time to provide feedback regarding your recent stay here at the Country Inn & Suites. We are happy you enjoyed your stay and look forward to your next visit.

Summary: This hotel is within walking distance to Disneyland.  The hotel is very well kept and the staff was great.  They helped and answered any questions we had.  The rooms were spacious and comfortable.  The bathroom door looks like a barn door but fits with the room.  It was odd to me, but I am a city girl.  The breakfast area is set up really nice and spacious.  The food was good.  I would definitely stay here again and I would recommend to friends and family.
Manager Response: Dear Precious2003,  Thank you for your feedback and for taking the time to write about your experience. We are delighted to read that you enjoyed your stay. We look forward to your next stay.

Summary: Excelent customer service, front desk let us check in earlier than standard check in time which made it a lot easier for us, rather than have to check in late at night after visiting Disneyland. Thank you so much for your excelent customer service!!.
Manager Response: Dear Alejandro V.,  Thank you for taking the time to provide feedback regarding your recent stay. We are happy to hear you enjoyed your time with us. We look forward to your next visit!

Summary: We are AP holders (2 adults, 2 kids ages 5 and 8) and make frequent trips, this has got to be the best hotel we’ve stayed at. The location, cleanliness, parking, breakfast and value is spot on. I can’t wait to stay here again!
Manager Response: Dear elliebellie327,  We look forward to your next visit!

Summary: This hotel is clean; the staff is great, and the breakfast was delicious. The location is a great spot to stay if you are going to any of the Disney attractions.  But the beds are HARD and if you stay in a room close to the highway, you will hear the cars/ motorcycles all night.
Manager Response: Dear kdeek2017,  Thank you for providing feedback regarding your recent stay at the Country Inn & Suites by Carlson. We regret to hear you didn't have a good night's sleep. Your concerns will be taken into consideration to improve our guests' quality of stay.

Summary: This hotel is very close to Disney- 10 minute walk to park gates.  Breakfast was great.  Pool is huge and open until midnight.  Staff was extremely polite, attentive and helpful.  Gentleman in the hallway says, “Good morning,” on sight!  We will make this hotel our “go-to” spot for Disney trips in the future!
Manager Response: Dear stevew85200,  Thank you for your kind words and we look forward to your next visit!

Summary Heading: Great stay for a visit to Disneyland!
Summary: Like other reviews, we were quite satisfied with our stay. While I think the walk is more than .2 miles (which I read elsewhere) it's less than 15 minutes to the entrance to Disney. The staff were all very friendly. The hotel is new and everything is clean and fresh. The hot breakfast wasn't great, but fine. Parking is free.
Manager Response: Dear Lickman,  Thank you for your feedback. We are happy to hear you enjoyed your stay with us.

Summary: Wasn't sure what to expect when we first booked this room. Well, upon arriving, we were pleasantly surprised. Clean lobby, nice employees, rooms were very clean and worth the price. Spacious rooms. I only wish we had more time to spend in the pool, which was gorgeous! The breakfast was just ok for my liking, but my family seemed to really like it. Also, freeway noise could be a concern, depending on which side of the hotel you're staying on. Would definately stay there again.
Manager Response: Dear Marcus L.  Thank you for your kind words. We look forward to your next visit!

Summary: This is a very new property that is almost perfect.  The rooms and common areas are clean and spacious.  The pool is huge.  The breakfast isn’t very good.  Very limited selection and they ran out of what the did have.  Should be better.  The location is good. Very easy to get to and a mile or so walk to Disneyland.
Manager Response: Dear Jason C.,  Thank you for taking the time to provide feedback regarding your recent stay. We look forward to your next visit.

Summary: I've not generally been a fan of the Country Inn and Suites brand but this hotel will make me rethink that.  Besides it being new and fresh, its just a great hotel and so easily walk-able to Disneyland and California Adventure.  The room itself was quite comfy and offered plenty of space for the two of us.  Breakfast was surprisingly quite good for a free breakfast.  Staff were all friendly and very helpful.  I was also surprised to find that the hotel had a small bistro for quick meals if we didn't want to venture out in the evening for dinner.    Overall it was a great stay and I'll definitely be back.
Manager Response: Dear JasonFromCalifornia,  Thank you for your feedback regarding your recent stay at the Country Inn & Suites by Carlson. We're happy to hear you and your guest enjoyed your time with us and we look forward to your next visit to the Anaheim area.

Summary: This hotel is new, very well laid out, has a premium feel about it, and has large open public spaces and a great outdoor pool which is open late.   Breakfast is included, and is a full spread.   We had a room with 2 queen beds, which comfortably catered for 2 adults and 2 kids (9 and 11).  It took us around 10 minutes to walk slowly to Disneyland, but I think a bus is available if walking isn’t your thing.   The hotel is also just off the Interstate 5, so is also really easy to reach, and has plenty of parking.
Manager Response: Dear Karl W,  Thank you for your feedback and kind words. We look forward to your next visit!

Summary: This hotel is phenomenal. I stayed at the Country Inn located in Anaheim. The view from my window was breath taking. The beds were very comfortable and soft. Staff was so friendly and helpful. I ate at the bistro downstairs and it's very reasonable. I love Country Inn and I hope it stays as is. I feel attached to it and when it's vacation time-- I book a room at Country Inn and Suites. I more than highly recommend you stay here if you're planning a vacation or a getaway. Country Inn is great with five stars, no question. It's very convenient and close to the Anaheim convention center, and, walking distance to Disneyland!
Manager Response: Dear nintendolover788,  Thank you for taking the time to provide feedback regarding your recent stay at the Country Inn & Suites. We are glad you enjoyed your stay and we look forward to seeing you during your next visit to the Anaheim area.

Summary Heading: Will be my main Disney hotel!
Summary: We are so happy we booked this hotel! I travelled with my best friend and her 4 year old daughter and we were all really pleased with the service and cleanliness of this hotel for the reasons below: - Great, clean pool area - comfortable bed - proximity to Disneyland-about a 10 minute walk. We threw the 4 year old in a stroller anyways (one day we clocked 21km walking!) so this was totally manageable - proximity to Anaheim Garden Walk mall- in between hotel and Disneyland and was a great source of meals that WEREN'T at Disneyland - friendly, helpful staff. Most of Anaheim is super accommodating and helpful, I've stayed at numerous hotels in the area, but this staff was probably the best.  TIPS FOR BOOKING: - I would request floors 4 or 5 again. reasonably quiet and if you're on
Manager Response: Dear Kimiko Y,  Thank you for taking the time to provide feedback regarding your recent stay at the Country Inn & Suites.

Summary: Very nice hotel! Glad that we booked our room with them. Room 438, clean room with my kinda decor and scheme...room had a LG flat screen TV, clean sheets, no funky room smell, air cooler worked well. Barely heard anyone in the rooms next to us (not sure if the rooms were booked) but must of been as the parking lot was full and when we booked they did say only 3 rooms left. Only noise that did bother us, was the freeway noise. Perhaps earplugs?  Nice bathroom, plenty of hot water and towels. Noticed like others mentioned, no hooks for towels. Moving on to breakfast, plenty to eat. English muffins, sliced bread for toast, little muffins, cereal like 3 or 4 kinds, oatmeal or yogurt, diced potatoes, small round waffles, sausages or bacon depending on the day, fruit mix (yum!) It had
Manager Response: Dear Sylvia H,  Thank you so much for your feedback. The Country Inn & Suites is thrilled to hear that you enjoyed your stay.  We look forward to your next visit!

Summary: Nice clean hotel walking distance to Disneyland. Staff was really nice. The room was very comfortable and quiet especially after a long day at Disneyland. Breakfast need's a little improving, If they just added a little more items to it, It would up there customer ratings. Will definitely stay here again.
Manager Response: Dear Maria R.,  Thank you so much for your FIVE BUBBLE review! We are happy to hear that you enjoyed your stay here at the Country Inn & Suites and look forward to your next visit.

Summary: Country Inn & Suites is an excellent hotel for what you pay.  I consider it low to mid-end in the price-range.  However, the hotel is less than a year old and thus, all facilities are essentially brand new - it was built from the ground up.  The rooms are standard but clean.  There is a mini fridge and a microwave in the room, which is handy if you have kids or just like to store your own food and drinks.    The pool is AMAZING.  It's salt water, quite shallow (again great for kids), large.  There is a hot tub as well. A great way to have an afternoon break from Disneyland and rest your feet before heading back out.  Breakfast was adequate.  Very little variety in terms of hot food, which was limited to waffles, potatoes and scrambled eggs daily and either bacon or sausages, but
Manager Response: Dear jesseandaddy,  Thank you so much for your review! We are happy to hear that you found a great value in choosing our hotel and we look forward to seeing you during your next visit to the Disneyland Resort.

Summary: Husband, daughter and I stayed 2 nights at Country Inn in a King suite this week. We chose this hotel based on reviews and proximity to the Disney Parks. It was an absolutely perfect choice.   Staff: very friendly and helpful particularly Taylor at the front desk. Also I was very impressed by the hands on of the manager. It is a bit hard to describe but he interacted with guests, took on chores and seemed very interested in making the hotel the best it could be. Also liked the fact that maid service respected the do not disturb sign and did a good job with the room. So many hotels we stay at have cleaning staff attempting to enter the room or knocking and waking us even with a sign out but not at this hotel. Also my daughter left her suitcase on the sofa bed when we left the
Manager Response: Dear akgril51997,    Thank you for taking the time to provide feedback regarding your recent stay at the Country Inn & Suites. On behalf of our entire staff at Country Inns & Suites we thank you for your business and we hope to see you again when your travels bring you back to the area!

Summary: It's a good place to stay if are going to disneyland or the convention center, you have both of the with in walking distance.  New construction, clean and very neat  My family  and I stayed for a weekend to celebrate our 10 year weeding anniversary and also to attend the Disneyland Halloween party, it was a great experience. especially the pool which is salt water so not only it's healthier for you but you don't have the smell of chlorine when you get out.  Really nice place totally recommend
Manager Response: Dear edgarrodrigov,  Thank you for your kind words and feedback. We are glad you enjoyed your time with us and we look forward to your next visit.

Summary Heading: Clean. Accomodating. Close to Disney. Great pool.
Summary: This was our fifth consecutive year doing a week in Disney. U should stay here.  It was an incredible stay and the same price as the dirty hotels that r further away. Just saying. This is a no brained. Stay here.
Manager Response: Dear Justin D.,  Thank you for your kind words. We look forward to seeing you during your next visit to the Disneyland Resort!

Summary: We stayed 7 nights and were amazed by the friendliness of the employees. Not a single issue and will definitely recommend this hotel to our friends & family. The 15 minute walk to Disneyland was nice and you could even take the city bus if you prefer, stops in hotel parking lot. All this plus free parking, free laundry and free breakfast.
Manager Response: Dear DeniseH71205,  Thank you for your kind words and feedback. We are happy to hear you enjoyed your stay and we look forward to seeing you during your next visit to the Anaheim area.

Summary: The location and price of staying here is perfect in comparison to resort hotels. Very comfortable beds, clean and nice. Short walk to Disneyland gates and downtown Disney. Did a 4 night stay with my wife for our anniversary to specifically go to Disney and had not trouble getting used to the area for that specific goal. The only one thing we noticed that was a slight issue is there was slight stomping in the room above us each night when we were resting , but us also understandable considering it is an affordable hotel very close to Disney and children are obviously going to be staying as well. The breakfast is a tad weak but either way it is a nice bonus to be able to grab something to put in your system until you can get to the parks and get some amazing food. Would
Manager Response: Dear csanfrod2017,   Thank you for your feedback and for taking the time to write about your experience. We are delighted to read that you enjoyed your time with us. We look forward to your next stay.

Summary Heading: Great hotel for a great price
Summary: Hotel was new and very clean.  The staff was friendly and helpful.  I have trouble sleeping with noises and was put in a room over the freeway.  I asked to be moved and they immediately took care of it with no hassle.  I really appreciated their caring and taking care of it.  The pool area was nice and so was breakfast area.  Super convenient for Disneyland, shuttle stops at the hotel, takes 5 mins to get to Disneyland.
Manager Response: Dear Reynaru, Thank you for taking the time to provide feedback regarding your recent stay at the Country Inn & Suites. We look forward to seeing you during your next visit.

Summary: The hotel is only a month old. Our room was very spacious and decorated nicely. The pool is large and tropical looking surrounded by Palm Trees. The breakfast was good - the usual hotel breakfast food - with lots of seating. The cool thing was there is a wall of glass that opens to the pool so they can open that up and you are still inside but feel like you are outside. We stayed here with several other families and we all loved it. The staff was friendly and helpful. If we are in the area again I would definitely stay here again.
Manager Response: Dear TwinMom2003,  Thank you so much for your review! The Country Inn & Suites is thrilled to hear that you truly enjoyed your stay and we look forward to your next visit!

Summary: Over the years we have stayed at several hotels in the Disney area. Some much less expensive and a few more expensive. While the Country Inn would not be described as budget helpful, we found it a very good value! Worth paying the little bit extra for the updated facility and clean facility. I wish more hotels near Disney were this nice!
Manager Response: Dear Y1817XXdavidf,  Thank you for your kind words and feedback. We hope you choose to stay at the Country Inn & Suites by Carlson during your next visit to the Disneyland resort.

Summary: Very clean,friendly staff,convenient ,quiet place..easy for the location,quiet place and the breaksfast was so good and value of money is less..i hope they wont change,and they will maintain the cleanliness and friendly staff..
Manager Response: Dear rosylinac,  Thank you so much for your review! We are happy to hear that you found a great value in choosing our hotel.   We look forward to your next stay!

Summary: This hotel was fantastic.  The lobby is beautiful and spacious and so are the rooms.  The breakfast is very good and the breakfast area and bar look out over the large, unique pool.  A big sliding glass door opens to allow fresh air to permeate the lobby.  The rooms were huge, the mattress was perfect.  The bathrooms are large and built with real bathtubs and tile throughout.  Our room had a separate sitting area with it's own tv.  The staff was friendly and knowledgeable.  The walk to Disneyland was less than 15 minutes, straight down Disney drive.  The hotel is large and easy to find, but is very quiet.  We will definitely stay there again.
Manager Response: Dear Steven B,  Thank you for your review. The Country Inn & Suites is dedicated to providing a level of service that is above industry standards. We look forward to your next visit to the Anaheim area.

Summary: New.  Clean.  Cookies. Easy parking.  Cozy fireplaces. Expansive modern lobby.  Free hot breakfast buffet. Expansive dining area for breakfast. Good business center, nice computers. Available private dining or conference room. Walking distance to both California Adventure and Disneyland. Perfectly working heating and cooling ventilation system. Helpful courteous staff. Good water pressure. Nice shower.  Comfy bed. Quiet.  No complaints!
Manager Response: Dear differentname,  Thank you for taking the time to provide feedback regarding your recent stay with us. We look forward to your next visit!

Summary: This is a great option of you are going to Disneyland. Comfortable beds, good breakfast and amazing staff. Definitively we would stay here in our future visits to Disneyland. Maybe they could improve by making breakfast more variable.
Manager Response: Dear Jessica R,  Thank you for your feedback and kind words. We look forward to you next visit to the Disneyland Resort!

Summary: Our family really liked this new hotel, and found the staff very friendly and relaxed. The rooms are well appointed and beautifully decorated. It is also very clean. I appreciated that the laundry room is free to use, so no coins needed, just bring your suds and you are set to go!
Manager Response: Dear TheLinkers,  Thank you so much for your  review! The Country Inn & Suites is thrilled to hear that you truly enjoyed your stay.     We look forward to your next visit!
