Manager Response: Dear 5_star_baby,  Thank you for your kind words and we hope to see you during your next visit to the Anaheim area!

Summary: Close to Disneyland. Breakfast amenity.            Road noise from the air conditioning unit. Reasonable price. Fridge and microwave in the room. Children loved the pool. Relatively clean. Shower diverter was difficult to pull up but still decent stay overall.
Manager Response: Dear an2ni2017,  Thank you for taking the time to provide feedback regarding your recent stay.

Summary: Loved our stay at Country Inn & Suites. It was spacious and had great amenities (pool, mini fridge, complimentary breakfasts, fast Internet, complimentary laundry) to cater for family of four with two teenagers. We also was only 10 or so minutes walk to Disneyland and close to many eateries for dinner. Staff were pleasant and would highly recommend a stay in this modern hotel.
Manager Response: Dear nelson279,  Thank you for taking the time to provide feedback regarding your recent stay at the Country Inn & Suites. We are happy to hear you enjoyed your time with us and look forward to seeing you during your next visit to the Anaheim area.

Summary: Hotel was more than what I was hoping for. Staff was so great with us. Room extremely clean, new, and BIG. We got the best room in the hotel (541) facing disneyland! The walk to disneyland was about 15 minutes. There’s a bus stop right in front of hotel, but we decided to walk. Could not be any more happy with our stay. Complementary Breakfast was great as well. Fresh fruits, cereals, bacon, eggs, sausage, and waffles. Drinks options included Apple, orange and cranberry juice,milk and coffee. Staff in the breakfast area were on top of things. They make sure tables were clean and food area was clean and stock. They will also take you plates after you were done (like in a restaurant). I really loved that EVERYDAY in our stay you would see Managers walking around in breakfast area
Manager Response: Dear Yesenia B,  We are delighted to hear you enjoyed your time at the Country Inn & Suites. We do our best to provide top notch service and we're glad it shows. Thank you for your kind words and we look forward to seeing you during your next visit to the Disneyland Resort.

Summary Heading: Beautiful new Hotel in Walking distance to Disney
Summary: I selected this Hotel because it was built in 2015 and seemed like a great value for the accommodations.   There is a resort fee that is less than most hotels charge for parking. If you are flying into John Wayne and using transportation to this hotel that may be a negative, but the is such a new clean hotel with friendly staff I think I would stay here in the future if I chose to fly instead of driving.
Manager Response: Dear Gary S,  Thank you for taking the time to provide feedback regarding your recent stay. Thank you for your kind words and we look forward to seeing you during your next visit to the Anaheim area.

Summary: Excellent hotel. Very clean, very friendly staff, extremely comfortable beds. Beautiful pool and hot tub although I didn't get a chance to try it out. Very close to Disneyland. Breakfast was eggs, steamed potatoes, sausage or bacon, mini waffles, cereal, oatmeal, toast, muffins, juice, and coffe. Got a great deal on Hotwire. The only negative was a surprise resort fee of $20 for each room per night
Manager Response: Dear 415eddie,  We are glad to hear you enjoyed your visit to the Disneyland area, as well as your stay at the Country Inn & Suites. Thank you for your feedback and we look forward to seeing you during your next visit to the Anaheim area.

Summary Heading: Nice new hotel packed with value-  only a few minor niggles
Summary: We booked this hotel last minute as our other reservations near Disney fell through.   After staying here for four days in room 433, I feel very lucky that we are able to get this nice of a hotel for a fair price so late in the game, bookingwise.  The hotel is brand new, complete with LED lighting, electric vehicle charging, nice large entryway and breakfast area.  Breakfast was just ok. They alternated between bacon and sausage each day, with pretty much everything else the usual waffles, bread and fruit. It was a nice option in the morning.  The walk to Disneyland was about 15-20 minutes and was about two city blocks. Nice to be close, but when your tired after a long day in the park, a closer hotel would have been nice.  The few niggles we had were minor and it wouldn't keep
Manager Response: Dear Ed W,  Thank you for your kind feedback and we look forward to your next visit.

Summary: I usually stay at the major hotel chains, but chose this hotel on a recent business trip because of its proximity to my work location.  The room was huge and had a nice sitting area.  The location is within walking distance of Disneyland and the Convention Center.  It is also across the street from Gardenwalk. The complimentary breakfast was good as well as the bar area.  All of the staff I interacted with were friendly.  I wouldn't hesitate to stay here again.
Manager Response: Dear Esollie11,  Thank you for your kind words and feedback. We are delighted you enjoyed your time with us and look forward to your next visit.

Summary Heading: Clean Hotel within a 10 minute walk to Disneyland
Summary: This hotel is new and has very clean rooms and amenities. It is a 10 minute walk to the park so I would advise that you bring a stroller for your little ones, even if they don’t usually ride in a stroller, because by the return home they are exhausted! The continental breakfast was a perk because we could grab a quick bite and not have to stop to eat once we got in the park. The pool is nice at night - you can see the fireworks from the park! We would highly recommend this hotel!
Manager Response: Dear karonpadgett,  Thank you for taking the time to provide feedback regarding your recent stay at the Country Inn & Suites by Carlson. We are glad you enjoyed your time with us and look forward to seeing you during your next visit to the Anaheim area.

Summary Heading: Perfect hotel for trip to Disneyland!
Summary: We stayed in this hotel in May 2017, and it was great. Very clean and very modern. We had two queen beds in the bedroom which was great for the 4 of us (two toddlers aged 1 and 3). The purpose of our trip was to go to Disneyland. We went to the pool a couple times, but it does get pretty hot out there without much shade. It is a very nice pool though. Hot breakfast was included in our stay, and it was decent considering that it was free. We didn't use the shuttle to Disneyland, but it was a pretty short 10 minute walk to the front gates, which we loved. Also, it's a pretty quick walk over to Garden Walk where there are a bunch of restaurants. We've stayed at a few hotels around Disney, and the Country Inn and Suites was definitely one of the newer and nicer hotels. I would
Manager Response: Dear KidventuresTV,  Thank you for taking the time to provide feedback regarding your recent stay at the Country Inn & Suites by Carlson. We are happy to hear you enjoyed not only the hotel, but the surrounding area as well. Anaheim has so much to offer. Again, thank for you kind words and we look forward to your next visit!

Summary: The hotel was conveniently located (it's short walk to Disney!), the staff was super friendly and helpful, and very clean. We came here for a family vacation and was not disappointed. The only thing to be aware of is that they do charge a $20 per night resort fee which may surprise some guests. The hotel does offer complimentary breakfast, wifi was available throughout the building, and there's free parking so it's worth it!
Manager Response: Dear J6779ZHpaulk,  Thank you for your kind words and feedback. We appreciate all comments that come our way. We look forward to your next visit to the Anaheim area.

Summary: We stayed 4 nights at this hotel and it was superb.  3 blocks from Disneyland with shuttle service, public transportation, private cars available.  Clean, spacious rooms and all brand new.  Great bar with small menu and free breakfast and parking.  Heated pool and hot tub open late where you can watch the Disney fireworks from. Bartender Toshima (sp) was very friendly and accommodating.  Front desk staff very helpful with directions to locations avoiding freeway traffic.  Overall, a great experience.
Manager Response: Dear Paul M,  Thank you for taking the time to provide feedback regarding your recent stay at the Country Inn & Suites by Carlson. We are pleased that you enjoyed your time with us and look forward to your next stay.

Summary: Nice, new hotel - very modern. Good location for us - we had a car, parking was provided. The staff are excellent, happy to assist in any way to make the stay pleasant. The room we had was very spacious but empty in a way...... with the extra space of the room, a bigger bathroom (which wasn't very big) or lounge to sit on (there was only 1 chair in the room) and even increasing the size of the closet (which was only 1m wide) would be a good option, it just seemed to be such a waste of space - overall, the room was at lest very comfortable. Free washing and dryers available for guests. Our stay included breakfast - unfortunately this was the only negative..... with many guests around during the morning period, tables and chairs were hardly available, people were having to sit at
Manager Response: Dear Richie L,  Thank you for taking the time to provide feedback regarding your recent stay.  All comments are appreciated and used to improve our guests quality of stay.

Summary: We booked this hotel when we were looking for somewhere near Disneyland without the price of the Disney hotels.  I couldn't be happier with our choice.  The hotel is in a great location - very easy to find and within a few minutes walk to Disneyland. Also free parking is a real bonus considering if you park at the Disney parking lot its $25 and further away.  The room we had was a good size and very comfortable. Lots of space and great amenities.  Breakfast in the mornings was also good.  I would recommend this hotel and would use it again if i go back to Anaheim.
Manager Response: Dear Emjay101,  Thank you for your feedback and for taking the time to write about your experience. We are delighted to read that you enjoyed your time here at the Country Inn & Suites by Carlson. We look forward to your next stay.

Summary: This was a wonderful experience and awesome hotel. It was very clean and new! My husband and I stayed in a king room and it even had a sitting area, which was perfect for other family members to come in and hang out in. The value for what you get is awesome, and the rooms were extremely nice and clean. We walked to and from disneyland... For four adults, it took us about 15-20 minutes each way. There are shuttles you can pay for and such, but we opted to walk. Also - we got free parking at the hotel with our booking, which was an added bonus. I will definitely stay here on my next visit to Anaheim! Thanks to all the awesome staff and housekeeping for a great stay.
Manager Response: Dear CMarieS2013,  We are happy to hear your and your husband enjoyed your time with us. Thank you for your kind words and we look forward to seeing you during your next visit to the Anaheim area.

Summary: The hotel was incredibly clean wherever you went! The room was spacious, had a hair dryer, mini fridge, microwave, safe, plenty of towels and did I mention clean!  The hotel had washers and dryers, beautiful pool, nice fitness center, delicious breakfast and clean.  I definitely will return to this hotel again!  Walking distance to an assortment of restaurants and Disneyland! It was safe to walk at night.
Manager Response: Dear E7898QWpamelar,  Thank you for taking time to provide feedback regarding your recent stay. We pride ourselves of providing a clean and welcoming environment. We are delighted to hear you enjoyed your visit and look forward to seeing you next time.

Summary: Quick stay close to Disneyland theme parks. Walking distance. Hotel was beautiful with wonderful staff that was very caring and took care of any small need that we had. Cute souvenir store with Disney merchandise that my daughter liked. We plan to stay here again!
Manager Response: Dear DDuran33  Thank you for your feedback and for taking the time to write about your experience. We are delighted to read that you enjoyed your stay at the Country Inn & Suites by Carlson. We look forward to your next stay.

Summary Heading: You can see Disneyland from my room.
Summary: The hotel was three blocks from Disneyland. I was there during the 4th of July time period and the lady at the front desk put me in a room that had a great view of the fireworks from Disneyland. My room was close to the stair, so it was an easy walk to the buffet breakfast, which was good and easy access to the pool. Would stay there again.
Manager Response: Dear 24tennis2015,  Thank you for taking the time to provide feedback regarding your stay with us. We are happy to hear you enjoyed your visit and the view of Disneyland.   We look forward to seeing you during your next visit to the Anaheim area!

Summary: Beyond Great. One of the best experiences in a hotel that i have had in many years. The staff were genuinely happy to help you and make what ever you need happen.   They treated my 4 yr old daughter like a princess (disneyland vacation) and when we added one more night, they moved things around so we didn't have to move rooms - all while the hotel was booked.   Fantastic experience.
Manager Response: Dear Z9950LHjeffd,  We are delighted to hear you and your family enjoyed your stay here at the Country Inn & Suites by Carlson.  Thank you for your kind words and Happy Belated Birthday to your daughter!

Summary Heading: Good location, but unhelpful staff and terrible checkout policy
Summary: Pros: + A Beautiful temperature controlled pool + Very close to Disney entrances + Decent rooms with microwave Cons - Terrible checkin checkout policy 3 pm check in 11 am checkout. - Terrible breakfast buffet (its free so you cant complain, but they have nothing but a sausage, smashed eggs, juice, flakes and milk - Poor customer orientation among staff
Manager Response: Dear mojoneeti,  Thank you for taking the time to write a review and we are sorry you didn't fully enjoy your time with us.  We would appreciate the opportunity to discuss your recent stay further.  We invite you to contact us directly at property level.

Summary: Great new hotel. Nice staff.  Also not a high traffic area, so our UBER drivers were quick to pick and drop off. Reasonably priced and great location, whether walking or UBERing around.  (purpose for stay: Ducks game at Honda Center)
Manager Response: Dear albertom06897TY,  Thank you for your feedback and for taking the time to write about your experience. We are delighted to read that you enjoyed your stay at the Country Inn & Suites by Carlson. We look forward to your next stay.

Summary: Very clean rooms, great tasting free breakfast, great location less than a mile from Disneyland. We loved our stay there and it will be our go to Disneyland hotel from now on. We highly recommend this hotel.
Manager Response: Dear Eencyweency,  Thank you for taking the time to provide feedback regarding your recent stay with us. Your kind words are appreciated.   We look forward to seeing you during your next visit to the Anaheim area.

Summary Heading: Great place to stay near Disneyland!
Summary: Welcoming and friendly front desk staff.  Clean rooms,  breakfast buffet is okay, nice pool, free parking, close to Disneyland if walking and bus stop is right in front parking lot.  We will keep coming back.
Manager Response: Dear 156cathrynr,  Thank you for providing feedback regarding your recent stay with us. We are extremely happy to hear you enjoyed your time at the Country Inn & Suites by Carlson and we look forward to your next visit.

Summary: Great location to Disney parks! Great service and quiet!! My family loved it and we will stay here again!! Great pool and hot tub as well! The staff is super helpful and friendly. The complimentary breakfast was super good! We love this hotel!!
Manager Response: Dear 430katya,  Thank you for your kind words and feedback. We at the Country Inn & Suites by Carlson prides ourselves on providing a home away from home for our guests.   We look forward to seeing you during your next visit to the Anaheim area.

Summary: The hotel was clean, but beds were HARD, and I was very put off by having to go back out to my car to place a card on the dashboard when desk had already taken my vehicle info... I was very tired after a full day at Disneyland and felt that was unnecessary. Also no ice machine on the first floor was inconvenient, and no flavored creamer for coffee was disappointing considering the price of stay... I've seen that at more reasonable hotels. In addition, some outlets in our room didn't work to recharge phones...go figure! Hotel staff was not very friendly or attentive, and snack prices were outrageous. Breakfast food was very tasty, though, and again it was extremely clean throughout!
Manager Response: We are sorry to hear you did not have a good night’s sleep due to the comfort of your bed. We know a good night’s rest is very important.   We also apologize for the disappointing service you received from our staff. Our team works hard to make sure our guests are comfortable and receiving our best service. Please contact me personally if you would like to discuss your stay. Thank you for taking the time to reach out to us and we hope for another opportunity to exceed your expectations.

Summary: Im not reccomended this place... free breakfast but no food at all no bread and milk and the food is not warm enough... they dont clean our room... we make big mistake very expensive but we never get our money back for the service
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to reach out to us. We are sorry to hear that we fell short of your expectations due to the service you received from our staff and that your breakfast experience was less than what you expected at that time. This is not the kind of experience we would like you to have. Your feedback is highly appreciated as it assists us in our continuous goal of improving our services. We hope that you will consider staying with us again so that we may have the opportunity to provide you an experience that is truly excellent in all aspects.

Summary: Just had a great 7 night stay here. Hotel smart, modern & clean. Great location, 5 min walk to the Garden Walk (can recommend the Cheesecake Factory,excellent) & an abt 10-15 min walk to Disney, no need for bus unless very tired, think Art charged $5.50 a day  Great pool area open till abt midnight, hot tub comes in handy as well. Great Bar/Lounge area, several T.V's. Free breakfast very welcome & free hot drinks in the evening. small shop selling the basics.too.  Stayed in a lovely spacious King-Bed Suite, really nice with separate sitting area/ sofabed, cannot fault it.  Def recommend it !!!
Manager Response: Dear trevormassive,  Thank you for taking the time to provide feedback regarding your recent stay at the Country Inn & Suites by Carlson. We are glad you enjoyed your time with us and look forward to your next visit.

Summary: Had a lovely two night stay here in Anaheim. The hotel is nice and clean and feels new. We really enjoyed the room and hot breakfast. The staff was great and check in and check out was easy. Please note that there is a nightly resort fee.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to provide feedback regarding your recent stay at the Country Inn & Suites by Carlson. We are delighted you enjoyed your stay with us and look forward to your next visit to the Anaheim area.

Summary: My daughter arrived and had an easy check in.  The staff was helpful and fun yo speak with. Our room was just what we wanted & we had a view of the fireworks in the evening.  Room was clean, comfortable and the blackout curtains did a good job
Manager Response: Dear W2786DGjoannak,  Thank you for taking the time to provide feedback regarding your recent stay at the Country Inn & Suites by Carlson. We are happy to hear you enjoyed your room and the view of the fireworks at Disneyland. We look forward to seeing you during your next visit to the Anaheim area!

Summary Heading: Near FWY Garden Walk and Disney
Summary: I was here for business and fun.  Everything was perfect. Love the new hotel.  Will try the breakfast and pool next time. The new House of Blues is across the street and Garden Walk. Look forward for a new relaxing stay there. Everyone was really nice and the price was very affordable.
Manager Response: Dear 934sherriz,  Thank you for your feedback and for taking the time to write about your experience. We are delighted to read that you enjoyed all the surrounding area has to offer. We look forward to your next stay.

Summary: I am a native Californian, grew up in the area, and never even new this hotel existed!   Very clean and modern.  GREAT Breakfast!!  Located near everything!!  Free Charging Station for my car!  Will definitely return for a longer stay next time.
Manager Response: Dear tonjas460.  Thank you for your feedback and for taking the time to write about your experience. We are delighted to read that you enjoyed your stay here at the Country Inn & Suites by Carlson. Thank you for your kind words and we look forward to your next stay.

Summary Heading: great great great and very clean and confortable. great job!
Summary: great stay! everyone here is great staff is knowledgeable. attentive. helpful and clean. . recommend it! i travel with my mother often - she never showers at hotels when its a one night stay and at times brings her own blankets. she was very comfortable and happy and took 2 showers in the hotel..
Manager Response: Dear Jorge M,  Thank you for your feedback and for taking the time to write about your experience at the Country Inn & Suites by Carlson. We are happy to read that you enjoyed time with us. We look forward to your next stay.

Summary: very nice hotel with nice pool, good breakfast ,free parking and a short walk to disneyland. hotel was only nine months old at our stay. Hotel staff was very friendly. the room we had had a street view but was quiet. the air conditioner was a little noisy.
Manager Response: Dear David P,  Thank you for your feedback and kind words. We are happy to hear you enjoyed your time at the Country Inn & Suites by Carlson. We look forward to seeing you during your next visit to the Anaheim area.

Summary: The hotel room's was very nice even the front desk employees were very friendly  ;however, breakfast wasn't as expected. One kind of egg no fresh fruit, bread finished very fast and time was short too.
Manager Response: Dear 949abdullahz,  We appreciate you taking the time to write your review. The lack of diversity in our breakfast area is being addressed. Your review gives us the opportunity to correct any deficiencies we may have in our service. We hope you will give us another chance if you are in the area again.

Summary: Great Price extremely quite and comfortable 10 minute walk to Disney Land. The pool is heated and open 6am to midnight they have a bar it is a great place to stay family friendly would definitely recommend to anyone
Manager Response: Dear adrianmS1927HR,  Thank you for taking the time to provide feedback regarding your recent stay at the Country Inn & Suites by Carlson. I'm glad to hear you enjoyed your time with us and look forward to your next visit.

Summary: As any family knows, stretching you're budget to accommodate all the extras in vacation can we be stressful.  We found Country Inns by word of mouth from my brother in law.   From the driveway and check in everything was perfect. We didn't have to wait, didn't have to fuss about anything.  It's new so it's very clean but my wife works in hospitality and told be they are keeping it well maintained for a very busy busy  public place.  Breakfast ( complimentary) worked out great each day. We aren't are weren't expecting a lavish buffet. Free breakfast has to rolled into any fee but parking was free so was the wifi so we can't argue much.  We stayed in a large room;  we had pizza delivered from there restaurant. Tasty and cheap to feed a family.  My kids- who run the show, enjoyed
Manager Response: Dear agster03,   Thank you for your feedback and for taking the time to write about your experience. We are delighted to read that you enjoyed all the Country Inn & Suites has to offer. We look forward to your next stay.

Summary Heading: Great hotel, close enough to Disneyland
Summary: The hotel itself is nice.  The rooms are big and clean (2 queen beds).  The room was also quiet, which is a big plus.  We have stayed at other hotels near Disneyland and the walls seem to be so thin, we can always hear the neighbors; not here though.  The walk to Disneyland is not bad.  It's about a 15 minute walk to the front gates, with kids.  The breakfast in the morning is adequate.  It's not anything fancy, but enough choice for the kids and adults to get some energy for the day at Disney.  One drawback is that there aren't any restaurants or other amenities near the hotel, without driving (or walking 10 minutes).
Manager Response: Dear Carlos G.,  Thank you for your feedback and for taking the time to tell us about your positive experience.  We are delighted to know that you enjoyed your stay with us. Again, thank you and we look forward to your next stay!

Summary: Don't let the hotel scam you with fresh omelette he hoot.  Our room has a water leak issue and fire ant problem. Reported this to management, they respond but nothing was done and no follow up from them
Manager Response: Dear Stephen B.  Thank you for taking the time to complete our guest satisfaction survey.    If you have a moment and are willing to discuss your visit it would help me to remedy these concerns.  However, regardless of your response to my request I want to make sure that you feel your comments were heard.                                 I'm hoping that you'll visit us again. If you'd like, you can reach me at the hotel phone number.  It would be a pleasure to personally discuss with you any specifics and / or suggestions you'd like to offer.

Summary: Rooms are very clean and the staff was very professional. Staff at the front desk was very informative. The room service staff was very attentive to our needs. The staff that handled the breakfast was very helpful.
Manager Response: Thank you for your feedback and for taking the time to write about your experience. We are delighted to read that you enjoyed your stay at the Country Inn & Suites by Carlson. We look forward to your next stay.

Summary: They have a small ant problem.  Also you can hear the kids that are running in the hall and rooms around you. But due to the area your in that is bound for.  The hotel pool and breakfast was great.  Also its almost 2 to 3 city blocks from Disney entrance.
Manager Response: Dear 330ashat,  Thank you for taking the time to provide feedback regarding your recent stay at the Country Inn & Suites by Carlson. We are happy to hear you enjoyed your stay.

Summary: My husband and I went to California for a babymoon and spent 3 days in Disney . We are so happy we chose this hotel for our 4 night stay in Anaheim . The staff at the reception were super helpful and so nice ! The hotel looked brand new and our room was gorgeous! Free daily breakfast was definitely a great add on knowing we would be spending quite a bit at Disney. The fact that it was walking distance was also really nice . There is a nice outdoor pool area to relax and enjoy the nice weather . We would go back in a heartbeat! This hotel is a gem !
Manager Response: Dear Laura G,  Thank you for taking the time to provide feedback regarding your recent stay at the Country Inn & Suites by Carlson. We are happy to hear you enjoyed your time with us.  Thank you for your kind words and we looking forward to seeing you during your next visit to the Anaheim area.

Summary Heading: Great staff, typical rooms, just one thing...
Summary: Stayed 3 nights for a Disney trip. First, we were greeted by a guy named Taylor behind the front desk who was incredibly friendly and helpful. It is rare I find the front desk staff to actually make a difference in my stay, but Taylor was great in helping us with many of our plans. He has management in his future!  Theroom was basic but clean and comfortable. The breakfast was certainly adequate to get our days at the park started early. The pool was big and clean.   The hotel is definitely walking distance to the park, maybe ten or twelve minute walk, depending on the age of your kids. it was perfect in the mornings. The only thing I will say, is that for the late night walk home from the park the walk is down a long, dark street lined by hedges that had some shade characters
Manager Response: Dear doclorenzo,  Thank you for your feedback and for taking the time to write about your experience. We are delighted to read that you enjoyed your stay at the Country Inn & Suites by Carlson. We look forward to your next stay.

Summary: We've been to Disneyland several times, always staying across the street from the parks in the smaller and older "good neighbour" hotels. This time we chose Country Inn and Suites because it was better priced, offered free parking, free breakfast and free wifi, plus it has excellent reviews. The place exceeded our expectations. The staff is friendly and service was excellent. The facilities are top notch, rooms are  BIG. We got the king bed suite for less than a double queen in other places. The pool is awesome and it's perfect after a long day at the park. They have a poolside bar a bit pricey but good for an occasional drink and a bite. Breakfast is simple but has healthy options. And they have underground parking. It is a 10 minutes walk to the parks but it doesn't make a
Manager Response: Dear RamCal69,  Thank you for your feedback and for taking the time to write about your experience. We are delighted to read that you enjoyed your stay at the Country Inn & Suites by Carlson. We look forward to your next stay.

Summary: They charge a "resort fee".  This is not a resort by any means. It's a budget hotel like the many in the area.  If they want to charge for parking, they should jut say they charge for parking, but they would rather sneak it in as a "resort fee" and surprise you at check-in.  There is also not enough parking and they tell you to park in the red fire lane.  Guess what, if there is a fire, this is a huge negligence!   The pool is nice and big, but the views are horrible.  Power lines and a budget motel environment.    The breakfast is one of the worst in the area.  Usually cold and not much of a selection. Also the quality is beyond cheap.  Sausages taste like they are mixed with saw dust, eggs are okay, and potatoes are extra starchy and worse than something you would get in a
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to write a review. It is a delight to know that you were pleased with our pool. On the other hand, we apologize that you were not satisfied with your stay due to the parking situation and that your breakfast experience was less than what you anticipated. This is certainly not the kind of experience we would like you to have. We always desire for our valued guests stay to be outstanding. Your feedback is highly appreciated as it assists us in our continuous goal of improving the services and the policies of our hotel. We hope for another opportunity to make a more favorable impression in the future.

Summary: We spent 3 nights here on a recent trip to Disneyland. We opted to use Lyft to get to the park which was 5bucks each way. The hotel is very clean and spacious rooms big enough to easily add a roll out if needed. There is a complimentary breakfast daily which was a nice perk. The teenagers we were traveling with enjoyed it! So no complaints here would definitely stay here again. Oh and really friendly staff from the check in to the house cleaners every one greeted with hellos. Oh and free laundry machines were offered too!
Manager Response: Dear Bri V,  Thank you for taking the time to provide feedback regarding your recent stay here at the Country Inn & Suites by Carlson.  We are glad you and your family enjoyed everything we have to offer.  Again, thank you for your kind words and we look forward to seeing you during your next visit to the Anaheim area.

Summary: Terrific hotel, relatively new and extremely clean.The rooms were better than we expeced, the beds were very comfortable and bathroom stocked with everything a family of three would need.Great staff! all very friendly and accommodating. One staff member in perticular, Liz at the front desk was amazing, very helpful and always a sincere smile. GREAT ATTITUDE !! Thanks Liz. When we return to Anaheim, we will likely be staying with this hotel again largely in part to the staff.
Manager Response: Dear BWolczak,  Thank you for your feedback and for taking the time to write about your experience. We are delighted to read that you enjoyed your stay and we will definitely give Liz a pat on the back for providing exceptional service. We look forward to your next stay.

Summary: Over all was great service, clean room, free parking, free breakfast , Great amenities ..CLOSE TO DISNEYLAND !! And you can order pizza to your room from right in your hotel ..Pool area clean heated pool
Manager Response: Dear dianemV8252VB,  Thank you for taking the time to provide feedback regarding your recent stay here at the Country Inn & Suites by Carlson.  We are delighted you enjoyed your everything the hotel has to offer and we look forward to seeing you during your next visit to the Anaheim area.

Summary: We enjoyed our stay, found a great rate on HotelTonight app. Excellent customer service, super nice pool & hot tub, free breakfast, free parking, short drive to Disney or take the bus, like we did, for 5.50pp all day privileges.
Manager Response: Dear F8010Dcindyc,  Thank you for taking the time to provide feedback. We are delighted to hear you enjoyed everything we have to offer.   Again, thank you for your kind words and we look forward to your next visit.

Summary: I found chips and pop corn under the sofa bed , the ice bucket with the same plastic I used one day before when with ice melted , the blanquet dirty for the price I paid the room was horrible , no good to stay
Manager Response: danieloK52AV,  Thank you for reaching out and writing your review. We are sorry you were not satisfied with the accommodations of your room. Summary: New and welcoming hotel. Great service and extremely comfortable. The accommodations an amenities were excellent. I'm definitely recommending this hotel to all my friends and family. We were also able to see the Disneyland fireworks from our room.
Manager Response: Dear F5091OZdanilv,  Thank you for your kind words and feedback! We look forward to seeing you during your next visit toe the Disneyland resort.

Summary: The staff at this hotel went above and beyond to assist us. When we arrived in California, we were robbed in San Francisco. We stayed in this hotel for 5 days at the end of our vacation and needed to have documents mailed, emailed and faxed to us for airplane travel home. The staff were extremely helpful and tried to assist in any way possible. The hotel was like new, super clean. My only complaint is the breakfast, pretty much the same, not so great food for 5 days. That's the only improvement that I would recommend.
Manager Response: Dear Kathloeen L,  Thank you for taking the time to provide feedback regarding your recent stay at the Country Inn & Suites by Carlson.  I am delighted to hear our staff was so helpful. We pride ourselves on providing service that exceeds industry standards.  Again, thank you for your kind words and we hope we see you during your next visit to the Anaheim area.

Summary: The hotel is great.  It is fairly new.  Had a wonderful experience with the family and children however the breakfast buffet could be a little better.  The items were very repetitive for breakfast.  They have complimentary laundry machines which was awesome for our 4 nights of stay.  Just had to buy laundry soap from the front desk.  It was about 10-12 min walk to Disneyland.
Manager Response: Hello,  Thank you for taking the time to provide feedback regarding your recent stay. All comments are appreciated and taken into consideration. Thank you for your kind words and we look forward to seeing you the next time you're in the Anaheim area.

Summary: I hesitate to big up this property because it may be sold out next time I'm looking for a place to stay near Disney...but I'll take the good kharma by sharing my great experience.  Top notch service, facilities, rooms, and salt water pool!  It's nice to get out of the pool after a long day at Disneyland and feel like I just took a dip in the ocean rather than a pool of chemicals - a huge win in my book!  All the other amenities that make a property appealing were in place as well:  free wifi, comfy & clean rooms, fridge and microwave in rooms, free REAL breakfast with lots of options (all good except the styrofoam plates and plastic flatware - bad for environment).
Manager Response: Dear Christine B.  Thank you for your kind words! We look forward to your next visit.

Summary: Once you get used to this being located next to the freeway and if you have a room facing it you will hear the cars, it's a lovely hotel with great facilities and lovely staff. My only complaints were that Breakfast was however very odd in terms of the food some mornings. We came to the conclusion that they haven't really an established kitchen yet as the food wasn't great. They don't offer dinner and the bar menu and food is awful. Hubby refused to eat anything it was that bad. Also whilst it was quiet around the pool so it wasn't too much of an issue there are very few sunbeds.   The hotel has a gym and laundry facilities plus a reasonably priced shop should you need anything. As it is new the rooms etc are lovely. Only comment is could have done with more than one shampoo for
Manager Response: Dear RONNIE43CATS,  Thank you for taking the time to provide feedback regarding your recent stay with us. We appreciate all comments that help us improve our level of service to our guests. Again, thank you for your comments and we welcome you to stay with us during your next visit to the Anaheim area.

Summary: Such a great hotel. The pool is amazing and the bar is great. The pillows here are more comfortable than my pillows at home. The bed was comfortable and everything is kept very clean. It's a great value compared to other hotels. Parking and internet is included. They even have little things for you if you forget stuff at home, such as complimentary toothpaste
Manager Response: Dear Lorilynn L,  Thank you for taking the time to provide feedback regarding your recent stay here at the Country Inn & Suites by Carlson. We are happy to hear you enjoyed your time with us. Again, thank you and we look forward to your next visit.

Summary Heading: EXCELLENT hotel within walking distance of Disneyland!!!
Summary: Brand new hotel. Everything is new and everything looks great. Rooms are modern, spacious, very clean and comfortable. Business center, fitness center, and laundry room on site. Hotel staff was friendly and helpful especially Nina!  Full hot breakfast buffet was free! Parking was free! And last but not least, it's within walking distance to Disneyland! :)
Manager Response: Dear Robert S,  Thank you so much for your kind words and feedback. We pride ourselves on providing service above industry standard. We are delighted that you enjoyed everything the Country Inn & Suites has to offer and we look forward to seeing you during your next visit to the Disneyland resort!

Summary: Spacious comfortable room!  Great location - but get a room as far away from the highway as you can.  Nice amenities (coffee maker, microwave and fridge), especially being able to wash clothes.  We stayed 6 days.
Manager Response: Dear 652darrelt,  Thank you for taking the time to provide feedback regarding your recent stay at the Country Inn & Suites by Carlson. We welcome you back during your next visit to the Anaheim area!

Summary: It's hard for me to explain how great of an experience I had at this hotel. You'll just have to come experience it for yourself. This place is run virtually perfectly. Amazing staff, amazing amenities, and walking distance from a plethora of food and entertainment!
Manager Response: Dear N4417ZNcolind,  Thank you for taking the time to provide feedback regarding your recent stay with us. We are happy to hear you enjoyed everything the Country Inn & Suites has to offer. We pride our self on providing a home away from home for our guests. Thank you for your kind words and we look forward to seeing you during your next visit to the Disneyland resort.

Summary: My family took a vacation in august to experience Southern California and especially Disneyland. Enjoyed the quality and pricing of the hotel, it's amenities and its proximity to Disneyland. Great value!!
Manager Response: Thank you for your kind words! We are delighted to hear you enjoyed your time with us. We look forward to see you during your next visit to the Anaheim area.

Summary: Clean and fresh rooms with nice size bathrooms,  The lounge area  near the lobby is large and family friendly with many tables and easy access to the pool.   Great  Disney Firework show viewed from the pool area in the background  makes a great end to a great evening.
Manager Response: Dear 87georgen, Thank you for you kind words and feedback! We look forward to seeing you during your next visit to The Anaheim area!

Summary: It was a great stay! Staff were helpful and was really to work with me to improve stay! Was impressed on how clean the hotel was. Always felt great! The only thung I would change is a smoother check in and check out.
Manager Response: Dear O4058ZIokhh,  Thank you for your feedback and kind words. All comments are greatly appreciated. We are glad you enjoyed your time with us here at the Country Inn & Suites by Carlson and we look forward to seeing you during your next visit.

Summary Heading: Greatest place to stay in Anaheim
Summary: Excellent, new clean hotel. Great Pool and hot tub. Nice bar lounge area with nightly bar menu. Spacious rooms with nice view towards Disneyland. Highly recommended. Great staff and a good breakfast. Very close to Disneyland, 15-20 minute walk or a 10 min shuttle.
Manager Response: Dear ian d,  Thank you for taking the time to provide feedback regarding your recent stay at the Country Inn & Suites by Carlson. We are delighted to hear that you enjoyed everything we have to offer.

Summary: This hotel was located in a quiet location near Disneyland and many shops/restaurants. The rooms were clean, spacious and well-maintained. Friendly staff greeted us daily. Only downfall we had was our room was facing the pool and we heard swimmers near midnight playing Marco Polo and laughing. Daily breakfast was decent with toast, cereals, yogurt, juices, mini-waffles, sausage, fruit and "powdered" eggs.
Manager Response: Dear kaz_stenzel,  Thank you for your feedback and kind words!

Summary: Overall very good, clean, awesome pool, great location. We only stayed one night, it was a very short walk to Disneyland, the breakfast could have been better. The room was very specious. We will be bringing our family back here for a stay next time we come for Disney.
Manager Response: Dear mattv609,  Thank you for taking the time to provide feedback regarding your recent stay. We look forward to seeing your during your next visit to the Disneyland resort!

Summary: Will stay here again. Loved the location, cleanliness, staff, amenities. Rooms extremely comfortable, staff helpful, nice and quiet and away from the craziness of Disney but still close enough. Loved it!!
Manager Response: Dear 627mirnaa,  Thank you for your kind words and feedback!

Summary: There are ants! Stay away! We told the front desk and he disregarded. He was super rude. The front desk needs to have patience with people. This is my first time here and my last. If you want to sleep w. Ants this is the place to be!
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to write a review. We are striving hard for excellence in cleanliness and guest satisfaction. On the other hand, we apologize that you were not pleased with your stay due to the cleanliness of the hotel and the service you received from our staff at that time. This is certainly not the kind of experience we would like you to have. Our team is working hard to make sure our guests are comfortable and are receiving our best service. Your feedback is greatly appreciated and will be forwarded to the hotel management to ensure that situations like this won't happen again from now on. We still look forward to seeing you again in any of our Country Inns & Suites hotels in the future.

Summary: The staff went out of their way to accommodate us, even though we stopped by late at night when our car broke down nearby.  They went out of their way to accommodate us in the only room that was available.  They provided extra beds for all of us.  Thanks!
Manager Response: Dear J8884HCjamesa,  Thank you for your kind words. We're glad to hear the front desk staff was able to accommodate you during your time of need. Thank you for your feedback and we hope we see you during your next visit to the area.

Summary: We had a great stay and look forward to staying here again in the future. Our future trips will include this hotel and it's friendly employees. We hope the Breakfast gets better other than that amazing Hotel.
Manager Response: PBarkers,  Thank you for your feedback. We look forward to seeing you during your next visit to the Anaheim area.

Summary: This hotel is in a great location with in walking distance of Disneyland. Has a complimentary breakfast, internet, landurany facilities on site for guests. The rooms are spacious with a tv, mini refrigerator and microwave.
Manager Response: Dear Q1686FTjonathanp,  Thank you for taking the time to provide feedback regarding your recent stay. We appreciate your kind words and look forward to your next visit.

Summary: The hotel is fresh. A great value. All the amenities necessary in addition to the spacious and well kept rooms.  The distance to the Disney Parks is easily walkable (10 mins) and there is an efficient shuttle for those not wanting extra steps.  The pool is large, clean and a perfect antidote to long days at the park.  We split up our park days by coming back to the hotel to swim and chill for a bit, allowing us to get a second wind for more Disney time.   Staff is friendly, courteous and efficient.  Added bonus was complimentary laundry service (bring a small bag of detergent).    Boys (17 and 13) and I all appreciated the hotel very much.
Manager Response: Dear GeneralPatton11,  Thank you for your kind words. We are delighted to hear you and your family enjoyed your stay. We look forward to seeing you during your next visit to the Disneyland resort.

Summary Heading: Very good hotel. Great pool and location.
Summary: Hotel was great. Pool was excellent for our family with two kids. Walking distance to Disney. Very clean. Loved free laundry. Staff was excellent. Only disappointment was breakfast buffet. Found it not well stocked. Felt it efficient but not hospitable. Overall very good hotel.
Manager Response: Dear Mark K,  Thank you for taking the time to provide feedback regarding your recent stay at the Country Inn & Suites by Carlson. We look forward to seeing you during your next visit.

Summary: Clean & comfort room, free laundry machine(Laundry detergent must be purchased), free WiFi, delicious breakfast, clean and large pool, close enough to walk to Disneyland, friendly staff, convenient parking etc...
Manager Response: Dear youngjink423,  Thank you for your kind words and feedback. We are delighted that you enjoyed your time with us!

Summary: Arrived at the property late after a long drive. Beautiful and comfy rooms. The fridge ran cold and froze everything we put in it. Breakfast was good but more fresh fruit and dairy free milk would be great. Pool is nicely heated and clean but there is no shade. The walk to Disney is an easy 10 minutes. There was a shuttle but we did not find it necessary to use. I did laundry the last morning, it was so nice to have clean clothes for the next leg of our trip. We stayed here based on the referral of a friend and will return on our next trip to Disney.
Manager Response: Dear Kristi S.  Thank you for your feedback and we look forward to seeing you during your next visit to the Anaheim area.

Summary Heading: Poor customer service and rude staff.
Summary: We will not be staying here again. Staff was rude and derogatory toward children in every experience. No smiles just terse response and making us feel like they just wanted us to leave as soon as possible. Room on first floor smelled musty and this is supposed to be a new hotel.
Manager Response: Thank you for reaching out to write your review. Please accept my sincere apologies for experience during your stay with us. Please reach out to the hotel and ask for me directly. I would be more than happy to discuss your experience and make it right.  Thank you for your patience during your stay.

Summary: This hotel was a perfect stay, staff were very friendly, food was good, the pool and spa are a great size, able to walk to where you want to go, great price and very clean. There was also a bus if needed, parking was a great add on and the internet was awesome as well.
Manager Response: Dear 514shelbyt,  Thank you for taking the time to provide feedback regarding your recent stay here at the Country Inn & Suites by Carlson. We are happy to hear you enjoyed your time with us. We look forward to seeing you during your next visit to the Disneyland resort.

Summary: Great place to stay, close to Disney, and the rooms were new and clean.  My daughter enjoyed the pool and we went there when we took a break from Disney. I purchased this as a package plan on Expedia.  If you are looking for a place to stay off of the property, but close to Disney this is the place!!
Manager Response: Dear Cynthia N,  Thank you for your kind words and feedback.  We are delighted to hear you enjoyed your stay here at the Country Inn & Suites by Carlson. We look forward to seeing you during your next visit to the Anaheim area.

Summary: Nice hotel the room was ok only complaint would be the carpets are extremely stained never have I stayed in a nice hotel where the carpets where this bad. House keeping was great. The breakfast is good they alternate between biscuit and gravy and sausage and waffles. Not a big fan of the breakfast voucher we weren't asked the whole trip except the last day we don't even bother to bring them with us by then. Coffee station was ok but only complaint is they only had half and half as a creamer option. It has a pool which is a plus for a day of relaxation or a break from Disney.
Manager Response: Dear Sarah A,  Thank you for your feedback and for taking the time to write about your experience. We are happy to hear you enjoyed your recent stay and hope we see you during your next visit to the Anaheim area.

Summary: Hotel was great for our family's mini vacation. Clean and friendly staff members. I liked the fact that the hotel is close enough to Disney but far enough from the hustle and bustle of Harbor Blvd. The King Suite had ample room for a family of 4 and very clean. I would stay again when we are back in town, great for families.
Manager Response: Dear C7356CKernick,  Thank you for sharing your experience. We are happy to hear that you enjoyed the level of service our staff provided.  We look forward to your next visit!

Summary: The hotel is a new and located within a ten minute walk to Disney. There is shopping and eating facilities as well as other amenities close by. The Los Angeles Angels stadium is located across the freeway from the hotel. It is easily accessible off the major nearby freeways,
Manager Response: Dear 280murraya,  Thank you for your feedback and for taking the time to write about your experience. We're glad to hear you enjoyed your time here at the Country Inn & Suites by Carlson.  We hope we see you during your next visit to the Anaheim area.

Summary: The hotel and it's staff were amazing. The rooms were very clean and nice, however, if your room was on the freeway side, it was noisy. The breakfast area was clean and breakfast was OK, but lacked variety. We were there for 4 days and it was the same every day, with sausage and plain eggs as the only hot proteins. The lobby was inviting and the bar and patio seating area very nice.
Manager Response: Dear V5996BNmichellem,  Thank you for your feedback and for taking the time to write about your recent experience here at the Country Inn & Suites by Carlson. We are delighted to read that you enjoyed your time with us. We look forward to your next stay.

Summary: We stayed three days this week at this hotel.  Excellent location if you are visiting Disney.  A short 12 minute walk or you can take UBER for under $5.  The staff was very attentive and the rooms clean and new.  Breakfast was included and a great way to start the day.  Not a lot of variety from day to day but the staff kept everything stocked well during the busy time. We have already booked this hotel for two upcoming trips.  Also most nights there were warm cookies available at the front desk. Yum!
Manager Response: Dear Mary M.,  Thank you for your feedback and for taking the time to write about your experience.  We are happy to hear you enjoyed your stay here at the Country Inn & Suites by Carlson.  Thank you for your kind words and we look forward to seeing you during your next trip to the Anaheim area.

Summary Heading: Perfect, Welcoming and home away from home
Summary: On a trip for business and to celebrate our 20th wedding anniversary.  Staff was always welcoming, rooms were amazing, a perfect place to stay when you are away from home. We will stay again and recommend to all family and friends.
Manager Response: Thank you for your kind words. We are happy to hear you enjoyed your recent stay at the Country Inn & Suites by Carlson. We look forward to seeing you during your next visit to the Anaheim area. Thank you and Happy Anniversary!!!

Summary: The hotel was very nice however the service at the front desk was not good! The lady was very rude and the hotel charged almost $30 for parking ( $25 plus tax) for a second car. I told the lady nothing on the site says they charge for a second car, she didn't care or try to wave the fee!! Not a good check in at all!
Manager Response: Dear N1462KQcrystalh,  I apologize for the disappointing service you received from our staff. Please feel free to contact me directly to further discuss your recent visit.  We appreciate you bringing this matter to our attention, and hope for another opportunity to exceed your expectations in the future.

Summary Heading: Good breakfast and location; No lock and only one hook in bathroom
Summary: The breakfast was very good, The location was good. We walked to the Disneyland. It took 15 mins to walk. Walking back to hotel was a bit painful as we wore off from walking the whole day inside the Disneyland. There was no lock in the bathroom. And, there was only one hook in the bathroom to hang cloths.
Manager Response: Dear shaikhs829,   Thank you for your feedback and for taking the time to write about your experience. We will definitely take your comments into consideration. Again, thank you for your feedback and we hope you choose the Country Inn & Suites during your next visit to the Anaheim area.

Summary: I had spent my first night in Anaheim at the Hilton, big mistake.  The Country Inn & Suites was a huge upgrade.  It is a modern design, clean hotel with a friendly hard  working staff.  Convenient ART stop right outside hotel, nice breakfast buffet, comfortable rooms.  One of the nicer hotels stays I've had in quite sometime.
Manager Response: Dear Marie1004,   Thank you for your kind words and feedback. We're glad to hear you enjoyed all the Country Inn & Suites has to offer!

Summary: This hotel is convenient to the parks with the available shuttle.  The hotel is a good value for your dollar.   The front desk staff went out of their way to accommodate our early arrival.  I would definitely recommend staying here.
Manager Response: Dear Amy A.,  Thank you for your feedback and for taking the time to write about your experience here at the Country Inn & Suites by Carlson. Thank you for your kind words and we look forward to seeing you the next time you visit the Disneyland Resort.

Summary: This is a review before staying. My family is planning a trip for our granddaughter (and NOT to Disneyland). She is turning 4 years old and we are going to a local kids convention in Irvine in September. I am a Sales Manager at the Radisson Hotel in San Diego which is apart of the Carlson Reizdor family.  After making my online reservation, I wanted to confirm a few things and request a few things. I spoke with Jim, the Night Manager, and he was DELIGHTFUL!! He was a fresh of breath air!!  He was accommodating, funny and very helpful. And I didn't have to tell him who i was! Anaheim....you have a great one and I can't wait to stay in September!
Manager Response: Dear Oscar M,  Thank you for your kind words! Don't hesitate to contact the hotel should you have questions or requests for you upcoming trip in September.  We will definitely acknowledge Jim's excellent service.  Again, thank you and we look forward to seeing you next month!

Summary Heading: Great place to stay if going to Disneyland!
Summary: Our family loved this hotel.  It was a short walk from Disneyland and provided breakfast each morning.  My kids enjoyed the pool in the evenings.  The beds were super comfy and we felt rested each day.  They also gave free cookies!
Manager Response: Dear Q1456QVlisae,  Thank you for your feedback and for taking the time to write about your experience. We are delighted to read that you enjoyed your time at the Country Inn & Suites by Carlson. We look forward to your next stay.

Summary: This hotel is new and and in a great location. Right across the street from Anaheim Gardens and an easy 10-15 minute walk to Disneyland.   The room was huge! We stayed in a king with a pullout couch. The decor was very minimal, with a lot of unused space. The bed was really comfortable. Our main issue was with housekeeping. We stayed three nights. The first two days the bed was made and towels replenished, but none of the trash was taken care of and we could tell they did the bare minimum. The last night when we returned at 1:30 am from Disney, the room hadn't been touched. Beds still unmade, no towels, etc.  I called the desk and they sent towels and offered to change the sheets which we declined. Upon checkout we told the manager about housekeeping and just got a "Sorry about
Manager Response: Dear Daniella R.,  Thank you for your feedback and for taking the time to write about your experience. We' are happy to hear you enjoyed your stay, however sad that your room wasn't serviced as necessary. We appreciate you bringing the housekeeping matter to our attention, and hope for another opportunity to exceed your expectations in the future.

Summary: Very comfortable and clean hotel.  Staff were friendly and always willing to help.  The pool area was very clean and tidy although it would have been nice to see a bit more shade in the form of umbrellas. The breakfasts were average and not a lot of variety.  The negative was eating off styrofoam plates and bowls using plastic utensils. Aside from that it was a very comfortable and relaxing stay and would definitely recommend it.
Manager Response: Dear Kristen B.,  Thank you for your feedback and for taking the time to write about your experience. We are delighted you enjoyed your time here at the Country Inn & Suites by Carlson.

Summary Heading: Fresh Face in Old DIsney Area!
Summary: Great new hotel with great amenities and a great pool... close to parks and Anaheim Convention Center... We stayed for a VB tournament and the breakfast was perfect for the team... plenty of Parking and some under ground.. laundry onsite and big rooms with multiple TV's for all to get a view.
Manager Response: Dear X4496ZOdeborahs,  Thank you for your kind words and taking the time to let us know about your recent stay with us. We appreciate your feedback and look forward to seeing you the next time you visit the Anaheim area!

Summary Heading: great hotel to stay with family
Summary: i loved the location and the workers were great and helpful the pool was the best part and prefect for my daughter to swim not to deep and she could walk around and learn to swim thank you for a wonderful stay
Manager Response: Dear 872sugeyr,  Thank you for your kind words and feedback. We are glad you and your family enjoyed your time here at the Country Inn & Suites by Carlson. See you next time!

Summary: This hotel exceeded our expectations.  It looks brand new.  The room is clean and location is very convenient for going to Disneyland.  Just wish they had free shuttle services to Disneyland.    The only problem we had was that the cleaning staff ignored the do-not-disturb sign and repeatedly pounded on the door when we were trying to catch up some sleep after dropping off our teenagers at Disneyland both days we were there.
Manager Response: Dear cruiselover285, Thank you for taking the time to let us know about you recent stay with us. I'm delighted to hear we surpassed your expectations, however I must apologize for the concern you addressed. Please know that the issue you mentioned will not be overlooked. Again, thank you for your feedback and we look forward to seeing you during your next visit to the Anaheim area.

Summary Heading: Nice spacious rooms and convieniently located
Summary: The hotel is convienetly located , spacious rooms , lounges and corridors. Enough large elevators. New facility and furniture. Car parking with a lot of space. Staff were friendly and supportive. Very close to Disney
Manager Response: Dear aadmawia,  Thank you for your kind words and taking the time to let us know about your recent stay at the Country Inn & Suites by Carlson. We look forward to seeing you during your next visit to the Disneyland Resort!

Summary: Enjoyed our stay. Clean, friendly, good price , great location, updated, free parking, internet, and breakfast. Breakfast staff very nice and not just muffin and coffee- but MacLean full breakfast with choices.
Manager Response: Dear Pamela G,  Thank you for your kind words and feedback regarding your recent stay at the Country Inn & Suites by Carlson.  We're happy to hear you enjoyed your time with us!

Summary: Close and convenient to Disneyland and Garden Walk restaurants. Short & frequent shuttle service to Disneyland available. Hotel is fairly new, clean and comfortable. Service overall was good with informative staff. Breakfast buffet was very basic and serving food on cheap polystyrene and plastic cutlery lowers the overall quality of the hotel. Nice pool and lounge area which will be more relaxing when construction next door is completed.
Manager Response: Dear 257Mike,  Thank you for your feedback and for taking the time to let us know about your recent experience with us. We take all comments into deep consideration in hopes of improving our overall guest experience. Again, thank you and we hope you choose the Country Inn & Suites by Carlson during your next visit to the area.

Summary: The hotel is only 7 months old and everything is fresh and beautiful.  Check out the pool area!  The staff is friendly and helpful.  Easy walk to Disneyland.  Overall, great visit and I would stay there again.
Manager Response: Dear Deborah S,  Thank you for your feedback and for taking the time to write about your experience at the Country Inn & Suites by Carlson. Again, thank you and we look forward to seeing you during your next visit to the Disneyland Resort!

Summary: Staff was friendly and efficient, with quick check in on arrival.  Staff was very helpful with questions about Disneyland and other local attractions.  10-15 min walk to Disney.  Rooms were clean and beds were comfortable.  The complimentary breakfast was basic but general good, but best to get there early to get a good selection.  When our shuttle for our ride to LAX failed to show, staff were quickly able to line us up another ride in short order.  Very happy with our stay and will be staying there again in the future.
Manager Response: Dear jason001115,  Thank you for your feedback and for taking the time to write about your experience. We are delighted to hear you enjoyed your recent stay with us and we look forward to seeing you during your next visit to the Anaheim area!

Summary: This hotel is an awesome place to stay. We are so glad we choose this hotel. The rooms are spacious for families and very clean. The facilities are also great. I really like this hotel and highly recommend this hotel.
Manager Response: Dear alexfk6807PZ,  Thank you for your feedback and for taking the time to write about your experience. We are delighted to hear you enjoyed your recent stay with us here at the Country Inn & Suites by Carlson. Again, thank you for your kind words and we look forward to seeing you during your next visit to the Anaheim area.

Summary: Excellent Hotel! Clean, friendly staff. Pool was excellent, very large and hot tub was nice. Walk to Disneyland, farther away than the older hotels but do able. Breakfast was OK, same each day so a little variety in meat choices would have been nice.  My grandson was wishing they had cheese so he could have made an egg mac-muffin.
Manager Response: Dear Nahocc,  Thank you for taking the time to tell us about your recent stay at the Country Inn & Suites by Carlson.  We will definitely take your comments into consideration.  We appreciate your kind words and look forward to seeing you during your next visit to the Anaheim area.

Summary: This hotel is fairly new so it was very clean and had a comfortable feel to it when you walked in. The staff were very friendly especially the front staff. Breakfast was fulfilling and had a variety. Location was within walking distance to Disney. There's so much I could positively say about our recent stay. I would definitely be back if we went down again.
Manager Response: Dear Jennifer Lee W.,  Thank you for your feedback and for taking the time to write about your experience at the Country Inn & Suites by Carlson. Our goal is to make a home away from home for our guests. We are delighted you enjoyed your time with us and we look forward to seeing you the next time you are in the Anaheim area.

Summary: Perfect distance to the park, new property, on location bar, new pool. Take bus #7 to park and back home from the park - price is $3.00 each way, beats parking at the park, but the walk is quick if your not too tired.
Manager Response: Dear seansQ9870XS,  Thank you for your feedback and for taking the time to write about your experience. Our unique location and proximity to Disneyland definitely has its advantages. Given the recent heatwave the ART shuttle to and from the Disneyland Resort certainly comes in handy. We're glad you enjoyed your time with us and look forward to seeing you during your next visit to the Anaheim area.

Summary: The rooms and hotel was clean. Very close to Disneyland, you could walk or wait for the shuttle. The staff was helpful and friendly. The swimming pool was big and they deliver food to the pool area!!!
Manager Response: Thank you for your feedback and for taking the time to write about your experience. We are delighted to read that you enjoyed our facility and all it has to offer. We appreciate your kind words and hope you stay with us during your next visit to the Anaheim area.

Summary Heading: Great new rooms, free breakfast, and easy access to local transit for Disneyland
Summary: New Hotel .4 miles from Disneyland entrance.  Full breakfast was offered each morning, with a reasonable selection of food choices.  Rooms are in great shape, and the air-conditioning was reliable.  Travel to and from the park is either by foot, or readily available every 20 minutes via ART bus, which picks up and drops off right at the entrance to the Parks And the Hotel, Reasonably priced at $5.50 per rider per day.  Definitely would recommend and stay here again!
Manager Response: Dear Robert S,  Thank you for your feedback and for taking the time to write about your experience.   We're glad to hear you enjoyed your stay with us!   We hope you choose to stay at the Country Inn & Suites by Carlson during your next visit to the Anaheim Area.

Summary Heading: Great stay within walking distance of Disney!
Summary: This was a fantastic hotel stay for our family! New facility, clean and well managed. Employees were friendly and extremely helpful! Pool, free breakfast, restaurant onsite, conplimentary laundry room - all perks that made the stay even better!
Manager Response: Dear Rita G,       Thank you for taking the time to complete a review of your recent stay here at the Country Inn & Suites by Carlson.       We are happy to hear you enjoyed everything our hotel and all it has to offer and we hope we see you during your next visit to the Anaheim area!

Summary: Hotel is clean, nicely decorated, honey,  very welcoming and comfortable. Staff is very nice and accommodating. Great restaurants within walking distance as well as minutes of drive time. Can see Disneyland fireworks from poolside.
Manager Response: Dear ladeelou,      Thank you for taking the time to complete a review of your recent stay at the Country Inn & Suites by Carlson.     Your feedback is much appreciated and we hope you choose to stay with us during your next visit to the Anaheim area.

Summary Heading: Great location and facilities for family Disney trip
Summary: Booked his hotel a few days before we went to Disney for a great price. Extremely close to Disney entrance and nearby shops and restaurants. The pool and hot tub were amazing and we wished we could have used it more. Overall amazing stay and would definitely return again.
Manager Response: Dear Henry N.     Thank you for your kind words and feedback. We're delighted to hear you enjoyed your recent stay at the Country Inn & Suites by Carlson.      We appreciate you taking the time to tell us about your positive experience, and we look forward to your next stay!

Summary: This hotel is very clean, and all of the staff are super friendly. The pool is great, but needs some umbrellas to make it even better.  Breakfast is good, but items can be replenished more  often. Above all like the title says, the staff are wonderful, super helpful and kind. We would come back again.
Manager Response: Thank you for your feedback and for taking the time to write about your experience. The staff of the Country Inn & Suites by Carlson is dedicated to making our guests feel right at home. We are glad you enjoyed your stay with us and we look forward to seeing you during your next visit to the Anaheim area.

Summary: New and very clean. Staff more than hospitable. Excellent full breakfast every morning. Clean pool.  Be aware it is one full mile from the front door of this hotel to the front of Disneyland. Stayed on opposite side from the freeway, so the room was pretty quiet.  Comfy beds, but you might want to bring your own pillow.  Even our 9 year old complained her neck hurt.
Manager Response: Dear nermartin,  Thank you for your feedback and for taking the time to write about your experience. Your comments are important to use and will be used to improve the quality of stay at the Country Inn & Suites by Carlson.  Again, thank you for your kind words and we hope we see you during your next visit to the Anaheim area.

Summary: We would like to extend a sincere thatk You to all of you at this hotel!  Our family enjoyed all the amenities.     We would recommend this to any family looking for pleasant staff and comfort.      Very close to Disney and surprisingly quiet.
Manager Response: Dear bobcB1367YB,  Thank you for taking the time to provide us with feedback regarding your recent stay at the Country Inn & Suites by Carlson. We are delighted you and your family enjoyed your time with us. We pride ourselves on providing friendly service that goes beyond industry standards.  Again, thank you for your feedback and we look forward to seeing you during your next visit to the Anaheim area.

Summary: Worst hotel ever which has not refunded my security deposit for over a month now. I have been making calls at extremely high rates and at odd timings due to the time zone difference in my country. But no action from their side. Extremely disappointed.
Manager Response: Dear Sharmeen S.,  I want to apologize if this situation has caused any hardship. Please contact me directly at the Hotel so we can further discuss this issue. One of my Front Desk Agents are more than able to provide you with my contact information. Once again, I sincerely apologize for any inconvenience this has caused and I hope to hear from you soon.

Summary Heading: Price was not honored what was displayed or told on Expedia
Summary: This hotel will not honor price of Expedia it's total fraud on Expedia just to attract people once you reach there they will tell that was not correct price displayed I was not the only one another family just before had same issue this is complete ripp off!!!
Manager Response: Dear 610faisalz,  I am sorry to learn that you experience with our hotel was not what you expected. Please know that the issues you mentioned will not be overlooked.  Please feel free to contact me if you would like to further discuss these issues.

Summary: My husband and I met my son's family (of 6) in Anaheim, about mid point of our homes.  I picked the Country Inn for a few reasons, it's convenient location to a few amusement parks, its accessibility to freeway, no additional parking or resort fees, the price and breakfast that was included in the price.    From the Front Desk staff to the housekeeping staff, everyone was friendly and accommodating.  Breakfast had some challenges as the staff never knew how many people would come down to eat at any given time.  Staff did their best, friendly and helpful amongst the spills and keeping the breakfast bar stocked.  The pool was kid friendly, not too deep which was great for my grandchildren ages 4 to 11.  For a small fee transportation is provided, Disneyland fireworks were easily
Manager Response: Dear Corinne N.,  Thank you for your feedback and for taking the time to write about your experience. We are delighted to hear you enjoyed your recent stay with us and look forward to seeing you during your next visit to the Anaheim area.

Summary: We liked staying here. The rooms were clean and everyone was very friendly. The food st the bar/restaurant was ok but the service was slow. Breakfast was very good. Pool was large and they have a great hot tub. We would stay here again.
Manager Response: Dear LovesToTravel420,  Thank you for taking the time to provide us with comments regarding your recent stay at the Country Inn & Suites by Carlson. We appreciate as much feedback as possible so we can it to better serve our guests.  Once again, thank you for your comments and we hope you choose the Country Inn & Suites during your next visit to the Anaheim area.

Summary: Very clean rooms, hotel is fairly new. Only complaint I have would be for the price I'd expects a better breakfast. Pretty sure the eggs were powdered eggs, ran out of a few items near the end of breakfast.
Manager Response: Dear F731RTeidir,       We appreciate you taking the time to write a review regarding your recent stay at the Country Inn & Suites Anaheim, and are sad to hear you were unsatisfied with your  breakfast experience.      We take all feedback seriously and use it to enhance our guests' future experience.       Thank you for your patience during your stay.

Summary: Hotel is very modern and clean.  The staff was very courteous and helpful.  Rooms are outstanding and our overall stay was wonderful.  It is conveniently located close to everything especially Disneyland.  Family had a wonderful stay and will strongly consider staying here again.
Manager Response: Dear davidbH7652TW,  Thank you so much for your review and kind words. The Country Inn & Suites Anaheim is thrilled to hear that you truly enjoyed your stay.  We look forward to your next visit!

Summary: Basic stay.  Pool was nice, water temp was perfect.  We were able to see the fireworks from the pool, plenty of towels. Staff very nice, helpful, friendly.  Shuttle cost was ridiculous.  Breakfast was ordinary.
Manager Response: Dear Q28Mrlisav,  Thank you for your comments and for taking the time to write about your experience. We take all our guest feedback into consideration so we can provide service that is above industry standard. Again, thank you for your feedback and we hope you choose to stay at the Country Inn & Suites during your next visit to the Anaheim area.

Summary: We loved our stay here. The location was perfect for Disneyland! The pool was perfect temperature and fun for our 6 year old and 3 year old! Most definitely would stay here again!!  Staff was very friendly! Rooms were very clean!
Manager Response: Dear adamkI9501PO,  Thank you for your feedback in regards to your recent stay at the Country Inn & Suites Anaheim. We are pleased to read that you and your family enjoyed our spacious infinity swimming pool. We look forward to your next stay!

Summary: The hotel was extremely clean, comfortable, and located in a convenient part of Anaheim. The staff are extremely friendly and willing to help as needed.  It's a bonus that continental breakfast is provided. I highly recommend this hotel!
Manager Response: Dear 712jamilas,  Thank you for your feedback and for taking the time to write about your experience. We are delighted to read that you enjoyed your stay at the Country Inn & Suites Anaheim. We look forward to your next stay!

Summary: The hotel was new and beautiful, the price I paid was reasonable. Everything was nice free breakfast, free wifi and parking. The breakfast was decent but it's free so I can't complain. A lot of parking, and fast wifi. All staff was friendly and the room were clean and comfy! I hope the price doesn't go up so I can stay here again !
Manager Response: Dear YN209,  Thank you for your feedback and for taking the time to write about your experience. We are delighted to read that you chose the  Country Inn & Suites Anaheim and enjoyed all it has to offer.  We look forward to your next visit!

Summary: Loved this hotel!  We were so pleased with the breakfast!  There were pancakes, eggs, potatoes and more!  Saved us time and money before starting the day!  The rooms were clean!  The pool was not only new and modern, but we were able to view the Disneyland fireworks and swim at the same time!!  We had a very happy experience here!
