Manager Response: Dear M1556Cjohnh,  Thank you for posting your review. We are happy to hear that you enjoyed your stay at the Country Inn & Suites Anaheim. Our unique location and proximity to Disneyland definitely has its advantages and our breakfast aims to please!   Thank you for taking the time to give us feedback and we hope to see you during your next visit to the Anaheim area.

Summary: The hotel is very nice and nice size pool and jacuzzi.  It is secluded from other hotels, which we like and within 5 minutes of driving distance to Disneyland/California Adventure and other restaurants near Disney.  Access to highway is right there.
Manager Response: Dear dounggiat, Thank you for your feedback and for taking the time to write about your experience. We are delighted to read that you enjoyed our pool and spa.  Thank you for choosing the Country Inn & Suites Anaheim and we look forward to your next stay.

Summary: Staff was very friendly and helpful, especially Liz at the front desk.  She was always willing to go the extra mile to make our stay as good as it was.  The park is close enough to either walk or take an Uber for only $5.  Well worth the money.  Can't wait to go back!
Manager Response: Dear Toby H,  Thank you so much for your review! We are happy to hear that the Country Inn & Suites location was perfect for you. We will share your kind words with Liz.   We look forward to seeing you during your next visit to the Anaheim area!

Summary: Spacious rooms, very clean, with new furnishings. The staff was courteous and friendly. I booked the room on Hotwire with a stated rate, but hidden hotel name. The pool and spa ate wondetful, but the fitness room could use more weights. I would come back again.
Manager Response: Dear ericbh1935ZX,  Thank you for your kind review. The Country Inn & Suites Anaheim is dedicated to providing a level of service that is above industry standards. We are delighted you enjoyed our pool and spa. We appreciate your feedback in regards to our fitness room and will definitely look further into it.  We look forward to seeing you during your next visit to the Anaheim area!

Summary: This exceeded our expectations. The rooms were very big. We joked that we could do cartwheels in it. Breakfast was decent and the seating area was pretty cool and open. Overall, the staff was super nice!
Manager Response: Dear ver0nicalp,    Thank you so much for your review. We are truly happy to hear that you enjoyed your visit to the Country Inn & Suites Anaheim. Our staff strives to make all our guests feel at home.  We look forward to your next visit!

Summary: Great location, about 10 min walking distance to Disneyland and nearby restaurants across the street. Great service and outstanding rooms. Not to forget the pool, was warm and inviting. Definitely would stay here again.
Manager Response: 490marissaj, thank you for your comments and taking the time write a review of our property! We're glad you enjoyed your stay and we hope we see you during your next visit to the Anaheim area.

Summary: We stopped over at Country Inn and Suites after a day in Disneyland. The night staff was super friendly and made sure we had all we needed. Room and clean, which is a big deal for me. Bed was comfortable and we were able to get a good shower after a long hot day. Breakfast the next morning was good, it was very sparse due to the fact of so many people down there eating. Overall great stay!
Manager Response: Thank you for taking time to write a review of the Country Inn & Suites Anaheim. I'm glad you enjoyed your stay with us and I hope you choose our hotel during your next trip to the Disneyland Resort.

Summary: The rooms were nice and clean. Beds were comfy and the staff very friendly! Location was close to everything including the freeways. Overall a great place to stay. Breakfast could be better by having more available.
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing the Country Inn & Suites, Anaheim! We take pride in our hotel and we're glad it shows. I'm delighted you enjoyed your stay with us and I hope we see you during your next visit to the Anaheim area.

Summary Heading: Very Clean, Decent Locaction, Not-So-Good Breakfast
Summary: The room was spacious and clean. Not a lot of storage space. The pool was clean. The breakfast was okay. Didn't have many selections especially on the go food as we walked to Disneyland. The walk was decent. It took about 20 minutes to get to the entrance of Disneyland with a child and through security. Felt safe walking at night back to hotel. Did not use the Art Shuttle as we were told we were the last stop in the area. Walking was quicker.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to provide feedback regarding your recent stay at the Country Inn & Suites by Carlson. We appreciate your comments and will use them to help provide services beyond industry standards. Again, thank you for your feedback and we hope to see you during your next visit to the Anaheim area.

Summary: Great hotel with excellent customer service :) I will make sure to book with this hotel when I visit Anaheim California again. I have also visited their Bloomington Minnesota location near The Mall of America and was just as satisfied.
Manager Response: Dear aydag417,   Thank you for your feedback and for taking the time to write about your experience. We're glad to hear you enjoy staying with the Country Inns & Suites by Carlson! Thank you again for your kind words and we look forward to seeing you during your next visit to the Anaheim area.

Summary: It was our first stay at a hotel by Carlson.  This was a new property and in great condition.  I have nothing negative to say about our stay.  Would definitely stay again and look forward to looking for other properties by Carlson in the future.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to write about your recent stay at the Country Inn & Suites by Carlson! We are thrilled to hear that you truly enjoyed your stay. We pride ourselves on providing a home away from home for all our guests. Again, thank you for your feedback and kind words.

Summary: I totally recommend this hotel close to Disneyland.  Brand new hotel and everything is fresh. Staff was friendly and helpful.  The pool is sparkling clean. Free breakfast to start your day. I've stayed at many places close to Disneyland and by far this was the nicest. This hotel was a win for me.
Manager Response: Dear wendybA1248PX,  Thank you for your feedback and for taking the time to write about your experience. The Country Inn & Suites by Carlson is dedicated to providing a level of service that is above industry standards. Once again, thank you for your kind words and we look forward to seeing you during your next visit to the Anaheim area.

Summary: We stayed one night. Walking distance to Disney and from our window we could see the nightly fireworks which were fabulous. Very roomy accommodations . We had 2 queen beds plus a desk and lounging chair plus refridgerator and microwave. Breakfast and parking free. We actually had a 4 hour late checkout which was 50.00 but was well worth the money.
Manager Response: Dear Ceryl S,  Thank you for your review! We are happy to hear that you enjoyed your stay with us and we look forward to your next visit.

Summary: My family and I enjoyed the hotel. It exceeded our expectations. Very friendly for my 2 year old son. Bus passes where offered for a small fee that was less than the parking for Disneyland. It was great to use. The entire process was so smooth. I will come back again. I will recommend for families with small children.
Manager Response: Dear johnrG5737KI,  Thank you for posting your review. We are happy to hear that you enjoyed your stay at the Country Inn & Suites by Carlson.  We pride ourselves on providing a home away from home for our guests and we are glad it shows. Again, thank you for your feedback and we hope to see you during your next visit to the Anaheim area.

Summary: My husband and I were looking for a hotel close to Disneyland where we could crash one night and hit the park after his conference in that area without spending an arm and leg. This place is new and clean and great! It is a little farther walk than I wanted but you could take a bus that runs right in front or they will shuttle you for 10. We had a king room with a couch and tv in a separate area. The room also had a microwave, coffee maker, and a frig. The staff could not have been any more accommodating or nice! Check in was quick and easy. The breakfast was real hot food and very good.
Manager Response: Thank your for taking the time to write a review of your recent stay at the Country Inn & Suites, Anaheim! It's great to hear you had an excellent stay and enjoyed all we have to offer seeing as how we take pride in our customer service and amenities. Once again, thank you, and we hope to see you during your next visit to the Anaheim area.

Summary: Stayed 7 nights June 3-10. I chose this hotel carefully. It was our 1st trip back to Disneyland in 10 years. I wanted it to be special. This hotel has many 5 star reviews and is new. People are blindsided by the newness and beautiful big rooms but what is lacking is customer service. From check in, after driving 7 hours in traffic from the Bay Area, they asked for my credit card for the entire stay for the week plus a deposit which exceeded my daily limit. With a line behind me, the clerk loudly declared my card was declined (because I have a daily limit for security purposes) and I was surprised they we're charging me as if I had stayed there at check in! I had to call my bank and clear the charge which was held the entire week. I told her flat out she was rude and embarrassed
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to post a review regarding your stay with us. I truly do apologize if you experience was not a positive one.     If you would like to further discuss your stay with us please feel free to contact me. Again, thank you for your feedback and I hope to hear from you soon.

Summary Heading: Be aware of the $20 a night resort fee!!!
Summary: Was not aware of the resort fee when I booked and when I got there I was basically told it's not their problem!! I booked through Hotwire and didn't know what the hotel was until it told me upon payment. Hotel is nice and new which was nice.
Manager Response: Dear meshaw2017,       Thank you for your review. We're glad to hear your enjoyed our brand new facility, however we are saddened to hear you weren't notified of our resort fee prior to your stay with us.        We are currently working hand in hand with all our third party booking sites to select a better placement for all information regarding our resort fee.        Again, your feedback is appreciated and please feel free to contact me at any time.

Summary Heading: Nice, but not worth the hassle!
Summary: The hotel is pretty new, so its in good shape. However, while there they closed off most of the parking leaving not enough spaces for the number of guests. It was nearly impossible to get in or out as guestss would "park" in the lanes out of lack of anywhere else to go. The front entrance/exit was closed off and we had to walk through the pool and bar to come and go. The breakfast didnt open on time making us late. The computers didn't work, so even though there is a gift shop i couldnt buy hairspray because no computer. Couldnt check out because computers were down and the water was off most of a day. Then they have the nerve to charge a $17 resort fee for all of the things that are not working!  A LOT of inconvenience
Manager Response: Dear Shannon M.,  Thank you for posting your review. We work hard on providing the best guest experience possible, we apologize with was not the case during your visit with us.   We appreciate all feedback, including negative, as it give us a chance to enhance our guest's experiences.   Please feel free to contact me and again thank your for taking the time to give us feedback.

Summary Heading: Resort fees for a not so resort-like stay.
Summary: I want to preface this review with our prior experience staying at Country Inn & Suites Anaheim in January 2017. During our trip in January 2017, after an exhausting day of walking around Disneyland/DCA (and making the walk back to the Country Inn and Suites Anaheim) we fell asleep, just to be woken up an hour later from the fire alarm. Startled, we hurriedly dressed to exit the hotel, however, my husband opened the room door and saw that the fire sprinklers were spraying out all over the hallway and especially right outside our door. There was water pooling outside our door and we had to run through it and the sprinklers to exit the building. After about an hour outside in the cold, we were allowed to return to the hotel lobby and that's when hotel management offered to change
Manager Response: Dear Itzia R,  I apologize that your experience with the Country Inn & Suites Anaheim was not a positive one. We take all feedback very seriously and use it to fix any areas in need of improvement.   Please feel free to contact me at your convenience and hopefully you'll give us another chance to make it right.

Summary: Stayed here for Disney trip. Hotel was very clean, rooms were big and comfy. The pool was very clean and big, plus the hot tub was a good way to relax after long day.  Staff was super friendly & free breakfast
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to write your review.  We appreciate your feedback and are thrilled to read you enjoyed your stay.

Summary: Country Inn & Suites surpassed my expectations. I think this is the first time I have NOTHING to complain about!! The value of the rooms were very fair, the breakfast was great, it's close to Disneyland (5 minute drive!), and the hotel has a very eco-friendly vibe (which is very hard to find in chain hotels). I would 10/10 recommend staying here!
Manager Response: WOW!! Thank you for the wonderful review.  We appreciate all feedback, especially this kind!!  Hope to see you on your return to visit to Anaheim!

Summary: Great hotel choice.  Walking distance to Disneyland.  Free breakfast that was awesome.  All staff was very helpful--very willing to extend great hospitality.  Loved the heated pool and hot tub!  Housekeeping kept everything very tidy!
Manager Response: I will make sure to let our staff know you and your family had a great experience!  Thank you for such a wonderful review.

Summary: The hotel was clean and in a safe location, only 10 minutes walking to Disneyland and the staff was great too. Breakfast was pretty good and the pool are is super nice! Definitely recommend staying here.
Manager Response: Thank you very much for the wonderful review.  We welcome and appreciate any and all feedback.

Summary Heading: Clean, comfortable hotel close to Disney
Summary: Huge room for my husband and I.  Lots of space and very clean.  Bathroom door was sliding and did not lock which was a bit weird.  Walking distance to Disney-no need to drive if you rented a car.  Beware that the self-parking advertised as free is not really free.  There's a resort fee per day that includes parking which we didn't realize until after we made the reservation.  Otherwise, great hotel.  Complimentary breakfast every day was hot and replenished as needed.
Manager Response: Thank you for your feedback.  I apologize the additional resort fee was not made clearer while booking your reservation.  We are delighted to read you and your family enjoyed your stay.

Summary: You cannot beat this hotel when it comes to quality vs. cost. I would highly recommend CIS Anaheim for anyone vacationing in Orange County, specifically Disneyland. It is only about a 10 minute walk from the park entrance and close to a number of restaurants.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to write your review! We appreciate your wonderful feedback.

Summary: This hotel is awesome and so are the staff.  We have stayed here before and really enjoy our time at this hotel. The hotel is very neat and clean and everyone is very friendly and helpful. We are planning another trip for September and we will be staying at this location again.
Manager Response: Thank you for the wonderful review!!  We look forward to seeing you and your family in September!

Summary Heading: Clean, New, Great Location & Better Pool
Summary: The hotel is new.  It is clean.  The staff is super accomdating and friendly.  The location is great.   A 10 minute walk to Disneyland or a city bus stop right out front of the hotel.  The pool is beautiful.  It was heated and warm.  The pool area was super clean.  The free breakfast was perfect for a quick bite and great for my family and my young kids.
Manager Response: Thank you for the wonderful review.  We really appreciate your feedback and comments.

Summary: Hotel is clean, walk to Disneyland but off main hotel area. No traffic to contend with. Rooms clean, beds comfortable, great free breakfast, wife and kids loved it here,pool and jacuzzi  open late is great for after a long day at Disney. Free laundry was neat find.
Manager Response: Glad you were able to take advantage of all of our great amenities.

Summary: Easy to get in and out of this hotel.  Staff was extremely helpful.  It was easy to buy tickets to Disney through the hotel.  Rooms were clean and comfortable.  Pool was a hit with the kids.  The laundry facilities downstairs were an added bonus too!
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing such a wonderful review.

Summary: Very clean, modern, comfortable, I would definitely recommend to anyone staying in the area. Parking was close and easy, staff very friendly and helpful. Bathroom was large with nice up to date shower and room was eco friendly to save energy. Lobby was beautiful with inviting fireplace and seating area. Not a great view from room but I was not there for the view.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to write your review. We appreciate all feedback and happy to read you enjoyed your stay.

Summary: These people are liars and charge you extra fees! And then charge you duplicate fees! And they will not return your money and if they do it takes 14 days!!! And they are liars! Never ever stay here!!!
Manager Response: Thank you for making us aware of your concerns. Please reach out to the hotel directly to research the incorrect charges. We are happy to help.

Summary Heading: Great Place to Stay - Walk to Disneyland.
Summary: I booked this place for our 3 day trip to Disneyland after reading positive reviews and it does not disappoint.    I requested, at booking, to have a room 3rd floor or higher facing the park so we could see the fireworks. Got it!   Love!  First night we rolled in at 8pm, got settled and then saw the fireworks show!    Our room was Huge!  I image that they must typically roll in extra beds for families with kids because there was room for a sofa and chairs, but none in there...   the room also had a refrigerator and microwave. The closet was small. The bathroom was well lit and clean.   We overlooked the pool and it was modern and nice, but we didn't go in.   Hot cooked buffet breakfast was included in the price.  Great way to start the day.  There were two different sitting
Manager Response: Thank you for such a great review!

Summary: Can't say enough about our stay at Country Inn & Suites! New Hotel with Great Staff and Services. Very Modern Design which includes lot of free amenities! Cost was even more surprising...saved couple hundred staying there! It's High end Hotel with Great Service and Prices! I enjoyed my stay and would recommend it to everyone staying near Disneyland! Aloha
Manager Response: Thank you for such a great review!

Summary: Very friendly staff, amazing pool and jacuzzi, room was perfect and spacious. Also, the hotel is a 3 minute walk from an outdoor shopping mall that includes a bowling alley, nightlife, and restaurants. The complimentary breakfast in the morning was delicious. No complaints for the price we paid!
Manager Response: Thank you for the wonderful review!

Summary: Everyone at the desk was helpful. As soon as I got there, I was helped. I wish I could remember the names of the people that were really kind, but it was on the 29th of May at around 9pm when I checked in. The man at the desk explained everything in the hotel, such as hours of the restaurant, bar, pool, gym, etc. The bar was also very welcoming. The same day at around 10pm I went to the bar and ordered the Nachos, as well as some potato wedges for my girlfriend, and they were both very delicious. The bar tender was also very kind and nice.  The next day I ordered some Trash bags and a blanket to my room, and either the maintenance guy or the housekeeping guy brought it up. He was kind as well, and he even made sure to ask if it was what I needed, if not he would go get another
Manager Response: We are pleased to read you had an enjoyable stay.  Thank you for taking the time to write your review!

Summary: Hotel is practically brand new, so very clean and modern. Short walk to the park entrance. Very nice pool and hot tub area. The lounge is set up well to get together with friends to review the day and plan the next.
Manager Response: Thank you for the wonderful review!

Summary Heading: Blown away at how wonderful everything was
Summary: Hotel is recently new. Close enough to walk to DL if you wish. The value is very high, considering that not only a full breakfast is included (and a great one), but an early evening light meal is provided most days as well.  The bed was comfy, the room was quiet, and there was plenty of space to move around. The sink is inside the bathroom, which always gets a ding in my book. When a room is shared between 4 people, having a vanity sink outside the bathroom is a huge plus. It's hard to share one toilet and one shower/bath and have the sink/mirror out of commission if one of those facilities are being used.  Overall, I strongly recommend this property for a Disney family.
Manager Response: Thank you for your feedback. We appreciate you taking the time to write your review.

Summary: this is an awesome hotel,it is very very clean ,spacious and close to Disneyland....parking is also free. the breakfast was great ....it is close to some great eating places and to target  you can see the fireworks display but it is not noisy
Manager Response: Thank you for the nice review!

Summary: Very nice, clean hotel. People were very friendly, nice pool, it just needed some umbrellas for shade. Breakfast wasn't anything special but other then those 2 complaints, it was a great experience! I would stay there again. Walking distance to lots of things
Manager Response: Thank you for your feedback

Summary Heading: New, Clean, Close Enough to Walk, Great Breakfast
Summary: We stayed here for 3 days and really enjoyed the size of the studio suite which included 1 king bed and a pull-out sofa in a separate area.  The hotel staff made out stay very nice...everyone is courteous, helpful and they make it a point to go above and beyond.  Check in went very fast.  Our room, keys, and paperwork were ready before we even walked in the front door (we had requested early check-in).  Our original room faced the freeway and seemed a little loud for us country folks and the staff promptly found a quieter room for us (the studio suite was much quieter).  Breakfast was amazing and in all three days the food was well stocked.  We also ordered from the bar menu the last night of our stay and the food there was amazing as well.  We will be staying here whenever we
Manager Response: We are delighted your stay was exceptional! Thank you for the wonderful review.

Summary: The place was very nice.  Very close to many restaurants and Disneyland.  Everything was withing walking distance or a shuttle came to the parking lot to take you to the Happiest Place on Earth.  Would Highly recommend
Manager Response: Thank you for the recommendation!

Summary Heading: Great if you're going to Disneyland
Summary: We walked to Disneyland from the hotel- it's about 15 minutes.  You can't beat it as the parking at the hotel is free for guests.   It's a very clean beautiful hotel with a nice pool.  The rooms are like suites practically.  I would highly recommend it.
Manager Response: Thank you for the great review!

Summary: Everything is excellent except the incidentals charge which I have complained about for many of the Disney area hotels! This hotel does not charge for parking most do. But add the $100 to the "resort fees" and then the high tax and you end up with over $150 less in your pocket to spend at the Magic Kingdom!
Manager Response: Thank you for your feedback and understanding. We are happy to read you enjoyed your stay.

Summary: walking distance to Disneyland, 4ft swimming pool best for my 6 and 3 yr olds. complimentary breakfast makes it easy! room was clean! staffs was very nice and helpful.  love this place, would definitely come back!
Manager Response: Thank you for the wonderful review!

Summary: Found this hotel as a nicer looking hotel with convenient access to Disneyland resort. It was only about a 10 min walk. Rooms were nice but you could hear the freeway all night and breakfast needed to be restocked a little better. All in all it was a good room for the price and amenities that you could expect for a site so close to the park.
Manager Response: Thank you for your feed back. We are happy to read you enjoyed your stay.

Summary: Nice clean hotel walking distance to Disneyland and gradenwalk shopping / restaurants. If you want a romantic stay this is not for you. There was so many kids I thought it was a "kids stay free" hotel!!! Pool is nice / hot tub. Another down fall for me besides the daycare atmosphere was the Bar didn't open until 4 pm!!!
Manager Response: We are happy to read you chose our hotel for a romantic getaway.  However, with Disney we do have a lot of young guests.  We are happy to read you enjoyed your stay.  Thank you!

Summary Heading: Excellent for Disneyland trip with kids
Summary: Great location, literally a 10 min walk to Disneyland (with 4 year old) and many restaurants closeby (across the street) if required. New hotel, large rooms, very clean.  Staff very friendly and helpful. Great for families with good sized pool, a delicious well priced casual bar/pool menu and even free laundry facilities. Breakfast ok - didn't like plastic plates and cutlery and choice quite limited although I think this is reflective of Hotels in the US generally but this is only a minor comment for an otherwise great stay. Would highly recommend
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to write your review.  We are working on stopping the use  of the disposable flatware as soon as possible.  Thank you for your understanding and so happy to read you enjoyed your stay.

Summary: Would def stay here again.  All super clean, amazing staff, fantastic pool, perfect location. Cons- breakfast was usually empty well before 9:30am and close to a fire station (in case you are a light sleeper).  We loved it.
Manager Response: Thank you for your wonderful review!

Summary Heading: Well priced, nice hotel with perks
Summary: Overall this was a very nice hotel for the price.  The check-in staff was very friendly and good at their jobs (read: speedy and efficient).    The room we stayed in was a King Suite. Upon entering the room, there is a small living area with a sofa/bed, chair, coffee/end table, and desk.  With all of this furniture, it felt a little cramped in the living area, but not unbearable.  There is a small hallway type area that contains a cabinet with the mini fridge, microwave, and coffee maker (all very useful!), and entrance to the bathroom.  The bathroom was immaculate (which I would expect for a hotel that is only 5 months old), and well laid out.  Water pressure in the shower was perfect.  The only things I noticed that could pose a problem in the future (but are not currently
Manager Response: Thank you so very taking the time to write such a wonderful review.  All feed back, positive as well as negative, allows us fine tune our operations and facilitate a legendary stay!

Summary: Less than a mile walk to Disneyland and California amusement parks.  Clean and beautiful hotel.  Great pool and hot tub.  Lots of different options with the complimentary breakfast.  Right off the 5 freeway.  Easy to get to.  Close to lots of other fun things.  Large and spacious rooms!
Manager Response: Thank you for your wonderful review!

Summary Heading: Perfect Location to Walk to Disneyland
Summary: Would definitely recommend. Brand new hotel with great amenities.  Price is very good for everything you get.  I will say the $20/day "resort fee" is interesting.  I guess since you get free parking and free breakfast that all makes up for it.  This location is so perfect if going to Disneyland.  Its about a 10-12 minute walk to the main gates.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to review our hotel!  We are pleased to read your family enjoyed their stay.

Summary: This Hotel was extremely nice, very clean. Hotel employees very pleasant, and helpful. Breakfast had several choices and options. Free cookies at desk , which Grandkids really enjoyed. Swimming pool and hot tub was nice to use after coming back from a long day. We really enjoyed being able to watch the fireworks at Disneyland from our room. We really enjoyed our stay at this Hotel.
Manager Response: Thank you for such a wonderful review!

Summary: We enjoyed our stay here. The staff was very friendly and tried to always have fresh cookies waiting after along day out! The swimming pool was so nice and big. Very relaxing place to stay. Clean and nice size rooms. They had a small store where you could buy snacks or something to drink. The breakfast was good and set up nice. Would recommend to family for sure the Disney bus stops in front does cost but if you don't want to pay very short walk to the parks. Enjoyed our stay for sure.
Manager Response: We are so pleased to read you enjoyed your stay.  Thank you for taking time to write your review.

Summary Heading: Thumbs Down on Undisclosed Resort Fees
Summary: PRO:  Friendly, efficient staff, Very clean hotel and rooms; good breakfast; beautiful pool and spa; about a 20 minute walk to Disneyland entrance. CON:  Big surprise on the added RESORT FEES $17 per night per room on top of usual bed tax, etc.  Not disclosed when booked rooms. Nice amenities in rooms, but what was missing was a room phone to call front desk, towel bars in bathroom and a fan in the bathroom.  Note: you can buy bus passes at front desk and bus comes about every 20 minutes or so.  Depending on number of people in your party, Uber may be cheaper.
Manager Response: I understand your frustration.  Our resort fee is listed on all third party websites. I have address the placement specifically to ensure the fee is listed at all aspects of the booking process. Thank you for your understanding and for taking the time to write your review.

Summary: Such a great hotel! Has such a great home/comfy vibe! Friendly staff and very clean large rooms! Walking distance to Disneyland and complimentary breakfast. Great pool! Great bar. Great price! Military friendly!!
Manager Response: We are thrilled to see you enjoyed your stay!  Thank you for the wonderful review.

Summary: I stayed for the Tinkerbell Half Marathon weekend. I was worried the hotel might be too far from Disneyland, it's a good long walk, but easily doable. The time in the hotel was excellent, all amenities are brand new, clean and stylish. The staff was very helpful in providing directions to The Resort, and there is a shuttle that takes you to the Disneyland main entrance every 30 minutes all day long. Overall, great place and would love to stay here again sometime.
Manager Response: Thank you for the wonderful review!  We hope to see you at the next marathon.

Summary: PREFACE: The one star is for their undisclosed "RESORT FEE" policy. We booked our 2 night stay through Hotwire and thought we had found a good rate with "free internet, parking and breakfast." BEWARE that they will charge you an extra fee ($20.22/night in our case) per night on your credit card deposit. We have NEVER had this issue with a hotwire booking in the past.  When checking in, Country Inn asked for a credit card deposit, which is customary for other hotels where we've stayed. I asked for clarification that if we didn't order room service or other resort services that this would be reimbursed to our card and was told that the card would be reimbursed. Upon Checking out by phone, I again asked if my credit card would be refunded, and was told there was a resort fee (of
Manager Response: I apologize for the misinterpretation of our resort fees.  Our resort fee is listed on all third party websites.  I have address the placement specifically with hotwire to ensure the fee is listed at all aspects of the booking process.  Thank you for your understanding.

Summary: Extremely clean hotel! They greeted us immediately as we walked in, along with making sure we received the best room possible(view of Disneyland, our request). Unfortunately we weren't able to make time for breakfast but I'm sure that was amazing.
Manager Response: We are very pleased you enjoyed your stay.  Hope to see you soon!

Summary Heading: Hotel would be rated 5/5, but additional fees added an entire night's worth of cost to trip at checkout.
Summary: I am going to start with the bad. We booked through a third party site, so I understand why the hotel would add this fee, to avoid giving more money to those sites; however, upon checkout we were given a bill for an additional 21 USD per night (taxes incl) which added almost an entire day's worth of cost to our trip. We had a great experience during this trip at this hotel so this very much left a sour taste in my mouth.  Location The location of the hotel would be within walking distance of the Disneyland Resort; however, after walking around the park all day who really wants to do that. There is a shuttle bus across the street that goes to the park and an Uber/Lyft ride was around 7 USD to the park. The Lyft from John Wayne Airport was around 25 USD.  Hotel Room We were
Manager Response: Thank you very much for writing such a wonderful review.  We really appreciate the feedback.  Even though the resort fee is listed on our third party websites, I have reached out to see if there is a way better display the additional fees.

Summary: The hotel is in a perfect location if you are looking to visit Disneyland!  The hotel is brand new and just far enough away from Harbor that you aren't bothered by all the noise and traffic that goes along with Disneyland.  The hotel is clean, modern, and your stay includes free internet, gym access, internet, breakfast, and parking.  You really can't beat this place for the price.  The staff was super friendly and we absolutely loved everything about our stay here!
Manager Response: Thank you very much for the wonderful review!

Summary: This hotel is brand new and totally has the "new" feel. The entire hotel was spotless. Our room was in perfect shape and the shower/bathroom was our favorite part! It is also just a short walk to disneyland (with FREE parking). The bartender didnt know how to make a bloody mary so that is my ONLY negative thing to say about it. He was such a good sport and let me show him how to do it though. GREAT hotel and GREAT price! We will be back!
Manager Response: You're Hired!  Thank you very much for the wonderful review.  I will make sure to follow up with our bartenders.

Summary: Loved that this facility was so clean and accommodating. Staff was really great and the breakfast was good with a nice variety. Location was great and close to local attractions. Parking was good. Easy to find right off of the freeway.
Manager Response: So happy to read you enjoyed your stay!! Hope to see you and your family again in the future.

Summary: We stayed at this hotel - excellent. Breakfast was good, pool area and the staff were very friendly. Not that far to walk to Honda Centre, if you want exercise & close 2 Disneyland. 2 thumbs up!  Would stay again
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing your experience!  Go Ducks!

Summary Heading: Family Oriented: Close to Disneyland with shuttle to Disneyland
Summary: We booked 3 rooms for our famlies totaling 9 people. Hotel was very accommodiating and clean. NIce staff. We took the shuttle(fee) to Disneyland but also walked sometimes which was faster than the shuttle as it makes various pick-ups.  We were able to come back to hotel in afternoon to rest and kids went swimming. Then returned in the evening for the parade and fireworks. Nice breakfast buffet which was free. We would definitely stay here again.
Manager Response: Its great to hear that your family had a wonderful time!  Thank you,

Summary Heading: Good Location, but new hotel staff needs work
Summary: The hotel is new and clean and was as expected on arrival. The staff lacks some simple customer service skill. The breakfast free if they have enough food to supply the amount of people booked at the time of your staff. We happened to be staying when it apparently was very busy and they did not have enough food and we ended up going out for breakfast. The rooms are large with lots of empty space. No table should you want to sit and eat in your room. Walking distance to park and Downtown Disney, don't bother paying for the bus your walk 5 minutes away.
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing your experience, we apologize for the issue you encountered during the breakfast meal period. We are pleased that your overall experience was very favorable, we hope you return very soon.

Summary Heading: Recent Stay with Country Inns & Suites
Summary: Newer Inn & Suites in the area. Very nice accommodations and close to near by attractions and shopping.  The staff was professional and very polite. Short walk to Disneyland and a little of the beaten path.  The breakfast was great, pool is awesome, has a kitchen to order food and a bar which I was unable to use on this trip.
Manager Response: We truly hope you have the opportunity to return soon!

Summary: Amazing service and walking distance to Disneyland! Staff was amazing and pool and bar legit! There is a driver always on call near the hotel and is very reasonable. Food wasn't the greatest but when its included how can you complain. Energy efficient rooms and nice televisions.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to share your experience, we truly appreciate it!

Summary: We only stayed one night but we'll be back. New and clean. The shower was probably the best hotel shower I've ever had. The hotel workers we all nice and helpful. Breakfast was good. Make your own waffles, muffins, fruit and cereal. My husband liked the parking under the hotel. It is a bit of a walk to the Disneyland Main Entrance but they have the city buses which pick up at the hotel which I'm not a fan of. We tried that at another hotel. The cost is around $200 a night but we got promotion discount.
Manager Response: We are so pleased you enjoyed your vacation, please come back soon!

Summary: Outstanding staff, clean and modern furnishings. Staff went out of their way to help us get some forgotten first aid supplies. Breakfast was fully stocked with protein options and had excellent variety. The pool was amazingly warm which is helpful for families with kids who like to swim at 10pm when done with Disneyland! Hot tub was spacious and close enough to the pool to sit and supervise swimming kids. Distance to the park was borderline too far to walk. Was no big deal in the AM but was a bit of a stretch with an exhausted 8yr old at the end of a 12mile day. Short walking distance to lots of great eating options. Overall great!
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing your wonderful experience!

Summary: We travelled from Sweden and looked for a good hotel near Disneyland. We found this fantasic brand new and very clean hotel with excellent service. Pool-area is fantastic with heathed tub and large heathed swimming pool. Kids loved it. Hotel was only a short stroll from Disneyland.
Manager Response: We hope we have the pleasure of hosting your family again very soon!

Summary: I found Country Inn and Suites a coupke of years ago. So I decided to try this one out. It is wlking distance to the prk entrance. The staff, except for the breakfast workers are kind and helpful. The rooms are very comfortable and roomy. The great price gives you a great breakfast. Hot and cold choices. They charge a resort fee but free parking.
Manager Response: We are so pleased to read about your great experience.  Thank you !

Summary Heading: Great place to stay for a vacation
Summary: I'm from Minnesota and my friends and I came to Anaheim for my birthday. We stayed At this hotel and when we first got there we were already impressed by how this place looked. It's beautiful and very clean. All of the staffs were super nice and helpful. The bartender was super friendly and fun to talk to. The hotel was only a 15 min walk from Disneyland and they have a shuttle bus to Disneyland. This area also have great restaurants nearby. They made my stay here at the Hotel a memorable one. I am definitely coming back and staying at this exact hotel.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to share your experience, we hope to see you in the near future.

Summary: Very nice, new, clean hotel.  Perfect for traveling with children to Disneyland.  Walk or take the shuttle.  Kids LOVED the free breakfast!!  Jr. Suite with a king was plenty of room for a family of 4.  Will definitely stay here again!
Manager Response: We are so pleased to hear that the family enjoyed the vacation!

Summary: We just went to Disney parks and this hotel was SO close and very nice. The transport bus came right up front and the facility was so new and clean. Kids loved the pool and mom loved the bar selection!
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to share some fantastic comments ,please come back soon.

Summary Heading: Great stay at a new hotel in the Disneyland Resort area
Summary: Loved this hotel - we will undoubtedly be staying here again. Breakfast was great, WiFi worked nicely, staff was so helpful and welcoming, room was spacious and clean. The only thing was it was a bit far of a walk after a long day at Disneyland, so we ended up using the Mickey and Friends parking structure which was only a short trip away. Very satisfied.
Manager Response: Thank you for allowing us to host you and your family!

Summary Heading: Updated Rooms, great breakfast, close to Disneyland.
Summary: Close enough to walk to Disneyland (less than 15 minute walk to main gate). Updated, modern rooms with barn-door style bathroom doors. My only complaint is the bathroom; the barn door doesn't lock and there is a shortage of hooks, hangers, or rods for towels. otherwise, the room was very clean. The free breakfast was good and well organized. Enjoyed the pool and hot tub. Very friendly and accommodating staff. Would definitely stay again.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to share a few comments regarding your stay with us, We appreciate the suggestions for improvement in the bathroom area to allow us to better service you.  Thank you,

Summary: Staff was friendly and courteous, our room was a great size though could have used more seating (only one chair), room and common areas very clean, good buffet breakfast provided, very nice pool.  The location was perfect for our Disneyland trip
Manager Response: We appreciate you sharing your experience, we hope we see you again soon.

Summary Heading: NEW and VERY CLEAN, nice staff, perfect walking distance to Disneyland!
Summary: Very clean and new! Staff was very friendly, breakfast was good to fill up before heading to Disneyland, perfect 10 min walk to Disneyland! Loved how clean, fresh, and nice the hotel was! Beds were comfortable, never heard noise outside of the room!
Manager Response: We are so pleased to hear that you had a wonderful stay, Thank You for the honor of hosting your family!

Summary: the hotel's location is ideal. disneyland was short distance away. hotel is very nice and clean.  very nice staff and helpful too.. room was clean and nice size. Our kids loved the breakfast,. we have enjoyed our stay, and will book this hotel again if going for an over night disney trip.
Manager Response: Thank you, we truly hope to see you again soon!

Summary: Rooms were roomy and comfortable. Breakfast was good.  Pool was perfectly heated.  Bar service was great. Distance to Disney wasn't too bad.  Bus service was timely and worked out well for us. The view of Disney's fireworks from the pool area was a nice bonus. Overall, it was a great experience and I will definitely stay here in the future.
Manager Response: We are so pleased your shared your wonderful experience. We look forward to your next visit!

Summary: Pros: self complimentary laundry facility, outdoor pool, complimentary breakfast, close to Disneyland and freeway access, clean rooms/dining/pool, free cookies, free parking, friendly staff.  Cons: they ran out of fruits during breakfast and hot tub was not hot. (Minor issues)   We highly recommend this hotel.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to share your experience, we certainly hope we have the pleasure of you staying with us again.

Summary Heading: The best deal for a nice hotel within walking distance of Disney
Summary: A great new hotel that's only  minutes away from Disney.   This hotel is nicely furnished and well staffed. It's also very clean with a nice restaurant and bar.  The breakfast buffet was a nice bonus, and had a good variety even for the kids.
Manager Response: We appreciate your warm comments !

Summary Heading: Great new hotel with great location
Summary: Easy freeway access. Close to restaurants and Disneyland. Hotel is very new. Complimentary breakfast. Free Wi-Fi. Free parking. Friendly staff. This was a great deal. I would definitely stay here again.
Manager Response: Please stay again soon!

Summary: Extreme clean room (2017 april), close to disneyland and house of blues. Publicerat transport ok, but could be better to LA downtown. Staff extremely friendly and helpful, had a really Great time and enjoyed stan at hotel. Will strongly recomend hotel!!
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing your experience, we sincerely appreciate your comments.

Summary: Spacious rooms! Great pool for kids. Shuttle to Disneyland was awesome (surcharge) Breakfast buffet options were great! (Waffles, cereal, bagels, eggs, hash browns, sausages and fruit)  only downside was my room not getting cleaned on a 2 night stay.
Manager Response: Thank you for the comments, were truly sorry for any miscommunication in regards to the room being serviced.

Summary: We took our kids to Disneyland and this hotel was perfect . The walk was about 15 min to the park. The staff was so great and helpful during our stay . We will definitely stay here again. The pool was awesome
Manager Response: Thank you for allowing us to serve you !

Summary: My husband and I spent three days in this hotel and we were very pleased with everything about it. Very helpful and friendly staff, very clean and a great breakfast.   One of the front desk clerks even cheerfully helped us boost our dead car battery.
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing your great experience!

Summary Heading: Great Place to stay and great staff
Summary: Spent 8 nights here with my family and enjoyed the hotel, staff were very friendly and helpful. Hotel is nice and new so really clean and tidy, the pool was really nice and the gym while small had enough gear for a workout. Beds were super comfortable and the room was of good size for what we needed they give you free freshly made cookies at night which is a nice touch. Cant really fault the place it was great price and comes with free breakfast included  Would easily stay again if back in that part of the world
Manager Response: We sincerely appreciate your comments!

Summary Heading: Can walk to Disney, but too close to freeway.
Summary: The hotel was decent walking distance from Disney with free parking at the hotel. However, the hotel itself abuts the freeway and there is constant traffic noise. The beds were adequately comfortable, but not exceptional. It was difficult to regulate the thermostat. It was either too hot or too cold. When you turned off the heater, the air conditioning turned on automatically.
Manager Response: We sincerely apologize for the ac/heat issues that you encountered during your stay.We sincerely hope that you will allow us to serve you again in the near future.

Summary: Great location, excellent customer service.   Beautiful pool and hot tub to relax after long day at park.  Hot and full breakfast.  Front desk always cheerful and staff  smile and greet all day.  All day coffee helps to keep you up with the kids between breaks when you come and go to the parks.
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing your great experience!

Summary: From right when I walked in to check-in and from when we checked-out everything was excellent. The customer service was kind and helpful, the rooms were comfortable and immaculate, the pool area is beautiful and stays open late, convenient shuttle to and from Disneyland, and delicious complimentary breakfast in the morning.
Manager Response: On behalf of all our staff, Thank you for the great comments!

Summary: We were happy with the property, the location and the amenities were very convenient.  The property is very close to many Anaheim attractions like Garden Walk, Disney, the Convention Center, Angels Stadium, etc.
Manager Response: We truly appreciate your warm comments concerning your experience.

Summary: Good location, clean room, big bathroom and plenty of amenities. Wi-Fi and breakfast included in price. Pool, gift shop, bar and restaurant open late. Family friendly, good parking and friendly staff rounded out a great stay.
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing your experience, we hope you return soon!

Summary: FREEWAY!!!!!!!? There is a busy California freeway next to the hotel, it is quite unpleasant when spending a nice Valentine's day evening with my significant other. It's hard to focus when you hear all of the cars flying by and honking at each other.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to share your experience, I truly apologize for any highway noise issues that you encountered.

Summary: Everything was great about this hotel.  A short walk to Disneyland, a short car trip to shopping outlets, a great pool and spa with beautiful views of the Disneyland fireworks.  Beds were comfortable and we'd love to stay here again.
Manager Response: We hope to see you again soon!

Summary: I had no issues with booking the room a few hours before arrival.  The property is walking distance to the Disney parks.  Complementary breakfast was served and their were waiters to be sure our needs were met.  The room and bathroom were both very spacious.  There was no must or cigarette odor. The linens were fresh and bright.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to share your experience, we truly appreciate it.

Summary: Our family came first day at Disneyland and was thrilled to have a hotel with only a 15 minute walk to the park. Hotel is new so the rooms we're up to date and very clean.  Any stuff we encountered were very polite and helpful. I had read things about problems with the complementary breakfast but we had no issues. Will definitely stay again.
Manager Response: Thank you for your great comments , we truly appreciate you staying with us.

Summary Heading: Hope to return for next trip!
Summary: This was my first time in Anaheim visiting Disneyland and decided to stay here.  My room was a King Suite and was very clean and extremely spacious.  I originally was only booked for 2 nights but decided to extend my trip an extra day since I felt so comfortable here and wanted to stay at Disney an extra day.  Let me say that the staff at the front desk were so nice and helpful!! They made sure that my extension went smooth as someone had already reserved my room but they were so quick to book me in a room just a couple of doors down so I didn't have to drag my luggage to a different floor. I really appreciated their efforts! This hotel is a really quick walk to Disneyland! I will definitely stay here again if I'm back in Anaheim.
Manager Response: We hope you return to see us very soon!

Summary: My fiancé and I visited in march and had an absolutely positive experience at this hotel.  The rooms are clean, and come equipped with mini fridge, and safe.  This is a must stay hotel. The pool and hot tub are relaxing and clean. The staff is awesome as was the breakfast.  I took the recommendations from another reviewer to ask for a room facing Disneyland and did not disappoint.  We were able to see the nighttime fireworks from our room!  This hotel made our experience at Disneyland an awesome one!
Manager Response: It was our pleasure to have you as our guests, please return soon.

Summary: Excellent stay with all amenities included. Highly recommend this hotel to everyone visiting Disneyland. Very good breakfast and  beautiful pool area. Service is excellent. Great hotel for families with young children.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to share such great comments!

Summary: Newer hotel with the friendliest staff. The pool is very large and warm enough for parents to jump right in. The entire property is clean and has just enough amenities to keep the costs down. You can walk 15min to Disney's front gates or take a $5.50 Uber. I know there is a bus that stops there too, but we just took Uber. Breakfast is good, scrambled eggs, waffles, fruit and pastries everyday - potatoes and meats change daily. Only wish the bar opened before 4pm;)
Manager Response: We truly hope you will join us again soon!

Summary: The hotel was comfortable and clean.  minor problem with shower but it was fixed expediently.  The free breakfast was awful.  I would stay here again but would bring my own breakfast or go to a restaurant.
Manager Response: Please accept my sincere apology for any issues that you encountered during the breakfast service, we hope that you join us again soon.

Summary: The staff was super friendly.  It is closer to the freeway and walking distance to everything.  Not too close to the crowds or traffic.  The hotel is clean, our room was all the amenities and complimentary breakfast was delish!
Manager Response: We appreciate your great comments!

Summary: This is my second time staying at a Country Inn & Suites and both times have been great experiences. Extremely comfortable, nice hotel with a lot of features for a good price. Super close to Disneyland.
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing your experience, we truly appreciate you taking the time to share!

Summary: I was quoted $353.68 for a 2-night stay.  When I checked out, I was charged $461.16.  That's right...$107.48 in fees and taxes - for two nights!!  It would have been nice to know about all the hidden costs while I was reserving my hotel!
Manager Response: Thank you for your comments regarding your stay. I truly apologize for any miscommunication regarding the local taxes. We truly attempt to be transparent with any taxes and fees that are controlled by the local Anaheim government.

Summary Heading: Perfect location and room, but worst service and housekeeping
Summary: The location is perfect. Only 15minutes walk to Disney land. Room was big and clean, the bed was comfortable. Wifi was good and fast.   However, the housekeeping was worst. We stayed for 3 nights, and housekeeper just cleanup our room but didn't give us new shampoo and soap, and even didn't refill coffee and sugar. So that we used shampoo by ourselves and didn't have coffee on the last two days.  The breakfast time was too short. The staff closed the door of breakfast at 9:30. We usually took breakfast at 9:00, but many foods were empty and the staff didn't refill. They just told us the breakfast is going to be closed! Wow!  房間很大很舒適，而且因為是新的飯店，所以非常乾淨。地點很好，走路到迪士尼只要15分鐘。網路超快。  但兩個缺點讓我們很不開心。我們住了三個晚上，housekeeping 竟然完全沒有給我們新的洗髮精和香皂，還好我們自己有帶。然後咖啡喝完也沒補，天阿我們一個晚上付了150美金竟然這麼糟糕。
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing your experience, please accept my sincere apology for the housekeeping issues during your stay. We certainly hope you stay with us again in the near future.

Summary: Clean, nice accommodations, hot breakfast included, little gift shop with necessities and Disney gifts, nice pool that stays open late....downfalls, no Disney shuttle, but within walking distance....no room service....no self check out (had to wait in a line)
Manager Response: Thank you for your feedback.  We appreciate your input and will use that to make the hotel experience even better!

Summary: Very pleasant room, nice staff and adequate breakfast. We were on the third floor within walking distance to Disneyland and the Convention Center. We enjoyed it so much that we booked our stay for next year Wonder Com
Manager Response: I am so happy to read you enjoyed your stay AND booked again! Thank you for the wonderful review.

Summary: Nice hotel, newer with friendly staff. Hotel provides breakfast which is a good way to start your day off. Disneyland is walking distance. Very clean and inviting. Hotel has a pool and fitness room. Beds could be more comfortable, too stiff.
Manager Response: Thank you for the wonderful review of our hotel!

Summary Heading: Excellent Family hotel within walking distance to Disney theme parks
Summary: Excellent hotel for the price! Brand new hotel! Book your stay while the prices are reasonable! Nice pool and staff was very kind. Breakfast included with your stay so that helps cut down on costs.  Try it you'll like it!
Manager Response: Thank you for the wonderful review!!

Summary: This hotel is a 15 min walk to Disneyland and also has a public bus you can ride to the Disneyland for 5 bucks all day 2 bucks for kids.  Very Clean rooms and hotel. Free laundry machines which is nice when you have young kids. :)
Manager Response: Thank you for the wonderful review!

Summary Heading: Need to spruce up there breakfast menu and have plenty to go around. As they ran out. Service was great. Cookies were
Summary: Need more trash cans. And breakfast needs to be adjusted. Beds are comfy rooms are clean staff is great. Location to disneyland is just a little walk newer hotel only four months old. You do share a elevation with the hotel staff as they do not have their own.
Manager Response: We are sorry to hear that you were not satisfied with the “Be Our Guest” Breakfast.  We work hard to ensure fresh food is provided and that each item is available for all of our guests. Your review gives us the opportunity to correct any deficiencies we may have in our service. We hope you will give us another chance if you are in the area again.

Summary Heading: Clean and large rooms. Very helpful staff. Great place.
Summary: Amazing place. Staff went out if way to help. Free breakfast is amazing. Staff spent time and helped us look for what we needed. Furthermore they went out of their way to find us milk for our youngest child as there wasn't any in the gift shop.
Manager Response: I am so happy to read you had a wonderful experience.  I will make sure to share this with our staff!

Summary: First room was smoky, food below average. Second room suite was very nice. Nice staff. Potatoes first breakfast were under cooked and soggy every day. My last morning I was locked out of my room was was a hassle since I had the flu. I ordered a Margherita pizza and was told they had no tomatoes so I changed my order to a veggie pizza with extra olives, it came with tomatoes, very confusing. I felt like one of my four night stay should have been comped but nothing was offered.
Manager Response: I am very sorry to read our breakfast and restaurant service was below par.  Thank you for offering your feedback and writing your review.

Summary Heading: Great family stay with heated outdoor pool!
Summary: Heated pool was a hit for us.  We watched the Disneyland fireworks from pool one night.  Great location to Disney area and restaurants.  Service, staff, room etc were all great.  Value was very good overall.  Parking and breakfast included in resort fee were good.  Breakfast was ok but better than others we've experienced.   We would definitely recommend this hotel and will be back!
Manager Response: Thank you for the wonderful review!

Summary: This is a new hotel and overall our stay was great. The staff are helpful and friendly. It is a short walk to Disneyland and all the other attractions in the area. I will be staying here again in the future. I stayed for free by using my club Carlson points.
Manager Response: So happy to read you enjoyed your stay! We welcome all of our Club Carlson Members.

Summary: Enjoyed staying at the Country inn for two nights. Nice, new and clean. Rooms are great. The large heated pool was  nice surprise. Within walking distance to Disneyland and California Adventure (15 mins). Would definitely stay again!
Manager Response: Thank you for the wonderful review.  Look forward to seeing you back at our hotel!

Summary: Thoroughly enjoyed our stay at this new hotel!  20 min walk to Disney and 5 min walk to the Garden Walk for shops and dining.  A lovely new hotel with a very warm and welcoming environment and staff!  Could see some of the fireworks from Disney!  Great breakfast and the afternoon cookie is a sweet touch!  Excellent staff!!  The heated pool was beautiful and lots of room for all to enjoy!
Manager Response: So wonderful to read you had a great experience!

Summary: Stayed for one night before our Disney visit. Super close and convenient to walk to the park. Great food in the restaurant. Wonderfully helpful staff. Great pool and hot tub. New and clean rooms. Overall great stay.
Manager Response: We are very pleased to read you had a great stay!

Summary Heading: Nice new hotel walking distance to disney
Summary: The hotel is clean and very new still. The breakfast items were always fresh and ready for us to enjoy. Only down I found was the door to the bathroom is a slider with no lock and sometimes the highway noise since our room was on the backside of the hotel.
Manager Response: Thank you so very much for your input.  We have since purchased ear plugs to help our light sleepers.  Thank you for writing your review!

Summary: Great new hotel within walking distance to Disneyland.  The rooms were immaculate and the beds were very comfortable.  An extra bonus was the complimentary breakfast which included all the basic breakfast foods such as waffles, eggs, bacon, sausage, fruit, and yogurt. The front staff was very helpful and friendly as well! I would definitely return to this hotel the next time I visit Disneyland.
Manager Response: Thank you for your wonderful review.  Hope to see you soon!

Summary: The overall location to the park, friendliness of the staff, cleanliness of the room and warmth of the pool made for a great time at Disney!! 5 stars for sure!! You can take a quick bus ride to the parks or Uber for under $6, but it's also a quick 15 minute walk if your feet can handle it after walking or standing in lines all day.
Manager Response: We are very pleased to read you had a great experience at our hotel! We look forward to seeing you in the future.

Summary: Walking distance to Disney.   Great Breakfast, make your own waffles, fresh fruit.    Heated outdoor pool bathrooms outside in pool area.  No problems with anything!!  Can't wait to return. Coffee available in lobby 24/7.
Manager Response: Thank you for the wonderful review.  Can't wait to have you return!

Summary: Very nice, new hotel. Loved the breakfast and rooms. Free parking!  Free Wifi!  Free breakfast! I would definitely stay here again! Very Happy with the whole experience. I will look for more of these hotels when I travel!
Manager Response: Country Inns and Suites are a MUST!  We are so very happy to read you enjoyed your stay.

Summary: We booked this hotel for our recent Disney trip, it was clean and modern and conveniently located to the parks. The complimentary breakfast is pretty standard/ordinary but a nice option if you don't want to pay for an expensive breakfast at the parks.
Manager Response: Thank you for the nice review! Hope to see you when you return to the area.

Summary: We enjoyed our stay, the room was very clean, the personnel was very friendly , beautiful lobby , family friendly and the breakfast was very delicious and well clean food area. Walking distance from Disneyland or the bus shuttles. The only problem we had was looking for a parking spot. Overall we enjoyed our night stay.
Manager Response: Thank you for the wonderful review! We are very happy to read you enjoyed your stay.

Summary: I love this hotel its brand new the location is great, me and my husband stayed here on our last night of our honey moon and we loved it here the staff was very friendly and welcoming, loved the pool and the area, this will be my first choice of hotel when we come back,
Manager Response: Thank you for spending such an important date with us!  Can't wait for your return visit.

Summary: We stayed for three nights for a quick Disney trip. The location is great as it is totally walkable to the parks but not too close where you encounter road traffic from the park. The hotel is extremely new and the rooms were nicely appointed. Staff were  extremely friendly and accommodating throughout our stay. The daily resort fee is reasonable for the availability of parking and reliable internet. Cable TV was also a nice feature. We did not take advantage of the breakfast but it is nice that the hotel offers it.   Despite being new, the bed and pillows are not that comfortable. The pillows are hollow and the bed coils can be felt through the sheets. Also, road noise and noise from guests footsteps above are an issue so bring earplugs if you are a light sleeper. We did not
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to write your review!  I am happy to read you had an enjoyable stay.

Summary: We drove about two hours to get to the hotel and when we first got there we were blown away by how beautiful the hotel was. The lady that checked us in was wonderful!! I booked this room with points so it was a very pleasant surprise that the hotel itself was a good value for how many points I needed to spend. I booked a King Suite and the room was wonderful! Very large and comfy.  I really wish I could have given this hotel all 5 of the stars but as the night carried on the stay started to decline. After having dinner in downtown disney we came back to the hotel to sit in the hot tub with some drinks. One of the guests sitting in the hot tub with us accidentally hit the emergency alarm by the hot tub. We all sat in waited in the hot tub for quite some time before realizing that
Manager Response: We apologize for the disappointing service you received from our staff. Our team works hard to make sure our guests are comfortable and receiving our best service. I will make sure to use this as a training to tool. We appreciate you bringing this matter to our attention, and hope for another opportunity to exceed your expectations in the future.

Summary: This place is a gem.  It has everything my family wants.  Perfect location.  Modern decor.  Great pool and bar.  Clean and spacious rooms.  Professional staff.  Valet parking.  Great view of the fireworks.  Close to Disneyland.  We will return again and again.
Manager Response: Sooo happy to read you enjoyed your stay! Look forward to you returning.

Summary: This new(er) hotel is an easy walk to the park; hotel door to Disneyland entrance is a 10 minute walk.  The hotel and rooms are clean.  The king suite was spacious and the pull out sofa was fantastic for our daughter.  There's a small microwave and fridge.  And, the hotel breakfast was good- eggs, breakfast meat, waffles/french toast, etc.  They have a heated pool- wish we had remembered our swimsuits.  Overall, very pleased.  We'll be staying here again at our next trip.
Manager Response: Thank you for the wonderful review!!

Summary: Beautiful, brand new hotel. Nice amenities. Great breakfast, beautiful heated pool. Very family-friendly and walking distance to Disney resorts. Staff was friendly and helpful. Rooms were good sized and our family of four was very comfortable. Would definitely stay again!
Manager Response: Thank you for the wonderful review!

Summary: LOVE the location just far enough away from Disney traffic . We didn't go to Disney but saw a lot of people with Mickey Ears on. Hotel was very clean. Walgreens and cvs were within walking distance  The breakfast was good. We had a  5 k early sunday and they made us up some to g obreakfast  bags !!
Manager Response: So happy to read you enjoyed your stay!!

Summary Heading: Very Enjoyable Stay at Country Inn & Suites
Summary: We just returned home from out stay at this hotel for 4 nights.  I have nothing negative to say about this hotel.  It is brand new, well kept and clean, and it is very close to Disneyland (about a 10 minute walk).  Very nice continental breakfast included with free wifi and free parking.  Staff were very friendly and approachable.  Great stay.  I would definitely recommend this hotel to anyone staying in Anaheim.
Manager Response: Thank you for the wonderful review!

Summary: We had a fifth floor Suite on the South side of the building.  Excellent room, better than expected.  Large, clean, new, floor-to-ceiling glass, nice little "living room".  The free breakfast is anemic at best, definitely not up to the quality of the rest of the hotel.  Would stay here again in suite.
Manager Response: Thank you for the wonderful review!

Summary: We like Radisson so we stayed here one night on our way to San Diego. The room was very nice and the location great for Disneland visitors. The pool looked great too. What we did not like was the breakfast.  It was way below par for a hotel in this price range.
Manager Response: Thank you for reaching out to write your review.  I'm sorry to read you did not enjoy breakfast.  We are working to ensure quality and everyone is satisfied.

Summary: Everything was great.  We really enjoyed our stay.  The front desk staff, Jesse, Nina & Jonathan were fantastic. The breakfast staff kept the food replenished and hot.  The room was clean and very roomy.  Parking was no problem.
Manager Response: Thank you for the wonderful review!!!

Summary: The staff was absolutely amazing.  It's a brand new build so everything was pristine and the design was nice but not too obtrusive.  It's not pet friendly but I had my service dog and the staff literally fell in love with him and played with him every time we walked through the lobby.  I didn't get a chance to use the pool or jacuzzi or any of the amenities for that matter as I was on a very busy work schedule but they all looked extremely nice... I am still bummed I didn't get to take a dip in the heated pool and jacuzzi!!  It's walking distance to the House of Blues and Downtown Disney so would be a great spot to stay on a vacation as well.
Manager Response: We are delighted to read you had an enjoyable stay!

Summary: We spent 4 night at the Country Inn and Suites in Anaheim.  The room was nice. We did have a major issue with no hot water. I went to take a bath ran water to half full and the water was ice cold. I had to play with the faucet for about a half hour and finally got hot water. The next morning no hot water. Talked to the front desk and was told sorry we'll work on it. A hotel should have hot water. Also no silverware or glasses for juice at breakfast. Very basic breakfast not what was expected at Country Inn. A shuttle to Disney would be nice.
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing your experience as well as your patience during our issues with consistent hot water.  We are working diligently to ensure we are providing a quality breakfast.

Summary: Room was great, bed was comfortable.  Overall, great room and location to Disneyland Parks.  But eat somewhere else, unless money is very tight, then early early.  Food tends to run out and is of less quality.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to write your review.  We are working to streamline our breakfast and provide a quality breakfast.  Thank you for your patience during our learning period.

Summary: I like this hotel definateley would stay again. Breakfast was great variety and close to disneyland a short walk away and a lot of stuff around. all around a great experiance the kids had a blast and so did we
Manager Response: So happy to read you had a great stay.  Thank you for your wonderful review!

Summary: My husband and I stayed Fri and Sat night this weekend. Our favorite hotel when we come Disneyland was booked so we ran across this one. Thinking this may a new favorite. Decor is nice and modern, BUT that is the only good thing about this place.  We drove 8 hours, arrived at 9:15pm,  front desk explained the ammenties available, we mentioned we were hungry and we're told we could get sandwiches or salads from the the bar until 10:30. Starved, we put our things away and came down to get some food, bartender told us kitchen was closed and recommended we walk down the street or have something delivered in. Fine, we went out and had dinner. When getting ready for bed I saw there were stains on our duvet cover on our king bed. You can hear the highway, but other than that ok.
Manager Response: Thank you very much for sharing your concerns.  I will be more than happy to use this as a training effort to offer a prompt solution for any future instances.  Thank you for your patience.  We truly appreciate your time in writing your review.

Summary Heading: Huge potential, still working out a few wrinkles
Summary: The location is excellent (a 10-minute walk from the gates of Disney). The room we stayed in was large and clean. The pool is exceptional. The advertised amenities (specifically: guest-accessible laundry facility and restaurant) were not completed at the time of our stay, yet still on the website (and a deciding factor) when we booked. Pleasant, helpful staff. Not a great breakfast experience.
Manager Response: Thank you for your patience during our opening delays.  We are working to ensure all the items you wrote about have been corrected.

Summary Heading: Nice rooms, Issues with breakfast and service
Summary: Stayed at this hotel over President's Day weekend (2/16/17 - 2/20/17).  Traveled with wife and two year old daughter.  The rooms are nice, large and quiet.  They are the main reason I can give this hotel three stars.  Neighbors also had small children and we only know because we saw them in the hallway.   The breakfast was not good.  This is due to a few issues: (1)  Not enough seating - even if hotel is at capacity, facilities are supposed to be designed for worst case.  People were forced to sit in the lobby couches or just stand around until tables opened.  When trying to adhere to a schedule the situation is frustrating.  (2)  Constantly out of coffee and food items - Every morning we had to wait until the coffee was refilled, and even after it was refilled the container did
Manager Response: Thank you for reaching our to write your review.  We understand your concerns during breakfast and are working on streamlining our mornings to provide a better service to our guests.  More importantly, we would like to thank you for your patience.

Summary: We had a wonderful stay. I loved the modern feel of the hotel and everything pretty much met our expectations. It's a little bit of a walk from Disneyland but not super far. Overall, our stay there was perfect.
Manager Response: So happy to read you enjoyed your stay.  Thank you for taking the time to write your review.

Summary: I found this hotel on a web search.  I read the reviews of many other hotels in the area that were old and noisy with paper thin walls but 'recently renovated' knowing that even if you slap a new coat of paint, that won't  block the sound of loud neighbours.  I decided to try Country Inn & Suites since it was new and I'm so glad I did!  Based on a recommendation I read, I requested a room away from the freeway, and it was nice and quiet.  This hotel, being brand new, is beautiful and sparkling clean.  The walk to Disney took our family 12 minutes.  The front desk staff were so friendly and our room was spacious and modern.  The gift shop had drinks, snacks, Disney merchandise and toiletries.  The breakfast included eggs, bacon or sausage, biscuits, waffles, yogurt, fruit,
Manager Response: Thank you for the wonderful review!!

Summary Heading: Wow! Really impressed with our first stay!
Summary: If you don't want to shell out the dollars to stay on-site, this is a GREAT alternative to the overpriced Theme Park hotels.  Every staff member was friendly and interactive, asking us about our day and asking what they can do to help.  Any issues with the water stated in previous reviews, have been taken care of.  When the shuttle is running from the Pumbaa parking lot, right across the street, you can hop aboard and save yourself the 10 minute walk from the Resort.  The breakfast was hit or miss...the eggs were not fresh and the coffee and condiments weren't refilled as regularly as they should be.  But other than that, a family with full tummies to start the day is a great way to start the day in the Parks!!!
Manager Response: Good News!  Our shuttle stop is in! Look forward to seeing you when you return to Disney.    We are working to streamline breakfast to ensure its quality is consistent.  Thank you for your patience during our period of growth.

Summary Heading: Wanted so badly to give 5 stars
Summary: We arrived to this new hotel and were amazed at how modern and clean it was.  The desk staff was very friendly, helpful, and had fresh cookies for us.  The room was nice, but we struggled initially with the bathroom lights.  We eventually figured out that there is a device by the front door in which you put your room key card to activate the lights.    Breakfast started at 7 am.  We arrived at 7:20 and the doors were closed.  We asked if we could come in and began to serve ourselves, with the exception of eggs, which they were still waiting on.  No biggie, but Disney opened at 8 am, and I think some families wanted to hit breakfast and have enough time for park opening.  My wife and I stayed two nights total.  The second night, my wife wanted a shower after being at the parks
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to write your review as well as patience during your stay.  We are working to ensure those items are being resolved and providing the best experience to our guests.  I am very happy to read you and your family loved our hotel.

Summary Heading: New Hotel, Close to Disneyland, BUT be sure to ask information on Free Night Promo if you booked that rate
Summary: Stayed here back at the end of December for two nights during the holiday week for a visit to Disneyland.  Everything is new and it has a modern country theme (like Fixer Upper) as per the hotel name.  Free breakfast in the morning, and Fridge & microwave in the room were a plus.  It was also a short 15 minute walk to the Disneyland Entrance so no worries about parking.
