I did also encounter the hot water issue back in December as mentioned in earlier reviews, but have stayed here a second time in January and everything was resolved by then.  For the hotel itself I'd give it 5 stars.  But I did have an issue with the promo rate I booked which was the Holiday Free Night offer in which you receive a free night for staying 2 nights.  Being new to this chain, I didn't know how this
Manager Response: Thank you for letting us know about your type of booking.  We are happy to see that was resolved and your points awarded.   Please accept our apologies for the miscommunication.

Summary: This hotel has so much potential – they just need to work out some issues.    I selected this hotel due to the proximity of DL, price and the fact it was new meant it should be clean.   Even with all the cons noted below, I still rate this as Very Good based on what I paid for the room and expectations.     Pro:  •	The front desk staff & bar staff were friendly and helpful.    •	Provided great directions to locations to purchase bottles of wine and later asked if we found it okay.     •	Responsive when we had questions about the room (how to turn on lights). •	Easy walking distance to Disneyland •	Clean •	Large room (we had a king suite) Con: •	Outlets in the bathroom did not work.   Told front desk and while we were gone facilities came to check it.  Unfortunately they weren't
Manager Response: Thank you so very much for your comments as well as suggestions.  We are working to streamline our breakfast to ensure every item is quality and satisfying for our guests.  Thank you for your patience during our growing process.

Summary: Stayed @ new Country Inn & Suites in late January. Incredible property for the money! Walk to Disney with your family or stay on business and enjoy the value. Brand new property - clean and modern. Entry is warm and inviting - fireplace and lounge, full bar, great breakfast and socializing space. Rooms were well appointed, clean and modern decor. Staff was great - friendly and informative. Came with family and enjoyed the resort style pool (large infinity pool + HT).. Awesome stay and experience - highly recommend, especially for the money. Would stay here every time.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to write such a wonderful review!!  We are so delighted to read you and your family enjoyed your stay.

Summary Heading: Incorrect charges took too long to be fixed
Summary: While the staff was very nice, I’m disappointed that it took about 20 minutes to get charges fixed. I had booked this through hotels.com and had e-mailed receipts that showed what I would be charged, and yet I was charged more. Something about how tax wasn’t included in the resort fee, or other fees, and how there had been glitches before with Expedia/hotels.com sites not calculating the taxes correctly. I said that if I was supposed to be charged a certain amount, then that’s what I should pay; any glitches shouldn’t adversely affect the customer. So it was fixed, but only about $1—still not the correct amount. Finally it was fixed, but it took about 20 minutes to get this done. I know it was only about a $6 difference, but the points are I shouldn’t have been charged more than
Manager Response: Thank you for your patience with the incorrect charge.  We are working to avoid any similar errors in the future.

Summary: I am very happy to share that my stay was amazing at this new hotel near Disneyland.  I am very particular with my hotels, especially with my young children.  I did not even feel grossed out once while sleeping here.  I will definetly come back!
Manager Response: Thank you for the wonderful review!

Summary: We stayed here for a weekend trip to Disneyland. Took Uber to the Park in the mornings and walked home at night which was about 20 minutes. Will definitely stay here again, the beds were super comfortable and the staff was very friendly!
Manager Response: Thank you for the wonderful review!

Summary: This is a brand new hotel that is within walking distance to Disneyland and the Anaheim Gardenwalk.  Check-in was quick. Parking was free and adequate for the number of guests. The room was spacious and clean and we were able to control the room temperature. The complimentary high-speed internet worked without any issues. The complimentary breakfast was usual hotel breakfast food but did have hot options like oatmeal, waffles, eggs, etc...Although it was cool when we went, the outdoor pool appeared to be a very nice size.  After reading several reviews I was worried about the water not working. The front desk was very transparent about prior challenges since the opening but assured us that everything had been fixed. The hot water was working! The hotel website mentioned an
Manager Response: Thank you for reaching out to write your review.  We are very delighted to see you enjoyed yourself and our staff made for a memorable stay.  I will be sure to relay your positive comments!

Summary: The hotel was completely new, so everything was clean and new, staff were friendly and helpful.  Negative points: there is no safety box in the rooms! The breakfast was so limited, just few items, no sausages, no cheese at all.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to write your review.  We are working diligently to get the safes into the rooms and appreciate your patience during that period.  But we are happy to read you enjoyed our facilities!  Look forward to your next visit.

Summary: I stayed here the first week of January. Brand new hotel, nice decor. When I checked in I made a special request and the lady at the front desk was able to make it happen. Everyone was friendly. A different breakfast every morning. I'd say a 15 minute walk to Disneyland with a child.  Unfortunately, my first night there something happened with the sprinkler system so the fire alarm went off and we had to evacuate. Unfortunately, again, it was on the floor I was staying on. I think the staff could have kept us a little more informed about what was going on. Besides that, the rooms were clean and very large. I enjoyed my stay there.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to write your review as well as your patience during your stay.  I'm very happy to read you enjoyed your stay despite our fire alarm disturbance.  We have discussed with the staff the importance of communicating with our guests.

Summary: Well I choose this hotel for my stay as it was new and it's closeness to Disneyland. Price of hotel was good because it was only open 3 weeks. I'm sure it will be higher as summer comes. You do pay a $11 resort fee daily which is higher as they don't tell you there is taxes on that as well. The room had a few problems with no hot water, but they moved us to another room that worked. Hopefully they will get all the bugs out of hotel soon.The staff was very friendly and helpful. The pool area is awesome nice pool and jacuzzi hot tub. This area will be great in summertime. They serve a hot breakfast  every morning, some days were better than others. I can see it being very crowed at times. But overall is was great for me to have a hot meal. Parking is also free, parking lot no the
Manager Response: Thank you for reaching out to write your review.  I will ensure our front desk agents are properly communicating all property information.  We truly appreciate your feedback and glad to see you enjoyed your stay.

Summary: We had a very nice stay at this new hotel.   Location was great and we will very likely stay here again.   Hopefully when we come back the restaurant will be up and running as it was only available for breakfast when we stayed.  Otherwise, we liked the hotel, the room & the location for getting around the area as it was very close to "The 5".
Manager Response: Our bistro is now open and serving food in the evening.  Look forward to having you return.

Summary: We stayed 5 nights. Had a very comfortable stay, hotel was under staffed for first 2 days but staff are very hard working professional and friendly providing great service I really enjoyed meeting the bartender who makes great drinks . Pool and hot tub are superb. You can book the rooms on 5th floor facing Disney  land to view the fireworks from comfort of ur room. Breakfast buffet got better toward end of our stay with nice and strong coffee. Fast and free Wifi . free use of computers and printer if needed. Rooms come with fridge and microwave . You wont be disappointed to stay here if you don't mind walking 15-20 min to main gate of Disney.
Manager Response: Thank you for your feedback and for taking the time to write about your experience.  We are delighted to read that you enjoyed our brand new hotel.   Thank you for your patience, I will make sure to address the staffing.  We look forward to your next stay.

Summary: I ran past this property while it was under construction in September during a runDisney half marathon and was excited to be able to stay here for the Star Wars Lightside Half Marathon weekend this month! We were greeted by Liz at the front desk and she could not have been more genuine, kind and welcoming! There was a slight discrepancy with our rate and they handled it quickly and with a great attitude! We arrived early in the morning, so they held our bags so that we could enjoy some time at Disneyland until a room was available. The room was very spacious, clean and quiet. There was TONS of HOT water!! I saw there had been a issue with other reviewers, but we were never lacking for hot water. The breakfast was not amazing (mostly simple carbs, lots of sugar, breaded chicken
Manager Response: Thank you for your feedback and for taking the time to write about your experience.  We are delighted to read that you enjoyed our new property. We look forward to your next stay.  And I will for sure congratulate Liz on a job well done!

Summary: We stayed at this hotel for 3 nights in January. They had just opened December 14th, so the hotel was/is essentially brand new. The front desk staff were all friendly and very helpful. The hotel is extremely clean and welcoming. We stayed in a room with 2 queen beds and the decor was very tasteful and modern. The room included a microwave as well as a refrigerator. So if you are traveling with medications, you may find the fridge extremely useful, particularly as it comes at no extra cost. The TV has more than enough cable channels to keep you and/or your travel party entertained. I would also like to add that the hot water issue was fixed and our water worked as expected.   Breakfast is also included, and is served buffet style. This is one area where I thought the experience
Manager Response: Thank you for your feedback and for taking the time to write about your experience.  We are delighted to read that you enjoyed our brand new hotel!!  We look forward to your next stay.  I will make sure to pass on your suggestions as well as positive comments.

Summary: This hotel is brand new so it was very nice. Staff was very friendly and helpful. Room was nice very comfortable. Breakfast was average, but it's free. It is within walking distance of Disneyland little over 1/2 mile. We had no issues while staying here. I will definitely stay here whenever I go to Disney.
Manager Response: Thank you for your feedback and for taking the time to write about your experience.  We are delighted to read that you enjoyed our brand new property!!  We look forward to your next stay.  I will pass on your positive comments to our staff.

Summary: Overall I have to say that this hotel was very clean and everyone we spoke to at the front desk carried themselves very well.  They provide free wifi and breakfast is included every morning!  Country Inn is great for families and little ones and did I mention it's NEW!  Don't think about it too hard when deciding on a location close to Disneyland.  My only two complaints if any were the towels which had a little too much lint on them and the fact that no shuttle is provided to Disneyland.  It is about a 10 minute walk, but think about it when traveling with little ones especially at the end of a long day.  Wear some Adidas Ultra Boost lol
Manager Response: Thank you for your feedback and for taking the time to write about your experience.  We are delighted to read that you enjoyed our brand new hotel!! We look forward to your next stay.  Hope your feet have recovered!!

Summary: We just stayed here over the weekend and the hotel is awesome. Most of the "Disney" area hotels are dated and fairly run down. This one is brand new, they said it has been open less than a month. Everything is clean and new. There is a nice bar, pool, hot tub and lounge. There is a little area for kids to watch videos while you check in/out. Breakfast (included) is the usual basic stuff but it works for a quick bite before Disneyland. The hotel is about a 10-15 minute easy walk from the park and right across the street from Pumbaa parking lot if you want to take a shuttle.  There is plenty of parking and it is free (amazingly) at the hotel. The staff is wonderful and the service was great. I will stay here for all my future Anaheim visits.
Manager Response: We are so happy to read you enjoyed your stay at our brand new property!!  We appreciate your kind words and hope to see you again in the future.

Summary: You can see the Tower of Terror from the hotel. It's pretty new and walking distance to the park. Parking was free. Breakfast free. Wifi free. All things we want and at the price we want to pay. You can even take the Pumba shuttle back to the hotel after the park and the walk is even shorter!
Manager Response: So happy to read you enjoyed your stay at our brand new hotel!

Summary: This hotel is brand new , which was a key decision when we booked . All the staff we encountered were incredibly helpful and friendly . Hotel itself is nicely decorated . There's a kids TV corner next to front desk which is great for little ones to enjoy while you check in . Rooms were nicely decorated , nothing spectacular but tasteful and modern . Everything is new which was a plus. Beds are pretty darn firm . If your looking for pillow top or softer definitely Not these beds , ..my back was sore in morning . Water pressure was low for baths but not a biggie. The breakfast was nice, pretty good options. Area itself was very nice modern decor . Think they are still fine tuning everything. They could use more fresh options , muffins etc and side options .. but it's free so no
Manager Response: Thank you so much for the wonderful review! I am so happy to read you and your family enjoyed your stay.  We also very much appreciate your patience as we "fine tuned" our operations.  Can't wait to see you in the future!

Summary: The hotel was great. Staff were very friendly and helpful. Rooms are beautiful and spacious. The beds are very comfortable. Breakfast was quick and easy. The hotel is conveniently located next to Disney park parking so it is easy to walk to and catch the shuttle. Will definitely stay again.
Manager Response: Thank you for the wonderful review!

Summary: Stood here for NYE weekend it was a sweet experience. Hotel is brand spanking new, it was literally built from scratch a few months ago; opened it's doors on xmas week. The hotel as you can imagine is super clean and beautiful. The rooms are decent size and so are the bathrooms. Room has mini fridge, coffee maker (better coffee quality would be nice though), and microwave. I was a bit upset because it didn't have a safe where we could leave all our valuable items in. The pillows they had really sucked because they're cheap; i kept stacking my pillows and they would just not work out for me. Other than that the room is great. The staff are great and friendly; special shout out to Fernando who took care of us. Unfortunately for us when we arrived they were having hot water issues.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for your patience with not having hot water and our breakfast.  We have fixed our hot water and are working everyday to ensure high quality breakfast items are plentiful.  I am happy to read you enjoyed your stay and will pass on your positive comments to Fernando.

Summary: This hotel is a 10-15 minutes walk to Disneyland so you don't have to drive your car to the park and stay on the long lines!!  The room was clean and the shower is great! They have a microwave, a coffee machine and a empty minibar in the room. The breakfast was really simple, not a lot of options, but at least is free!
Manager Response: Thank you for the wonderful review!

Summary: We stayed here for 1 night on the second floor. This Hotel was nice and modern. The breakfast in the morning was good, but more staff is needed to keep up with the food. The front desk staff was pleasant and welcoming. We were not here for Disneyland, but it looks like a  good hotel to stay at in the future.
Manager Response: Thank you for the wonderful review!  We are working to ensure our staffing levels are adequate.  We look forward to having you stay with us in the future.

Summary: Hotel was only a few weeks old and is right off the 5 freeway.  Stayed New Years Eve so we could attend Pirates Dinner Adventure NYE show (which was awesome BTW!).  Upon check in we were informed that the hotel had no hot water, but we were told that they were ACTIVELY working on the problem (they did discount the price of the room).    So in all honesty I figured they would have it fixed by the morning.  Come mid-morning, there was still no hot water.  I see on another review that on 12/30 they had no hot water, and earlier in December they had hot water issues.  This should have been fixed, and having no hot water is actually a habitability issue.  The hotel shouldn't have been taking reservations, and shouldn't make it sound like the issue will be fixed within a few hours
Manager Response: We are sorry to hear that you were not satisfied with the “Be Our Guest” Breakfast.  We are working hard to ensure fresh food is provided and that each item is available for all of our guests.  And thank you for your patience for the hot water issues during your stay.  Our plumbing vendor worked diligently on solving the issue however it did take longer than expected.  Your review gives us the opportunity to correct any deficiencies we may have in our service.  We hope you will give us another chance if you are in the area again.

Summary: OK. So the hotel has only been opened less than 2 weeks, but still, this is a Carlson property.  Having to run the shower and sink faucets 45 minutes (literally) to get warm water to the 5th floor was not good.  Come on, 45 minutes, really?  And the breakfast was equally as bad.  They kept running out of food, plates, utensils, juices, no milk, etc. And it wasn't even crowded.  The kitchen was understaffed, understocked, and not prepared.  Then there was the wi-fi.  We had to log in every time we wanted to use it.  It wouldn't let our devices store the login info.  The hotel staff was very gracious, acknowledged the issues, and to be (somewhat) fair, they gave us a generous credit on our bill for the issues.
Manager Response: Thank you for reaching out to write your review.  And, more importantly, thank you for your patience during your stay.  The hot water issue was unforeseen and our staff and outside contractor did their best to work diligently to find a resolution.  I have discussed the breakfast quality and amounts with our staff to ensure we are offering our best "Be Our Guest Breakfast".  Your review gives us the opportunity to correct any deficiencies we may have in our service.  We hope you will give us another chance if you are in the area again.

Summary: I usually don't do reviews, but this is the exception. What an amazing beautiful romantic hotel. The hotel just opened, literally a few days ago. Breathtaking view of the Disney firework show from the bar and pool. Tishoro was our bartender, I would recommend stopping by and having a drink. We will be back just to have drinks and watch the fireworks. Gary the General Manager was so nice, stopped by and talked to us and showed us around.  We are local to the area, but have discovered our new favorite goto getaway.
Manager Response: Dear Samantha W.  Thank You for your staying with us, we are really happy you enjoyed your stay. We appreciate the kind words you have to say about the hotel our bartender and our GM the Hotel and we look forward to seeing you on your next getaway.
